This kit exclusively features both Steeda products Cold Air Intake (555-3198) and High Flow Inlet Tube (555-3130) for upgraded power and torque!

This billet 6061 aluminum insert allows you to run your factory tune and 87 octane fuel. No computer flash is required!! This is due to Steeda's exclusive velocity stack design and high flow air filter while maintaining all the factory cold air feeds.

The Pro-Flow intake tube is available in a high temperature heat resistant plastic or available in real carbon fiber. Comes with a blue hose.

The best part of both this kit is once you want to upgrade to a Steeda performance tune you can! Simply remove the billed insert from the mass air meter and enjoy even more tire burning horse power and torque!!

Like all Steeda manufactured parts this too features an exclusive life time warranty.

Product Benefits

  • Allows you to maintain your factory tune!
  • Easy bolt in installation
  • Power increase at all RPM ranges
  • Life time warranty!

Note: Federal and several state and provincial laws prohibit the removal modification or rendering inoperative of any part that affects emissions or safety on motor vehicles used on public streets or highways. It is the responsibility of the customer to determine if their modified vehicle complies with applicable laws.

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

*Over 20+ hp increase with tuning alone*

SCT's X4 tuning device is he latest evolution of the X series of tuning devices from SCT. SCT's X4 features great improvements in design and use. This unit is a smaller more compact device than the X3 it replaces.

The X4 features a larger brighter easy to read color screen with auto dim and user adjustable portrait and landscape modes. The device holds up to 10 custom tunes which can be supplied by SCT custom tuning dealers and also includes pre-loaded strategy files from SCT.

Now with built in Wifi the device can be connected to any wireless network and will allow you to install any software updates released by SCT right through the device without a PC.

In addition the X4 offers improved datalogging capabilities right through the device or when used in conjunction with a laptop and SCT's Live Link software.

Note: For custom tuning applications please provide the vehicles 4 digit processor code with your order.

Note: Purchase of this item enrolls you in the Lifetime Tunes Program. To read more about the Lifetime Tunes Program Click Here.

Warning: This part has been designed and is intended for off-road application only. Installation of this part on a vehicle that is driven on public roads may violate U.S. and Canadian laws and regulations.

Product Benefits

  • Larger adjustable screen with landscape and portrait modes
  • Holds up to 10 custom tunes
  • On screen datalogging and monitoring
  • Wireless connectivity

Time to install: About 15 Minutes

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: No Tools

@19@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@19@^http://www.steeda.com/ford-racing-mustang-calibration-track-cal-161-m-14204-mgttc/^@^Steeda^@^Ford Racing Mustang Calibration Track Cal - (13-14) 5.0L GT^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/2-Track-Cal.jpg^@^161-M-14204-MGTTC^@^

Track Cal is a Ford Racing exclusive calibration that provide added functionality to 2013-2014 Mustang GT's with a manual transmission.

The calibration includes these exclusive features:
column2: >Driver adjustable Launch Control or "2-step engine speed limiting"
column3: >Driver adjustable Pit Lane Speed Control
column4: >Lopey idle (we recommend Mustang GT side exhaust kit M-5220-MB to maximize the lopey idle experience)
column5:
>Improved engine performance- Up to 60lb-ft at 1500rpm & peak increases of 16 hp and 7 lb-ft on 93 octane fuel

Track Cal is supplied via our exclusive Pro-Cal flash tool. It is always active but lopey idle can be turned off. Available for all 2013-2014 Mustang GT's with manual transmission.

Track Cal contains exclusive calibration features designed for track use and derived from the same software algorithms and features employed in Ford Racing turn-key race cars such as the Boss 302R Boss 302S and Cobra Jet.

Engine performance is similar to the calibration available in the Ford Racing M-FR1-MGTB kit and modifies several PCM parameters including:
column6: >Twin Independent Variable Cam Timing (TiVCT)
column12:
>Throttle response

Alters several thousand lines of code and several hundred calibration parameters. The only calibration of that has gone through the rigorous Ford Racing test procedures. 50 state legal aftermarket engine performance software upgrade for the 2013-2014 Mustang GT with Manual Transmission

Product Benefits
column13: >Driver adjustable Launch Control or "2-step engine speed limiting"
column14: >Driver adjustable Pit Lane Speed Control
column15: >Lopey idle (we recommend Mustang GT side exhaust kit M-5220-MB to maximize the lopey idle experience)
column16:
>Improved engine performance- Up to 60lb-ft at 1500rpm & peak increases of 16 hp and 7 lb-ft on 93 octane fuel

If you own an Android based or Apple touch phone or tablet then you can tune your vehicle!

SCT's Android TSX/Apple iTSX device is a bluetooth wireless device that will interface with your phone or tablet and allow it to become a tuning device to program your car with SCT's latest tuning programs or custom tunes from any SCT tuning dealer.

After purchasing this programming device interface you simply download the free app for your device from either the Apple Itunes store or Android's Google Play marketplace. SCT's app lets you control the vehicle-tuning and monitoring capabilities of the TSX/iTSX Wireless OBD-II Interface the The wireless OBD-II Interface plugs into your vehicle's OBD-II diagnostic connector and communicates with your Apple or Android device via a secure Bluetooth wireless connection.

Tuning capabilities are just one of the software package's many features. The TSX/iTSX system will allow you to measure 0 to 60 1/8th mile and 1/4 mile performance braking performance from 60 to zero on screen gauges with adjustable warnings and full diagnostic datalogging capabilities as well.

This system is the most innovative and versatile tuning system on the market for your Ford Mustang with wide vehicle support datalogging capabilities and custom tuning support. Get your TSX/iTSX device today and start truly enjoying your vehicle!

Note: Supports Android based phones and tablets as well as Apple iPHONE iPOD Touch and iPAD via bluetooth connection

Warning: This part has been designed and is intended for off-road application only. Installation of this part on a vehicle that is driven on public roads may violate U.S. and Canadian laws and regulations.

Product Benefits

  • Works via Bluetooth with Apple iOS devices and Android devices
  • Huge virtual gauges when used with a tablet
  • Datalog and monitor vehicle engine data via virtual on screen gauges
  • Will accept STEEDA custom tunes and custom tunes from SCT tuning dealers
  • Performs 0-60 1/8th mile and 1/4 mile performance testing

Time to install: About 15 Minutes

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: No Tools

@23@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@23@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-certified-mustang-custom-tune/^@^Steeda^@^Certified Steeda Lifetime Mustang Custom Tunes (96-15)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/6/steeda-certified-mustang-custom-tune-999-TUNE-4-LIFE.jpg^@@^

Own an SCT tuning device and want to have the most advanced safest most reliable custom tuning available on the market? Then purchase our Lifetime Tunes option and receive our Steeda Certified Custom tunes for your vehicle for as long as you own that vehicle and tuning device. Steeda Certified Custom tunes pass our rigorous standards for performance durability and driveability and have an impeccable safety record. Developed and tested on our in house dyno as well as though hundreds of hours of field testing both on the street and some of the most demanding race tracks in the country you can be sure our tunes will deliver safe reliable power.

Custom tuning is delivered via email. Delivery times is 3 to 4 business days. If you are ordering separate products do not install your products that require tuning until the tune has been delivered.

Note: Our program only covers the original vehicle owned at the time the customer entered the Lifetime Tunes program. New vehicles will require a new purchase of either a tuning device or a new Lifetime Tunes program purchase. Modifications that require dyno tuning are not covered by the Lifetime Tunes program. These types of modifications include but are not limited to:

Warning: This part has been designed and is intended for off-road application only. Installation of this part on a vehicle that is driven on public roads may violate U.S. and Canadian laws and regulations.

  • Aftermarket Fuel Injectors
  • Aftermarket Non OEM Superchargers
  • Nitrous Systems
  • Major Engine Changes (stroker engines compression changes cylinder heads)
  • Crate Motor &

Steeda's G/Trac Suspension Systems include everything needed to build an awesome handling car with excellent street manners. Steeda designed these parts using Computer Aided Design (CAD) software and the experience gained from years at the racetrack. Each stage provides an outstanding improvement in performance and a well balanced car in an affordable package.

Stage 3 completes the suspension. Your total G/Trac suspension completely transforms an average performer into a world class sports car capable of out-handling anything on the road.

  • Aluminum Lower Control Arms reduce unsprung weight and dramatically improve traction and control while maintaining a smooth quiet ride.
  • Lightweight high strength Tubular Front Swaybar reduces body roll for flatter more stable and faster cornering.
  • Our exclusive Offset Front A-Arm bushings push the control arms forward to improve weight distribution and steering response. Bushings are formed from special urethane compounds for ride quality superior to typical urethane or Delron.
  • 4130 Chrome-Moly Alloy Subframe Connectors reduce body twist and improve handling by strengthening the structure which supports the suspension. These connectors prevent fatigue from shortening the life of your car.

Steeda's ST-R mesh wheel is designed to clear most popular big brake kits such as Steeda's 14 inch 4 piston brake set up.

Note: 2007 and up vehicles must have tire pressure system sensors transfered to new wheels for proper system operation. Tire pressure system programming tool is available separately.

Steeda's G/Trac Suspension Systems include everything needed to build an awesome handling car with excellent street manners. Steeda's G/Trac suspension components are proven components tested through decades of experience gained from street and racetrack testing.

Each stage provides an outstanding improvement in performance and a well balanced car at the end of each stage. This means you do not have to do each stage in numerical order to achieve improvements. Each stage can be done individually at any time as your budget or upgrade needs dictate.

Steeda’s Stage 1 suspension package lays the foundation for proper handling and builds a base for any future modifications by addressing three essential elements needed for performance.

  • Sport Lowering Springs lower the center of gravity and reduce body roll while maintaining the great ride quality Steeda springs are known for.
  • Strut Tower and lower G/Trac braces stiffen the body structure to stabilize the suspension during hard cornering and reduce body shake and rattles. Steeda G/Trac bars are included with 86-93 cars. 94+ have factory G/Trac style bars so our kits do not include them.
  • Caster Camber Plates allow you to set proper alignment and improve caster geometry while eliminating suspension “slop” at the top of the strut tower. Improved caster gives you straighter highway tracking with less wander and better self centering steering feel. Increased caster also gives you better tire contact patch area during braking or better more consistent braking performance.

Time to install: About 7 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

The 3dCarbon Mach 3 rear spoiler does not block the view of the factory third brake light and covers the holes left by stock factory wing. This rear wing installs with a combination of 3M automotive bonding tape and hardware for extra security.

This 3dCarbon Mustang Mach 3 Spoiler is made from a from high-pressure injected molded polyurethane material for its flexibility and long lasting durability.

The 3DCarbon 3-piece Mach 3 Rear Wing Spoiler fits all 2005 to 2009 Mustangs including the V6 GT Bullitt and Shelby GT500 models.

BBK's tuned mid length headers for the 2011 Mustang feature all the great features you've come to expect from BBK headers over their many years manufacturing quality made in the USA exhaust components.

Starting with their 1 piece laser cut 3/8"
column2: flanges for a perfect leak free seal. BBK used large 1 3/4&quot
column3:
mandrel bent tubes for maximum flow.

When combined with their after cat X-pipe gains of up to 14 horsepower have been achieved on an otherwise bone stock 5.0L Coyote engine. You can expect even more gains on highly modified vehicles. Gains start early in the power band for an increase in power over the entire RPM range.

BBK's after cat X-pipe bolts directly after the factory catalytic converters for an easy bolt on installation.

Headers are available in Silver Ceramic Coated Chrome Plated or 304 Stainless Steel construction.

Product Benefits

  • Up to 14hp over a factory stock 5.0L coyote engine
  • Direct bolt on installation
  • Well known BBK quality and fit

Improve the steering on your 1994-04 Mustang with this Flaming River 20.1 steering rack and pinion installation kit. This rack and pinion kit will reduce weight off the front of your vehicle and provide smooth responsive steering. The manual rack is ideal for drag race applications.

This cast aluminum rack and pinion kit eliminates the power rack pump pulley and rag joint for a total vehicle weight reduction of more than 30 lbs. Flaming River manual rack and pinion steering systems feature chrome plated center tubes and two mounting holes and are designed to meet the standards of professional street rod and race car chassis builders.

This rack and pinion kit is a direct bolt-in replacement. The kit includes a 20.1 manual steering rack high performance collapsible steering shaft kit 2 tie rod ends and 2 piece mounting bushings. Flaming River manual racks weigh less than 15lbs.

@121@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@121@^http://www.steeda.com/2005-2010-mustang-lightweight-radiator-support-555-5075/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Lightweight Radiator Support (05-10)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-5075.jpg^@^555-5075^@^

Steeda's Lightweight Tubular Front Radiator Support was the first one on the market that allowed you to maintain your front swaybar and reduce weight at the same time! Our competitors took years before catching on to this.

Our engineers designed this support from super strong and light 4130 chrome moly alloy steel material. This resulted in a tubular support that is much lighter than the factory piece. Your factory radiator support weighs in at 17 pounds our easy to install radiator support comes in at less than 7 pounds for an easy 10+ pound weight reduction off the front of the car. That is over half the weight of the stock steel unit and yet is still strong enough for you to run your front swaybar when not at the drag strip and tough enough to withstand the rigors of autocross and road course competition. This support is the perfect item for the road course/autocross car to reduce front end weight and improve weight distribution.

Compared to changing the K-member our tubular radiator support improves weight distribution by 0.3% and takes weight right off the nose of the car which is ideal. A typical tubular K-member improves weight distribution 0.4% yet costs many hundreds of dollars more is much more complicated/costly to install which ads even more cost and is not removing weight from the front nose of the vehicle making ours the best bang for your buck piece for performance and weight reduction.

Our tubular radiator support works with or without the swaybar. Fits the factory original Steeda and most aftermarket front swaybars.

Our radiator support is tig welded and powdercoated in silver metal flake which makes for a great looking piece. It accepts all factory hardware also. This brace bolts directly in place of the factory piece and can be installed by practically anyone in their garage or driveway.

Product Benefits

  • Made from High Strength 4130 Steel
  • Light weight and lose it off the front of the car!
  • OEM Quality and Easy installation
  • A Must for any Hardcore Drag strip enthusist

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column1: @127@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@127@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-triax-2005-2010-mustang-short-throw-shifter-555-7305/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Tri-Ax Mustang Short Throw Shifter (05-10)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/555-7305.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-7305-5.jpg
column4:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/555-7305(2).jpg^@^555-7305^@^

The Steeda Tri-Ax shifter has always led the way in performance. With this latest revision the evolution of this shifter continues and is the best version yet!

The factory steel mounting rail is replaced with a substantial billet beam for more positive location
column5:
and upgraded rear mounting bushings are supplied to further reduce deflection under hard shifting. The shifter base handle and beam are all CNC machined by Steeda from 6061 aluminum.

For the ultimate in accuracy and precision the internal shift lever mechanism now pivots off a high quality spherical bearing that has been throughly tested to insure it withstands our standard of 1.5 million+ shifts without failure. Our 2 position handle height a Steeda exclusive allows you to taylor the shifter for the best combination of throw length and comfortable reach.

Check out the great reviews for our shifter and place an order for the best shifter on the market today.

U.S. Utility Patent 7464621

Product Benefits

  • Superior patented Steeda technology!
  • Prevent damage to the transmission and linkage under hard usage
  • Never miss 3rd gear!
  • No complicated unnecessary adjustments unlike competitive designs
  • Proper shorter throw engineered to make shifting easy unlike other extremely short shifters that end up increasing shift effort making shifting more difficult and uncomfortable
  • No rubber used on main shifter shaft to wear out and cover up NVH
  • 3 lbs lighter than other (so-called) competing brands (Weight is the enemy of performance.)
  • Natural shifting feel not awkward to shift like other brands
  • No nylon bushing used in pivot to wear out like competitors. Tri-Ax was tested to 1.5 million shifts with no measurable wear!

Testimonial

I am not a performance driver anymore. These days my Mustang is my daily driver and weekend cruiser. So my needs in a short throw shifter are somewhat different than those of most enthusiasts. I wanted a shifter with a somewhat shorter throw than stock but still long enough for my relaxed shifting style. But most of all the shifter had to be as quiet as stock. I tried one of the very expensive performance shifters and liked the shorter throw but hated the amount of noise vibration and harshness (NVH) that it introduced so after about a month I went back to the shop and had them reinstall the stock shifter. I found out later that the NVH problem was due to damage caused by an improper installation so I don't know what it would have been like had it been properly installed.

Once back to using the stock shifter I realized how much I still wanted a shorter throw but without the NVH so I started asking around and came to the conclusion that the Steeda Short Throw Shifter might be my best option. After some conversation with the helpful people at Steeda I ordered and received their shifter. I had a different shop do the installation this time. Driving away after the installation I noticed an immediate difference that brought a grin to my face. This shifter was exactly what I was looking for! It has a nice throw that is shorter than stock but not too extreme. It has very precise movement and best of all it is just as quiet as the stock shifter! There is a slight click as it is pulled into each gear that is more felt than heard and is a reassuring confirmation that you are in the gear. The reverse lockout is positive without requiring too much effort (I had expected I would want to switch to the included lighter spring but decided it wasn't necessary once I tried it).

I can't say how it would do in performance use since that's not my style but if you are looking for a reasonably priced quality shifter with great feel and no added noise then the Steeda shifter is a great choice. I could not be more pleased!

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

The shifter on the TKO 500 and TKO 600 transmission has strong springs and a short throw but the short lever can be hard to reach and requires more effort to engage the gears. Steeda billet shifter bushings adapt the taller factory Ford shift handle to the TKO 500 / TKO 600 transmission for better driving comfort and easier smoother shifts. The solid billet bushings eliminate the soft rubber isolator in the factory handle making the shifts crisp and precise. Also adapts stock handle to Hurst shifters.

^@^Mustang^@^ GT Boss ^@^Mustang Exhaust^@^2014 2013 2012 2011 ^@^Mustang X-Pipes^@611.95 @148@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@148@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-x2-mustang-balljoint-kit-555-8101/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda X2 Mustang Balljoints (94-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-8101.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-8101-1.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-8101-2.jpg^@^555-8101^@^

Any time you alter the height of your ride as you do when you install lowering springs (like our Steeda Sport Springs) you upset the suspension geometry. Your roll center geometry as well as your bump steer geometry is affected. You can easily bring your front roll center geometry with a set of our X2 ball joints.

Steeda's X2 Balljoint improves suspension geometry on lowered Mustangs by raising the spindle relative to the balljoint pivot-point. This raises the roll center back into the correct range for optimum handling resulting in reduced body roll quicker steering response and improved overall front tire grip. Steeda's special balljoint reduces the need for oversize front swaybars and allows the use of lower front spring rates creating more grip over uneven pavement and better ride quality.

Why is this important? When a Mustang is lowered the front roll center changes due to the new position of the suspension pivot points. Lower the car too much and the front roll center drops to well below ground level and worse than that the roll center moves side to side as the body rolls resulting in lost grip and erratic handling. The lower roll center causes the body to roll more easily. Countering this tendency usually requires a significant increase in front spring rate to simply control the added roll due to the lowered the roll center. This higher spring rate not only hurts ride quality but it also reduces grip on rough surfaces as the stiffer springs cause the tire to skip over bumps instead of following the contours of the road. The X2 balljoint was designed to eliminate these problems by correcting the front roll center geometry. The X2 balljoint has a longer shaft to raise the spindle relative to the balljoint pivot point. Spacers for the springs are included in the X2 kit to maintain the same ride height as a stock balljoint but with a much improved roll center height. With the roll center restored to the proper height the result is a suspension that works for you to accommodate the small and large imperfections that are in any road or track allowing the tires to stay planted and provide better front end grip.

Construction

Steeda ball joints are made in the USA to our specifications by a respected name-brand supplier to Ford GM and Daimler Chrysler. Except for their custom length they are the same materials and construction that has been extensively tested in Panther applications that is police cars and other severe duty applications where they have demonstrated durability that exceeds current production "regular" balljoints. They meet Ford's standards for friction wear and durability.

Important Details

Because the balljoint changes the relationship between the lower control arm and the tie-rod bump-steer should be checked whenever the X2 balljoint is installed. Particularly if caster/camber plates are being used. With stock caster settings offset rack bushings can sometimes be enough to keep bump-steer within acceptable range. However when caster is increased the rear inclination of the spindle further raises the steering arm where the tie-rod attaches. Therefore an adjustable tie rod end commonly called a bump-steer kit is highly recommended to prevent bump-steer whether or not caster camber plates are used in combination with the X2 balljoint.

Note: Fox Body Owners; Steeda X2 ball joints will work with 1979-1993 Mustangs however modifications to your brake system are required.

Product Benefits

  • Restores front end roll center geometry
  • Improved front end grip and steering response
  • Reduced understeer at cornering limit
  • High quality construction

Read more about what makes Steeda balljoints the best available at our online blog:http://www.steedablog.com/2010/05/steeda-balljoints-what-your-lowered-stang-needs/

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

column1: @159@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@159@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-brake-cooling-kit-555-6019/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Brake Cooling Kit - 05-09^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-6019.jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-6019-1.jpg^@^555-6019^@^

Get better brake performance out of your brakes during spirited driving and track events with the Steeda Brake Cooling Kit. The proper way to cool brakes is from the inside of the hat out through the vanes.

Mounting the duct tube 2+ inches away from the rotor as other designs do results in a significant loss of cooling air when the duct ends. The air simply escapes through the gap without taking any heat with it. Also since there is nothing there to direct it into the hat most of the air that actually does some cooling simply bounces off the inside rotor face.

This causes the inside fire ring to cool more than the outside which can cause rotor warping. To solve these problems our engineers came up with a mount specifically for the Mustang spindle (not some universal piece) that directs air right to the eye of the rotor ensuring that virtually all of the air goes through the vanes. The result is even cooling lower rotor temperatures and better brake performance than the rest.

The modular design allows you to upgrade your brakes and maintain maximum cooling by merely switching out the backing plate.

Made from aluminum and not steel like the rest for less weight. All mounting hardware is stainless too for more durability.

Product Benefits

  • Lower rotor temperatures
  • Even rotor cooling
  • Modular design

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

column1: @171@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@171@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-differential-cover-brace-555-8118/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda IRS Mustang Differental Cover Brace - Cobra (99-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-8118.jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-8118-1.jpg^@^555-8118^@^

The Cobra IRS Differential cover is cast in aluminum a material prized for its unique property of strength without the weight of steel or cast iron. Yet aluminum is not as flexible as steel so when you push your Cobra to the limit in the corners you may be applying enough force to twist the cover beyond it's ability to flex. Repeatedly doing this causes the metal with the result show below left.

Without resorting to a replacement cover made entirely of steel or iron the engineers at Steeda designed the steel brace shown in the photo below right. By mounting with 6 bolts (supplied) where other designs use 5 the Steeda Autosports Cobra IRS Differential Cover Brace provides 20% more points of attachment yeilding greater strength and safety. Installation is straightforward using the supplied hardware and the we have even thoughtfully included a hole to permit easy access to the differential fill plug without the need to remove the brace.

Product Benefits

  • Stiffens differential cover

Level of difficulty: Easy

Ready to step up to an adjustable suspension setup on your 2005 and up Mustang? Buy the one with the most research and engineering and all out track testing behind it. Designed and engineered in the U.S.A!

Steeda’s billet adjustable suspension system for the S197 Mustang includes custom designed adjustable front struts and matched Tokico D-spec rear shocks which feature infinite simultaneous adjustment of compression and rebound. Not partial or no adjustment like other lesser kits.

The front coil over system is designed to use our exclusive upper strut mount kit which eliminates the weak factory upper spring perch which is prone to “popping” with increased spring rates and provides +/- 1 degree of camber adjustment not available with the factory mount.

The rear system features ride height adjusters for the rear of the vehicle which accept a coil over style spring and Tokico D-spec shocks.

Two complete kits are available depending on whether you have already upgraded to our 555-8120 upper strut mount kit which only requires replacing the upper spring cup or you have the factory strut mount.

This kit is made from billet aluminum in our in house manufacturing facility and features anodized parts for long lasting protection against oxidation and roller bearings to make adjustments a snap. Fully adjustable for shock valving and ride height. Ride height adjustment varies based on spring rate but typical adjustment range available is stock ride height down to a full 2 inch lowering.

Steeda Adjustable Suspension System is used by winning racers and record breakers like:

  • Robin Burnett
  • Sutton High Performance

Product Benefits

  • Improved vehicle handling
  • Great ride quality
  • Improved vehicle stance

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

@176@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@176@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-front-coilover-kit-555-8110/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Front Coilover Kit - (79-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-8110.jpg^@^555-8110^@^

Steeda's Adjustable Coil Over kits will fit all 79-04 Mustang front struts with the exception of Bilstein.

This kit allows you to mount coil over springs with ride height adjustment on the front of your 79-04 Mustang.

Our nylon tipped set screw on the adjustment collar locks the collar without damage to the threads.

This kit has a 2-piece upper spring perch with a flat high quality Torrington-type roller bearing which allows the spring to rotate under compression. This bearing is O-ring sealed to keep dirt and contamination out of the bearing assembly.

Great for drag race cars to reduce unsprung weight and greatly improve your weight transfer. CNC machined to exact tolerances with a quality anodized finish for longevity.

Note: Springs available separately please choose your spring choice from the drop down menu.

150lb springs are recommended for lightened cars with light weight K-members fiberglass hoods and aluminum cylinder heads

175lb springs are recommended for with only minimal front end weight removed or 351 windsor engine with aluminum heads.

200lb springs are recommended for cars with stock or slightly heavier than stock front end weight.

Product Benefits

  • Adjustable ride height
  • Reduced front end weight
  • Better drag launch weight transfer

Time to install: About 3 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

column6:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/8/555-8127-1-4_tb64-88.jpg^@^555-8127-4^@^

Ready to step up to an adjustable suspension setup on your 2005 and up Mustang? Buy the one with the most research and engineering and all out track testing behind it. Designed and engineered in the U.S.A!

Steeda’s billet adjustable suspension system for the S197 Mustang includes custom designed adjustable front struts and matched
column8:
> rear shocks which feature infinite simultaneous adjustment of compression and rebound. Not partial or no adjustment like other lesser kits.

The front coil over system is designed to use our exclusive upper strut mount kit which eliminates the weak factory upper spring perch which is prone to “popping” with increased spring rates and provides +/- 1 degree of camber adjustment not available with the factory mount.

The rear system features ride height adjusters for the rear of the vehicle which accept a coil over style spring and
column10:
> shocks.

Two complete kits are available depending on whether you have already upgraded to our 555-8120 upper strut mount kit which only requires replacing the upper spring cup or you have the factory strut mount.

This kit is made from billet aluminum in our in house manufacturing facility and features anodized parts for long lasting protection against oxidation and roller bearings to make adjustments a snap. Fully adjustable for shock valving and ride height. Ride height adjustment varies based on spring rate but typical adjustment range available is stock ride height down to a full 2 inch lowering.

Steeda Adjustable Suspension System is used by winning racers and record breakers like:

  • Robin Burnett
  • Sutton High Performance

Product Benefits

  • Improved vehicle handling
  • Great ride quality
  • Improved vehicle stance

Time to install: About 4 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/497-gor17lgs-1.jpg^@^497-GOR17LGS^@^Brisk Premium LGS Spark Plugs are the ultimate spark plug for your naturally aspirated Mustang. These spark plugs feature a unique design which unshrouds the spark allowing the spark to ignite the maximum amount of fuel resulting in complete burning for maximum power and fuel economy. Ready to get the maximum power out of your naturally aspirated Mustang? Put these Brisk Premium LGS Spark Plugs in today!

Notes: Because of heat range and electrode design we recommend you DO NOT USE THESE SPARK PLUGS FOR SUPERCHARGED TURBO OR NITROUS APPLICATIONS. For those applications use our Brisk Silver Racing Spark Plugs. Spark Plugs with a 17 in the part number are recommended for stock to slightly modified applications. Heavily modified naturally aspirated use spark plugs with 15 in the part number.

Product Benefits
  • Unique design unshrouds spark
  • Maximum Spark Energy!
  • Better Fuel Economy!

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

@185@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@185@^http://www.steeda.com/brisk-silver-racing-mustang-spark-plug-497-rr15-yc1/^@^Steeda^@^Brisk Silver Racing Mustang Spark Plug - Stock - 11-14 GT^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/497-rr15-yc1.jpg^@^497-RR15-YC1^@^

Brisk Silver Racing Spark Plugs are the ultimate spark plug for your Mustang! These spark plugs are perfect for high compression forced induction and nitrous applications where maximum spark energy is required.

Unlike copper platinum or iridium designs Brisk spark plugs feature a fine wire Silver center electrode cut-back side ground electrode and high dielectric strengh insulator for superior ignitability low ignition voltage requirements and high dielectric strength. What does that mean to you? It means you get a stronger more intense spark for improved power and gas mileage!

2005-2009 Applications
Brisk Silver Racing spark plugs colder than stock plugs and recommended for supercharged turbocharged and nitrous applications. Put these Silver Spark plugs in today and begin to get the most out of your Mustang!

Note: There are two heat ranges offered for this spark plug. Part number 497-3VR17YS is recommended for applications up to 450 flywheel horsepower. Part number 497-3VR14S is a colder heat range and recommended for application at 450 flywheel horsepower and higher.

Product Benefits

  • Increased Spark Energy
  • Better Gas Mileage!
  • Maximum Horsepower!

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

@196@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@196@^http://www.steeda.com/brisk-silver-racing-mustang-spark-plug-497-rr14-s/^@^Steeda^@^Brisk Silver Racing Mustang Spark Plug - Mild Mods/Boost - 11-14 GT^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/497-rr14-s_boci-0c.jpg^@^497-RR14-S^@^

Brisk Silver Racing Spark Plugs are the ultimate spark plug for your Mustang! These spark plugs are perfect for high compression forced induction and nitrous applications where maximum spark energy is required.

Unlike copper platinum or iridium designs Brisk spark plugs feature a fine wire Silver center electrode cut-back side ground electrode and high dielectric strengh insulator for superior ignitability low ignition voltage requirements and high dielectric strength. What does that mean to you? It means you get a stronger more intense spark for improved power and gas mileage!

2005-2009 Applications
Brisk Silver Racing spark plugs colder than stock plugs and recommended for supercharged turbocharged and nitrous applications. Put these Silver Spark plugs in today and begin to get the most out of your Mustang!

Note: There are two heat ranges offered for this spark plug. Part number 497-3VR17YS is recommended for applications up to 450 flywheel horsepower. Part number 497-3VR14S is a colder heat range and recommended for application at 450 flywheel horsepower and higher.

Product Benefits

  • Increased Spark Energy
  • Better Gas Mileage!
  • Maximum Horsepower!

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

@197@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@197@^http://www.steeda.com/classic-design-concepts-mustang-sequential-taillights-067-110631/^@^Steeda^@^Classic Design Concepts Mustang Sequential Taillights (05-09 All)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/145629926153f502f61ae77.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/82177441853f502f61b192.jpg^@^067-110631^@^

First introduced in the '60s the Ford Mustang featured three-lens sequential taillights which not only caught people's attention but also gave new life to the average blinker. It was not until 2010 that sequential taillights once again became a factory option on new models. Bring your '05-'09 Mustang up to speed and give the rear end a classic touch with the CDC Sequential Taillights.

Direct plug and play. This Sequential Taillight System requires no splicing resulting in a high tech lighting system for your rear end that installs effortlessly in minutes.

This advanced engineered system uses brand new harnesses and sockets with a pre-programmed microprocessor that controls timing for optimum performance. It has been moisture tested and cycle tested for quality results.

Standard with reverse circuit protection and voltage regulation this tail light system is physically sealed to protect the electronics from any moisture. When the brake is applied the lights will sequence once and then remain illuminated until the brake pedal is released

Product Benefits

Tokico takes their already excellent adjustable struts and shocks to the next level with their new D-Spec shocks and struts. These shocks and struts come in matched sets of 4 and offer infinite adjustment of both compression and rebound directly from the top of the unit.

Tokico D-specs are truly a multi-use product with plenty of adjustment range to allow them to be used in daily driven street and aggressive road race applications making them a perfect match for your Steeda Sport or competition springs. Get them today to maximize your suspension's capabilities!

Note: Sold as a kit in a set of 4.

We went "
column3:
through the whole Bilstein line and have the following in stock for your Mustang - so you can step up to Bilstein Today!

Front: 395-V36-4138-HI: 87-04 “Heavy Duty”
Fits any 87-04 Mustang as well as 79-86 'stangs when upgraded with 87 or newer V8 spindles. With their “Heavy Duty” valving (same valving as a stock 03-04 Cobra) they work best with Steeda Sport Spring sets any of the factory V8 springs including Bullitt or Mach 1 or any other spring in the 550-650 pound range. Not suggested with ANY of the available coil over springs on the market or our 750-850 or 850-1050 pound Comp Springs.

Rear: 395-BE5-2959-HO: 99-04 “Heavy Duty”
For IRS cars 99-04 featuring “Heavy Duty” valving (similar to 03-04 Cobra factory shocks). A great upgrade for 99-01 Cobra and 03-04 Cobra (coupe and Convertible) owners when running our 99-01 Cobra Sport Springs (540-600 Front Rate/ 500-600 Rear Rate) or the factory springs.

395-BE5-6418-HO: 94-04 “Heavy Duty”
For Solid Axle Cars this shock has the “Heavy Duty” valving works best with a 200-300 pound spring. Perfect damping for any of our Sport or Comp/Sport Spring sets or factory Bullitt or Mach 1 springs. For racers in classes which allow upgraded dampers but not springs these when matched to the V36-4138-HI Front Struts (above) are a good set up. Works with the factory GT or Cobra (non IRS) springs but WILL NOT be sufficient for the 325 or 350 pound springs used with our 5 Link Suspension.

395-B46-2148-HI: 79-93 “Heavy Duty”
Same specs as the BE5-6418-HO for 79-93 cars.

are a Koni's original and still the best premium adjustable shock and strut unit they offer.

Koni Sport Yellows feature an external adjustment right at the top of the unit for rebound adjustment. This adjustment allows you to soften the ride for daily driving or firm it up for handling performance and track use. Adjustment is done on the car by simply using the provided knob to turn the adjuster clockwise to soften the ride or counter clock wise to stiffen the ride.

These shock and strut units are a direct bolt on twin tube high pressure gas design that will enhance both ride quality and handling performance.

All Koni Sport Yellow units come with a lifetime warranty against manufacturing defects.

Note: Koni Sport Yellow shocks and struts are sold and priced individually. 2 struts and 2 shocks make a full set. Koni Yellow units are adjustable for rebound only.

Steeda's G/Trac Suspension Systems include everything needed to build an awesome handling car with excellent street manners. Steeda designed these parts using Computer Aided Design (CAD) software and the experience gained from years at the racetrack. Each stage provides an outstanding improvement in performance and a well balanced car in an affordable package.

Stage 3 completes the suspension. Your total G/Trac suspension completely transforms an average performer into a world class sports car capable of out-handling anything on the road.

  • Aluminum Lower Control Arms reduce unsprung weight and dramatically improve traction and control while maintaining a smooth quiet ride.
  • Lightweight high strength Tubular Front Swaybar reduces body roll for flatter more stable and faster cornering.
  • Our exclusive Offset Front A-Arm bushings push the control arms forward to improve weight distribution and steering response. Bushings are formed from special urethane compounds for ride quality superior to typical urethane or Delron.
  • 4130 Chrome-Moly Alloy Subframe Connectors reduce body twist and improve handling by strengthening the structure which supports the suspension. These connectors prevent fatigue from shortening the life of your car.

Time to install: About 9 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 1993 1992 1991 1990 1989 1988 1987

Model(s): 5.0L V8 Cobra 2.3L

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

column1: @251@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@251@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-boss-302-mustang-handling-package-555-2377/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Boss 302 Mustang Handling Package - Stage 1 - 12-13^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-2377.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2377-2.jpg
column4:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2377-3.jpg^@^555-2377^@^

As good as Ford made the Boss 302 Mustang there is still room for improvement to make your Boss even better than it already is with our handling packages.

Level 1 includes our Boss 302 specific springs adjustable upper strut mounts and our adjustable panhard bar. The springs in this package greatly improve the Boss 302's overall weight distribution. This is achieved by lowering the ride height only 0.2 inches in the front but the rear comes down 0.7 to 0.8 inches.

With the front height remaining largely unchanged your front roll center geometry remains optimal. Spring rates are substantially increased to greatly reduce body roll and reduce nose dive under braking for greatly improved control and balance.

Thanks to our decades of engineering experience with Mustang springs these springs achieve all of this while maintaining near stock ride quality characteristics so if you enjoy taking your Boss 302 Mustang around town you will enjoy it even more with these springs!

The included adjustable strut mounts feature a +1/-1 degree range of camber adjustment. Manufactured from billet aluminum billet steel TIG-welded nickel plated and grade 12.9 hardware the bearing chosen for our mounts is a fully caged 70mm diameter 7200lb capacity needle roller bearing for long life and incredible strength. Triple sealed to keep out dirt and water and isolated in a custom designed urethane bushing our mounts provide no increase in NVH while maintaining near O.E. levels of impact harshness and comfort.

Rounding our the package is our adjustable panhard bar which features 4130 chrome moly alloy steel construction not just ordinary mild steel like the factory piece and other aftermarket offerings. Our chrome moly alloy construction makes it lighter than the factory bar by 4 pounds and lighter than any other aftermarket piece.

Our bar is length adjustable to adjust rear end offset to a more optimal position regardless of ride height and our urethane bushings reduce deflection under load for noticeably improved steering response and control.

Add up the parts in this package individually and you will see the great savings and value this package provides. Take your Boss Mustang to the next level of performance and enjoyment today!

Package Includes

  • 555-8245 - Steeda Boss 302 Springs
  • 555-8135 - Steeda Heavy Duty Upper Strut Mounts
  • 555-2551 - Steeda Adjustable Panhard Bar

Product Benefits

  • Improved weight distribution
  • Greatly increased handling
  • Improved steering response
  • Bolt on installation
  • +1/-1 degree of camber adjustment not available with the factory strut mount which is not adjustable

Time to install: About 6 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Model(s): Boss

column1: @254@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@254@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-suspension-package-555-2134/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda G/Trac Mustang Suspension Package - Stage 1 (99-04 GT)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-2134.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2134-2.jpg
column5:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2134-4.jpg^@^555-2134^@^

Steeda's G/Trac Suspension Systems include everything needed to build an awesome handling car with excellent street manners. Steeda's G/Trac suspension components are proven components tested through decades of experience gained from street and racetrack testing.

Each stage provides an outstanding improvement in performance and a well balanced car at the end of each stage. This means you do not have to do each stage in numerical order to achieve improvements. Each stage can be done individually at any time as your budget or upgrade needs dictate.

Steeda’s Stage 1 suspension package lays the foundation for proper handling and builds a base for any future modifications by addressing three essential elements needed for performance.

  • Sport Lowering Springs lower the center of gravity and reduce body roll while maintaining the great ride quality Steeda springs are known for.
  • Strut Tower and lower G/Trac braces stiffen the body structure to stabilize the suspension during hard cornering and reduce body shake and rattles. Steeda G/Trac bars are included with 86-93 cars. 94+ have factory G/Trac style bars so our kits do not include them.
  • Caster Camber Plates allow you to set proper alignment and improve caster geometry while eliminating suspension “slop” at the top of the strut tower. Improved caster gives you straighter highway tracking with less wander and better self centering steering feel. Increased caster also gives you better tire contact patch area during braking or better more consistent braking performance.

Time to install: About 7 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Model year(s): 2004 2003 2002 2001 2000 1999

Model(s): GT

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

column1: @255@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@255@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-spring-shocks-strut-mount-package-555-8410/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Pro-Action Sport Spring/Shock/Strut Mount Package (05-10)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-8410.jpg

Steeda's Sport Pro-Action combo kit puts together our Steeda Sport Springs and street adjustable upper strut mounts with our matched Pro-Action Shocks and Struts in one complete package.

If your budget allows when lowering your 2005-2014 Mustang GT it makes both performance and financial sense to change the springs shocks struts and upper strut mounts together. From a performance standpoint our Pro-Action shocks and struts are far superior to the factory units at properly controlling the higher spring rates of our lowering springs providing improved ride quality and control.

With the front springs mounted directly on the strut on the bottom and the upper strut mount on the top which has to be removed for installation it makes financial sense to do all these components together at the same time saving you on labor costs.

Do the job right once and save money with our Pro-Action Sport Combo Kits.

Note: Springs will lower your Mustang 1"

column1: @258@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@258@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-ultimate-mustang-swaybar-kit-555-1080/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Ultimate Mustang Sway Bar Kit (05-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-1080.jpg

Our Ultimate Sway Bar Kit for the 2005 newer Mustang is the most beneficial sway bar package on the market.

With both adjustable front and rear sway bars you have complete control of your vehicles handling characteristics and with enough adjustment to change the handling balance of the vehicle completely to your preference.

From maintaining understeer to neutral to oversteer this sway bar package has the range to fine tune your vehicles handling precisely.

NOTE: Fits hardtop models only does not fit convertible Mustangs.

Product Benefits

  • 3 position adjustability for front and rear
  • Competition proven handling performance
  • Fine tuning of vehicle handling balance
  • Improved response and feel

Steeda's G/Trac Suspension Systems include everything needed to build an awesome handling car with excellent street manners. Steeda designed these parts using Computer Aided Design (CAD) software and the experience gained from years at the racetrack. Each stage provides an outstanding improvement in performance and a well balanced car in an affordable package.

Stage 3 completes the suspension. Your total G/Trac suspension completely transforms an average performer into a world class sports car capable of out-handling anything on the road.

  • Aluminum Lower Control Arms reduce unsprung weight and dramatically improve traction and control while maintaining a smooth quiet ride.
  • Lightweight high strength Tubular Front Swaybar reduces body roll for flatter more stable and faster cornering.
  • Our exclusive Offset Front A-Arm bushings push the control arms forward to improve weight distribution and steering response. Bushings are formed from special urethane compounds for ride quality superior to typical urethane or Delron.
  • 4130 Chrome-Moly Alloy Subframe Connectors reduce body twist and improve handling by strengthening the structure which supports the suspension. These connectors prevent fatigue from shortening the life of your car.

Time to install: About 9 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Steeda's Pro-Action Ultra-Lite Lowering kits pair our Steeda Ultra-Lite Springs with matched Pro-Action Shocks and Struts in one complete package.

When lowering your 2005-2014 Mustang GT it makes both performance and financial sense to change the springs shocks and struts together. From a performance standpoint our Pro-Action shocks and struts are far superior to the factory units at properly controlling the higher spring rates of our lowering springs providing improved ride quality and control.

With the front springs mounted directly on the strut which has to be removed for installation it makes financial sense to do the springs struts and shocks at the same time saving you on labor costs.

Do the job right once and save money with our Pro-Action Sport Lowering Kits.

Note: Springs will lower your Mustang GT or V6 1 1/4"

Steeda has put together suspension systems that include everything needed to build an awesome handling car with excellent street manners. Each kit provides an outstanding improvement in performance and a well balanced car at the end of each stage.

Stage 2 picks up where Stage 1 leaves off. This kit will further improve the suspension providing greater off the line and corner exit traction improved tunable shock valving and better steering response and balance with the following components:

Tokico D-SPEC shocks and struts: These adjustable shocks have infinite simultaneous adjustment of compression and rebound dampening. Their wide
adjustment range makes then truly a multi-use product that can be adjusted for street or race use.

Billet rear lower trailing arms: These aluminum arms keep unsprung weight down and noticeably improve off the line and corner exit traction without adding unwanted NVH (noise vibration and harshness). Unlike previous Mustangs these arms can also be seen through the wheel well and look awesome giving your suspension the "
column6:
factor at the track and car shows.

Rear Swaybar: Larger than O.E. rear swaybar provides better rear compliance
and reduces understeer improving handling balance.

Steeda's G/Trac Suspension Systems include everything needed to build an awesome handling car with excellent street manners. Steeda's G/Trac suspension components are proven components tested through decades of experience gained from street and racetrack testing.

Each stage provides an outstanding improvement in performance and a well balanced car at the end of each stage. This means you do not have to do each stage in numerical order to achieve improvements. Each stage can be done individually at any time as your budget or upgrade needs dictate.

This Stage 2 package provides major improvements in control and stability.

  • Tokico adjustable shocks give outstanding control of wheel motion increasing cornering grip and improved ride quality. Five adjustment positions allow tuning of understeer and oversteer as well as ride comfort.
  • Heavy Duty Tubular Steel upper control arms with improved bushings improve traction stability and also significantly improve lateral stability. reducing unwanted "
column6:
and side to side travel in the rear end.
  • Our exclusive Adjustable Rear Swaybar keeps the car flat during corners eliminates understeer and increases maximum cornering speed. It's easy to adjust so you can tune the bar to match your driving style. And if you add more suspension modifications later all it takes is a simple adjustment of the rear bar to re-tune the suspension for a well balanced car.

    • Time to install: About 6 1/2 Hours

    Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Steeda's Ultra-Lite Pro-Action combo kit puts together our Steeda Ultra-Lite Springs and street adjustable upper strut mounts with our matched Pro-Action Shocks and Struts in one complete package.

If your budget allows when lowering your 2005-2014 Mustang GT it makes both performance and financial sense to change the springs shocks struts and upper strut mounts together. column1: @281@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@281@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-g-trac-mustang-suspension-package-555-2350/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda G/Trac Mustang Suspension Package - Stage 3 (05-10)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-2350.jpg

Steeda has put together suspension systems that include everything needed to build an awesome handling car with excellent street manners. Each kit provides an outstanding improvement in performance and a well balanced car at the end of each stage.

Stage 3 continues to build on Stages 1 and 2. Stage 3 combined with 1 and 2 transforms your Mustang into a World Class sports car capable of handling reserved for cars costing tens of thousands of dollars more! The following components compose Stage 3:

Adjustable Front Swaybar: A full 1 3/8 tubular unit. This swaybar is the lightest aftermarket bar in the industry. It has 3 position adjustment to dial in vehicle balance. Comes with urethane bushings and is a direct bolt on.

Front Street Adjustable Swaybar Endlinks: Replace the factory fixed endlinks. Provides ability to further fine tune front swaybar balance and are stronger than the factory endlinks.

Front Swaybar Mount Brace: These braces eliminate rotation of the front swaybar and yield better swaybar compliance.

Front Bump Steer Kit: Corrects bump steer in the front suspension. Directly replaced outer tie rod end. Tapered shaft design for hassle free installation that required no drilling of the spindle.

Adjustable Rear Upper 3rd Link: This part allows the ability to set pinion angle and eliminate the torque deflection of the factory piece. Direct replacement for factory rear upper 3rd link.

3-point Frame Rail and Torque Box Brace: This brace ties the rear inner and outer frame rails to the rear torque box (lower trailing arm mounting point). Stiffens the chassis and torque box mounting point for improved handling and stability.

Time to install: About 8 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

column1: @282@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@282@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-billet-control-arms-555-4406/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Billet Rear Lower Control Arms - Spherical/Poly Ends (05-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-4406.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/steeda-mustang-billet-control-arms-555-4405(2)_xyd1-vo.jpg
column5:

*Save over 6 lbs. compared to the OE control arms by switching to Steeda!*

When only the best will do say it with billet! These billet rear lower trailing arms replace the stamped steel OE parts and depending on your desired performance goals are available with urethane bushings or a spherical bearing/urethane bushing combination for high horsepower applications.

These lightweight yet super strong arms reduce un-sprung weight and eliminate wheel hop. Steeda was first to market with these control arms and had them on the shelves even before the 2005+ Mustang was released thanks to our exclusive technology transfer program with Ford Motor Company. Steeda was the first to incorporate the proper design rear offset for the rear lower trailing arms.

Don't be fooled by other companies claiming to be first with this offset yet they have only had their arms on the market a few months! Steeda's exclusive polyurethane bushing package also ensures smooth quiet operation combined with performance. No increase in NVH (noise vibration harshness) with our poly bushings like competitors arms. Part number 555-4406 with a spherical bearing on one end and our exclusive poly bushings on the other is recommended for high horsepower applications and will only have a slight increase in NVH over the standard polyurethane bushing arms.

Don't settle for anything less than Steeda original innovation.

Note: 555-4406 recommended for 500+ horsepower applications. Slight increase in NVH will result from this part.

U.S. Patent Pending

Product Benefits

  • Eliminates wheel hop improves traction.
  • Super strong billet construction.
  • Lighter than stock and competitors arms - reduced unsprung weight.
  • Used on the fastest production built Mustangs

column1: @283@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@283@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-upper-control-arm-555-4098/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Upper Control Arm - Lowered (11-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-4098.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/steeda-mustang-upper-control-arm-555-4098(2).jpg^@^555-4098^@^

Need more axle control with those sticky tires? The new Steeda Tubular Upper 3rd-Link gives you the ability to eliminate the torque deflection associated with the factory piece.

Steeda's upper link uses our track proven three-piece urethane bushing design on the chassis end to eliminate the annoying windup and wheel-hop you get with the soft factory bushing.

Steeda's upper 3rd link is a direct replacement for the factory original bolting into the factory location. Aluminum reinforced plates are a very high aircraft quality. Comes Blue Powdercoated with bump stop and hardware.

Stepped Spacer Details

This spacer is designed to fix the problem with the OEM upper link. At the attachment point for the upper link to the chassis mount Ford uses a 14mm bolt but the opening in the mount is 16mm. This is not typically a problem with the OEM mount as it uses a soft hydra mount bushing to soften this. But once an aftermarket upper is installed with a urethane bushing can transmit this noise or clunk. This space can be installed with all aftermarket upper that still use a 14mm bolt. The stepped spacer takes up the slop and eliminates all noise from the upper. Note it does work with aftermarket chassis mounts with smaller then 16mm bolt holes.

Notes

  • All Steeda Upper Third Links produced on or after February 2007 include the Stepped Spacers.
  • Steeda's non-adjustable upper third link part number 555-4096 is intended for use on lowered vehicles only. Steeda's 555-4097 upper 3rd link can be used on stock ride height and lowered applications.

Product Benefits

  • Better handling with more stable cornering while maintaining good ride quality
  • Excellent bang-for-the-buck suspension piece
  • More Traction which means lower 60fts!

Learn the differences in Steeda brand control arms read our blog post for more info: http://www.steedablog.com/2012/01/the-hidden-difference-in-control-arms/

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Need to reduce wheel hop and improve traction? Steeda's upper 3rd links will do the job. The Steeda adjustable upper 3rd link for S197 Mustangs gives you the ability to set your pinion angle and eliminate the torque deflection associated with the factory piece. This upper 3rd link uses our track proven three piece bushing package using soft outer bushings a hard center bushing on the axle end. This proven combination helps control axle wind up wheel hop under acceleration and allows for proper articulation without deflection for improved handling and cornering stability.

Steeda's three piece bushing package will not increase NVH (noise vibration and harshness) keeping the factory's quiet smooth operation unlike competitor's pieces. Direct replacement for the factory original bolting into the original factory location. Our 3rd link is a double adjustable design allowing you to make adjustments without removing the arm from the vehicle.

Steeda's competition upper 3rd link for S197 Mustangs is the ultimate piece for the performance Mustang enthusiast. This competition upper 3rd link like the original street version allows you to adjust your pinion angle and eliminate the torque deflection associated with the factory piece. Our competition upper 3rd link will control axle windup eliminate wheel hop under acceleration and allows for proper articulation without deflection for improved handling and corner stability.

Retains our 3 piece bushing package along with our heavy duty chassis mount to bring your 555-4105 3rd link to 555-4109 specs.

This part is a double adjustable design allowing you to make adjustments on the car directly eliminating the need to remove it from the vehicle for adjustment.

Available in 2 versions our full competition part number 555-4106 includes a competition proven chrome moly alloy rod end to eliminate all wheel hop and axle windup. It also allows for proper articulation with no deflection for excellent handling and cornering stability. This version with a solid rod end will increase NVH in street use and is recommended for competition use only.

The dual purpose street/competition version part number 555-4109 uses our exclusive 3 piece bushing package on the axle end and is recommended for dual purpose street/competition use. Steeda's 3 piece bushing package uses soft outer bushings with a hard center bushing on the axle end. This proven combination helps control axle wind up wheel hop under acceleration and allows for proper articulation with minimal deflection for improved handling and cornering stability. Our 3 piece bushing package will not increase NVH (noise vibration and harshness) keeping the factory's quiet smooth operation unlike competitors pieces.

Both competition upgrades include a new heavy duty chassis mount made from stout 1/4"

Already own an original 555-4105 Steeda upper 3rd link and want to take it to the next level? Purchase our competition upgrade kits separately.

Note to 2011 Mustang owners: Ford changed the design of the upper 3rd link on 2011 models. 2011 owners must use either 555-4106 or 555-4109 full kits. Steeda's original 555-4105 upper 3rd link will not fit 2011 models.

http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/steeda-mustang-adjustable-upper-control-arm-555-4112(2)_fnzg-dg.jpg^@^555-4105^@^

Need to reduce wheel hop and improve traction? Steeda's upper 3rd links will do the job. The Steeda adjustable upper 3rd link for S197 Mustangs gives you the ability to set your pinion angle and eliminate the torque deflection associated with the factory piece. This upper 3rd link uses our track proven three piece bushing package using soft outer bushings a hard center bushing on the axle end. This proven combination helps control axle wind up wheel hop under acceleration and allows for proper articulation without deflection for improved handling and cornering stability.

Steeda's three piece bushing package will not increase NVH (noise vibration and harshness) keeping the factory's quiet smooth operation unlike competitor's pieces. Direct replacement for the factory original bolting into the original factory location. Our 3rd link is a double adjustable design allowing you to make adjustments without removing the arm from the vehicle.

Already own an original 555-4105 Steeda upper 3rd link and want to take it to the next level? Purchase one of our competition upgrade kits.

The full competition version part number 555-4107 includes a competition proven chrome moly alloy rod end to eliminate all wheel hop and axle wind up. This version with a solid rod end will increase NVH in street use and is recommended for competition use only.

The dual purpose street/competition version uses our exclusive 3 piece bushing package on the axle end and is recommended for street use since it wont increase NVH levels in the vehicle.

Both competition upgrades include a new heavy duty chassis mount made from stout 1/4"
column4:
thick steel for twice the thickness of the original factory piece. It also gives you 2 mounting locations for increased adjustment to provide even better traction and handling.

Steeda Stepped Spacers: 555-4105 upper 3rd links come with spacers designed to fix the problem with the OEM upper chassis mount. At the attachment point for the upper link to the chassis mount Ford uses a 14mm bolt but the opening in the mount is 16mm. This is not typically a problem with the OEM 3rd link as it uses a soft hydra mount bushing to soften this. But once an aftermarket upper is installed with a urethane bushing you get a noticeable clunk from the smaller bolt walking in the larger hole it installs into. Our spacers can be installed with all aftermarket upper arms that use the factory 14mm bolt in the factory chassis mount. The stepped spacers take up the slop and eliminate the noise from the upper 3rd links associated with the mismatched bolt/bolt hole combination.

Note: Our 555-4107 and 4108 upgrades do not require these spacers with their all new chassis mounts. All Steeda 555-4105 Upper Third Links produced on or after February 2007 include the Stepped Spacers.

Product Benefits

  • Adjustable pinion angle for optimum traction
  • Better handling with more stable cornering
  • Three piece urethane bushings for better traction
  • Competition tested &

column1: @288@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@288@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-upper-control-arm-555-4096/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Upper Control Arm - Lowered (05-10)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-4096.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/steeda-mustang-upper-control-arm-555-4098(2)_rn48-hl.jpg^@^555-4096^@^

Need more axle control with those sticky tires? The new Steeda Tubular Upper 3rd-Link gives you the ability to eliminate the torque deflection associated with the factory piece.

Steeda's upper link uses our track proven three-piece urethane bushing design on the chassis end to eliminate the annoying windup and wheel-hop you get with the soft factory bushing.

Steeda's upper 3rd link is a direct replacement for the factory original bolting into the factory location. Aluminum reinforced plates are a very high aircraft quality. Comes Blue Powdercoated with bump stop and hardware.

Stepped Spacer Details

This spacer is designed to fix the problem with the OEM upper link. At the attachment point for the upper link to the chassis mount Ford uses a 14mm bolt but the opening in the mount is 16mm. This is not typically a problem with the OEM mount as it uses a soft hydra mount bushing to soften this. But once an aftermarket upper is installed with a urethane bushing can transmit this noise or clunk. This space can be installed with all aftermarket upper that still use a 14mm bolt. The stepped spacer takes up the slop and eliminates all noise from the upper. Note it does work with aftermarket chassis mounts with smaller then 16mm bolt holes.

Notes

  • All Steeda Upper Third Links produced on or after February 2007 include the Stepped Spacers.
  • Steeda's non-adjustable upper third link part number 555-4096 is intended for use on lowered vehicles only. Steeda's 555-4097 upper 3rd link can be used on stock ride height and lowered applications.

Product Benefits

  • Better handling with more stable cornering while maintaining good ride quality
  • Excellent bang-for-the-buck suspension piece
  • More Traction which means lower 60fts!

*Save over 6 lbs. compared to the OE control arms by switching to Steeda!*

When only the best will do say it with billet! These billet rear lower trailing arms replace the stamped steel OE parts and depending on your desired performance goals are available with urethane bushings or a spherical bearing/urethane bushing combination for high horsepower applications.

These lightweight yet super strong arms reduce un-sprung weight and eliminate wheel hop. Steeda was first to market with these control arms and had them on the shelves even before the 2005+ Mustang was released thanks to our exclusive technology transfer program with Ford Motor Company. Steeda was the first to incorporate the proper design rear offset for the rear lower trailing arms.

Don't be fooled by other companies claiming to be first with this offset yet they have only had their arms on the market a few months! Steeda's exclusive polyurethane bushing package also ensures smooth quiet operation combined with performance. No increase in NVH (noise vibration harshness) with our poly bushings like competitors arms. Part number 555-4406 with a spherical bearing on one end and our exclusive poly bushings on the other is recommended for high horsepower applications and will only have a slight increase in NVH over the standard polyurethane bushing arms.

Don't settle for anything less than Steeda original innovation.

Note: 555-4407 recommended for 500+ horsepower applications. Slight increase in NVH will result from this part.

U.S. Patent Pending

Product Benefits

  • Eliminates wheel hop improves traction.
  • Super strong billet construction.
  • Lighter than stock and competitors arms - reduced unsprung weight.
  • Used on the fastest production built Mustangs

Tubular control arms reduce unsprung weight while improving weight distribution in race applications. QA1 tubular control arms require the use of QA1 coil-over struts and QA1 caster/camber plates.

Eco-Comp Control Arms

The Eco-Comp control arms are an economical choice in tubular arms for use on the strip. They are built with QA1's exclusive compressed rubber bushings and engineered for performance. The Eco Comp's offer value without sacrificing performance.

Pro-Comp Control Arms

The QA1 Pro-Comp Control Arms are the ultimate in adjustability design and strength. These arms utilize QA1's exclusive XM series rod ends. These chrome moly heat-treated rod ends use QA1's exclusive Teflon®/Kevlar® lining for superior performance and durability. Included in the control arm kit are spacers to allow movement of the arms forward and rearward for the wheel base adjustment.

Product Benefits

  • Better handling more stable cornering
  • Light weight
  • QA1 quality

http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-8119-3.jpg^@^555-8119^@^

Steeda's Lower Trailing Arm Relocation Brackets are designed to let you adjust the location of the rear mounting point of the lower trailing arm allowing you to fine tune the instant center geometry of your Mustang.

Highly recommended for all types of racing improving the instant center geometry will improve weight transfer and increase traction for better 60ft times and better acceleration out of a corner on the road course. These brackets are great for lowered cars to correct the instant center geometry change that occurs from lowering the vehicle.

Steeda designed this kit to have more adjustment range than all other competitive offerings. This gives you more options for fine tuning your instant center maximizing your performance potential. This kit is compatible with all S197 Mustangs including the Shelby GT500.

The kit includes two zinc plated relocation brackets grade 10.9 hardware and instructions.

This kit is a weld-in application for the S197 Mustang platform and is not recommended as a bolt in only application. Bolts are included for positioning to aid in welding but are not to be driven on.

Product Benefits

  • Strongest Relocation Bracket on the market!
  • Track tested and proven.
  • Better handling with more stable cornering while maintaining good ride quality.
  • Allows adjustment of your instant center for optimum traction.
  • More traction which means lower 60fts!

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools
