column1: @297@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@297@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-adjustable-control-arm-555-4113/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Adjustable Mustang Upper Control Arm - Spherical End (11-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-4113.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/steeda-mustang-adjustable-control-arm-555-4113-2.jpg^@^555-4113^@^

Need to reduce wheel hop and improve traction? Steeda's upper 3rd links will do the job. The Steeda adjustable upper 3rd link for S197 Mustangs gives you the ability to set your pinion angle and eliminate the torque deflection associated with the factory piece. This upper 3rd link uses our track proven three piece bushing package using soft outer bushings a hard center bushing on the axle end. This proven combination helps control axle wind up wheel hop under acceleration and allows for proper articulation without deflection for improved handling and cornering stability.

Steeda's three piece bushing package will not increase NVH (noise vibration and harshness) keeping the factory's quiet smooth operation unlike competitor's pieces. Direct replacement for the factory original bolting into the original factory location. Our 3rd link is a double adjustable design allowing you to make adjustments without removing the arm from the vehicle.

Already own an original 555-4105 Steeda upper 3rd link and want to take it to the next level? Purchase one of our competition upgrade kits.

The full competition version part number 555-4107 includes a competition proven chrome moly alloy rod end to eliminate all wheel hop and axle wind up. This version with a solid rod end will increase NVH in street use and is recommended for competition use only.

The dual purpose street/competition version uses our exclusive 3 piece bushing package on the axle end and is recommended for street use since it wont increase NVH levels in the vehicle.

Both competition upgrades include a new heavy duty chassis mount made from stout 1/4"
column4:
thick steel for twice the thickness of the original factory piece. It also gives you 2 mounting locations for increased adjustment to provide even better traction and handling.

Steeda Stepped Spacers: 555-4105 upper 3rd links come with spacers designed to fix the problem with the OEM upper chassis mount. At the attachment point for the upper link to the chassis mount Ford uses a 14mm bolt but the opening in the mount is 16mm. This is not typically a problem with the OEM 3rd link as it uses a soft hydra mount bushing to soften this. But once an aftermarket upper is installed with a urethane bushing you get a noticeable clunk from the smaller bolt walking in the larger hole it installs into. Our spacers can be installed with all aftermarket upper arms that use the factory 14mm bolt in the factory chassis mount. The stepped spacers take up the slop and eliminate the noise from the upper 3rd links associated with the mismatched bolt/bolt hole combination.

Note: Our 555-4107 and 4108 upgrades do not require these spacers with their all new chassis mounts. All Steeda 555-4105 Upper Third Links produced on or after February 2007 include the Stepped Spacers.

Product Benefits

  • Adjustable pinion angle for optimum traction
  • Better handling with more stable cornering
  • Three piece urethane bushings for better traction
  • Competition tested &

proven

Tubular control arms reduce unsprung weight while improving weight distribution in race applications. QA1 tubular control arms require the use of QA1 coil-over struts and QA1 caster/camber plates.

Eco-Comp Control Arms

The Eco-Comp control arms are an economical choice in tubular arms for use on the strip. They are built with QA1's exclusive compressed rubber bushings and engineered for performance. The Eco Comp's offer value without sacrificing performance.

Pro-Comp Control Arms

The QA1 Pro-Comp Control Arms are the ultimate in adjustability design and strength. These arms utilize QA1's exclusive XM series rod ends. These chrome moly heat-treated rod ends use QA1's exclusive Teflon®/Kevlar® lining for superior performance and durability. Included in the control arm kit are spacers to allow movement of the arms forward and rearward for the wheel base adjustment.

Product Benefits

  • Better handling more stable cornering
  • Light weight
  • QA1 quality

Boss competition arms are upgraded with high duroameter urethane bushings for greatly reduced deflection and upgraded longer ball joints for strength and improved front suspension geometry and alignment.

Reduced bushing deflection will noticeably increase steering response and maintain proper alignment geometry during hard cornering. The high-grade ball joints will improve front geometry for increased cornering grip reduced under steer and reduced body roll.

Most importantly these arms won’t fold up bend and break under high load conditions like other aftermarket tubular designs.

Note: Due to the relocation from the longer ball joint 18 inch or larger wheels are required for clearance.

Product Benefits

  • Will not fold up and break like aftermarket tubular designs
  • Track tested at Daytona Speedway at over 150 mph
  • Increased cornering grip - reduced understeer
  • Maintains proper alignment geometry under hard braking
  • Reduced body roll
  • A must for 2005 through 2014 and Mustangs
  • No steering shimmy like other tubular control arms
  • Used by the top professional race teams

*Save over 6 lbs. compared to the OE control arms by switching to Steeda!*

When only the best will do say it with billet! These billet rear lower trailing arms replace the stamped steel OE parts and depending on your desired performance goals are available with urethane bushings or a spherical bearing/urethane bushing combination for high horsepower applications.

These lightweight yet super strong arms reduce un-sprung weight and eliminate wheel hop. Steeda was first to market with these control arms and had them on the shelves even before the 2005+ Mustang was released thanks to our exclusive technology transfer program with Ford Motor Company. Steeda was the first to incorporate the proper design rear offset for the rear lower trailing arms.

Don't be fooled by other companies claiming to be first with this offset yet they have only had their arms on the market a few months! Steeda's exclusive polyurethane bushing package also ensures smooth quiet operation combined with performance. No increase in NVH (noise vibration harshness) with our poly bushings like competitors arms. Part number 555-4406 with a spherical bearing on one end and our exclusive poly bushings on the other is recommended for high horsepower applications and will only have a slight increase in NVH over the standard polyurethane bushing arms.

Don't settle for anything less than Steeda original innovation.

Note: 555-4406 recommended for 500+ horsepower applications. Slight increase in NVH will result from this part.

U.S. Patent Pending

Product Benefits

  • Eliminates wheel hop improves traction.

Boss competition arms are upgraded with high duroameter urethane bushings for greatly reduced deflection and upgraded longer ball joints for strength and improved front suspension geometry and alignment.

Reduced bushing deflection will noticeably increase steering response and maintain proper alignment geometry during hard cornering. The high-grade ball joints will improve front geometry for increased cornering grip reduced under steer and reduced body roll.

Most importantly these arms won’t fold up bend and break under high load conditions like other aftermarket tubular designs.

Notes

  • Drilling required to accommodate larger balljoint studs (Included with purchase)
  • Due to the relocation from the longer balljoint 18 inch or larger wheels are required for clearance

Product Benefits

  • Lifetime Warranty
  • Will not fold up and break like aftermarket tubular designs
  • Track tested at Daytona Speedway at over 150 mph
  • Increased cornering grip - reduced understeer
  • Maintains proper alignment geometry under hard braking
  • Reduced body roll
  • A must for 2005 through 2014 and Mustangs
  • No steering shimmy like other tubular control arms
  • Used by the top professional race teams

Tubular control arms reduce unsprung weight while improving weight distribution in race applications. QA1 tubular control arms require the use of QA1 coil-over struts and QA1 caster/camber plates.

Eco-Comp Control Arms

The Eco-Comp control arms are an economical choice in tubular arms for use on the strip. They are built with QA1's exclusive compressed rubber bushings and engineered for performance. The Eco Comp's offer value without sacrificing performance.

Pro-Comp Control Arms

The QA1 Pro-Comp Control Arms are the ultimate in adjustability design and strength. These arms utilize QA1's exclusive XM series rod ends. These chrome moly heat-treated rod ends use QA1's exclusive Teflon®/Kevlar® lining for superior performance and durability. Included in the control arm kit are spacers to allow movement of the arms forward and rearward for the wheel base adjustment.

Product Benefits

  • Better handling more stable cornering
  • Light weight
  • QA1 quality

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Steeda's Chrome Moly alloy steel rear lower trailing arms directly replace the stamped steel OE parts. These lightweight yet super strong 4130 chrome moly alloy arms reduce un-sprung weight eliminate wheel hop and are twice as strong as competitors basic mild steel arms.

Steeda was first to market with trailing arms and had them on the shelves even before the S197 Mustang was released thanks to our exclusive technology transfer program with Ford Motor Company. Steeda was the first to incorporate the proper design rear offset for the rear lower trailing arms.

Don't be fooled by other companies claiming to be first with this offset yet they had their arms on the market months if not years after we released ours! Steeda's exclusive bushing package also ensures smooth quiet operation combined with performance. No increase in NVH (noise vibration harshness) like competitors arms. Don't settle for anything less than Steeda original innovation. Place your order today!

Steeda's competition upper 3rd link for S197 Mustangs is the ultimate piece for the performance Mustang enthusiast. This competition upper 3rd link like the original street version allows you to adjust your pinion angle and eliminate the torque deflection associated with the factory piece. Our competition upper 3rd link will control axle windup eliminate wheel hop under acceleration and allows for proper articulation without deflection for improved handling and corner stability.

Kit: 555-4107

Includes a competition proven chrome moly alloy rod end and our heavy duty chassis mount made from stout 1/4"
column5:
thick steel which brings your 555-4105 3rd link to 555-4106 specs.

Kit: 555-4108

Retains our 3 piece bushing package along with our heavy duty chassis mount to bring your 555-4105 3rd link to 555-4109 specs.

This part is a double adjustable design allowing you to make adjustments on the car directly eliminating the need to remove it from the vehicle for adjustment.

Available in 2 versions our full competition part number 555-4106 includes a competition proven chrome moly alloy rod end to eliminate all wheel hop and axle windup. It also allows for proper articulation with no deflection for excellent handling and cornering stability. This version with a solid rod end will increase NVH in street use and is recommended for competition use only.

The dual purpose street/competition version part number 555-4109 uses our exclusive 3 piece bushing package on the axle end and is recommended for dual purpose street/competition use. Steeda's 3 piece bushing package uses soft outer bushings with a hard center bushing on the axle end. This proven combination helps control axle wind up wheel hop under acceleration and allows for proper articulation with minimal deflection for improved handling and cornering stability. Our 3 piece bushing package will not increase NVH (noise vibration and harshness) keeping the factory's quiet smooth operation unlike competitors pieces.

Both competition upgrades include a new heavy duty chassis mount made from stout 1/4"
column6:
thick steel for twice the thickness of the original factory piece. It also gives you 2 mounting locations for increased adjustment to provide even better traction and handling.

Already own an original 555-4105 Steeda upper 3rd link and want to take it to the next level? Purchase our competition upgrade kits separately.

Note to 2011 Mustang owners: Ford changed the design of the upper 3rd link on 2011 models. 2011 owners must use either 555-4106 or 555-4109 full kits. Steeda's original 555-4105 upper 3rd link will not fit 2011 models.

column1: @323@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@323@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-ultralite-05-09-mustang-full-cowl-race-hood-307-0011/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Ultralite Full Cowl Induction Hood - (05-09)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/307-0011.jpg

Steeda's 2 step cowl induction hood will give your Mustang a bold muscular look and let people know this is no ordinary grocery getter. This original race version is 15lbs lighter than our 307-0012 street hood and 6lbs lighter than the original factory hood.

It features fully functional cowl induction instead of just a single vent that the 307-0012 version for the ultimate improvement in aerodynamics and reduced underhood temperatures. This hood has a aluminum reinforced latch area and is a direct bolt on to the factory hinges. Hood comes in a smooth gelcoat finish for easy painting and comes with windshield washer and factory prop rod provisions.

Steeda's full cowl hood part number 307-0011 substantially reduces underhood temperatures. As tested by Steeda and confirmed by Steeda's racers. Steeda's hood will maintain temperatures within 5 degrees of ambient temperature versus the stock hood which can allow underhood temperatures to soar to up to 100 degrees above ambient temperature.

http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/307-q2010-2.jpg^@^307-Q2010^@^

Steeda's Q-series Functional Hood is the same hood used in our popular Q-series serialized cars.

Continuing in the Steeda tradition of designing parts with function not just looks Steeda's Q-series hood features a large functional vent strategically located based on aerodynamic design testing done in conjunction with Ford Motor Company engineers through our long established Ford technology transfer program.

The hood vent not only reduces underhood temperatures substantially it also improves the Mustang's aerodynamic characteristics as well.

As tested by Steeda and confirmed by Steeda's racers. Steeda's hood will maintain temperatures within 10 degrees of ambient temperature versus the stock hood which can allow underhood temperatures to soar to up to 100 degrees above ambient temperature.

Our Q-series hood also features a 1/2 inch raise in height over the stock hood for a more aggressive appearance.

This hood is a direct bolt on replacement for the factory hood. Comes in a smooth gelcoat finish that is ready for basic prep and paint.

Product Benefits

  • Functional Aerodymanic Design
  • Reduces underhood heat
  • Direct bolt on replacemen

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column1: @330@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@330@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-front-swaybar-endlinks-555-1053/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Front Endlinks - Street/Comp (05-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-1053.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/555-1053-4.jpg^@^555-1053^@^

They're back! Our once discontinued street and race adjustable swaybar end links are back and better than ever!

Steeda's adjustable swaybar end links make a great upgrade for the stock end links as well as the perfect dual purpose street/open track piece.

For street applications these endlinks are as quiet as the factory units. They will not add NVH (noise vibration harshness) like rod end units.

For competition use our double adjustable design makes it adjustable on the car and allows to both retain proper swarbar geometry on lowered cars and adjust swaybar preload for fine tuning.

The adjustment body is constructed from lightweight aerospace grade aluminum and is corrosion resistant. End links feature case hardened ball studs that feature significantly increased swing area compared to spherical rod ends. Includes locking hardware for installation.

Product Benefits

  • As silent as factory units in street use
  • Aerospace grade aluminum center adjusters
  • Double adjustable design for adjustment without removing them from the vehicle
  • Case hardened ball stud
  • More swing area than endlinks with spherical rod ends
  • Proudly made in the USA!
  • Lifetime warranty

Time to install: About 45 Minutes

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Classic Design Concepts Rear Decklid Blackout Panel really cleans up the rear of your Mustang and greatly improves it's appearance.

This ABS panel easily installs with high strength double sided adhesive tape. No drilling or painting required. It neatly cleans up the style of the rear end by blacking out the entire decklid and eliminating the rear OE center badge.

In addition the rectangular space between the taillights of the '05-'09 models lies indented just a little over an inch. This trim panel fills that gap completely so the deck lid and taillights all work together nicely for a much cleaner look. Regardless of your Mustang's color the addition of the Deck Lid Trim Panel is sure to get your vehicle more attention.

Available plain or with the GT logo.

Product Benefits

  • Fill is gap between tail lights
  • Blackout look improves vehicle apprearace
  • Eliminates false gas door trunk badge
  • High Quality ABS Construction
  • No drilling or painting required

column6: Weight is the enemy of performance&quot

Benefits include easy on car length adjustment through our CNC machined chrome moly steel alloy adjuster to adjust rear end offset this is especially important if you run much wider wheels and tires and want to make sure their offsets look correct. Our CNC machined chrome moly threaded inserts are precisely engineered to provide an easy adjustment and are far stronger than mild steel. Included urethane bushings will reduce flex and improve the panhard bar's control resulting in better steering response and handling balance.

And to make a good thing better add our heavy duty panhard Bar Brace from the above drop down menu.

Adding the panhard bar brace stiffens the panhard bar chassis mounting bracket which is prone to flex under load during high cornering loads. Not sure if you need to replace the factory panhard bar brace? Put your car in the air and grab the factory brace and pull on it. You will be able to flex it by hand! Like our panhard bar our panhard bar brace is made of super strong 4130 chrome moly alloy steel for the ultimate in strength and no flex!

column1: @358@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@358@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-bumpsteer-kit-555-8106/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Bumpsteer Kit (05-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/555-8106.jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/555-8106(2).jpg^@^555-8106^@^

If you have substantially lowered your vehicle chances are you have introduced bump steer. What is bump steer? Bump Steer is changes in toe caused by suspension movement.

Every car has bump steer however when you lower the vehicle you increase the amount of bump steer that occurs if this becomes excessive you will begin to notice some unwanted vehicle driving characteristics.

When you turn your steering wheel you are essentially changing the toe of the wheels to turn the vehicle. Excessive bump steer is undesireable because it introduces unwanted steering inputs which means the suspension is steering the car instead of the driver.

If your car is lowered and has tracking issues and less predictable steering behavior you need a bump steer kit.

Steeda's Bump Steer Kits will allow you to correct your bump steer geometry and can do so without requiring you to drill or modify your vehicle spindle.

In addition our bump steer kit makes a great service replacement for your worn out high mileage outer tie rods even if you do not have excessive bump steer issues.

Pick up a bump steer kit today and refresh your outer tie rods and improve your steering.

Steeda Tapered Stud Bolt
Studs are made to the exact taper of the factory spindle for a simple install every time. Requires drilling the spindle hole to a 5/8"
column3: diameter. Bit costs $17 at local Hardware Store. Made of 4140 high-grade steel for superior strength. Basic grade 8 bolt that can vary in strength. Machined to exact tolerances for an exact fit. Must drill spindle to bolt size will have "
column7:
. Heat treated after machining to ensure hardness throughout stud. No steps taken to ensure material hardness.

Product Benefits

  • Wide range of adjustment
  • Does not require spindle modification for fitment or adjustment
  • Direct replacement installation
  • High quality construction and fit

Time to install: About 2 Hours

column1: @361@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@361@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-x11-mustang-ball-joints-555-8136/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda X11 Mustang Ball Joints (11-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-8136.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/steeda-x11-mustang-ball-joints-555-8136(2).jpg^@^555-8136^@^

Steeda's X11 balljoints are a longer stronger ball joint designed to raise the front roll center of your Mustang which becomes lower as a result of lowering the vehicle with springs or an adjustable ride height system.

Raising the roll center eliminates the issues associated with the lower roll center which include reduced cornering grip increased body roll and increased understeer.

Our X11 ball joint will improve handling by reducing body roll and improving the front tire contact patch without increasing spring rate or roll bar rate. You will experience improved steering response and higher overall front cornering grip with reduced understeer as a result.

Steeda balljoints are made in the USA from high strength steel and case hardened to meet and exceed OEM strength and durability standards. All internal housing parts are made from low-friction Nylon to preserve factory steering feel and feedback. Strength testing showed tensile strength to be nearly four times as strong as the OE ball joint.

Designed to fit 2010 GT500 and all 2011 and up Mustang models. These ball joints come with all necessary hardware and are greasable unlike the OE ball joint.

Please Note: 18"
column4:
wheels are required for clearance. Also note when using the ball joint which relocates the outer control arm pivot point a bump steer kit must be used with it because the relocation changes the geometry between the control arm and the tie rod ends which increases bump steer. Check out our bump steer kit here.

Product Benefits

  • Raises front roll center for improved handling
  • Reduces body roll
  • Reduces understeer
  • Exceeds O.E. ball joint strength and durability

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

*Clears long tube headers*

Our Extreme G-Trac Brace (k-member brace) is a direct bolt-on addition to your S550 Mustang and provides greatly improved front chassis bracing.

Our Extreme G-Trac Brace mounts close to the control arm mounts and helps strengthen the connection between the control arm mounts and the rear of the sub frame. This makes the load path more direct and gives much more effective stiffening so the suspension geometry doesn't change during high cornering/chassis loads. Manufactured from super strong chrome moly alloy steel tube making it over twice as strong as any mild steel offering.

Note: Includes G-Trac Brace and installation hardware.

  • Also referred to as k-member brace

  • Clears long tube headers!

*Power increases of up to 44 hp and 52 ft/lbs of torque!*

Steeda's ProFlow Cold Air Intake on an otherwise stock 2011 and up 5.0L Mustang has achieved a blistering 1/4 mile time of 11.96 at over 115mph! Steeda was the first manufacturer to get into the 11.90 range on a radial tire. Competitors had to use slicks to keep up.

Steeda Autosports the world's largest aftermarket manufacturer of Ford performance equipment is once again leading the performance market with our High Velocity Cold Air Intake (CAI) and SCT custom tuning device package.

This intake/tuning package called our Ultimate Induction Pak combines our High Velocity Cold Air Intake with an SCT X4 tuning device for the ultimate easy to install power upgrade.

The high velocity CAI in this package effectively opens up the intake system of Ford's new five-liter power plant and allows it to breath much more freely than the stock intake system allows - taking your 2011 and up 5.0L Mustang to the next level of performance.

To ensure the densest air charge possible we retained the factory cold air feed ducting from the front bumper and sealed the stainless steel shield to the hood to prevent any hot air from being sucked in from around the engine compartment. Other manufacturers have chosen to ignore the factory cold air ducting which is key to keeping the lowest air charge temperatures possible. Steeda was the first company to do this starting in 2010 with our 2010 GT intake and have carried this innovation over to the 2011 model.

Also a billet aluminum velocity stack and high flow air filter ensure a clean cool streamlined air charge straight to the engine. The new high flow "
column6:
intake tube provides the necessary ports to retain the factory noise tube and PCV tubes.

This Cold Air Intake is so effective at improving airflow into the five-liter engine that a performance tune is not just recommended it is required for maximum performance!

Combined with the required custom tune using the industry leading SCT X4 Flash Programming Device we have achieved dramatic power increases of up to 44hp and 52ft/lbs of torque!

SCT Tuning is the leader in the Ford tuning industry and Steeda's partner in developing this powerful package.

"
column7: SCT has seen the highest horsepower and torque results while using Steeda's Cold Air Kit over any other brand."
column8:
- Chris Johnson President of SCT Tuning

Our power increase it not just a peak number at one point in the band. The actual power increase is spread throughout the entire rpm range so your increased performance is available on demand in any gear at virtually any rpm!

Note: requires a minimum of 91 octane fuel for power gains.

Warning: This part has been designed and is intended for off-road application only. Installation of this part on a vehicle that is driven on public roads may violate U.S. and Canadian laws and regulations.

Lifetime Tune Program: Purchasing this Steeda Power Package automatically registers you into Steeda's Lifetime Tune Program at no extra cost! To learn more about Steeda's Lifetime Tune Program click here.

If your factory rear upper and lower control arm bushings are more than 10 years old regardless of mileage they most likely need to be serviced.

Steeda offers polyurethane rear control arm bushings kits to service your factory bushings and restore your factory control arms to better than new condition.

Polyurethane bushings are far more durable than factory bushings and will control suspension geometry and suspension movement better than original rubber bushings. With far less deflection you will also see improved traction and improved handling response.

Worn factory rear lower control arm bushings can also result in sagging ride height as they serve as the rear lower spring perch. New bushings will restore proper rear ride height if worn out rear lower control arm bushings are the cause.

If a full control arm upgrade is not an option for you choose these bushings upgrades instead and restore your vehicle today.

Product Benefits

  • Far more durable than factory rubber bushings
  • Reduced deflection for much better suspension control and response.
  • Improved traction and handling

^@^Mustang^@^ 5.0L V8 Bullitt Cobra Cobra R Mach 1 GT V6 2.3L ^@^Mustang Suspension^@^2004 2003 2002 2001 2000 1999 1998 1997 1996 1995 1994 1993 1992 1991 1990 1989 1988 1987 1986 1985 1984 1983 1982 1981 1980 1979 ^@^Mustang Bushings^@69.95

@367@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@367@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-cobra-mustang-rear-sub-frame-bushing-555-4016/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Rear Subframe Bushings - 99-04 Cobra^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-4016.jpg^@^555-4016^@^

Steeda IRS Subframe bushings improve handling reduce wheel hop and improve tire clearance on the 1999-2004 Mustang Cobra. The entire rear suspension of the Cobra is attached to a steel subframe which in turn is attached to the car with just four rubber bushings. The rubber bushings deflect under load leading to wheel hop and less predictable handling. Our polyurethane bushing kit substantially reduces unwanted subframe movement and wheel hop. You will notice an immediate improvement in car control after installing these bushings.

Steeda’s Subframe bushing kit includes two other important features. First we include the correct 14mm bolts to fit the car. The forward factory mounting points on the Cobra have 14mm holes but many cars were assembled from the factory with 12mm bolts. We provide new grade 10.9 nuts and bolts of the correct size. This ensures correct alignment of the subframe and prevents the bolts from shifting in the large 14mm holes. Second Steeda subframe bushing kits include new rear bolts with a low profile round head to increase tire clearance. The low profile allows bigger tires to be installed and the rounded head prevents the tire from being torn by occasional contact with the bolt.

Product Benefits

  • Improve vehicle handling
  • Reduce wheel hope

Time to install: About 6 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Your 1979-2004 Mustang's steering rack bushings are not getting any better with age. Service them today by replacing your bushings with these polyurethane steering rack bushings.

Polyurethane rack bushings reduce unwanted steering rack deflection for quicker steering response and more accurate control. These bushings will also last longer and will not deteriorate as quickly over time compared to standard rubber bushings making them a great investment.

Available in standard and offset versions. Standard versions maintain the factory steering rack position. Offset bushings raise the steering rack slightly to maintain proper steering geometry on lowered Mustangs and reduce bump steer.

Your 1979-2004 Mustang's steering rack bushings are not getting any better with age. Service them today by replacing your bushings with these polyurethane steering rack bushings.

Polyurethane rack bushings reduce unwanted steering rack deflection for quicker steering response and more accurate control. These bushings will also last longer and will not deteriorate as quickly over time compared to standard rubber bushings making them a great investment.

Available in standard and offset versions. Standard versions maintain the factory steering rack position. Offset bushings raise the steering rack slightly to maintain proper steering geometry on lowered Mustangs and reduce bump steer.

Product Benefits

  • Reduced steering rack deflection
  • Noticeably improved steering response
  • Much more durable than factory rubber bushings

If your factory rear upper and lower control arm bushings are more than 10 years old regardless of mileage they most likely need to be serviced.

Steeda offers polyurethane rear control arm bushings kits to service your factory bushings and restore your factory control arms to better than new condition.

Polyurethane bushings are far more durable than factory bushings and will control suspension geometry and suspension movement better than original rubber bushings. With far less deflection you will also see improved traction and improved handling response.

Worn factory rear lower control arm bushings can also result in sagging ride height as they serve as the rear lower spring perch. New bushings will restore proper rear ride height if worn out rear lower control arm bushings are the cause.

If a full control arm upgrade is not an option for you choose these bushings upgrades instead and restore your vehicle today.

column1: @396@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@396@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-air-filter-cleaning-kit-281-6005-01/^@^Steeda^@^Air Filter Cleaning Kit (79-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/281-6005.jpg
column3: B's Precision Cleaning &amp
column4: Oiling Kit allows vehicle owners to properly maintain their high performance air filters by precisely applying the correct amount of oil. The clearly marked bottle and easy-to-use applicator allow the user to measure and apply the proper amount of oil for each application. S&amp
column5:
B has conducted extensive testing with the Precision Cleaning Kit to ensure that it can be used on most high performance filters available today.

Product Benefits

  • Quickly and accurately restore your high performance air filter to like-new condition.
  • Works on most high performance air filters brands
  • Takes the guess work out of cleaning and oiling your performance air filter

Cleaning Instructions

  • APPLY CLEANER Remove Air Filter from Vehicle. Liberally spray Air Filter Cleaner onto both sides of filter and allow to soak for 10 minutes to loosen the dirt. Do not allow cleaner to dry on air filter.
  • RINSE FILTER Rinse off air filter with cool low-pressure water applied to the clean side out in order to flush the dirt out of the filter. Continue to rinse the filter until all traces of cleaner are gone. It may be necessary to repeat steps 1 and 2.
  • DRY FILTER After rinsing gently shake off excess water and only allow filter to dry naturally. Do not oil until the filter is completely dry. (overnight is ideal)
  • OIL FILTER Spray Air Filter Oil evenly along the crown of each pleat holding nozzle about 3"
column6:
away. Allow oil to wick for approximately 20 minutes. Touch up any light areas on either side of the filter until there is a uniform blue color at all areas. Reinstall Air Filter.

column1: @398@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@398@^http://www.steeda.com/gt500-carbon-fiber-cold-air-intake-555-3168/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Cold Air Intake - Carbon Fiber (10-12 GT500)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-3168.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3168-2.jpg
column4:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3168-3.jpg^@^555-3168^@^

With the 2010 and Up GT500 Mustang Ford took this car to a level never seen before at the O.E. level. Just like the 2011+ 5.0L Mustangs Ford put an outstanding air intake system on these cars giving the customer an extremely high level of performance and capability right from the showroom floor.

We have taken that a step further with our new ProFlow Cold Air Intake for the 2010-12 GT500. Designed tested and assembled all in-house. This kit completely replaces the factory intake assembly. This kit is specifically designed to utilize the factory cold air feed from the grille and incorporates a serviceable high flow air filter an injection molded velocity stack black powdercoated heat shield and our high flow ProFlow intake tube.

With a large 114mm mass air flow pipe we achieved a substantial increase in air flow at all engine rpm's not just at redline. The heat shield seals to the hood liner and also keeps the factory cold air feed duct keep out all hot engine bay air for maximum power.

This GT500 cold air intake is so effective at improving airflow into the 5.4L supercharged engine that a performance tune is required for maximum performance and drivability. This intake will not work with the factory ECU calibration.

In an effort to maximize performance and provide our customers with only the very best products we have partnered with the leader in automotive tuning - SCT Performance.

Combined with the required custom tune using an SCT X4 Flash programming device we have achieved power increases of up to 36hp and 39ft/lbs of torque!

Breaking down the powerband peak to peak gains of 32 horsepower were achieved with point to point max gains of 36 horsepower. Peak to peak torque gains were 32ft/lbs of torque with point to point max gains of as much as 39ft/lbs!

Power gains were achieved over the entire RPM range. More power and improved throttle response is available everywhere at any time when you need it.

If you already own a tuning device you can purchase the cold air intake by itself here or for a complete package with the required custom tuning check out our Power Packs.

Our easy to install kit comes with premium hardware silicone sleeves and installation instructions.

Product Benefits

  • Utilizes the factory cold air feed duct from the grille for low air charge temperatures
  • Beautiful gloss black powdercoated heat shield
  • ProFlow roto molded intake tube offers minimal heat soak maintaining cool air charge temps
  • Up to 36hp and 39ft/lbs of torque on an otherwise stock car

Read more about the advantages in Steeda Mustang Cold Air Intakes over the competitors on our blog: http://www.steedablog.com/2012/03/mustang-cold-air-intake-truth/

column1: @399@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@399@^http://www.steeda.com/v6-mustang-cold-air-intake-555-3159/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Cold Air Intake (11-14 V6)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-3159.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/382/detailed/3/555-3159-2.jpg^@^555-3159^@^

Steeda Autosports the world's largest aftermarket manufacturer of Ford performance equipment is once again leading the performance market with our High Velocity Cold Air Intake (CAI). This intake was designed using CAD data supplied exclusively by Ford Motor Company via our Technology Transfer program with Ford engineers.

This high performance CAI effectively opens up the intake system of Ford's new 3.7L power plant and allows it to breath much more freely than the stock intake system allows - taking your 2011 &
column4:
Up 3.7L V6 Mustang to the next level of performance.

The 2011 &
column5:
Up Mustang’s intake system from Ford is an excellent piece one of the best ever to come out of Dearborn. But as usual the engineers at Steeda were up to the challenge of making it even better for the performance customer that demands more power.

Our engineers started with a large surface area high-flow nano-fiber air filter added our famous “race-tested” velocity stack entry and then designed a stainless steel heat shield with a durable rubber gasket to seal the shield against the vehicle’s hood. Next we increased the MAF housing size and coupled it to a new higher flowing Pro-Flow inlet hose with our Cool-Tube Technology.

To ensure the densest air charge possible we retained the factory cold air feed ducting from the front bumper. Steeda was the first company to do this starting in 2010 with our 2010 GT intake and have carried this innovation over to the 2011 model. We also sealed the stainless steel shield to the hood to prevent any hot air from being sucked in from around the engine compartment. Some manufacturers have chosen to ignore the factory cold air ducting while others don't bother to seal and isolate the airbox which are both keys to keeping the lowest air charge temperatures possible. Also our billet aluminum velocity stack and high flow air filter ensure a clean streamlined air charge into the engine.

This Cold Air Intake is so effective at improving airflow into the 3.7L engine that a performance tune is not just recommended it is required for maximum performance! In an effort to maximize performance and provide our customers with only the very best products we have partnered with the leader in automotive tuning - SCT Performance.

Combined with the required custom tune using an SCT X3 Flash programming device we have achieved dramatic power increases of up to 20hp and 30ft/lbs of torque!

SCT Performance is the leader in the Ford tuning industry and Steeda's partner in developing this powerful package.

"
column6: SCT has seen the highest horsepower and torque results while using Steeda's Cold Air Kit over any other brand."
column7:
- Chris Johnson President of SCT Performance

Our power increase it not just a peak number at one point in the band. The actual power increase is spread throughout the entire rpm range so your increased performance is available on demand in any gear at virtually any rpm!

Note: requires a minimum of 91 octane fuel for power gains.

Product Benefits

  • Seals out hot underhood air
  • Utilizes the factory cold air intake ducting
  • High quality billet aluminum velocity stack

Steeda Autosports the world's largest aftermarket manufacturer of Ford performance equipment is once again leading the performance market with our High Velocity Cold Air Intake (CAI).

This high performance CAI effectively opens up the intake system of Ford's new five-liter power plant and allows it to breathe much more freely than the stock intake system allows - taking your 2015 5.0L Mustang to the next level of performance.

Our engineers started with a large surface area high-flow nano-fiber air filter added our famous “race-tested” velocity stack entry and then designed a black powder-coated heat shield with a durable rubber gasket to seal the shield against the vehicle’s hood.

You would think this is more than enough but we went the extra mile and designed this intake system to accept the factory sound tube should you decide you want to keep it for that robust intake sound many appreciate. Or if you want to eliminate it we provide the proper plug to delete it from the system.

This Cold Air Intake is so effective at improving airflow into the five-liter engine that a performance tune is not just recommended it is required for maximum performance! In an effort to maximize performance and provide our customers with only the very best products we have partnered with the leader in automotive tuning - SCT Performance.

Product Benefits

  • Easy bolt in installation
  • Retains sound tube and factory cold air ducting (also includes cap for sound tube elimination)
  • Power increase at all RPM ranges - not just peak power
  • Slated for release 2/15

column1: @401@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@401@^http://www.steeda.com/boss-mustang-cold-air-intake-555-3162/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Boss Mustang Cold Air Intake (12-13 Boss)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-3162.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3162-2.jpg^@^555-3162^@^

As good as the Boss 302 Mustang is there is still room for improvement and Steeda has found it with our Boss 302 cold air intake system!

Designed in-house by our engineering staff specifically for the Boss 302. This high performance CAI effectively opens up the intake system of Ford's five-liter power plant and allows it to breath much more freely than the stock intake system allows - taking your Boss 302 Mustang to the next level of performance.

Our engineers started with a large surface area high-flow nano-fiber air filter added our famous “race-tested” velocity stack entry and then designed a stainless steel heat shield with a durable rubber gasket to seal the shield against the vehicle’s hood. Next we increased the MAF housing size to 101mm and coupled it to a new higher flowing Pro-Flow inlet hose with our Cool-Tube Technology.

To ensure the densest air charge possible we retained the factory cold air feed ducting from the front bumper. Steeda was the first company to do this starting in 2010 with our 2010 GT intake and have carried this innovation over to the 2011-12 models. We also sealed the stainless steel shield to the hood to prevent any hot air from being sucked in from around the engine compartment. Some manufacturers have chosen to ignore the factory cold air ducting. Some claim they use it when it is really just hanging there blowing air into an open compartment. While others don't bother to seal and isolate the airbox which are all keys to keeping the lowest air charge temperatures possible. Also our billet aluminum velocity stack and high flow air filter ensure a clean streamlined air charge into the engine.

This Cold Air Intake is so effective at improving airflow into the five-liter engine that a performance tune is not just recommended it is required for maximum performance! In an effort to maximize performance and provide our customers with only the very best products we have partnered with the leader in automotive tuning - SCT Performance.

SCT Performance is the leader in the Ford tuning industry and Steeda's partner in developing this powerful package.

"
column4: SCT has seen the highest horsepower and torque results while using Steeda's Cold Air Kit over any other brand.&quot
column5:
- Chris Johnson President of SCT Performance

Combined with the required custom tune using an SCT X4 Flash programming device we have achieved dramatic power increases.

Peak to Peak gains of up to 28hp and 22ft/lbs of torque have been achieved with point to point gains of as much as 32 horsepower and 25 ft/lbs of torque!

Our power increase it not just a peak number at one point in the band. The actual power increase is spread throughout the entire rpm range so your increased performance is available on demand in any gear at virtually any rpm!

Note: requires a minimum of 91 octane fuel for power gains.

You can purchase the intake by itself if you already own a flash programming device and intend to have your own custom tuning done or you can buy the complete Boss Mustang Power Package by clicking here if you have a manual transmission or here if you have an automatic transmissions.

Product Benefits

  • Boss specific intake tube for proper fitment on Boss 302
  • Easy bolt on installation
  • Peak gains of up to 32 horsepower
  • Power increase across entire power band

Read more about the advantages in Steeda Mustang Cold Air Intakes over the competitors on our blog: http://www.steedablog.com/2012/03/mustang-cold-air-intake-truth/

Note: Federal and several state and provincial laws prohibit the removal modification or rendering inoperative of any part that affects emissions or safety on motor vehicles used on public streets or highways. Steeda Autosports assumes no liability for any violations arising out of any federal state or provincial emissions or safety requirements on motor vehicles arising out of the customer’s modifications and/or use of Steeda products. It is the responsibility of the customer to determine if their modified vehicle complies with applicable laws.

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column1: @408@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@408@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-v6-mustang-cold-air-intake-555-3124/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Cold Air Intake - 05-09 V6^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/product/1/555-3124.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/382/detailed/3/555-3124-2.jpg^@^555-3124^@^

Increase horsepower and torque with our high velocity cold air intake for your 2005-09 4.0L V6 Mustang.

Steeda's high velocity cold air intake earns it's name due to the exclusive velocity stack design.

The radiused entry of the velocity stack design increases and straightens airflow into the mass air for greater power and a cleaner MAF signal.

With a clean MAF signal you get better drivability than other designs and makes it easier to tune resulting in better power and the best drivability possible.

Includes a serviceable lifetime dual cone air filter that can be cleaned and re-oiled but the big news here is that we've streamlined the airflow in the V6 S197 Mustang to the point that a computer re-flash isn't just an option it's required! Check out the SCT X4 - the perfect tool for the job!

Steeda's intake is supplied with a stainless steel air box and CNC billet aluminum mass air meter. It mounts in the factory location with the supplied rubber trim to seal it against the hood &
column4:
fender to keep the hot air isolated from the filter. Our tests showed inlet temps a mere 10 degrees above ambient temperature. The Steeda Lifetime Filter can easily be cleaned and re-oiled making maintenance a snap. All hardware required for installation is included in the kit.

We've found between 16 -20 more rear wheel horsepower with this kit combined with the required SCT tune. Power you can feel!

Product Benefits

  • Added horsepower and torque
  • Lifetime filter
  • Keeps hot air out cold air in

Read more about the advantages in Steeda Mustang Cold Air Intakes over the competitors on our blog: http://www.steedablog.com/2012/03/mustang-cold-air-intake-truth/

column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/777-3800-2.jpg^@^777-3800^@^

Relocate your battery to the trunk for more traction and better handling. Steeda tested it on their 4-wheel digital scale and found that moving a 35 pound battery from the left front of the car to the right side of the trunk actually put 60 more pounds on the right rear tire - where you need it most for traction.

Better weight distribution also reduces "
column5: during braking and improves handling response. Kit includes battery box cables &amp
column6:
all necessary hardware.

Product Benefits

  • More traction
  • Better handling
  • Reduced nose dive

This Airaid cold air intake system directly replaces the factory cold air system on your 2011 and Up GT and provides up to 11 horsepower over the factory airbox using the factory engine calibration.

This intake was designed with a restrictor in place in order to not require custom tuning and runs perfectly on the original engine calibration. For even more performance the included restrictor can be removed and combined with SCT custom tuning gains of up to 40 horsepower can be achieved!

This intake ties properly into the factory cold air ducting system to keep air charge temperatures as low as possible and includes washable air filter that will last for years to come.

Product Benefits

  • Does not require custom tune
  • Up to 11 horsepower on factory tune
  • Up to 40 horsepower with custom tune!
  • Easy direct bolt on installation

Steeda Adjustable Motor Mounts for 2005-2010 Mustang directly replace the weak factory hydra bushing engine mounts. While the factory mounts get the damping job done they can be prone to fatigue and sagging even with only limited hard use.

In addition to being much more durable than the factory engine mounts these engine mounts are adjustable from factory height up to 3/4 of an inch lower to create clearance for superchargers and strut tower braces.

Steeda Adjustable Motor Mounts also feature dual durometer bushing packages. Choose the softer red bushings for great control with only minimal increase in engine vibration transmission. Choose the hard black bushings for maximum control but will increase engine vibration transmission significantly. Black bushings package is highly recommended for competition use only.

Featuring a 102mm diameter molded plastic air intake tube with a unique clean-air inlet design for better incoming airflow this Ford Racing cold air intake greatly improves power and throttle response.

This cold air intake is featured as original equipment on the naturally aspirated version of the Cobra Jet Mustang race car.

To realize the full power potential that this Cobra Jet Cold Air Intake Kit has to offer we recommend a Steeda custom tune with a Mustang Handheld Tuner to reprogram the vehicle's computer (ECU) for proper operation.

Note: This Ford Racing 5.0L Cobra Jet Cold Air Intake Kit is specifically designed to fit 2011-2014 GT and 2012-2013 Boss 302 Mustangs with the Cobra Jet 5.0L Intake Manifold installed. Intake manifold requires throttle body M-9926-MSVT M-9926-CJ65 or M-9926-SCJ.

^@^Mustang^@^ 5.0L GT ^@^Mustang Induction^@^2014 2013 2012 2011 ^@^Mustang Cold Air Intakes^@^99.95^ @423@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@423@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-billet-mustang-charge-motion-plates-nitrous-ports-555-3126/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Billet Mustang Charge Motion Control Plates w/ Nitrous Ports (05-08)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-3126.jpg^@^555-3126^@^

Steeda's patented CNC machined billet charge motion plates are a superior upgrade for your Mustang. As used on Steeda's Q335 Mustangs Steeda's plates are .070 larger than the OE plates and are a better port match to the intake manifold and cylinder heads than the original plates reducing turbulence and improving airflow in the intake path for more horsepower and torque!

Beautifully CNC'd machined out of 6061-T6 aluminum for superior strength and light weight. Steeda's charge motion plates are available with tapped nitrous fitting holes for custom nitrous applications. Steeda's charge motion plates require computer recalibration for use. Once tuned charge motion plates will not sacrifice any low-end torque and provide mid-range and upper RPM horsepower and torque increases. Peak increases of 10 horsepower or more have been seen on naturally aspirated applications larger gains possible on supercharged engines.

Bolt them on now and maximize your power curve today!

Note: As of the 2009 model year Ford now molds the charge motion plates into the stock intake manifold so they are not changeable.

Product Benefits

  • Increase of 10 hp!
  • Improves torque mid-range and upper RPM power
  • Installs using hand tools
  • Larger ports for better airflow!
  • Bolts directly in place of factory plates
  • US Patented CNC 6061-T6 billet aluminum construction

Time to install: About 3 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

The BBK Throttle Intake incorporates a high flow intake plenum and a large 78mm BBK throttle body all in one great performing unit. This throttle intake is a direct bolt-on and is good for an additional 10 to 15 horsepower.

The BBK Mustang throttle body is machined from high quality 356 aluminum to ensure OEM quality and fit. Features like die stamped throttle linkages double sealed bearings and o-ringed throttle shafts make this one of the best throttle body's on the market.

BBK's 78mm throttle intake is designed to be a perfect fit on all 1996 to 2004 4.6L SOHC GT Mustang uses the factory throttle body gasket.

Please note: 1. A 78mm throttle body works great on a heavily modified or supercharged Mustang GT's horsepower gains will be minimal on stock or mildly modified GT's because they do not have enough air flow to benefit from the larger throttle body. 2. This BBK product is not legal for use in emission restrictive states.

Transmission(s): ^@^Mustang^@^ 5.0L Bullitt GT V6 GT500 Boss ^@^Mustang Wheels & Tires^@^2014 2013 2012 2011 2010 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005 ^@^Mustang Wheel & Tire Combos^@^650.95^ @445@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@445@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-whipple-supercharger-belt-drive-555-3353-pol/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Whipple Supercharger Belt Drive - 18-20 PSI/Polished Snout (05-10)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-3353-pol.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3353-pol-1.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3353-pol-2.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3353-pol-3.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3353-pol-4.jpg^@^555-3353-POL^@^

Tired of belts slipping breaking or simply being thrown off your Whipple supercharged Mustang when pushing it to the limit? Those days are now over! Steeda’s Belt Drive System for Whipple Supercharger was designed to prevent any such belt problems that are all too common during competition or just hardcore use of your Mustang.

Steeda designed this belt drive package to relocate the supercharger drive off the factory 6-rib system making it a dedicated 10-rib belt system which drives the supercharger and nothing else. Removing the supercharger drive from the primary accessory drive serves to eliminate any and all slippage problems that can occur including both on the initial tip in and under full load. The standard accessories are driven by a Steeda underdrive pulley for even more power and reduced accessory load.

Our 10-rib system is available in boost levels of approximately 11psi to 17psi on a Gen 1 Whipple system and approximately 13 to 19psi on a Gen 2 Whipple system with no slippage under any conditions and no throwing or breakage of the supercharger belt.

The package includes a new supercharger snout billet pulleys billet mounting plates 2 new belts and a heavy-duty belt tensioner. Although we recommend a Steeda hood it only takes a minor modification to fit the system under your stock hood. Full installation instructions including to the procedure for measuring stock hood clearance are included.

Already own a Steeda Belt Drive and want to change boost levels? Take a look at our separate lower boost pulley kits.


Important Note: Stated boost levels are estimates only based on GEN 2 Whipple superchargers and will vary widely depending on numerous factors including but not limited to: Exhaust configuration cylinder heads port configuration camshafts geographic elevation engine compression throttle body size boost gauge accuracy and other factors beyond the control of Steeda Autosports. Use numbers provided for guidance only. In general cars with large cams cylinder heads etc will have slightly lower boost levels.

column1: @446@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@446@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-q-series-mustang-front-fascia-555-0501/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Q-Series Functional Mustang Front Fascia (10-12)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-0501.jpg

column5:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-0501-4.jpg^@^555-0501^@^

Steeda's Q-series functional front fascia for the 2010 through 2012 Mustang is a complete replacement front bumper that incorporates an aerodynamic air splitter for improved high speed stability.

A front lower splitter redirects airflow across the lower front bumper to the sides instead of letting it flow underneath the vehicle which creates downforce and eliminates the high speed front end lift associated with the air flowing underneath the car putting more weight down on the front tires.

We have also incorporated cooling openings for a variety of different cooling applications requiring extra airflow.

Starting with the built in brake cooling scoops in the lower bumper opening these will easily accept hose ducting that can be run to the brakes or can also be used with Steeda brake cooling duct kits.

The large lower bumper opening provides excellent airflow for intercoolers and heat exchangers on supercharged applications. In addition 2 additional opening to the sides of the fascia can be used for custom cooling applications such as oil coolers power steering coolers etc.

Steeda's Q-series Functional Front Fascia is a direct bolt on replacement to the factory fascia.

Product Benefits

  • Direct bolt on replacement
  • Aerodymanically functional - improves front downforce
  • Extra airflow for brake cooling and other cooling applications
  • Modern aggressive styling

column1: @449@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@449@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-gt500-mustang-brake-cooling-kit-555-6020/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda GT500 Mustang Brake Cooling Kit (07-09 GT500)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/337/detailed/2/555-6020.jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-6020-1.jpg^@^555-6020^@^

Get better brake performance out of your brakes during spirited driving and track events with the Steeda Brake Cooling Kit. The proper way to cool brakes is from the inside of the hat out through the vanes.

Mounting the duct tube 2+ inches away from the rotor as other designs do results in a significant loss of cooling air when the duct ends. The air simply escapes through the gap without taking any heat with it. Also since there is nothing there to direct it into the hat most of the air that actually does some cooling simply bounces off the inside rotor face.

This causes the inside fire ring to cool more than the outside which can cause rotor warping. To solve these problems our engineers came up with a mount specifically for the Mustang spindle (not some universal piece) that directs air right to the eye of the rotor ensuring that virtually all of the air goes through the vanes. The result is even cooling lower rotor temperatures and better brake performance than the rest.

The modular design allows you to upgrade your brakes and maintain maximum cooling by merely switching out the backing plate.

Made from aluminum and not steel like the rest for less weight. All mounting hardware is stainless too for more durability.

Product Benefits

  • Lower rotor temperatures
  • Even rotor cooling
  • Modular design

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Our tests showed inlet temps a mere 5-10 degrees above ambient temperature.

The Steeda Lifetime Filter can easily be cleaned and re-oiled making maintenance a snap. All stainless steel hardware required for installation is included in the kit.

Used by the top tuners in the industry.

column1: @459@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@459@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-watts-linkage-555-2525/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda's Mustang Watt's Linkage (05-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-2525_je1x-7u.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2525-2.jpg
column4:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2525-3.jpg^@^555-2525^@^

The Steeda Autosports Engineering Team latest creation is the most technologically advanced and best performing suspension upgrade you can provide for your 2005 and newer Mustang.

Steeda’s Watt’s Linkage was under development for an extended period of time by Steeda Engineers using ISO 9001-2008 certified procedures to insure we set a new benchmark standard for Watt’s Linkage suspension systems for the Ford performance enthusiast.

Rather than rushing to market like many of our competitors have done and potentially providing inferior products that do not provide the best possible performance attributes we took our time and designed it the right way from scratch. Our company founder Dario Orlando has always mandated that if the Steeda name is on it it has to be the very best possible he would not have it any other way.

We started with a “blank sheet"
column5:
doing extensive product evaluations and engineering simulations to form a basis for the current suspension dynamics on the Mustang.

A Watt’s Linkage replaces the Panhard Bar that was added when Ford re-designed the suspension and made the trailing arms parallel with the length of the chassis. When all of the trailing arms were made parallel they no longer provided lateral (side-to-side) positioning by themselves (as they did on the Satchell Link of the Fox/SN95).

As the body mount of a Panhard Bar rises and falls with suspension motion the axle moves laterally with respect to the chassis due to the arc described by the Panhard Bar. This in effect binds the suspension preventing it from moving to where load transfer and geometry would like it to be. Therefore the lower the movement the better.

A perfectly set up Panhard Bar (a bar that is horizontal at ride height) with a length of 42.5"
column6: (about what the S197 is) has a lateral motion of about 0.189&quot
column8: or 4.8mm) toward the passenger side for 4&quot
column9:
of travel in both bump and rebound. When the Panhard Bar cannot be set up perfectly (and it's not on the S197 it is not parallel at ride height) the amount of lateral movement increases in either bump or rebound (depending on which end of the Panhard Bar is lower which is the driver's side on an S197). Further since the axle moves toward the passenger side in both bump and rebound there is a difference in cornering characteristic when turning left vs. right.

Steeda’s Watts Linkage practically eliminates the unwanted lateral motion inherent in the geometry of the factory Panhard bar in its operating range. With the lateral and center link lengths that Steeda uses the lateral motion for 4"
column12: or 0.46mm or 1/10 of the Panhard bar amount). At 4&quot
column15:
or 0.43mm or 1/10 of the Panhard bar).

At 2"
column16: of bump/rebound travel Steeda's Watt’s Linkage is even more impressive. The Panhard Bar has moved 0.047&quot
column17: (1.19mm) while the Watt’s Linkage has moved less than 0.001&quot
column20:
or 0.01mm).

Eliminating the lateral movement of the axle allows the suspension to react to cornering forces in a more consistent manner and will provide for a more stable and confidence-inspiring feeling as your vehicle’s suspension moves through its range of motion. To the driver it will feel like the rear end is more connected to the chassis plus with the left vs right turning dynamics now stabilized the whole vehicle will feel more connected responsive and consistent.

Also not to be overlooked is our available adjustment for roll center height and links featuring urethane bushings instead of spherical bearings for quiet street operation. Spherical bearings used by competitors will increase NVH (noise vibration and harshness) in the vehicle.

On a Watt’s Link-equipped vehicle the center pivot of the center link is the rear roll center. Moving the center pivot up or down moves the roll center up and down. Further the lateral links should be horizontal and the center link vertical with the vehicle at ride height to minimize scrub.

Our Watt's Link is constructed out of tubular chrome moly alloy steel not mild steel like competitors - TWICE as strong and lighter than mild steel competitors keeping weight to a minimum with superior strength.

Notes: Not compatible with convertibles Eibach rear swaybar or Ford Racing rear swaybar.

Note: 2011 &
column21:
newer must use rear sway bar 555-1073 for clearance.

Product Benefits

  • Lightweight high strength 4130 steel
  • Urethane bushings to eliminate added NVH
  • Aerospace grade ball bearings for precise movement

Not all Mustang Watt's Linkages are created equal. Learn more about what makes Steeda stand out from the crowd: http://www.steeda.com/blog/2013/08/steeda-mustang-watts-link/

Time to install: About 3 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Best of all the 2-piece loops mean you don't have to drop your driveshaft to install it.

column1: @464@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@464@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-upper-control-arm-555-4097/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Upper Control Arm - Stock Height (05-10)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-4097.jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/8/steeda-mustang-upper-control-arm-555-4097.jpg^@^555-4097^@^

Need more axle control with those sticky tires? The new Steeda Tubular Upper 3rd-Link gives you the ability to eliminate the torque deflection associated with the factory piece.

Steeda's upper link uses our track proven three-piece urethane bushing design on the chassis end to eliminate the annoying windup and wheel-hop you get with the soft factory bushing.

Steeda's upper 3rd link is a direct replacement for the factory original bolting into the factory location. Aluminum reinforced plates are a very high aircraft quality. Comes Blue Powdercoated with bump stop and hardware.

Stepped Spacer Details

This spacer is designed to fix the problem with the OEM upper link. At the attachment point for the upper link to the chassis mount Ford uses a 14mm bolt but the opening in the mount is 16mm. This is not typically a problem with the OEM mount as it uses a soft hydra mount bushing to soften this. But once an aftermarket upper is installed with a urethane bushing can transmit this noise or clunk. This space can be installed with all aftermarket upper that still use a 14mm bolt. The stepped spacer takes up the slop and eliminates all noise from the upper. Note it does work with aftermarket chassis mounts with smaller then 16mm bolt holes.

Notes

  • All Steeda Upper Third Links produced on or after February 2007 include the Stepped Spacers.
  • Steeda's non-adjustable upper third link part number 555-4096 is intended for use on lowered vehicles only. Steeda's 555-4097 upper 3rd link can be used on stock ride height and lowered applications.

Product Benefits

  • Better handling with more stable cornering while maintaining good ride quality
  • Excellent bang-for-the-buck suspension piece
  • More Traction which means lower 60fts!

Learn the differences in Steeda brand control arms read our blog post for more info: http://www.steedablog.com/2012/01/the-hidden-difference-in-control-arms/

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Steeda's ST-R mesh wheels for the Ford Mustang offer great style and strength. Using a low pressure casting process gives these wheels lower weight than standard gravity cast wheels.

Steeda's ST-R mesh wheel is designed to clear most popular big brake kits such as Steeda's 14 inch 4 piston brake set up.

Can be run in 20x9.5 size all around or staggered with 20x9.5 in front and our 20x11 in the rear. Available in a solid matte black as well as gunmetal with machined lip.

Note: 2007 and up vehicles must have tire pressure system sensors transfered to new wheels for proper system operation. Tire pressure system programming tool is available separately.

Steeda's replacement shifter bushings are designed to reduce slop that develops over time with your aftermarket or factory shifter caused by the shifter linkage bushings wearing out.

The OE replacement bushings are not available from your Ford dealer separately they can only be obtained by purchasing an entire shifter assembly. Our bushings are more durable direct replacement upgrades.

Manufactured from high-strength plastic to provide a more direct link to the transmission. Does not require removal of the entire shifter assembly for installation.

Product Benefits

  • High strength plastic reduces shifter slop
  • Prevents purchasing the entire OE shifter just to replace the worn out bushings
  • Does not require any permanent modifications to car

Time to install: About 30 Minutes

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

@476@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@476@^http://www.steeda.com/sct-big-air-mustang-90mm-mass-air-meter-388-ba-2600/^@^Steeda^@^SCT Big Air Mustang 90mm Mass Air Meter (89-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/388-ba-2600.jpg^@^388-BA-2600^@^

A common issue in supercharged applications is reaching the maximum airflow reading capacity of the factory mass air meter. Many factory air meters will max out with as little as 400 horsepower.

SCT's Big Air BA-2600 mass air meter solves this issue. This mass air is specifically designed to support up to 700 rear wheel horsepower in roots style blower applications and up to 625 rear wheel horsepower in centrifugal supercharger applications.

This unit is a direct bolt on replacement for 2003-04 Cobra but can also be easily installed in 89-2004 supercharged applications.

Note: REQUIRES custom tuning for proper operation in all applications. 89-95 Mustangs require part number 388-2901 MAF connection adapter for use.

Product Benefits

  • Increases mass air range for high airflow supercharged applications
  • Supports up to 700 horsepower
  • OEM quality electronics
  • 90mm billlet construction

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model(s): 5.0L V8 Cobra Cobra R GT

This kit features everything you need to swap out the 4 lug setup for a 5 lug setup. Featuring spindles calipers and rotors from 1994-1998 SN-95 Mustangs. Pick up this kit today and get a wider selection of brakes wheels and other driveline options for your Mustang!

Need better cooling for your high horsepower 2005-2012 Mustang? Steeda has the solution!

When looking for a high performance radiator we looked for a design that met the same high quality standards we set for ourselves with our in house manufactured suspension and driveline components. With that in mind we chose CSF for our cooling solution.

This CSF radiator is the only one on the market designed to fit both the 2005-2010 Mustang as well as the 2011-12 5.0L Mustang. In addition this combo unit is designed to fit both manual and automatic transmissions with one part number.

Using CSF's innovative "
column12:
are carefully formed and the brazed over the seam to seal. This design is stronger than normal O shape tubes that are welded. This design also increases heat transfer surface area by around 15% compared to standard tubes.

CSF radiators are made from military grade aircraft aluminum on a high precision 6 stage tube forming mill. No one else in the aftermarket does radiators like this.

With enough cooling capacity to cool engines in excess of 750 horsepower this radiator should fit all your cooling needs street or race.

Product Benefits

  • Capable of cooling engines making in excess of 750 horsepower
  • Individually leak and vibration tested
  • Thermal cycle and burst pressure cycle tested for unmatched reliability
  • Direct bolt on replacement for all 2005-2012 Mustang - manual or automatic

MagnaFlow performance exhaust systems are as rugged and reliable as the vehicle that you drive. These exhaust kits feature OEM-style barbed hangers for easy installation mandrel bends to prevent exhaust flow restrictions and MagnaFlow's legendary straight-through wide-open stainless steel muffler to provide a smooth deep tone outside of the vehicle. All MagnaFlow exhaust systems are factory-checked for proper fitment and dyno-tested to verify performance gains. These kits include all necessary installation hardware and some include a polished stainless steel exhaust tip.

Product Specifications

  • Material: 100% Stainless Steel
  • Tubing O.D. Size: 3in.
  • System Type: Cat-Back
  • TIP O.D. Size: 4in.
  • TIP Quantity: 2
  • Single/Dual: Dual
  • Exit Position: DUAL SPLIT REAR EXIT

Product Benefits

  • Choice of sound levels (street vs competition)
  • Quality stainless steel construction
  • Available in Axle Back or Full Cat Back Configurations
  • Limited lifetime warranty
  • Increased horsepower and torque

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

^@^Mustang^@^ GT500 ^@^2011-2014 Exhaust^@^2014 2013 ^@^2011-2014 Axle-Back Exhaust^@^249.95^ @490@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@490@^http://www.steeda.com/magnaflow-mustang-competition-quad-tip-axle-back-exhaust-263-15077/^@^Steeda^@^Magnaflow Mustang Competition Quad Tip Axle-back Exhaust (11-12 GT)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/mpe-15077_jw_xl.jpg^@^263-15077^@^

Give your Mustang GT a deep aggressive rumble that the stock factory pipes just can't match with a Magnaflow Competition Axle-back. This premium quality exhaust features free-flowing straight-through mufflers that increase power and give your Mustang GT an unmistakable muscle car sound.

Made from 2.5" mandrel bent stainless steel tubing for long life this Magnaflow Axle back exhaust system features two straight-through mufflers that end with brightly polished 4" stainless steel quad tips.

These kits include all necessary installation hardware and some include a polished stainless steel exhaust tip.

  • System Type: Axle-Back
  • TIP O.D. Size: 4in.
  • TIP Quantity: 2
  • Single/Dual: Dual
  • Exit Position: DUAL SPLIT REAR EXIT

Product Benefits

  • Choice of sound levels (street vs competition)
  • Quality stainless steel construction
  • Available in Axle Back or Full Cat Back Configurations
  • Limited lifetime warranty
  • Increased horsepower and torque

Magnaflow exhaust manufactures high quality stainless steel exhaust systems and has excellent offerings for the 2010 Mustang.

From simple axle back exhaust systems to full cat back systems which include over axle piping with mandrel bent tubing Magnaflow has what you need.

Standard Magnaflow system feature an oval muffler with a 4 inch tip. Looking to increase sound slightly from stock but don't want excessive sound levels then this system is for you.

Magnapack system feature a round style muffler with 3.5 inch tip. Features substantially more aggressive sound than standard Magnaflow systems. Want people to know you are coming? Magnapacks are the way to go.

column1: @519@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@519@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-suspension-package-555-2125/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda G/Trac Mustang Suspension Package - Stage 1 (94-95 Cobra)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-2125.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2125-2.jpg
column5:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2125-4.jpg^@^555-2125^@^

Steeda's G/Trac Suspension Systems include everything needed to build an awesome handling car with excellent street manners. Steeda's G/Trac suspension components are proven components tested through decades of experience gained from street and racetrack testing.

Each stage provides an outstanding improvement in performance and a well balanced car at the end of each stage. This means you do not have to do each stage in numerical order to achieve improvements. Each stage can be done individually at any time as your budget or upgrade needs dictate.

Steeda’s Stage 1 suspension package lays the foundation for proper handling and builds a base for any future modifications by addressing three essential elements needed for performance.

  • Sport Lowering Springs lower the center of gravity and reduce body roll while maintaining the great ride quality Steeda springs are known for.
  • Strut Tower and lower G/Trac braces stiffen the body structure to stabilize the suspension during hard cornering and reduce body shake and rattles. Steeda G/Trac bars are included with 86-93 cars. 94+ have factory G/Trac style bars so our kits do not include them.
  • Caster Camber Plates allow you to set proper alignment and improve caster geometry while eliminating suspension “slop” at the top of the strut tower. Improved caster gives you straighter highway tracking with less wander and better self centering steering feel. Increased caster also gives you better tire contact patch area during braking or better more consistent braking performance.

Time to install: About 7 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools
