http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/6/steeda-spyder-mustang-wheel-black-machined-013-0020-45m(3).JPG^@^013-0020-45M^@^

Steeda's Spyder wheels offer great style and strength. Using a low pressure casting process gives these wheels lower weight than standard gravity cast wheels.

Steeda's Spyder wheel is designed to clear most popular big brake kits such as Steeda's 14 inch 4 piston brake set up.

Can be run in 20x9.5 size all around or staggered with 20x9.5 in front and our 20x11 in the rear. Available in black with machined face and lip or black with a machined lip.

Note: 2007 and up vehicles must have tire pressure system sensors transfered to new wheels for proper system operation. Tire pressure system programming tool is available separately.

Wake up the performance and sound hidden in your V6-powered 2011 to 2014 Mustang with a Flowmaster Force II exhaust system. These moderate sounding systems retain the dual exhaust system outlets and are designed to replace the original rear mounted mufflers using factory hangers and connections. With easy fit in mind these systems are mandrel bent for maximum performance and include specially tuned mufflers.

As a Force II system it delivers a moderate exterior tone and a mild interior tone and is suited to the enthusiast who wants a subtle but distinctive exhaust note. Like all Flowmaster systems the benefits include improved throttle response power and mileage. The kit is a true bolt-on and includes everything you need to easily install at home with basic hand tools.

Product Benefits

  • Mandrel bent 16 gauge 409 stainless tubing
  • Moderate exterior exhaust tone
  • Includes hangers and hardware for easy installation
  • Dyno tuned for maximum performance
  • Made in the USA
  • Premium Flowmaster quality

^@^Mustang^@^ 5.0L Bullitt GT V6 GT500 Boss ^@^Mustang Body Kits^@^2014 2013 2012 2011 2010 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005 ^@^Mustang Louvers^@169.95 @597@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@597@^http://www.steeda.com/3dcarbon-boy-racer-mustang-body-4pc-kit-unpainted-023-629019/^@^Steeda^@^3D Carbon Boy Racer Mustang Body 4pc Kit - Unpainted (13-14 GT V6)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/692019.4.jpg^@^023-629019^@^

Give your Mustang race inspired styling with a 3dCarbon brand Boy Racer body kit. This body kit features an aggressively sculpted front air dam that flows seamlessly into the side skirts.

The Boy Racer body kit includes the front air dam driver and passenger side skirts a rear lower fascia valance. The kit includes instructions and all the necessary hardware required for installation.

3dCarbon Boy Racer Body Kits are manufactured using high-pressure injected molded polyurethane material for its flexibility and durability.

This 4 piece Boy Racer Body Kit by 3dCarbon is specifically designed to fit the 2013-2014 Mustangs including the GT and V6 models. It does not fit the Shelby GT500 models.

Please note: Professional installation of all body parts is recommended. It is also recommended test fitting these parts before they are painted.

Product Benefits

^@^Mustang^@^ Bullitt GT V6 GT500 ^@^Mustang Body Kits^@^2009 2008 2007 2006 2005 ^@^Mustang Rear Wings^@^279.95^ @600@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@600@^http://www.steeda.com/3d-carbon-mustang-one-piece-tonneau-cover-023-691046/^@^Steeda^@^3D Carbon Mustang One-Piece Tonneau Cover - Unpainted - 05-14 All^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/22207449053baad9976e8b.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/109826569753baad997703a.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/210131679353baad9976c72.jpg^@^023-691046^@^

Give your convertible Mustang sleek modern styling by covering up your bulky folded down rag top with a 3dCarbon tonneau cover. This tonneau cover not only hides your convertible top for a sleek roadster appearance but it is officially licensed by Ford and features a bright Chrome Running Pony emblem.

The 3dCarbon Tonneau Cover is manufactured to higher than OEM specifications from a one piece vacuum-formed ABS plastic for its light weight and durability. The Tonneau Cover features a light grained texture that matches the factory trim molding perfectly.

Completed in a light grained texture black finish this high quality ABS Tonneau Cover can be installed as-is or be painted to match your Mustang's interior or exterior.

This One-Piece Tonneau Cover installs simply with the two supplied brackets and lock-tab cams. No drilling or cutting required and the lock-tabs provide extra peace of mind and protection against theft.

Please note: This 3DCarbon Tonneau Cover fits all 2005-2014 Convertible Mustangs including the V6 GT and Shelby GT500 models. This cover can also be used in conjunction with a styling bar or light bar for additional custom styling.

Technical Note. Due to the tonneau cover's one-piece construction it will not fit into your Mustang's trunk.

Product Benefits

^@^Mustang^@^ 5.0L Bullitt GT V6 GT500 ^@^Mustang Body Kits^@^2014 2013 2012 2011 2010 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005 ^@^Mustang Light Bars^@^599.95^ @601@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@601@^http://www.steeda.com/3d-carbon-mustang-fender-vents-unpainted-023-691074/^@^Steeda^@^3D Carbon Mustang Fender Vents - Unpainted (05-09 All)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/691074_1-23_109986.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/fv1tk_5.81.jpg^@^023-691074^@^

3dCarbon Fender Vents feature an aggressively sculpted design that complements the existing body lines. These fender vents not only look great but they are fully functional as well.

Designed as fully functional heat extractors to provide flow-through ventilation these 3dCarbon Fender Vents allow hot air to exit the engine bay keeping your engine running cooler.

3dCarbon Fender Vents are manufactured using high-pressure injected molded polyurethane material for its flexibility durability. Mesh grille inserts are included.

This pair of unpainted 3dCarbon fender vents are specifically designed to fit the 2005 to 2009 Mustangs including the V6 GT Bullitt and Shelby GT500 models.

^@^Mustang^@^ Bullitt GT V6 GT500 ^@^Mustang Body Kits^@^2009 2008 2007 2006 2005 ^@^Mustang Rear Wings^@^299.95^ @608@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@608@^http://www.steeda.com/3d-carbon-mustang-dual-exhaust-rear-valance-023-691566/^@^Steeda^@^3D Carbon Mustang Dual Exhaust Rear Valance - 05-09 V6^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/2093448053baab5fb4e28.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/184734108953baab5fba105.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/116437805153baab5fb9ed0.jpg^@^023-691566^@^

Most people just cut a hole in the factory rear bumper cover after converting to a dual exhaust system which isn't the best look - 3dCarbon Rear Valance Skirt will give your Pony a clean finished appearance that will have people guessing if you made any changes at all.

The 3dCarbon V6 Rear Valance Skirt is manufactured to higher than OEM specifications from high-pressure injected molded polyurethane material for its flexibility durability and for a perfect fit.

The 3dCarbon valance attaches directly to the factory V6 bumper via screws in the wheel wells and 3M automotive grade bonding tape around the perimeter. Installation will require trimming a hole for the driver side exhaust tip in the stock factory rear bumper before installing the 3dCarbon Rear Valance Skirt.

Please note: This 3dCarbon Rear Valance Skirt is designed for use on the 2005 to 2009 V6 Mustangs that have been converted to a dual exhaust system.

Product Benefits

^@^Mustang^@^ 5.0L GT V6 Boss ^@^Mustang Body Kits^@^2012 2011 2010 ^@^Mustang Fascias & Body Kits^@^049.95^ @616@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@616@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-competition-mustang-springs-555-8240/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Competition Mustang Springs - Full Set (79-04 GT & V6)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-8240.jpg^@^555-8240^@^

Springs are the foundation of good handling. So start with the best. Our experience and expertise in high performance street and racing suspension systems is second to none. Put that experience to work for you. Steeda springs are all custom made to our specifications- specifications that have been refined and improved through years of testing.

Steeda's performance lowering springs improve the overall handling of the 2003 Cobra by lowering the center of gravity and reducing body roll and pitching motion. The reduced longitudinal pitch of the vehicle during heavy braking due to the optimized spring calibration improves the overall braking efficiency. The higher rate of the front springs reduces the amount of load transferred to the front tires. This causes the load on all four tires to be more evenly distributed providing additional traction to the rear tires. The additional gain in rear traction usually results in reduced braking distances.

The proportionate increase in spring rate also reduces body roll which limits adverse suspension movement. This confines the suspension geometry to stay within parameters that enhance the tires contact patch relative to the road The result is improved vehicle cornering and handling because front and rear tire loading is more evenly distributed. Therefore higher cornering limits can be achieved because the built in understeer characteristics are reduced and provide for a more neutral yet safe vehicle.

Competition Springs

  • Lowers the car approximately 11/4”
  • Ultimate handling with a street-able ride
  • Slightly firmer ride than Sport Springs
  • O.E. on Steeda’s 5th Anniversary Mustangs

Full Competition Springs

  • Approximate 1-1/4"

lowering
  • For all out road racing competition.

Product Benefits

  • Better handling with more stable cornering

All lowering springs are not created equal. Read our Steeda blog post to learn more: http://www.steedablog.com/2010/08/all-lowering-springs-are-not-created-equal/

column1: @624@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@624@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-engraved-hood-struts-555-0650/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Engraved Billet Mustang Hood Strut Kit (05-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-0650.jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-0650-1.jpg^@^555-0650^@^

Steeda's billet hood strut kit is the perfect way to dress up the engine bay of your Stang. Made out of billet 6061 aluminum they are light weight and come engraved with the Steeda name.

OEM quality gas struts are included in this kit. Steeda has engineered this kit to fit and function better than the other kits on the market. There are clearance reliefs in the brackets for the washer fluid hose and a rubber bump stop on the underside to protect the paint on the underside of your hood.

No drilling or modifications required for installation. These hood struts include a 1-year warranty.

Product Benefits

  • More room to work on your motor in the front of the engine bay
  • Also more room on the sides then competitors kits
  • Lightweight billet aluminum and stylish with the Steeda logo or available plain
  • No drilling or permanent modifications required for installation like other brands
  • Hood struts meet/exceed OE standards
  • Lifetime warranty

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

StopTech is the first aftermarket brake company to offer balanced front brake upgrades engineered to dramatically improve overall braking performance. This has significantly advanced the state of art in aftermarket brake upgrades.

Stoptech street performance brake pads are engineered to meet the demands of high performance driving while maintaining the refinement and comfort expected in everyday driving conditions.

Stoptech brake pads combine the benefits of premium street brake pads with high temperature friction formulas suitable for aggressive street and autocross use. Stoptech has found the perfect combination of heavy braking and everyday weather resistant braking with these Street Performance pads.

Product Benefits

  • Rotor-friendly low-dust formulation makes for cleaner wheels
  • Scorched pad surface delivers a positive bite even when pads are cold
  • High-temperature compound ensures consistent performance and even pad wear

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

StopTech is the first aftermarket brake company to offer balanced front brake upgrades engineered to dramatically improve overall braking performance. This has significantly advanced the state of art in aftermarket brake upgrades.

Stoptech street performance brake pads are engineered to meet the demands of high performance driving while maintaining the refinement and comfort expected in everyday driving conditions.

Stoptech brake pads combine the benefits of premium street brake pads with high temperature friction formulas suitable for aggressive street and autocross use. Stoptech has found the perfect combination of heavy braking and everyday weather resistant braking with these Street Performance pads.

Note: This will not fit 1994-1998 Mustang Cobra's.

Product Benefits

  • Rotor-friendly low-dust formulation makes for cleaner wheels
  • Scorched pad surface delivers a positive bite even when pads are cold
  • High-temperature compound ensures consistent performance and even pad wear

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 1998 1997 1996 1995 1994

Model(s): All

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

StopTech recognizes that great brakes need to look as good as they perform. Performance wheels and tires are best complemented with StopTech Sport Rotors. StopTech slotted brake rotors prevent glazing of the pads add bite and improve wet and dry braking performance.

Every StopTech Sport Rotor is produced from a high quality Centric Parts blank casting and finished in a durable e-coating for corrosion resistance.

Power Alloy metallurgy is an exclusive feature of many StopTech rotors. In specific vehicle applications StopTech works with foundry partners to increase the molybdenum or carbon content of the castings and to carefully control the cooling rate during production to reach targets for hardness and tensile strength.

Product Benefits

  • Engineered performance rotor
  • Superior resistance to cracking due to thermal stress
  • Increased molybdenum (higher carbon) content that extends reliability amd service life
  • Includes left and right rotors

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 2014 2013 2012

Model(s): GT

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

@645@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@645@^http://www.steeda.com/stoptech-mustang-street-performance-front-brake-pads-05-10-492-309-10810/^@^Steeda^@^StopTech Mustang Street Performance Front Brake Pads (05-10)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/530/detailed/6/stoptech-mustang-street-performance-front-brake-pads-05-10-492-309-10810.jpg^@^492-309-10810^@^

StopTech is the first aftermarket brake company to offer balanced front brake upgrades engineered to dramatically improve overall braking performance. This has significantly advanced the state of art in aftermarket brake upgrades.

Stoptech street performance brake pads are engineered to meet the demands of high performance driving while maintaining the refinement and comfort expected in everyday driving conditions.

Stoptech brake pads combine the benefits of premium street brake pads with high temperature friction formulas suitable for aggressive street and autocross use. Stoptech has found the perfect combination of heavy braking and everyday weather resistant braking with these Street Performance pads.

Product Benefits

  • Rotor-friendly low-dust formulation makes for cleaner wheels
  • Scorched pad surface delivers a positive bite even when pads are cold
  • High-temperature compound ensures consistent performance and even pad wear

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Koni Sport "
column3:
are a Koni's original and still the best premium adjustable shock and strut unit they offer.

Koni Sport Yellows feature an external adjustment right at the top of the unit for rebound adjustment. This adjustment allows you to soften the ride for daily driving or firm it up for handling performance and track use. Adjustment is done on the car by simply using the provided knob to turn the adjuster clockwise to soften the ride or counter clock wise to stiffen the ride.

These shock and strut units are a direct bolt on twin tube high pressure gas design that will enhance both ride quality and handling performance.

All Koni Sport Yellow units come with a lifetime warranty against manufacturing defects.

Note: Koni Sport Yellow shocks and struts are sold and priced individually. 2 struts and 2 shocks make a full set. Koni Yellow units are adjustable for rebound only.

Product Benefits

  • Big handling improvements
  • Best KONI shock for all lowering springs
  • External rebound adjustment
  • Lifetime Warranty

Time to install: About 3 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 1993 1992 1991 1990 1989 1988 1987

Model(s): 5.0L V8 2.3L

Koni STR.T shocks and struts are high performance non adjustable dampers that are designed to be a perfect complement to lowering springs but also make an ideal service replacement and upgrade to stock ride height cars with factory original shocks and struts.

These Koni STR.T shock and strut units are a direct bolt on non adjustable twin tube high pressure gas design that will enhance both ride quality and handling performance.

All Koni STR.T units come with a lifetime warranty against manufacturing defects.

Note: Koni STR.T shocks and struts are sold and priced individually. 2 struts and 2 shocks make a full set. Koni STR.T units are NOT adjustable.

Product Benefits

  • Twin-tube high pressure gas design
  • Direct bolt-on replacement
  • Lifetime Warranty

Time to install: About 4 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

@648@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@648@^http://www.steeda.com/xtreme-stop-94-04-mustang-cobra-front-passenger-brake-rotor-077-xs54087r/^@^Steeda^@^Xtreme Stop Mustang Brake Rotor - Front Passenger (94-04 Cobra & 03-04 Mach 1)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/077-xs54087r.jpg^@^077-XS54087R^@^

Xtreme Stop brake rotors are the new standard in street performance and O.E. replacement brake rotors.

Engineered and produced in North America with quality castings not cheap overseas castings gives these rotors great durability.

Standard rotors can quickly overheat reducing life expectancy and performance. Trapped layers of heated gas during hard braking with standard rotors forms a barrier that reduces pad contact reducing stopping power.

Xtreme Stop rotors will operate cooler improving braking performance and durability due to their cross drilled/slotted design.

Xtreme Stop rotors will vent away superheated gasses caused by hard braking resulting in maximum contact between the rotor and pad and reducing operating temps by up to 200 degrees!

They also payed great attention to detail in designing their rotors. Drilled holes are CNC machined with a beveled edge helping prevent cracking associated with other drilled rotors.

Precision patterned holes are located so they are not being drilled into the internal veins. Drilling the veins themselves weakens the structure of the rotor. This is overlooked by other manufacturers.

Product Benefits

  • Reduce brake fade
  • Eliminate pad glazing
  • Improved grip and pedal response

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 2004 2003 2002 2001 2000 1999 1998 1997 1996 1995 1994

Model(s): Bullitt Cobra Cobra R Mach 1

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

@661@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@661@^http://www.steeda.com/xtreme-stop-05-10-mustang-v6-front-driver-brake-rotor-077-xs54130l/^@^Steeda^@^Xtreme Stop Mustang Brake Rotor - Front Driver (05-10 V6)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/077-xs54130l.jpg^@^077-XS54130L^@^

Xtreme Stop brake rotors are the new standard in street performance and O.E. replacement brake rotors.

Engineered and produced in North America with quality castings not cheap overseas castings gives these rotors great durability.

Standard rotors can quickly overheat reducing life expectancy and performance. Trapped layers of heated gas during hard braking with standard rotors forms a barrier that reduces pad contact reducing stopping power.

Xtreme Stop rotors will operate cooler improving braking performance and durability due to their cross drilled/slotted design.

Xtreme Stop rotors will vent away superheated gasses caused by hard braking resulting in maximum contact between the rotor and pad and reducing operating temps by up to 200 degrees!

They also payed great attention to detail in designing their rotors. Drilled holes are CNC machined with a beveled edge helping prevent cracking associated with other drilled rotors.

Precision patterned holes are located so they are not being drilled into the internal veins. Drilling the veins themselves weakens the structure of the rotor. This is overlooked by other manufacturers.

Product Benefits

  • Reduce brake fade
  • Eliminate pad glazing
  • Improved grip and pedal response

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 2010 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005

Model(s): V6

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/6/vossen-cvt-silver-metallic-directional-mustang-wheel(2)_jubj-1a.jpg^@^819-CVT-9N46-L^@^

Introducing the CVT directional wheel from Vossen a unique approach to wheel design.

A true rarity in the industry due to its intricate construction investment and overall development the CVT is a considerable step forward in Vossen's already stellar line-up.

The CVT requires four molds rather than the typical one or two molds for standard cast wheels. As a result the wheels on the driver's side and passenger side of the vehicle twist towards the same direction.

The Vossen CVT Silver Metallic Gloss Finish wheel will add a unique and sophisticated look to your Mustang.

This 19x10 Vossen CVT wheel fits the rear of all 2005 to 2014 Mustangs. Stagger with 19x8.5 wheels on the front for an aggressive muscle car stance.

Product Benefits

  • Crafted using low pressure casting
  • Manufacturers limited 5 year warranty
  • Band and valve stem TPMS compatible
  • Brembo compatible

Notes

  • Offset - +42mm (1.65"

@669@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@669@^http://www.steeda.com/auburn-mustang-differential-414-545002/^@^Steeda^@^Auburn ECTED Electrically Controlled Mustang Differential - 31 Spline (79-14 Non-IRS)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/414-545002.jpg^@^414-545002^@^

Auburn's exciting new ECTED differential combines a limited slip differential with an electronic locking system for spool-like 100% locked performance. This is a first for the Mustang. All previous locking differentials acted as a an open differential when not locked. The Auburn ECTED gives you the performance advantage of a limited slip differential for everyday driving with the ability to lock the differential at any time for complete torque to both wheels. The electronic locking system can be engaged at any time and at any speed unlike other locking differentials that require you to stop to engage the locking mechanism.

This opens up a whole new world of possibilities. Not only can you engage the locker with a push of the button on the dash it can even be wired to a boost sensitive switch to automatically engage when a certain boost level is reached. Extremely strong made from aircraft quality 9310 heat treated billet steel the ECTED also contains no failure prone pins or shift forks to engage the locking mechanism. Auburn Gear provides a 1 year warranty and the ECTED is also backed by Auburn's exclusive D-REX 4 year replacement exchange program. 31 Spline available - Call for Info.

Product Benefits

  • Locked differential may be engaged any time
  • Limited slip diff performance at your fingertips
  • Programmable based on boost level!

Time to install: About 4 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

@670@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@670@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-tri-ax-2011-up-mustang-short-throw-shifter-555-7312/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Tri-Ax Short Throw Shifter (11-14 GT/Boss/V6)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-7312.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-7312-10.jpg
column11:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-7312-9.jpg^@^555-7312^@^

Steeda's Tri-Ax shifter for the 2011 and up Mustang V6 and GT is crafted from billet aluminum steel and composite components for solid construction and to provide no increase in shifter NVH. This shifter will provide a 20% shorter throw and retains full reverse lockout functionality of the factory shifter and also allows for spring pressure adjustment.

Re-engineered pivot mechanism to provide no change in shifter knob height to preserve shifter ergonomics while still providing a shorter throw. Nickel plated finish for great looks and corrosion protection.

Accepts factory shift knobs and aftermarket knobs with M12 x 1.25 thread pitch. Easy to install and does not require any permanent modifications to your vehicle. Comes with a lifetime warranty.

Product Benefits

  • 20 % throw reduction
  • Made of high quality billet materials
  • No increase in shifter NVH (Noise vibration and harshness)
  • Retains reverse lock-out
  • Comes with a LIFETIME warranty

Not all Mustang shifters are created equal. Learn more about what makes Steeda stand out from the crowd: http://www.steedablog.com/2010/04/tri-ax-shifter-extreme-engineering/

Testimonial

I am not a performance driver anymore. These days my Mustang is my daily driver and weekend cruiser. So my needs in a short throw shifter are somewhat different than those of most enthusiasts. I wanted a shifter with a somewhat shorter throw than stock but still long enough for my relaxed shifting style. But most of all the shifter had to be as quiet as stock. I tried one of the very expensive performance shifters and liked the shorter throw but hated the amount of noise vibration and harshness (NVH) that it introduced so after about a month I went back to the shop and had them reinstall the stock shifter. I found out later that the NVH problem was due to damage caused by an improper installation so I don't know what it would have been like had it been properly installed.

Once back to using the stock shifter I realized how much I still wanted a shorter throw but without the NVH so I started asking around and came to the conclusion that the Steeda Short Throw Shifter might be my best option. After some conversation with the helpful people at Steeda I ordered and received their shifter. I had a different shop do the installation this time. Driving away after the installation I noticed an immediate difference that brought a grin to my face. This shifter was exactly what I was looking for! It has a nice throw that is shorter than stock but not too extreme. It has very precise movement and best of all it is just as quiet as the stock shifter! There is a slight click as it is pulled into each gear that is more felt than heard and is a reassuring confirmation that you are in the gear. The reverse lockout is positive without requiring too much effort (I had expected I would want to switch to the included lighter spring but decided it wasn't necessary once I tried it).

I can't say how it would do in performance use since that's not my style but if you are looking for a reasonably priced quality shifter with great feel and no added noise then the Steeda shifter is a great choice. I could not be more pleased!

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Vortech supercharger systems are a great value. Dollar for dollar Vortech systems deliver more horsepower than virtually any other method of upgrade. Also driven normally gas mileage often sees no adverse change.

Vortech's 2015 S550 Mustang 5.0 GT Supercharging Systems are available as either a complete fully calibrated bolt-on or as a V-7 tuner kit for custom installations at up to 1200HP.

This system is a complete system that includes everything required for installation including their V3 SI supercharger head unit installation hardware air to air intercooler full engine calibration and more making it possible for the weekend do-it yourself installer to install and calibrate the system on their own.

The complete system will boost your stock 2015 GT to 640 horsepower and 485 lb/ft of torque with 7.5-8.5 PSI of boost.

Product Benefits

  • 640 horsepower - 485 ft/lbs of torque
  • Industry leading 78% adiabatic efficiency
  • Complete system includes all hardware and calibration
  • Can be installed by do it yourself enthusiasts
  • Intercooled system for low air charge temps and maximum power
  • Satin finish

Vortech's "
column3:
aftercooler kit uses a water-to-air heat exchanger to reduce intake air temperature from the supercharger. Reduced intake temperature lets you run more boost and ignition timing without detonation. Power gains range from 10 all the way up to 70 horsepower depending on engine configuration and boost level.

Kits come complete with a water reservoir circulation pump hoses and all support hardware and plumbing. They're even 50 state smog legal and maintain Vortech's full warranty coverage! The battery must be relocated to the rear of the vehicle to fit the Power Cooler. But hey you wanted to do that anyway for better traction and handling right!

Time to install: About 5 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 1998 1997 1996

Model(s): Cobra

The 2005-2006 Mustang GT comes from the factory with an impressive 300 horsepower and 320 lb./ft. of torque. This Vortech supercharging system can safely increase this to 420 horsepower and 385 lb./ft. of torque. You will be impressed by the seamless integration of the supercharger system and the true supercar performance it delivers.

Note: Polished version shown above with optional intercooler.

  • Vortech gear driven supercharger with SQ technology provides nearly silent operation and unmatched reliability
  • Technologically advanced high-efficiency impeller and housing design developed in Vortech's supercharger test cell
  • Fuel management upgrade includes replacement high-flow fuel injectors and replacement high-flow fuel pump for safe reliable operation
  • DiabloSport PredatorTM hand-held programmer to re-flash factory processor plus provides additional functions such as fuel and timing adjustments and data logging
  • Oil feed and oil drain assemblies deliver the best possible lubrication and cooling for the supercharger even under sustained boost conditions
  • Discharge duct connections utilize heat resistant silicon sleeves and premium quality stainless steel clamps High-flow reusable air filter Billet aluminum mounting bracketry
  • High-flow bypass valve provides for surge-free compressor operation
  • Supercharger drive system includes all necessary belts and pulleys
  • Compatible with factory OBD II engine management systems and 3-year limited warranty

Time to install: About 16 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Required

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 2006 2005

Model(s): GT

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

@699@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@699@^http://www.steeda.com/vortech-maxflow-racing-mustang-bypass-valve-640-8d204-001/^@^Steeda^@^Vortech Maxflow Racing Bypass Valve (79-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/640-8d204-001.jpg^@^640-8D204-001^@^

If your supercharged Mustang is pushing more than 12 PSI of boost you need a bigger bypass valve to keep the intake charge cool and prevent reversion in the impeller. Vortech's new Mini-Race Bypass Valve is perfect for cars running up to 20 PSI of boost.

It's compact size fits in the engine compartment easier than the huge racing valves that were the only choice until now. A new discharge tube with built in flange is available to make this valve a direct bolt-on for 87-93 Mustangs and it will fit other Mustangs with minor modifications.

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Gains of more than 200 Horsepower have been achieved on a modified (street driven) 5.0L Mustangs.

S-trim kits for 86-95 Mustangs come with a standard 36 month 36000 mile warranty.

Time to install: About 12 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Required

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 1993

Model(s): Cobra

Transmission(s): Manual

The Driveshaft Shop has manufactured 2015 Mustang axles that can handle up to 800HP using super strong Ovaco 300m steel that has proven itself in every IRS/CV driven world record breaking car to date. They include 4340 billet CV mounts and a full 300m billet chromoly cage and race. If you plan on increasing your S550's horsepower then these DSS 800HP direct bolt in axle's are what you need.

Product Benefits

  • Direct bolt in part
  • Rated for up to 800HP to the rear wheels
  • 32 splines to the hub and 34 splines to the diff
  • Manufacturer's part numbers: RA8505X4 and RA8506X4

Time to install: About 4 Hours

column1: @709@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@709@^http://www.steeda.com/procharger-mustang-supercharger-522-1fr214-sci/^@^Steeda^@^ProCharger Mustang Intercooled Supercharger System (11-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/377/detailed/2/522-1fr214-sci.jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/336/detailed/3/522-1fr214-sci-1.jpg^@^522-1FR214-SCI^@^

Procharger is a highly recognized name for when it comes to making big horsepower and they don't disappoint with their 2011 and up Mustang GT Intercooler Centrifugal Supercharger System.

Utilizing Procharger's patented and proven self-contained P-1SC-1 supercharger paired to a large 3-core air to air intercooler this system produces an amazing 165+ rear wheel horsepower.

Procharger achieves this with a safe and conservative 7psi of intercooled boost using a custom 8-rib dedicated drive delivering maximum horsepower with no belt slip and maximum reliability.

Prochargers complete system includes all necessary components for installation including tuning. Just install the kit re-program your ECU then drive and enjoy your new asphalt ripping horsepower!

Product Benefits

  • Complete bolt on kit
  • 165+ asphalt ripping horsepower on 7psi of safe intercooled boost
  • Self contained oiling - no external lines to tap
  • OEM like quality and fit
  • Did we mention 165+ horsepower?

Time to install: About 15 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Model year(s): 2014 2013 2012 2011

Model(s): GT Boss

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

@710@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@710@^http://www.steeda.com/autopower-mustang-roll-bar-017-71260/^@^Steeda^@^Autopower Mustang 4-Point Bolt-In Roll Bar - Hatchback/Coupe (79-93)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/017-71260.jpg^@^017-71260^@^

4-Point Bolt-In Roll Bars

Our most popular Roll Bars! A stiff body structure is essential to great handling. Four point roll bars stiffen the structure of the car prolonging body life preventing squeaks and rattles and improving handling. Our street roll bars allow the rear seat and interior trim to remain in place and do not interfere with convertible tops.

Road Race Bars

Road Race style Roll Bars have a diagonal cross brace from behind the drivers head to the main hoop near the floor on the passenger side. Removable cross brace and seat back support brace are available as special order options at additional cost - please contact your Steeda Rep for details.

Drag Race Bars

Drag race style roll bars have braces which extend forward from the main hoop over the drivers shoulder to the floor by the driver and passengers feet. Removable cross brace and seat back support brace are available as special order options at additional cost - please contact your Steeda Rep for details.

Road Race Roll Cages

Roll Cages add additional bars which come forward along the roofline from the main hoop and turn down to the floor by the dashboard a cross bar along the top of the windshield and side protection bars along each door.

Important Note: All roll bars made from DOM tubing. Rollbars come spray-painted black for corrosion protection only. Scratches will occur during shipping and are not covered under warranty. Customer is responsible for finish and painting of roll bar. Additional lead time is expected.

^@^Mustang^@^ 5.0L V8 Cobra V6 2.3L ^@^Mustang Chassis^@^1993 1992 1991 1990 1989 1988 1987 1986 1985 1984 1983 1982 1981 1980 1979 ^@^Mustang Roll Cages^@^699.95^ @720@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@720@^http://www.steeda.com/autopower-mustang-roll-bar-017-70279/^@^Steeda^@^Autopower Mustang Drag Racing Roll Bar - Convertible (83-93)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/017-70279.jpg^@^017-70279^@^

4-Point Bolt-In Roll Bars

Our most popular Roll Bars! A stiff body structure is essential to great handling. Four point roll bars stiffen the structure of the car prolonging body life preventing squeaks and rattles and improving handling. Our street roll bars allow the rear seat and interior trim to remain in place and do not interfere with convertible tops.

Road Race Bars

Road Race style Roll Bars have a diagonal cross brace from behind the drivers head to the main hoop near the floor on the passenger side. Removable cross brace and seat back support brace are available as special order options at additional cost - please contact your Steeda Rep for details.

Drag Race Bars

Drag race style roll bars have braces which extend forward from the main hoop over the drivers shoulder to the floor by the driver and passengers feet. Removable cross brace and seat back support brace are available as special order options at additional cost - please contact your Steeda Rep for details.

Road Race Roll Cages

Roll Cages add additional bars which come forward along the roofline from the main hoop and turn down to the floor by the dashboard a cross bar along the top of the windshield and side protection bars along each door.

Important Note: All roll bars made from DOM tubing. Rollbars come spray-painted black for corrosion protection only. Scratches will occur during shipping and are not covered under warranty. Customer is responsible for finish and painting of roll bar. Additional lead time is expected.

http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/208-gp100s-1.jpg^@^208-GP100S^@^When you’re working in your PitStop Furniture you’re not plugging away at TPS reports—you’re barreling down the apron towards treacherous turn 1 at the Indianapolis Formula One Grand Prix. Excitement. Adventure. Style. PitStop Furniture turns your workaday world into a turbo-charged experience that’ll take your breath away.

Created by renowned European designer Henri Lenterman PitStop Furniture by Intro-Tech Automotive is packed with more features and appointments than a Ferrari. The bucket seat office chair is available in two racing styles both equipped with a billet aluminum shifter knob to switch between 4 ergonomic settings
column3: a base constructed from a suspension spring and a caliper brake kit
column5:
and unique armrests with an embossed tire tread pattern. Plus the matching desk sports an alloy tower strut bar 13” chrome metal racing shocks braided stainless steel hoses a spoiler-style paper tray and a tempered-glass top.

For the finishing touch on your checkered-flag makeover pick up the diamond plate chair mat along with your PitStop Furniture. The lockable racing-rim castors on your racing chair roll smoothly across its textured surface. Best of all every piece of this sturdy stylish furniture comes with a Lifetime Warranty.

Product Benefits
  • Race through your workday in style and comfort with PitStop Furniture by Intro-Tech Automotive
  • Designed by Europe’s own Henri Lenterman

  • Multiple color options available
  • Designed and assembled in the USA
  • Lifetime Warranty

The Willwood Brake kit is the perfect intermediate kit for your Mustang. With six pistons that give you a greater distribution of pressure across the brake pad. This brake kit will slow you down in a hurry. The kit has the correct piston diameter and volume to work perfectly OEM ABS systems.

For the race oriented driver that doesn't have the budget for a 14"

brake kit available saving you unsprung weight. Front SL6 Big Brake Hub Kits are engineered as complete assemblies for conventional pin front spindle applications.

@763@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@763@^http://www.steeda.com/afco-cobra-mustang-dual-fan-heat-exchanger-417-afc80275-pro/^@^Steeda^@^AFCO Dual Fan Cobra Mustang Heat Exchanger - 03-04 Cobra^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/417-afc80275-pro.jpg^@^417-AFC80275-PRO^@^

AFCO's 80275PRO heat exchanger uses a pair of Spal fans to always keep air moving across the fins of the heat exchanger. Not only do the fans help when the car is moving slow in city or traffic driving but they continue to run even when you're at a stop. Traditionally when you're at a stop no air is passed through the fins of the heat exchanger. That's when the intake air temps go up. With the new dual fan setup there is always air being passed through the fins of the heat exchanger so the fluid in the intercooler system will not only stay cooler but won't rise as fast as it would if the fans weren't there.

Another great thing about the heat exchanger with fans is for when you take the car to the dragstrip. After you run the car down the track the intercooler fluid heats up quite a bit. When that happens the PCM typically pulls timing. So before you make another run you want that fluid to cool as much as possible so your next run isn't with lower timing. All you need to do in order to cool things down is wire in a switch that allows you to turn both the fans and intercooler pump on while the engine is off. What this does is circulate the hot fluid in the system while pulling air across the fins of the heat exchanger. This cools the fluid very quickly and by the time you run the car again your intercooler temps will be at ambient temperature.

The Pro Series Heat Exchanger is significantly larger and built as a DOUBLE PASS design. The new double pass design incorporates a 360 degree welded baffle to prevent any internal coolant bypass. These baffles force coolant through the top half of the heat exchanger and then the bottom half giving the heat exchanger the opportunity to dissipate heat twice. Using this unit provides a cooler more stable coolant temperature to the intercooler even when the engine is being pushed to its limits. This process provides more consistent performance on the street and lowers ET times at the strip.

The AFCO Pro Series all aluminum heat exchanger core is over 28. This AFCO PRO-Series Heat Exchanger has by far the largest cooling coverage out of all of the heat exchangers on the market for the 03-04 Cobra. This product is designed to fit perfect and bolt right on..

Cooler intake temperatures mean more power. It is just that simple. However providing your engine with cool air to breathe becomes even more difficult when forced induction is involved.

Ford's potent supercharged V8 is no exception. This is why Ford designed a separate intercooling system for the supercharger on their popular F150 Lightning and Cobra Mustang.

The Ford system utilizes a heat exchanger mounted low in the front grill which is very similar to a small radiator. Coolant flows separately from the main engine cooling system and circulates internally through the intercooler beneath the supercharger.

While the factory supercharger cooling system is adequate in stock configuration it struggles to keep up with the multitude of popular modifications that not only deliver more power but also increase the stress and strain on the engine.

To combat the power loss by excessive heat build up in the supercharger and intake system AFCO focused on upgrading the weakest component in this cooling system: THE HEAT EXCHANGER.

AFCO Heat Exchangers are considerably larger than their stock counterparts. This provides a greater surface area and more capacity. AFCO Heat Exchangers reduce supercharger coolant temperatures by more than 40 degrees.

True Bolt-In Installation
No Cutting No Drilling No Welding No Headaches

AFCO Heat Exchanger installation only requires simple hand tools and approximately 30 minutes. All needed hardware (except replacement fluid) is included along with detailed instructions.

Easy Bolt-In Installation
AFCO Heat Exchangers mount in factory locations with no drilling cutting or fabrication of any kind “ a TRUE BOLT-IN.

Regains Lost Power
By more effectively cooling intake temperatures AFCO Heat Exchangers keep the air entering the combustion chamber cooler and more dense even in high-demand situations.

Allows for More Consistency
After hard acceleration especially in drag racing applications AFCO Heat Exchangers allow the supercharger to cool faster and remain at a constant temperature which means power delivery is more consistent.

Optimized Design
Using years of experience advanced design and thorough testing AFCO Heat Exchangers are designed to promote optimal air flow and cooling by utilizing appropriate fin count tube size core thickness and fin serration for each particular application.

Quality Construction
Of course as an AFCO product quality is second to none. AFCO Heat Exchangers are TIG welded and feature furnace brazed cores with no epoxy. Each unit is pressure-tested before it is shipped.

Product Benefits

  • Cooler intake temperatures mean more power
  • Regains Lost Power
  • True Bolt-In Installation

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column1: @766@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@766@^http://www.steeda.com/air-lift-mustang-suspension-kit-digital-432-95723/^@^Steeda^@^Air Lift Mustang Suspension Kit - Digital (05-14 All)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/1_hwan-eu.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/3_rfj0-am.jpg
column7:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/397/detailed/5/photo.JPG^@^432-95723^@^

Air Lift Suspension Kits use 30-way adjustable monotube struts with a serious range of damping adjustment that have been specially tuned to match their progressive air springs. The 30 clicks of adjustment aren't just for fun but rather allow the user to dial in their preferred handling feel or desired ride quality from super stiff to really soft.

Countless laps and several competition events have helped the Air Lift engineers hone the razor sharp handling and flat cornering nature of this airbag suspension.

This Air Lift Suspension Kit allows you to drop your Mustang over 4"
column8: from the stock height for a unique parked stance and with the push of a button lift it back up so you can tear around your favorite road course or drag strip. This Air Lift Suspension Kit not only allows you to drop your ride height but it also allows you to raise it up about 1&quot
column9:
(25mm) over the stock OEM ride height making it perfect for speed bumps or steeply angled driveways.

The AutoPilot V2 Digital Controller has 8 different presets to tailor your ride's height with incredible accuracy with just a push of the button. The V2 constantly monitors your pressures and adjust accordingly to your preset requirements - It also allows you to control your system manually for the ultimate in independent 4-corner adjustment. The V2 Digital Controller displays individual corner air pressure and tank pressure on a multi-color screen in a choice of 512 color combinations you can also choose to display pressure in PSI or BAR. The V2 controller features a rugged rubberized coating to help protect against the occasional drops and scratches.

Installation of this Air Lift Suspension Kit is simple with only basic hand tools required to complete the job. There are no modifications required in front and only 4 small holes that need to be drilled in the rear spring pocket area. If you can wire a stereo and swap suspension parts you can install this system yourself!

1 Year Warranty: As the leader in air suspension products for over 60 years Air Lift is committed to delivering quality parts that last. To ensure longevity the key suspension components have been tested on a durability rig for over 1 million cycles which equates to 100K miles. With a 1 year unlimited mileage warranty you can purchase this kit with peace of mind.

Please note: This complete Digital Air Lift Suspension Kit is designed for use on all 2005 to 2014 coupe and convertible Mustangs including the V6 GT Bullitt Boss and Shelby GT500 models.

column1: @769@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@769@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-bumpsteer-kit-555-8104/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Bumpsteer Kit (94-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/555-8104.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/steeda-mustang-bumpsteer-kit-555-8104(3).jpg^@^555-8104^@^

If you have substantially lowered your vehicle chances are you have introduced bump steer. What is bump steer? Bump Steer is changes in toe caused by suspension movement.

Every car has bump steer however when you lower the vehicle you increase the amount of bump steer that occurs if this becomes excessive you will begin to notice some unwanted vehicle driving characteristics.

When you turn your steering wheel you are essentially changing the toe of the wheels to turn the vehicle. Excessive bump steer is undesireable because it introduces unwanted steering inputs which means the suspension is steering the car instead of the driver.

If your car is lowered and has tracking issues and less predictable steering behavior you need a bump steer kit.

Steeda's Bump Steer Kits will allow you to correct your bump steer geometry and can do so without requiring you to drill or modify your vehicle spindle.

In addition our bump steer kit makes a great service replacement for your worn out high mileage outer tie rods even if you do not have excessive bump steer issues.

Pick up a bump steer kit today and refresh your outer tie rods and improve your steering.

Improve the steering response on your 1994-04 Mustang with this Flaming River manual steering shaft kit. This steering shaft design eliminates the rag joint for better steering response and appearance. The overall length is 13 inches and is an absolute must when using large tube headers.

This Flaming River steering shaft kit utilize two smooth needle-bearing universal joints a prefabricated shaft that bolts directly to the OEM column and a weldless intermediate shaft for easy installation. The shaft is nickel plated to prevent against rust and corrosion.

This manual steering shaft can be only used with the Flaming River Manual rack part number FlA-FR1503.

Product Highlights

  • Collapsible
  • 12 Collapsed Length
  • 13 Extended Length
  • Eliminates Rag Joint
  • Universal Joints Included
  • Splined Ends
  • 13/16 Steering Box Shaft Diameter
  • 26 Spline Steering Box
  • 13/16 Column Shaft Diameter
  • Steel Steering Shaft
  • Nickel Plated

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Stop on a dime by upgrading your Mustang's front brakes to a Ford Racing SVT Brake kit. This Ford Racing SVT brake kit includes massive 4-piston calipers from the worldwide leader in braking systems: Brembo so you can have the confidence you need to dive into the most challenging corners and still bring it to a controlled stop every time.

Brembo makes braking systems used by top race teams and auto manufacturers world over including Ford Racing. So don't settle for anything less when you're upgrading your Mustang GT's brakes for improved stopping power.

This bolt-on SVT front brake upgrade kit includes a pair of 4-piston black anodized Brembo calipers two 14"
column2:

This is the same exact production intake manifold used by Ford on the 2001 to 2004 4.6L SOHC 2V V8 GT Mustangs. It is less expensive and a great alternative to high dollar aftermarket performance intake manifolds when performing a PI head swap on your Mustang.

This Ford Racing Performance Improvement (PI) Intake Manifold is a direct fit on 1999-2004 4.6L GT Mustangs with PI head ports. It can also be used on 1996-1998 4.6L engines with PI heads with additional parts and modifications required.

Please note: 1999 and 2000 GT Mustangs will require the use of an alternator bracket from a 2001-2004 GT. All Mustangs will require a new factory style manifold to head gasket and a thermostat gasket.

@785@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@785@^http://www.steeda.com/ford-racing-mustang-differential-161-m-4204-mb/^@^Steeda^@^Ford Racing Boss 302 Mustang Torsen T-2R Differential (86-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/161-m-4204-mb.jpg^@^161-M-4204-MB^@^

Original equipment on the 2012 Boss 302LS this Torsen T-2R differential from Ford Racing will fit all 2005-12 Mustangs and any other Mustang with an 8.8 rear end that has been upgraded to 31 spline axles.

This Torsen differential features full time torque sensing and torque biasing with a torque bias ratio of 2.7.

Unlike conventional speed-sensing limited slip differentials TORSEN T2-R is a full time torque sensing torque biasing system. Torque and differentiation are continuously managed between the two axles and biased instantaneously according to variable road conditions. TORSEN T2-R's patented parallel gearing system is designed to perform for the life of the vehicle.

The TORSEN T2-R takes the T-2's performance to the next level. By combining the patented Equvex gearing from the TORSEN T-2 with friction enhancing plates the T-2R allows improved mobility an traction under the most extreme conditions.

This differential is a must have for those competing in auto-cross and road race competition.

Product Benefits

  • Full torque sensing differential
  • Competition proven yet smooth and quiet for street use
  • Direct bolt on for 31 spline applications
  • Competition proven

Time to install: About 4 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Ford Racing now offers a Whipple Supercharger system for the 2011 and up Mustang that brings your Mustang to an impressive 624 flywheel horsepower.

Using Whipple's long proven 2.3L Twin Screw head unit Ford Racing pumps in 9psi of intercooled boost giving you instant throttle response with greatly increased low end torque to go with the 5.0L engines top end horsepower.

Systems are complete and include the supercharger air to water intercooling system injectors and Ford Racing ProCal ECU programming device.

Currently only available for manual transmission vehicles.

Note: Requires 93 octane or higher fuel.

Ford Racing supercharger packages are 50 STATE EMISSIONS LEGAL.

Product Benefits

  • Twin screw Whipple head unit for instant boost
  • Complete bolt on system including tuning
  • 624 asphalt ripping horsepower!

@796@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@796@^http://www.steeda.com/ford-racing-cnc-ported-cylinder-head-161-m-6050-n3vpa/^@^Steeda^@^Ford Racing 3V CNC Mustang Ported Cylinder Head - Left Side - 05-10 GT/Bullitt^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/161-m-6050-n3vpa.jpg^@^161-M-6050-N3VPA^@^

Ford Racing's Ported 3V Cylinder heads are production castings that have been CNC machine ported for increased flow and performance.

Specs for these cylinder heads are as follows:

  • 53 cc combustion chamber (Stock head is 51 cc)
  • Intake runner volume: 202cc (Stock 174cc)
  • Exhaust runner volume: 73cc (Stock 62cc)
  • Intake flow rate at .600 lift: 272 CFM
  • Exhaust flow rate at .600 lift: 190 CFM (no pipe)
  • Assembled with factory guides production springs valves retainers locks and seals

These heads do not include camshafts and related valve trail (followers lash adjusters etc). They use 2008-later GT high thread spark plugs. Will bolt up to 05-07 GT models but requires conversion to 08+ spark plugs and ignition coils (sold separately).

Recommend using Ford Racing head changing kit M-6067-3V46.

Note: Engines with late style 12MM spark plugs can be identified by coil engineering number 8L3E Engines with early style 16mm "
column3:
design spark plugs can be identified by coil engineering number 3L3E part number.

Product Benefits

  • CNC ported for greater flow
  • Direct fit replacement
  • Includes valve springs
  • Uses upgraded 08+ style high thread spark plugs

Time to install: About 18 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Required

@800@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@800@^http://www.steeda.com/ford-racing-cobra-mustang-supercharger-161-m-6066-ct46/^@^Steeda^@^Whipple Mustang Supercharger - Black - Stock TB (03-04 Cobra)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/161-m-6066-ct46.jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/161-m-6066-ct46-1.jpg^@^439-WK-200100B^@^

Get the same ultra-efficient Whipple twin-screw supercharger that's utilized on the new 550HP Ford GT. With the industry's largest most efficient latest designed twin-screw superchargers the Whipple can produce incredible power levels with the stock 4.6L Cobra engine as well as highly modified engines. Run 8-15psi of boost on pump gas and have the ability to produce nearly 25psi for racing applications.

This is a direct bolt-on replacement with dramatically lower temps and power consumption (hp) than the factory Eaton roots-type supercharger. The Whipple Supercharger has passed the OEM standards to be factory equipment on the Ford GT and will provide you with unsurpassed reliability and durability. With the latest rotor bearing and case design Whipple is simply the best available option.

It's a simple fact that the Whipple-Lysholm supercharger has gone through more endurance testing and has passed the strenuous standards of Ford as well as Eaton. Whipple's Cobra kit not only offers a better supercharger but also offers far more engineering to help produce more power per pound of boost than any other supercharger. The Whipple supercharger inlet is nearly 35% larger which offers a much lower possibility for starving the compressor for air at high power levels. The Whipple discharge plate offers far more plenum area as well as a much greater radius to help distribute the air evenly over the entire intercooler core. Whipple's air bypass system also actually functions properly. This allows for lower discharge temps and less parasitic losses during operation.

Product Features

  • INSTANT BOOST / HORSEPOWER &
column3:
TORQUE AT ANY RPM
  • Largest displacement screw compressor available.
  • Direct bolt on replacement. CAD designed air inlet for maximum air flow.
  • Available for stock throttle body or larger mouth mono blade (Accufab Billetflow).
  • More power cooler charge temp less power consumption/parasitic loss than stock Eaton.
  • Up to 95% efficiency.
  • Over 80hp gain at 13psi.
  • Best $$ value bolt on.
  • More power than headers cam throttle body MAF meter chip and filter COMBINED.
  • No "
column5:
(stock Eaton is 13 psi @ 4000 and only 10.5 psi @ 6000).
  • No "
column7:
as with centrifugals and turbos. Boost range 8 - 25 psi.
  • No need for separate oil reservoir system or “catch can”.
  • Billet oversized bypass valve for decreased operating temps.
  • Internally lubricated. No tapping holes in pan required.
  • Factory fit and finish.
  • Kit includes supercharger supercharger inlet adapter plate pulley pulley plate drive belt and hardware kit
  • Kits include Ford Racing Pro-Cal tool with custom calibration with improved throttle response. Calibrations are 50 state emissions legal.
  • Simple bolt on increase at the rear wheels of 85 horsepower and 50 ft./lbs. of torque
  • Designed by Ford Racing and Whipple engineers
  • Installation of this kit will void your new vehicle engine warranty

    • Time to install: About 12 Hours

column1:
@801@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@801@^http://www.steeda.com/whipple-mustang-supercharger-439-wkstda450a-kit/^@^Steeda^@^Whipple Mustang Supercharger (07-10)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/439-wkstda450a-kit.jpg^@^439-WKSTDA450A-KIT^@^

Steeda in conjuction with Ford Motor Company and Whipple superchargers has put together the safest best driving 50 state emissions legal supercharger package for your 2007-08 Mustang.

Steeda starts with Whipple's 2.3L W140X twin screw supercharger to which Steeda ads its own unique flavor with our huge high capacity heat exchanger and special Ford Motor Company certified emissions legal ADAPTIVE calibration.

Steeda worked alongside Ford Motor Company calibration engineers to come up this industry exclusive calibration which allows for adaptive changes. This means it will allow you to make changes to the vehicle without having to reflash the computer with a new calibration.

Want to add shorty headers after you put the supercharger on? Want to add an axle back system? Looking to step up to the next size supercharger pulley? No problem. The calibration will compensate and apply the corrections needed to maintain the proper air/fuel ratios and timing. NO OTHER CALIBRATION SYSTEM ON THE MARKET CAN MAKE THIS CLAIM!

Systems come complete with everything needed for installation including the supercharger system intercooler injectors fuel pump and related components.

Due to the special adaptive calibration this calibration is not serviced through a hand held flash tuner. During installation you will need to ship the processor out for programming. Contact a Steeda sales rep for shipping instructions and details.

Don't be fooled by other kits with handheld flash tuners. These calibrations do not have full control of all engine parameters and are not adaptive!

Our adaptive calibration and our huge heat exchanger the largest on the market for any twin screw supercharger kit available make our system the best and only choice for the demanding Mustang performance enthusiast. Ready for the best? Place your order today.

Note: Steeda Sales reps will contact you for full vehicle information for calibration after your order.

Product Benefits

  • Steeda exclusive adaptive calibration
  • 50 State emissions legal
  • Largest heat exchanger available for lowest discharge temperatures
  • Safest system on the market for long term durability

Time to install: About 20 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Required

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Yukon's made in the USA heavy duty forged axles are stronger than factory axles to better handle high horsepower high performance applications.

One piece 1541H forged construction and rolled splines provide 30% increased strength over cut splines.

All axles are direct replacements and are available in 28 or 31 spline construction.

Note: all 2004-earlier factory axles are 28 spline 2005-2013 is 31 spline. To use 31 spline axles in 04-earlier applications requires a 31 spline differential.

Note: Does not include axle bearings seals and wheel studs. Can be added in drop down feature.

Product Benefits

  • Stronger and more durable than factory axles
  • Available in 28 and 31 spline applications
  • Direct replacement installation
  • Made in the USA!

@860@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@860@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-upper-strut-mounts-555-8120/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Heavy Duty Mustang Upper Strut Mounts (05-10 GT & 07-14 GT500)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-8120.jpg^@^555-8120^@^

Steeda's heavy duty direct replacement upper strut mounts replace the weak factory mounts for S197 Mustangs.

The Steeda street heavy duty upper strut mounts are manufactured to the same exacting tolerances as our industry leading caster/camber plates. They utilize a roller bearing that exceeds OEM specs to ensure precise suspension control. Will not fail on lowered cars like the factory piece.

These upper mounts eliminate the "
column3:
sound that is common on lowered cars when the factory upper mount fails. Unlike the factory piece you can also get an extra 1 degree of camber in each direction with these plates as well. Steeda's heavy duty upper mounts are specifically designed for street use and will not show any increase in NVH when installed.Price includes a set of two.

Patent Pending!

Product Benefits

  • Better handling with more stable cornering while maintaining factory ride quality
  • Precision Tolerance and Fit with the Highest Grade Materials available
  • Allows adjustment of up to 1 degree positive or negative of camber

Read Steeda's blog post to learn more about the truth behind caster and camber products: http://www.steedablog.com/2012/08/the-truth-about-camber-caster-plates-and-strut-mounts/

Time to install: About 2 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Springs are the foundation of good handling and ride quality. So start with the best springs for your Mustang built by the company that specializes the vehicle dynamics and your Mustang!

Our experience and expertise in high performance street and racing suspension systems is second to none - Put that experience to work for you. Steeda springs are all in house engineered and custom made to our exact specifications.

Steeda springs provide the best combinations of handling and ride quality available!

For the ultimate in handling also check out our Competition/Street springs Proven and winning in NASA American Iron Competition SCCA and IMSA!

Steeda Sport Springs

  • Steeda Sport Springs lower the vehicle approximately 1"
column11:
in the rear optimizing the center of gravity and suspension geometry.
  • This created a huge improvement in handling with a noticeable reduction in nose dive launch squat and body roll while still maintaining an outstanding ride quality for daily driving.

    • Steeda Springs are manufactured under these rigorous manufacturing certifications:
column13:
>QS-9000 & ISO 9001

Note: Not for use on 2011 & newer V6 Mustang due to lighter front end.

Product Benefits

  • Improved vehicle stance

column1:
@863@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@863@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-belt-tensioner-555-3358/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Heavy Duty Belt Tensioner - 90mm/Billet - Supercharged (05-10 4.6L)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-3358.jpg^@^555-3358^@^

Stop your OEM belt tensioner bracket from bending with Steeda's new Tensioner kit! A major problem with Supercharged applications as the increased belt length and tension puts unwanted stress on the factory tensioner. A real problem is when you kick the clutch and pull the next gear the RPMS suddenly drop.

With the extra rotating mass of the supercharger and weight of all the accessories it will jerk the belt and sometimes hurt your OEM tensioner. It causes it to flex and in the end you usually end up with broken belts that are hard to find and expensive. A great fix for all blown Roush Saleen and other bolt on supercharger applications. Kit is available with a factory pulley or an optional billet one.

Note: 555-3358 is designed for use with Whipple supercharger kits with a 3.625"
column2:
- 3.25 blower pulley. These kits require a 90mm idler.

Product Benefits

  • Made to be stronger then the OEM unit
  • Helps prevent belt breakage
  • Cheap and inexpensive way to increase performance and durability
  • A Must for Supercharged applications

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model(s): Bullitt GT

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

column1: @864@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@864@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-ford-mustang-rear-wing-476-steeda-wing/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Functional Mustang Rear Wing (10-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/476-steeda-wing.jpg

column9:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/363/detailed/6/wing-3.jpg^@^476-STEEDA-WING^@^

Steeda's Functional Rear Wing for 2010-2014 Mustang carries on the tradition of previous Steeda wing designs by not just looking great but providing functional down force as well with minimal drag.

Designed and tested in conjunction with Ford Motor Company engineers and with feedback from Embry Riddle Aeronautical University aerodynamic engineers this rear wing provides substantial downforce with minimal aerodynamic drag. It can be installed and used by itself but is also a great compliment to a front aero splitter or Q series front fascia to provide a balanced increase in front and rear downforce at high speeds.

For vehicles equipped with a factory wing our wing uses two existing mounting holes and requires 2 additional holes to be drilled for installation. There will be two outboard holes that are not used and must be plugged or filled.

NOTE: This wing does not come painted as shown in the images above.

Product Benefits

  • Race tested and proven functionality
  • Aggressive styling
  • Easy bolt on installation

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/steeda-mustang-gunmetal-mesh-wheel-004-209502(3).JPG^@^004-209502^@^

Steeda's ST-R mesh wheels for the Ford Mustang offer great style and strength. Using a low pressure casting process gives these wheels lower weight than standard gravity cast wheels.

Steeda's ST-R mesh wheel is designed to clear most popular big brake kits such as Steeda's 14 inch 4 piston brake set up.

Can be run in 20x9.5 size all around or staggered with 20x9.5 in front and our 20x11 in the rear. Available in a solid matte black as well as gunmetal with machined lip.

Note: 2007 and up vehicles must have tire pressure system sensors transfered to new wheels for proper system operation. Tire pressure system programming tool is available separately.

column1: @867@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@867@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-frame-rail-torque-box-brace-555-5551/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Frame Rail & Torque Box Brace (05-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-5551.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/steeda-mustang-frame-rail-torque-box-brace-555-5551(0).jpg^@^555-5551^@^

We spent countless hours fiquring out where the S197 Mustangs could benefit most from chassis stiffening. Here is the end result. There are several vendors out there treating your S197 like it was an old fox body making large braces for areas that are not weak on your S197 and that add a lot of unnecessary weight.

We took a strategic approach with Steeda's 3-point torque box and frame rail braces. These braces are made from 4130 Chrome Moly material. This material is twice as strong as mild steel and half the weight of mild steel.

These braces are compact and light weight. They are much lighter than the unnecessary braces many competitors offer and specifically designed for the needs of the S197 Mustang. They tie together the inner/outer frame rails and the rear lower control arm mount. One of the few areas on the S197 that could use additional bracing.

Our braces are silver powdercoated and come with mounting hardware. They can be bolted with our supplied hardware or welded in place for maximum effectiveness.

Note: Does not fit convertible Mustangs. Also will not fit Boss 302 Mustang or any Mustang equipped with the Boss 302 quad-exhaust system.

U.S. Patent Pending

Product Benefits

  • 4130 Chrome Moly Design for Hardcore use also
  • Better handling for more stable cornering
  • Helps prevent and eliminate sqeaks and rattles

Time to install: About 45 Minutes

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column1: @868@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@868@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-2005-up-mustang-g-trac-brace-555-5530/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang G-Trac Brace (05-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-5530.jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-5530-1.jpg^@^555-5530^@^

Our G-trac bar is a direct bolt on replacement for your S197 Mustang and provides greatly improved front chassis bracing.

The stock front lower chassis has a cross brace but it is mounted to an unsupported flange. Our G-trac brace ties the rear mounts of the front lower control arms together to reduce flex at the mounts and make the front chassis stiffer.

Our G-trac brace is attached as close to the control arm bushings as possible so the load path is more direct and you get much more effective stiffening so the suspension geometry doesn't change during high cornering/chassis loads.Manufactured from super strong chrome moly alloy steel tube. Over twice as strong as any mild steel offering. Includes G-trac bar and installation hardware.

NOTE: When using the G-Trac Brace with the Control arm Relocation kit two 14mm - 2.0 x 100mm long bolts are required for installation.

Product Benefits

  • Improves suspension compliance
  • Also referred to as k-member brace
  • Direct bolt-in easy installation with included hardware

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

A bit of race-inspired design that looks right at home on the street and is functional!

Steeda's front Cobra R Style Front Splitter for 99-04 GT and V6 is designed to re direct airflow across the bottom of the front bumper to the outside edges instead of letting it flow underneath the vehicle.

This eliminates front end lift and creates down force at high speed. When combined with Steeda's functional rear wing you get a great looking and functional combination that provides balanced downforce at high speeds producing increased high speed grip and handling balance as well as high speed straight line stability.

Note: This front splitter is an add on designed firmly attach to your factory front bumper cover. Does not come painted.

  • Looks great

http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/steeda-hydro-dipped-carbon-coil-covers-11-15-gt-wd-cc-hydro(5).jpg^@^WD-CC-HYDRO^@^

Steeda hydro-dipped carbon fiber coil covers fit all 2011 through 2015 Mustang GT's - sold in pairs. These custom coil covers add unique styling to your engine compartment!

What is hydro-dipping? Hydro-dipping is a water transfer printing technique that involves a specialized film that when applied adheres to a multitude of materials such as fiberglass plastic metal and wood. The surface to be dipped is pre-treated and cleaned then a base coat is applied. The item(s) are then dipped into a water container that has the transfer pattern ready to apply.

Product Benefits

  • Custom hydro-dipped carbon fiber coil covers add style
  • Clear-coated for gloss finish
  • Heat-resistant over 400+ degrees
  • Direct bolt-in easy installation

Time to install: About 15 Minutes

Level of difficulty: Easy Install

column1: @871@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@871@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-2011-mustang-short-throw-shifter-kit-555-7313/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Tri-Ax Short Throw Shifter Kit (11-14 GT/Boss/V6)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-7313.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-7313-2.jpg
column4:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-7313-4.jpg^@^555-7313^@^

Steeda's Tri-Ax short throw shifter kit combined two popular items in to one convenient kit. Dramatically improve your Mustang's gear shifting by upgrading to the Steeda short shifter for the 2011+ Mustang kit. Included in the kit is our wildly popular short throw shifter and shifter base bushing with bracket.

This straight forward install takes only about an hour and a half and you probably have all the tools you need sitting in your tool box. Dramatically improve the driving experience with this short throw shifter kit!

Product Benefits

  • 20 % throw reduction
  • Made of high quality billet materials
  • No increase in shifter NVH (Noise vibration and harshness)
  • Retains reverse lock-out
  • Comes with a LIFETIME warranty

Not all Mustang shifters are created equal. Learn more about what makes Steeda stand out from the crowd: http://www.steedablog.com/2010/04/tri-ax-shifter-extreme-engineering/

Testimonial

I am not a performance driver anymore. These days my Mustang is my daily driver and weekend cruiser. So my needs in a short throw shifter are somewhat different than those of most enthusiasts. I wanted a shifter with a somewhat shorter throw than stock but still long enough for my relaxed shifting style. But most of all the shifter had to be as quiet as stock. I tried one of the very expensive performance shifters and liked the shorter throw but hated the amount of noise vibration and harshness (NVH) that it introduced so after about a month I went back to the shop and had them reinstall the stock shifter. I found out later that the NVH problem was due to damage caused by an improper installation so I don't know what it would have been like had it been properly installed.

Once back to using the stock shifter I realized how much I still wanted a shorter throw but without the NVH so I started asking around and came to the conclusion that the Steeda Short Throw Shifter might be my best option. After some conversation with the helpful people at Steeda I ordered and received their shifter. I had a different shop do the installation this time. Driving away after the installation I noticed an immediate difference that brought a grin to my face. This shifter was exactly what I was looking for! It has a nice throw that is shorter than stock but not too extreme. It has very precise movement and best of all it is just as quiet as the stock shifter! There is a slight click as it is pulled into each gear that is more felt than heard and is a reassuring confirmation that you are in the gear. The reverse lockout is positive without requiring too much effort (I had expected I would want to switch to the included lighter spring but decided it wasn't necessary once I tried it).

I can't say how it would do in performance use since that's not my style but if you are looking for a reasonably priced quality shifter with great feel and no added noise then the Steeda shifter is a great choice. I could not be more pleased!

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools
