@883@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@883@^http://www.steeda.com/injector-dynamics-mustang-fuel-injectors-676-id725-gt/^@^Steeda^@^Injector Dynamics Mustang Fuel Injectors - 14mm Adapters - 05-10 GT^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/676-id725-gt.jpg^@^676-ID725-GT^@^If you have a high horsepower Mustang larger injectors are a must have. These injectors are designed to support high horsepower levels unlike other injectors however Injector Dynamics injectors provide you or your tuner with all the proper calibration information to tune the injector to your application for proper drivability as well as power. With the proper calibration data you can insure proper idle quality smooth part throttle cruising great throttle response and proper wide open throttle fueling.

Whether you are a hobbyist using SCT Pro Racer software or paying a professional to dyno tune your vehicle these injectors give you everything you need for proper tuning.

Injectors are not usually the drop in and go upgrade people think it is unless you are installing the same injector the vehicle came with proper calibration is required for correct operation. In addition not all injectors have the ideal spray and atomizations patterns. The Injector Dymanics ID725 has it all.

The ID725 is available for a wide variety of applications. Please choose your application properly from the list at the top of this to insure proper fitment.

Note: These injectors are EV6 style injectors - EV1 applications will require a separate EV1 TO EV6 adapter to use these injectors. 87-2004 Mustang GT uses EV1 style injectors. 03/04 Cobra 05-13 GT and 07-12 GT500 use an EV6 style injector.

Product Benefits
  • Direct fit replacement
  • High flow rates for high horsepower applications
  • Includes proper data for tuning calibration

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

@887@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@887@^http://www.steeda.com/ram-powergrip-mustang-cluth-609-98951/^@^Steeda^@^RAM Powergrip Mustang Clutch - 11" - 10 Spline - Mid 01-04^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/609-98951.jpg^@^609-98951^@^

Ram Powergrip clutch kits feature a combination of sintered iron and organic friction material along with increased pressure plate clamping loads for high increases in holding power with excellent driveability.

Available in 10.5 and 11 inch sizes with factory 10 spline or 26 spline versions for customers running Tremec TKO transmissions.

Kits come with clutch disc pressure plate and throw out bearing. Kits have a maximum horsepower capacity of 525hp for 10.5 inch kits and 550hp for 11 inch kits.

Note: 96 to mid 2001 vehicles use 10.5 inch OE clutch. Can use 11 inch clutch with proper flywheel. Mid-2001 and later GT Mustangs with TR3650 Transmission use 11 inch clutches.

Product Benefits

  • Available for stock 10 spline or Tremec TKO 26 spline input shafts
  • Good driveability excellent for dual purpose street/strip vehicles.
  • Will hold up to 550hp

Time to install: About 7 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

@890@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@890@^http://www.steeda.com/ram-powergrip-heavy-duty-mustang-cluth-609-98794hdt/^@^Steeda^@^RAM Powergrip Heavy Duty Mustang Clutch - 10.5" - 26 Spline - 79-Mid 01^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/609-98794hdt.jpg^@^609-98794HDT^@^

RAM's Powergrip HD clutches are the most aggressive single disc clutch sets we recommend.

Powergrip HD clutches will support 650hp. Powergrips are streetable but have more aggressive engagement than stock and may have slight chatter on initial launch.

Ram Powergrip HD clutches feature RAM's 900 series sintered iron friction material and increased clamp load pressure plate. Kit includes pressure plate disc and throw out bearing.

For applications higher than 650hp use RAM's dual disc clutch kits.

Note: Recommend use of billet steel or aluminum flywheels with Powergrip HD clutches. Powergrip HD clutches are only stocked for TKO 26 spline applications. Call for 10 spline applications.

Product Benefits

  • Holds up to 650hp
  • Durable single disc clutch solution
  • Complete clutch kit including throw out bearing

Time to install: About 7 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Required

Tools needed: Shop Tools

@895@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@895@^http://www.steeda.com/ram-mustang-6-bolt-billet-flywheel-609-1540/^@^Steeda^@^RAM 6 Bolt Billet Steel Flywheel - 10.5" & 11" (96-10 GT/Cobra)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/609-1540.jpg^@^609-1540^@^

Ram Billet Steel and Aluminum flywheels are perfect upgrades over your factory flywheel.

When installing a new clutch it is always a good idea to replace the flywheel to ensure maximum clutch life and safety.

Many shops use a basic resurfacing machine that leaves hot spots and heat cracks on your flywheel as well as regularly leaving high spots that can cause uneven engagement and accelerated wear.

Upgrade to a billet steel or aluminum flywheel that meets SFI spec 1.1 and add extra safety and prevent flywheel failure from excessive horsepower heat and high RPM use.

Don't trust your flywheel on your high horsepower Mustang to resurfacing. Do your clutch right the first time with a new flywheel.

Note: Some 4.6L 2V engines may have 8 bolt instead of 6 bolt crankshafts. Romeo plant built engines have 6 bolts Windsor plant built engines have 8 bolts. Using the 8th digit of your VIN number VIN character X is for windsor engines VIN character W is for Romeo engines. Please identify your engine before ordering.

Product Benefits

  • Available in steel or aluminum versions
  • Direct fit replacement
  • 6 and 8 bolt patterns available
  • SFI approved

Time to install: About 7 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Model year(s): 2010 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005 2004 2003 2002 2001 2000 1999 1998 1997 1996

Model(s): Bullitt Cobra Cobra R GT

Transmission(s): Manual

Note: Some 4.6L 2V engines may have 8 bolt instead of 6 bolt crankshafts. Romeo plant built engines have 6 bolts Windsor plant built engines have 8 bolts. Using the 8th digit of your VIN number VIN character X is for windsor engines VIN character W is for Romeo engines. Please identify your engine before ordering.

Product Benefits

  • Available in steel or aluminum versions
  • Direct fit replacement
  • 6 and 8 bolt patterns available
  • SFI approved

@901@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@901@^http://www.steeda.com/exedy-1986-2001-mustang-mach-400-clutch-639-07800/^@^Steeda^@^Exedy Mach 400 Mustang Performance Clutch - (86-Mid '01)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/639-07800.jpg^@^639-07800^@^

Exedy clutch is a high quality premier clutch manufacturer. As an O.E. supplier to Ford GM and 11 other automotive manufacturers you can trust the quality and performance of Exedy products.

Steeda proudly offers Exedy clutch options to fit all your performance needs.

Exedy's Mach 400 series clutches are a upgraded O.E. replacement for your factory clutch. Rated at 400 ft/lbs of torque capacity at the wheels with smooth engagement and O.E. like driveability.

The Mach 500 series is a Stage 1 performance clutch upgrade. Rated at 500 ft/lbs of torque capacity at the wheels. These clutches also feature smooth engagement and great drivability.

For the truly serious driving enthusist the Mach 600 series clutch is for you. This Stage 2 performance clutch upgrade is rated at 600 ft/lbs of torque capacity at the wheels. Unlike other clutches with this type of high torque capacity Exedy maintained excellent driving characteristics. This clutch has a more aggressive bite than the 400/500 series but can still be driven easily on the street. Perfect for high power daily drivers.

Notes

For use in 1996 to early 2001 vehicles a new flywheel that supports 11 inch clutches must be used. O.E. clutch for 1996 to early 2001 models is 10.5 inch. Mid-2001 to 2004 models use 11 inch clutch and can be used with O.E. flywheel.

1996-2004 kits include the disk pressure plate throw out bearing pilot bearings and an alignment tool.

2005-13 kits include disk pressure plate pilot bearing alignment tool and a new hydraulic release bearing.

Product Benefits

  • High quality direct bolt on clutch kits
  • Wide torque capacity for most combinations
  • Excellent drivability and smooth engagement

Time to install: About 7 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

These window louvers by SilverHorse Racing are a feature a unique flush mount design that is exclusive to this kit.

Directly replacing the factory window glass the louver openings contain dark tinted transparent polycarbonate allowing for the most visibility through the louver of any other piece on the market. These pieces also have UV inhibitors for protection from the sun and a long life.

Louvers come unpainted or are also available painted as a special order for most colors. Painted special orders are non-refundable and take 6 weeks to fulfill. Customer must specify color name and code when placing order.

Note: Installation requires removal of factory glass and normal paint preparation procedures of using unpainted piece. Professional prep and install is highly recommended.

Product Benefits

  • Flush mount for clean look
  • Best visibility of any louver on the market
  • UV inhibitors to protect from sun exposure

Time to install: About 3 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Once you change the gears in your differential you need a new speedometer gear to recalibrate your speedometer. They're inexpensive and only take a few minutes to change.

These Recalibration Gears fit 1979-1998 Mustangs. Please check our Hot New Product Section for information on 1999 and 2002 Mustangs.

Instructions: Note transmission type model and resulting drive gear. Cross reference with your rear-end gear ratio to find the correct "recalibration" gear for your application.

Manual Transmissions with 7 Tooth Drive Gear

  • 1983-1989 T-5 OEM
  • Pre 1993 T-5 Aftermarket
  • 1996-1998 Cobra T-45 OEM
  • All Tremec Transmissions

Manual Transmissions with 8 Tooth Drive Gear

  • 1990-1995 T-5 OEM
  • 1996-1998 T-45 OEM Except Cobra

Automatic Transmissions with 7 Tooth Drive Gear

  • 1983-1989 Automatic Transmissions

Automatic Transmissions with 8 Tooth Drive Gear

  • 1990-1998 Automatic Transmissions

Product Benefits

  • Allows speedo to work with changed differential gears
  • Easy to install

Autometer gauges are the standard of the industry for quality and accuracy.

Steeda recommends electric gauges for any applications measuring fluids as a mechanical gauge would require running the fluid up to the gauge posing the risk of leaks into the interior of the vehicle.

Gauges available in Autometer C2 Cobalt Sport Comp II and Phantom II styles.

  • Proven Autometer Quality

Moroso competition wheel studs. Designed for Open Track and Drag racing. Ready to install saves time and money.

These hubs are Genuine Ford products.

The Moroso extra long wheel studs are required by most sanctioning bodies. They are manufactured from high-grade SAE 8740 steel to withstand shear loads of 190000 psi (exceeds Grade 8 specs) and feature quick start dog ends for easier starting of lug nuts.

Product Benefits

  • Genuine Ford hubs
  • Required by most sanctioning bodies
  • Not recommended for use with wheel spacers
  • Stud length is measured from knurl base to stud end

column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2553-2.jpg^@^555-2553^@^

Bundle and save! Purchase Steeda's competition adjustable panhard bar and panhard brace in this convenient kit!

A great step towards improved handling out back is to upgrade the panhard bar supplied by the manufacturer with our chrome-moly steel unit.

If you want to take your Mustang to competition level performance and be able to adjust your rear roll center you need our new Competition Adjustable Race Panhard Bar.

This panhard bar is made up of aerospace rod ends grade 12.9 hardware and high strength 4130 chrome moly alloy steel. This is a weld-in unit that will allow you to adjust your rear roll center with ease and eliminate all deflection associated with the factory panhard rod. Adjusting the roll center will allow you to dial handling balance of the vehicle by helping control under/over steer.

Take your handling to the next level with Steeda!

Product Benefits

  • Competition tested and proven!
  • Adjustable Rear Roll center
  • Dramatically improves Handling
  • Is a must for any performance car

Time to install: About 2 Hours

column1: @988@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@988@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-2005-2014-mustang-rear-shock-tower-brace-555-5750/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Rear Shock Tower Brace (05-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-5750_yxqd-eo.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-5750-3.jpg
column7:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-5750-7.jpg^@^555-5750^@^

What does it do?

Steeda's Rear Mustang Shock Tower Brace ties the two rear upper shock mounting points together to limit rear chassis flex making the rear suspension more effective and increasing overall chassis life.

What materials are used and how is it made?

Even though it cost us more we believe strongly in using chrome moly steel a stronger and lighter alternative to mild steel used in other braces.

What is the warranty?

Buy with confidence your Steeda Mustang Rear Shock brace is backed by Steeda's LIFETIME WARRANTY.

Is this product thoroughly tested?

Absolutely! All Steeda manufactured parts are track and street tested by our staff of engineers and enthusiasts

Where is it made?

Steeda proudly manufactures our products right here in the United States out of our Valdosta Georgia manufacturing plant.

How does it install?

Steeda's Mustang Shock Tower Brace requires welding of the mounting brackets to the top of the strut towers. An installer experienced in welding is recommended for installation.

Notes

  • Does not fit in cars with Mach 1000 sound system
  • Does not fit convertibles

Product Benefits

  • Stiffens rear end of your Mustang

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Once you change the gears in your differential you need a new speedometer gear to recalibrate your speedometer. They're inexpensive and only take a few minutes to change.

These Recalibration Gears fit 1979-1998 Mustangs. Please check our Hot New Product Section for information on 1999 and 2002 Mustangs.

column3:
gear for your application.

  • Pre 1993 T-5 Aftermarket
  • 1996-1998 Cobra T-45 OEM
  • All Tremec Transmissions

Manual Transmissions with 8 Tooth Drive Gear

  • 1990-1995 T-5 OEM
  • 1996-1998 T-45 OEM Except Cobra

Automatic Transmissions with 7 Tooth Drive Gear

  • 1983-1989 Automatic Transmissions

Automatic Transmissions with 8 Tooth Drive Gear

@990@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@990@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-adjustable-clutch-cable-172-0000/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Adjustable Clutch Cable (79-95)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/172-0000.jpg^@^172-0000^@^

All Steeda clutch cables features a stainless steel inner cable and low friction Teflon lining along with a high-durometer bushing at the firewall for improved clutch response and cable life. This bushing is much more durable and will not prematurely split and fail like lesser bushings. Steeda is the only company with these features making this the finest quality clutch cable you can get for your Mustang.

Steeda's stainless steel cable will not allow the cable to rust through and is more durable unlike all other cables on the market that are made from lesser quality galvanized steel.

Clutch adjustment can be adjusted by turning a nut at the end of the cable when the cable is used in combination with the required Steeda’s aluminum quadrant.

Part number 172-0000 is designed specifically to be a direct bolt-on to '79-'95 Mustangs with V8 Engine. PN 172-0201 is the correct length and has the proper bracket for direct bolt-in replacement in any '96-'04 GT Bullitt or Cobra. PN 172-0301 is a non-adjustable stock-replacement cable.

Please Note: All cables shown require an aftermarket quadrant like Steeda's Double Hook Quadrant!

Product Benefits

  • High durability
  • Improved clutch response and cable life
  • Stainless steel cable will not rust through

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

@1001@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1001@^http://www.steeda.com/kirban-fox-body-mustang-fuel-pressure-regulator-303-5005/^@^Steeda^@^Kirban Mustang Adjustable Fuel Pressure Regulator (86-93 5.0L/5.8L)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/303-5005_tem4-7e.jpg^@^303-5005^@^

This billet style adjustable fuel regulator has been one of the most popular regulators in the Ford marketplace since its introduction in the mid-1990s.

One of the key features is the fact it closely resembles the factory fuel pressure regulator in format and size. This design enables it to work with almost every different aftermarket intake available for the popular 5.0 Mustangs.

The entire unit is 100% brand new and has two O-rings internally so it will never leak. Adjustments can easily be made without removing the vacuum line since the adjustment screw is a separate part on the top.

This adjustable fuel regulator is totally adjustable from 30-100 psi. It has a larger feed and return fittings internally for 30% more fuel flow which reduces fuel restriction of the fuel regulator. If necessary the regulator can easily be rebuilt as we stock the diaphragms separately.

This regulator can not only deliver 75 pounds of pressure but it can also be set below stock fuel pressure if the car runs fatter injectors.

The 3-bolt mounting format can also be used in several other Ford applications besides the ones noted above. Ford basically used either a 2-bolt mounting or a 3-bolt mounting design during the 1980s and 1990s on their fuel rails.

The fuel pressure regulator comes with new hardware to attach it to the stock fuel rail.

We are proud to say this entire adjustable fuel regulator has always been 100% Made in the U.S.A. and by the same supplier.

With its great price structure and sales of over 25000 in the last 15 years it's easy to see why this is the regulator many Mustang owners want for their application.

An excellent upgraded adjustable fuel regulator to enhance your Mustang's performance.

Product Benefits

  • This adjustable fuel regulator is totally adjustable from 30-100 psi
  • The entire unit is 100% brand new and has two O-rings internally so it will never leak.
  • This design enables it to work with almost every different aftermarket intake available for the popular 5.0 Mustangs.

Time to install: About 45 Minutes

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-7156-1.jpg^@^555-7156^@^

Steeda's all new Billet Aluminum Pro Street shift handle. Made from Billet 6061 aluminum and features a steel 12mm - 1.75 threaded stud.

Designed for S197 Mustangs with Steeda Tri-Ax shifters but will fit 79-04 Mustangs with stock or most aftermarket shifters.

The shift ball is available in gloss Black or White finishes or just the shift handle alone.

Grade 10.9 mounting Hardware is included.

Note: Shift knobs can only be used for shifters with a 12mm - 1.75 thread pattern. This is found with every Tri-Ax shifter 79-04 Mustang stock/aftermarket shifters and most 2005 and up aftermarket shifters. It will NOT work with the 2005 and up OEM shifter thread pattern.

Product Benefits

  • Made of high quality billet aluminum
  • Easily installs in minutes
  • Great shifter feel and response

Time to install: About 15 Minutes

Level of difficulty: Easy

@1015@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1015@^http://www.steeda.com/ford-racing-mustang-clutch-fluid-line-upgrade-161-m-7512-a/^@^Steeda^@^Ford Racing Mustang Clutch Fluid Line Upgrade (05-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/161-m-7512-a.jpg^@^161-M-7512-A^@^

Ford Racing's upgraded clutch fluid line was originally designed for Ford Racing's race car program to reduce clutch fluid line expansion improving clutch hydralic pressure greatly improved clutch pedal feel and preventing failures resulting from heat exposure from hard use and degredation over time.

Now you can enjoy all these same benefits for your personal Mustang. If you road race or regularly drag race replacing this line is a must! If your original line is more than 5 years old regardless of use you should replace it with this new line.

Features durable stainless steel hard line construction with a braided stainless steel flexible end. Includes necessary fittings and O-ring seals.

Product Benefits

  • Improved clutch pedal feel
  • Improved clutch hydraulic pressure
  • Stainless steel hard line construction with braided stainless steel flexible end
  • Includes fittings and o-rings

Time to install: About 2 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

The NT555R is a D.O.T.-compliant competition drag radial designed with maximum flexibility for the weekend drag racer. The NT555R combines a high grip compound and semi-racing construction to provide maximum traction at the starting line. The tire comes molded at 6/32 of an inch and features a unique reinforced belt package to provide improved traction and high-speed stability. The NT555R is the perfect performance radial for the street or strip.

The NT555R is recommended for dry competition use.

Traction: A

The NT555RII is a D.O.T.-compliant road race competition radial designed with the muscle car racer in mind. Using the same computer-designed tread pattern as the 555R the 555RII has been thoroughly updated to handle the task of road racing. Construction modifications were made to improve cornering feedback controllability and stability. The tire comes molded at 6/32 of an inch to reduce tread flex.

The 555RII is recommended for competition use.

The NT01 is a D.O.T.-compliant dry competition radial designed with the weekend road racer in mind. The compound was developed to provide the best balance of traction consistency heat cycle performance and longevity. The sidewall construction* is optimized for sharp steering response accurate feedback and increased driver confidence. For those that demand maximum dry performance the NT01 can be shaved from 6/32 of an inch down to 3/32 of an inch to reveal a slick with two circumferential grooves. The NT01 delivers fast and consistent lap times for both the professional road-racer and the track-day enthusiast.

*Steel reinforced sidewall offered in select sizes. The NT01 is recommended for dry competition use.

Compliment your 05-09 Mustang's brilliant design with the Ground Effects Package from Classic Design Concepts. This package includes a CDC front chin splitter made from High Pressure Injection Molded Urethane and works exclusively with the Mustang GT CDC Classic Chin Spoilers our all new Side Rocker Splitter Kit which fits all Mustang model years from 2005 to 2014 including Mustang Shelby GT 500 and Shelby Supersnake models. The new Side Rocker Splitters are manufactured using OEM quality Thermal Plastic Olefin (TPO). TPO is known for its long-lasting durability and UV protection. It features a grained texture for that OEM look. The Side Rocker Splitters look great in black or customer can paint o match the color of the vehicle. The final component is our Deck-lid trim panel. Panels are made from OE quality grained RIM material giving your Mustang a clean and classic look while also being easy to instal. It features a textured black finish.

Please note: Chin splitter will not fit 05-09 V6 Front Chin Spoilers. The Front Splitter and Side Rocker Splitters can be painted to match the color of the vehicle.

Product Benefits

  • Constructed using high pressure injection molded urethane
  • Thermal plastic olefin gives durability and UV protection
  • Can be painted to match the color of the vehicle.

Time to install: About 4 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005

Model(s): GT

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

Add race-inspired styling to your Mustang GT equipped with Classic Design Concepts' Classic Chin Spoiler by installing their Splitter Upgrade for an aggressive new look.

Manufactured from a tough high pressure black injection molded acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) plastic this CDC chin spoiler splitter is made to take the abuse of everyday driving.

Using 15 mounting points you will only need to drill a few holes to secure the splitter to the spoiler with the included push pins fasteners. Installation takes less than 30 minutes.

Please note: The Classic Design Concepts Classic Chin Spoiler Splitter is designed to fit the 2005 to 2009 Mustang GT with the CDC Classic Chin Spoiler installed. The Classic Chin Spoiler is not included.

This CDC-designed high temp ABS gauge pod puts critical system information right at eye level where you can see it. Three 2-1/16" gauges are mounted right on the center of your S197's dash inside this molded pod which flows seamlessly with the rest of your interior for a factory type look.

The Mustang Gauge Pod features a black color and smooth finish that blends with most interiors and it's also paint-able for custom applications.

This gauge pod is designed for an easy no-drill installation using acrylic bonding tape or dual lock Velcro. It is engineered for a flawless fit on all 05-09 Mustangs including the V6 GT GT500 and Bullitt models.

Gauges sold separately.

^@^Mustang^@^ V6 ^@^Mustang Induction^@^2002 2001 2000 1999 ^@^Mustang Shaker Hood Intakes^@^129.95^ @1062@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1062@^http://www.steeda.com/classic-design-concepts-mustang-convertible-lightbar-carbon-fiber-067-101005/^@^Steeda^@^Classic Design Concepts Mustang Convertible Lightbar - Carbon Fiber (94-04 GT V6 Cobra)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/87804-cdc-99-04-carbon-lightbar.jpg^@^067-101005^@^

Add race-ready style to your SN95 or New Edge Mustang Convertible with a CDC Carbon Fiber Lightbar for head-turning style on the street and at shows. Stand out from the crowd when your Pony's top-down with this sporty bar. And when the sun isn't shining the CDC Lightbar also fits conveniently under your ragtop when the weather's bad.

CDC designed this styling bar to provide additional safety by incorporating a high mounted LED brake light that is highly visible to all vehicles following behind you day or night.

The Classic Design Concepts light bar is constructed of a sturdy 1 ¼” round steel tube with a 1/8” wall thickness. The polyurethane mold is then wrapped in a durable carbon fiber look vinyl for race-ready good looks.

No Welding Required. Installation can be completed in a couple of hours in the comfort of your own driveway with basic hand tools and there is no welding required. The CDC Light Bar simply bolts to the B pillar for a sturdy mount that also helps stiffen your Mustang to reduce body flex.

The Classic Design Concepts Light Bar fits perfectly on all 1994 to 2004 SN95 and New Edge Mustangs including the V6 GT and Cobra models.

Once you change the gears in your differential you need a new speedometer gear to recalibrate your speedometer. They're inexpensive and only take a few minutes to change.

These Recalibration Gears fit 1979-1998 Mustangs. Please check our Hot New Product Section for information on 1999 and 2002 Mustangs.

Instructions: Note transmission type model and resulting drive gear. Cross reference with your rear-end gear ratio to find the correct "
column3:
gear for your application.

  • 1983-1989 T-5 OEM
  • Pre 1993 T-5 Aftermarket
  • 1996-1998 Cobra T-45 OEM
  • All Tremec Transmissions

Manual Transmissions with 8 Tooth Drive Gear

  • 1990-1995 T-5 OEM
  • 1996-1998 T-45 OEM Except Cobra

Automatic Transmissions with 7 Tooth Drive Gear

  • 1983-1989 Automatic Transmissions

Automatic Transmissions with 8 Tooth Drive Gear

  • 1990-1998 Automatic Transmissions

  • Allows speedo to work with changed differential gears

The CR1 racing seat provides drivers with the latest in looks durability comfort and style. Its exquisite design makes it one of the best-looking aftermarket seats available today. Whether on street the track or off-road the CR1 racing seat will enhance your overall driving experience. High wear patches are strategically placed to protect your seat from abuse in the high wear areas.

The fingertip controlled reclining mechanism allows the seat back to be adjusted to the ultimate driving position. Corbeau reclining technology allows with just the lift of the lever the seat back to be immediately returned to the full upright position.

Ultimate lateral support with well-defined thigh kidney and shoulder bolsters will allow both the driver and passenger to remain in the optimal seating position. The reduction of body shifting will reduce the amount of driver fatigue and enhance the overall driving experience.

Note: For Fast and easy installation be sure to order the correct Corbeau seat brackets for your year/model.

Product Benefits

  • Easy installation with Corbeau seat brackets
  • High-density injection molded foam provides ultimate comfort
  • Drivers and passengers seats sold as a set

The 2005-2009 Mustang Pocket Pod features three storage pockets that are perfect for keeping items such as manuals first aid kits emergency tools a tire pressure gauge or any other items that you want to store out of the way yet easily accessible. Each pod is approximately 9"
column6:

The 2005 to 2009 Mustang Pocket Pod features three pockets that each have a lid with a secure closure latch. The Pocket Pod is made with a rigid heat-shaped backed panel and finished with a dark charcoal felt fabric to blend with your interior. And best of all this high quality product is custom patterned engineered and Made in the USA just like your Mustang to ensure superior quality.

Pocket Pods do not require any drilling utilizing the existing features of your trunk lid for a quick and easy installation with supplied 3M automotive tape.

This Covercraft Pocket Pod is designed to fit all 2005 to 2009 Mustangs.

@1149@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1149@^http://www.steeda.com/flaming-river-economy-fox-body-manual-steering-rack-440-fr1890e/^@^Steeda^@^Flaming River Economy Mustang Manual Steering Rack - 79-93^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/440-fr1890e.jpg^@^440-FR1890E^@^

laming River Manual Rack and Pinion Economy Installation Kit with Standard 20:1 Ratio for 1979-1993 5.0L Mustangs.

Improve steering performance reduce weight and streamline your Mustang's engine compartment with this rack and pinion installation kit. These installation kits are a direct bolt-in replacement for 1979-1993 5.0L Mustangs (non-modular engines).

Eliminating the power rack pump pulley and rag joint this kit offers a total vehicle weight reduction of more than 30 lbs. Providing smooth responsive vehicle steering this manual rack is ideal for drag race and street use.

Economy Standard Ratio Kit

  • (1) Flaming River 20:1 standard ratio manual rack FR1503
  • (1) Steering shaft adapter
  • (2) Flaming River tie rod outer-ends FR1603
  • (4) Rack bushings

Time to install: About 5 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 1993 1992 1991 1990 1989 1988 1987 1986 1985 1984 1983 1982 1981 1980 1979

Model(s): 5.0L V8 Cobra V6 2.3L

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

@1150@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1150@^http://www.steeda.com/flaming-river-fox-body-mustang-manual-steering-shaft-440-fr1504m/^@^Steeda^@^Flaming River Mustang Manual Steering Shaft - 79-93^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/440-fr1504m.jpg^@^440-FR1504M^@^

These high performance steering shaft kits utilize two smooth needle-bearing universal joints a pre-fabricated shaft that bolts directly to the OEM column and a weldless intermediate shaft for easy installation. This design eliminated the rag joint for better steering response and appearance. Available in both steel for power or manual rack and pinions.

Product Highlights

  • Vibration Damper Included: No

  • Steering Box Splines: 26
  • Column Shaft Diameter (in): 3/4 in.
  • Steering Shaft Material: Steel alloy
  • Steering Shaft Finish: Nickel plated

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

@1151@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1151@^http://www.steeda.com/flaming-river-fox-body-mustang-quick-ratio-manual-steering-rack-440-fr1890q/^@^Steeda^@^Flaming River Mustang Quick Ratio Manual Steering Rack - 79-93^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/440-fr1890q.jpg^@^440-FR1890Q^@^

Converting to a Flaming River 15 to 1 manual rack and pinion steering system will give you more responsive steering allowing you to feel all of the road while retain the full factory turning radius of your OE steering system.

By installing a manual steering rack in place of the stock factory unit you will eliminate the power rack pump pulley and rag joint for a total vehicle weight reduction of more than 30 lbs. and every racer knows weight is the enemy. As an added bonus you gain horsepower by reducing parasitic drag.

Designed to meet the standards of professional street rod and race car chassis builders this Flaming River manual rack and pinion steering system is constructed from lightweight aluminum castings and features a durable bright chrome finish.

This Flaming River 15:1 Manual Steering Rack Kit is designed for use on 1979 to 1993 Mustangs equipped with the iconic 5.0L V8 including the LX 5.0 GT and SVT Cobra models. Intended for drag racing and street rod applications.

Time to install: About 5 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 1993 1992 1991 1990 1989 1988 1987 1986 1985 1984 1983 1982 1981 1980 1979

Model(s): 5.0L V8 Cobra V6 2.3L

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

@1152@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1152@^http://www.steeda.com/flaming-river-fox-body-mustang-manual-steering-rack-440-fr1890/^@^Steeda^@^Flaming River Mustang Manual Steering Rack - 79-93^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/440-fr1890.jpg^@^440-FR1890^@^

Improve the steering on your 1979-93 Mustang with this Flaming River 20.1 steering rack and pinion installation kit. This rack and pinion kit will reduce weight off the front of your vehicle and provide smooth responsive steering. The manual rack is ideal for drag race applications.

This cast aluminum rack and pinion kit eliminates the power rack pump pulley and rag joint for a total vehicle weight reduction of more than 30 lbs. Flaming River manual rack and pinion steering systems feature chrome plated center tubes and two mounting holes and are designed to meet the standards of professional street rod and race car chassis builders.

This rack and pinion kit is a direct bolt-in replacement. The kit includes a 20.1 manual steering rack high performance needle bearing U-joint shaft kit 2 tie rod ends and 2 piece mounting bushings. Flaming River manual racks weigh less than 15lbs.

Product Highlights

  • Manual Steering Rack
  • 45 Length
  • 5.25 Rack Travel
  • 4.2 Turns Lock To Lock
  • Tie Rod Ends Included
  • 26 Spline
  • 9/16-18 Tie Rod End Adjustment Thread Size
  • 2.10 Rack Housing Diameter
  • Steering Shaft Included
  • Cast Aluminum
  • Chrome Finish
  • Direct Bolt On

Time to install: About 5 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 1993 1992 1991 1990 1989 1988 1987 1986 1985 1984 1983 1982 1981 1980 1979

Model(s): 5.0L V8 Cobra V6 2.3L

@1153@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1153@^http://www.steeda.com/flaming-river-mustang-power-steering-shaft-440-000651/^@^Steeda^@^Flaming River Mustang Power Steering Shaft (94-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/440-000651_u8av-kg.jpg^@^440-fr1509p^@^

Improve the steering response on your 1994-04 Mustang with this Flaming River manual steering shaft kit. This steering shaft design eliminates the rag joint for better steering response and appearance. The overall length is 13 inches and is an absolute must when using large tube headers.

This Flaming River steering shaft kit utilize two smooth needle-bearing universal joints a prefabricated shaft that bolts directly to the OEM column and a weldless intermediate shaft for easy installation. The shaft is nickel plated to prevent against rust and corrosion.

This manual steering shaft can be only used with the Flaming River Manual rack part number FlA-FR1503.

Product Highlights

  • Collapsible
  • 12 Collapsed Length
  • 13 Extended Length
  • Eliminates Rag Joint
  • Universal Joints Included
  • Splined Ends
  • 13/16 Steering Box Shaft Diameter
  • 26 Spline Steering Box
  • 13/16 Column Shaft Diameter
  • Steel Steering Shaft
  • Nickel Plated

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

@1155@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1155@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-front-spring-spacer-592-997-0163/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Front Spring Spacer - Each (79-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/997-0163--Front-Spring-Spacers.jpg^@^592-997-0163^@^

Steeda's Mustang front spring spacer is designed to raise the front end of your 1979 through 2004 Mustang up by 1/2 inch.

This spacer is recommend for any Cobra setup that has been lowered. The added weight of the Cobra's front end creates more of a noticeable rake. These spacers will help to even out your rake.

We also recommend this spacer for any other 1979-2004 Mustang setup in which you would like to raise the front end by 1/2"

^@^Mustang^@^ 5.0L Bullitt GT V6 GT500 Boss ^@^Mustang Wheels & Tires^@^2014 2013 2012 2011 2010 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005 ^@^Mustang Wheels^@^949.95^ @1204@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1204@^http://www.steeda.com/hre-flowform-ff01-liquid-black-mustang-wheel-20x11/^@^Steeda^@^HRE FlowForm FF01 Liquid Black Mustang Wheel - 20x11 (05-15 All)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/43677917353ecc6ec5df5a_e2kq-xj.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/109496976053ecc6ec5e4c8_rkur-yh.jpg^@^574-01M011045033-LIQUID-BLACK^@^

Give your Mustang a sporty European inspired look with a set of HRE FF01 wheels. The FF01 wheel features a stylish 14 spoke mesh design that has a very slight concave face making it the perfect addition to your modern Mustang.

FlowForm is a unique casting and forming process that results in a wheel that is similar to the strength and weight of a forged wheel. The wheel is low pressure cast aluminum that is rapidly cooled and condensed to enhance its elastic strength and durability. The cast wheel is then placed in a flow forming tool where rollers press against the barrel to stretch the rim into a pre-defined final width and shape. This "stretching" process improves the grain structure of the aluminum making the wheel much stronger and lighter than a standard cast aluminum wheel.

HRE Performance wheels feature a durable powder coated finish that is tough enough to stand up against the daily hazards of everyday driving. This HRE Performance Wheel is completed in a high-gloss "Liquid Black" finish for an aggressive eye catching look.

Stagger with a 20x10.5 or 20x11 wheel on the rear for an aggressive muscle car stance and improved traction.

Product Benefits

@1225@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1225@^http://www.steeda.com/edelbrock-mustang-70mm-throttle-body-125-3825/^@^Steeda^@^Edelbrock Mustang 70mm Throttle Body (86-93 GT)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/125-3825.jpg^@^125-3825^@^

More air = More horsepower! These high flow throttle bodies flow significantly more air than their stock counterparts increasing top-end horsepower. A-must-have for serious performance when using upgraded intake manifolds and cylinder heads.

Product Benefits

  • Increased horsepower and torque
  • Improved throttle response

@1226@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1226@^http://www.steeda.com/edelbrock-victor-jr-mustang-aluminum-heads-125-77189/^@^Steeda^@^Edelbrock Victor Jr. Mustang Aluminum Heads (79-95)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/125-77189.jpg^@^125-77189^@^

With a 500+ horsepower potential out-of-the-box these heads feature large volume high-flowing 210cc intake ports and 0.130"
column2:
raised 75cc exhaust ports. Heads with 60cc combustion chambers are available complete with valve springs for flat tappet or roller lifter applications. They feature CNC gasketmatched port entries/exits with blended valve bowls.

The spark plug holes and valves are in the stock location with a valve cover rail that's raised .150"
column3: . Complete heads come with stainless steel. 1-piece swirl-polished under cutstem valves (2.05&quot
column5: exhaust) as well as phosphor bronze valve guides. Valve springs handle valve lifts up to .650&quot
column6:
on complete heads.

Rocker stud intake and exhaust bolt holes are heli-coiled for strength -won't strip out like plain threads.

Note: May require enlarged piston valve reliefs to clear values. Photo may vary from actual product.

Product Benefits

  • 50 State Legal

Time to install: About 10 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Required

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Model year(s): 1995 1994 1993 1992 1991 1990 1989 1988 1987 1986 1985 1984 1983 1982 1981 1980 1979

Model(s): 5.0L V8 Cobra GT

@1227@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1227@^http://www.steeda.com/edelbrock-mustang-cylinder-head-125-602579/^@^Steeda^@^Edelbrock Mustang Cylinder Head for A-SEDAN (79-95 5.0L)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/125-602579.jpg^@^125-602579^@^

A-Sedan racers now have a legal aluminum cylinder head for their class as of 11/01/08. These Edlebrock heads are 356-T-6 castings with Manganese bronze valve guides.

Also features stainless steel one piece valves with hardened tips helicoil inserts for intake exhaust and rocker arm bolt holes and 5/8 machined deck thickness. Features a 60CC combustion chambers. 170CC intake ports and 1.94 intake/1.55 exhaust valves.

These heads are not emissions legal and are for A-sedan race purposes only. They do not contain EGR or air injection tube hookups.

Product Benefits

  • Lighter weight
  • SCCA legal
  • Better breathing
  • Easily indentified for tech inspection

Time to install: About 8 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Required

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Model(s): 5.0L V8 Cobra GT

@1229@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1229@^http://www.steeda.com/edelbrock-performer-mustang-aluminum-heads-125-60379/^@^Steeda^@^Edelbrock Performer Mustang Aluminum Heads (79-95 5.0L)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/125-60379.jpg^@^125-60379^@^

Steeda is proud to offer Edelbrock's 50 state street legal aluminum heads. These hot heads are machined from T356 aluminum alloy and come fully assembled with a three angle valve job 1.90 Intake / 1.60 exhaust stainless steel valves heavy duty valve springs retainers and keepers.

Edelbrock takes the extra step to CNC gasket match the intake and exhaust ports and hand smooth the valve bowls on every Performer head they sell. So your heads are ready to make horsepower right out of the box.

They are a direct bolt on with stock rockers and headers or most any aftermarket replacement. High flowing exhaust ports and .625"
column2:
thick deck surface make these heads great for cars with superchargers or nitrous oxide.

Product Benefits

  • 50 State Legal

Time to install: About 10 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Required

Tools needed: Shop Tools

column1: @1230@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1230@^http://www.steeda.com/edelbrock-mustang-intake-manifold-125-7123/^@^Steeda^@^Edelbrock Performer RPM II Mustang Intake Manifold (86-95)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/125-7123.jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/125-7123-1.jpg^@^125-7123^@^

Edelbrock's intake can free up 8-12 horsepower on a stock 5.0 and up to 30 horsepower on an engine with performance cylinder heads! Edelbrock really does their homework. These manifolds feature the best air distribution (most even air flow from cylinder to cylinder) of any manifold we've seen. The removable plenum cover gives you direct access to the intake runners for easy porting and polishing.

The Performer 5.0 is your choice for most daily-driven street cars which need a lot of mid-range torque and horsepower below 6000 rpm.

The Performer RPM is perfect for high rpm when combined with a rev-extender. The Performer RPM's shorter runners are also a great match for the high airflow needs of stroker motors and 351 conversions.

Time to install: About 12 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Required

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Model year(s): 1995 1994 1993 1992 1991 1990 1989 1988 1987 1986

Edelbrock EGR valve spacer plates provide excellent sealing integrity and conformability for easy installation and are made to the same exacting standards as every Edelbrock product. Our R&
column2:
D team made up of automotive enthusiasts are constantly thinking of new and innovative ways of making power and our EGR valve spacer plates are no exception.

They are tested a real world environment on state-of-the-art equipment and in test vehicles on the track for performance that's guaranteed.

These Edelbrock throttle body intake elbows are designed using the latest technology for unbeatable flow and performance. They adapt GM LS1 LS2 and Ford 5.0L based throttle bodies to EFI intake manifolds with a traditional square bore mounting flange. Edelbrock throttle body intake elbows are available in standard or box-style configurations to fit a wide variety of engine and hood combinations. Cast from high-quality aluminum the throttle body elbows feature several bore inlet sizes with your choice of natural or black powdercoated finishes.

Item Specs

  • Bore Diameter: 70mm
  • Height: Stock
  • Material: Aluminum

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/526-250-110-1.jpg^@^526-250-110^@^

Whether you are building a Cobra based race car want to give your 03-04 Cobra the Cobra R look or want to duplicate the look of our famous #20 race car Steeda's 2003-04 Cobra Splitter is the perfect functional aerodynamic add on.

Steeda's front Cobra R Style Front Splitter is designed to re direct airflow across the bottom of the front bumper to the outside edges instead of letting it flow underneath the vehicle.

This eliminates front end lift and creates down force at high speed. When combined with Steeda's functional rear wing you get a great looking and functional combination that provides balanced downforce at high speeds producing increased high speed grip and handling balance as well as high speed straight line stability.

Note: This front splitter is an add on designed firmly attach to your factory front bumper cover. Does not come painted.

Product Benefits

  • Easy Install
  • Looks great

Time to install: About 30 Minutes

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 2004 2003

Model(s): Cobra

Transmission(s): Manual

Get the same manifold from the Boss 302R race program for your 5.0L GT Mustang.

Made from lightweight composite materials. This short runner intake is designed to optimize flow at high RPM's for high RPM horsepower with minimal change in low end and mid range torque compared to stock.

Requires custom calibration after installation. Also requires additional parts available from your local Ford parts dealer for installation:

  • Ford Service Part # : CR3Z-9G297-A Hose (1 pc.)
  • Ford Service Part # : CR3Z-9G290-B Bracket (1 pc.)
  • Ford Service Part # : CR3Z-9J280-A Fuel Lines (1 pc.)
  • Ford Service Part # : W506974-S437 Screw M6x16mm (1 pc.)
  • Ford Service Part # : CR3Z-9B659-B Air Inlet Tube (1 pc.)

Product Benefits

  • Lightweight Composite Construction
  • Compatible with Steeda Cold Air Intake
  • High RPM Horsepower with minimal change in low and mid range torque

This Fuel cap also fits 2010 to 2014 Focus FusionFiesta and 2009 to 2014 F150 and F250.

Specifically for street driven and fully equipped race cars. Stock sized pulley included with pump. Installation is nearly identical to the factory pump and can be completed in 2-3 hours. Aftermarket underdrive pulley sets may require a shorter serpentine belt to be used. Wiring kit with relay recommended for street vehicles.

Meziere Relay Kit

Meziere's relay kit is recommended for all applications using an electric water pump. Using a relay when wiring your electric water pump can help save your existing wires from overloading and supply the pump with ample power. This kit is designed for Ford modular installs with cut to length wires but can be used with any electric pumps.

Product Benefits

  • 55 GPM standard flow rate
  • Free up over 11 rear wheel HP
  • Cooler running in slowing traffic conditions

This front and rear 2005-2014 Ford Racing Brake Upgrade Kit includes massive six-piston Brembo calipers and 15 inch 2-Piece front rotors.

The front calipers are gloss black powder-coated with white Brembo lettering. Rear calipers are single piston GT500 fare with huge 13.8 inch rotors. New axle mounting flanges are included in this rear brake upgrade so you will need a differential gasket and a couple of quarts of Royal Purple gear oil. You will also need to bleed your brakes after the install of this kit so you will need brake fluid as well.

Note Fits: Mustang GT (05-14) Mustang Boss (12-13) Mustang GT500 (13-14)

  • Better Stopping Power
  • Direct bolt on upgrade

@1251@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1251@^http://www.steeda.com/dba-t3-mustang-rotor-602-dba42124sl/^@^Steeda^@^DBA 4000 T3 Rotor - Front Left - 11-14 GT & 12-13 Boss w/ Brembos^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/602-dba42124sl_5zv2-lj.jpg^@^602-DBA42124SL^@^

This rotor is a direct replacement for 2011 &
column2:
newer Mustangs as well as 2012-2013 Boss Mustangs with Brembo's big brake kit.

The DBA 4000 Series T3 Rotor has a Tri-Symmetrical design for extreme stopping power on the road and the track and complement the looks of any performance car. As with every DBA rotor the 4000 Series T3 Rotor bolts right onto the vehicle with no mechanical changes needed.

DBA''s mid-series enhanced-performance slotted rotor features Thermal Stability Profiling (TSP) for improved heat handling and Thermo-Graphic paint markings for effective heat monitoring.

The 4000 Series T3 Rotor’s Tri-Symmetrical design dampens the vibration noise while providing a quieter more responsive and smoother brake pedal feel. Along with an increased number of out-gassing exit points for brake pad friction gases to escape T3 Rotors offer enhanced consistency and effectiveness with every stop. Manufactured to QS-9000 quality standards using premium grade materials with XG-150 high carbon alloyed iron and dense metal matrix the rotors are designed to provide long wear and safe consistent stopping power by responding to the TSP process that stabilizes the micro-structure of the rotor.

Product Benefits

  • Improved fatigue resistance to minimize surface cracking
  • Reduced rotor fatigue during prolonged heavy braking
  • Quick replacement minimal ''bedding-in'' of rotors

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 2014 2013 2012 2011

Model(s): GT Boss

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

DBA's mid-series enhanced performance rotor features Thermal Stability Profiling for improved heat handling. Thermo-Graphic paint markings on the rotor allot for effective heat monitoring when the painted lines change color you can see the temperature that the rotors have reached allowing you to accurately match the proper brake pad compound. With a precise array of tri-symmetrical 'T' slots the patented T3 design brings major performance and practical advantages to the motoring enthusiast.

These key features make this a great rotor for street use and the weekend warrior who demands the most out of their car on and off the track.

Note: Sold individually.

Product Benefits

  • Forged from XG150 high-carbon alloyed iron for greater thermal capacity
  • Painted hub fights off rust and corrosion for greater longevity and better curb appeal
  • Improved Braking Performance

Time to install: About 1 Hour

DBA T3 Rotors are built to stay cool under intense pressure. They're constructed from XG150 high-carbon alloyed iron for greater thermal capacity and high-heat stopping power. They also boast DBA's unique Kangaroo Paw venting system to speed up cooling time. DBA T3 Rotors are marked with a thermo-graphic heat paint so you can check their peak temps to stay on top of servicing.

DBA backs their rotors with a 12-month/12000-mile warranty.

Note: Sold individually.

Product Benefits

  • XG150 High Carbon Alloyed Iron
  • Thermo Stability Profiling/Stabilizes The Natural Rotor Stresses
  • Paint Protection On Non-Friction Areas

@1264@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1264@^http://www.steeda.com/dba-t3-mustang-rotor-602-dba42124sr/^@^Steeda^@^DBA 4000 T3 Rotor - Front Right - 11-14 GT & 12-13 Boss w/ Brembos^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/602-dba42124sr.jpg^@^602-DBA42124SR^@^

This rotor is a direct replacement for 2011 &
column2:
newer Mustangs as well as 2012-2013 Boss Mustangs with Brembo's big brake kit.

The DBA 4000 Series T3 Rotor has a Tri-Symmetrical design for extreme stopping power on the road and the track and complement the looks of any performance car. As with every DBA rotor the 4000 Series T3 Rotor bolts right onto the vehicle with no mechanical changes needed.

DBA''s mid-series enhanced-performance slotted rotor features Thermal Stability Profiling (TSP) for improved heat handling and Thermo-Graphic paint markings for effective heat monitoring.

The 4000 Series T3 Rotor’s Tri-Symmetrical design dampens the vibration noise while providing a quieter more responsive and smoother brake pedal feel. Along with an increased number of out-gassing exit points for brake pad friction gases to escape T3 Rotors offer enhanced consistency and effectiveness with every stop. Manufactured to QS-9000 quality standards using premium grade materials with XG-150 high carbon alloyed iron and dense metal matrix the rotors are designed to provide long wear and safe consistent stopping power by responding to the TSP process that stabilizes the micro-structure of the rotor.

Product Benefits

  • Improved fatigue resistance to minimize surface cracking
  • Reduced rotor fatigue during prolonged heavy braking
  • Quick replacement minimal ''bedding-in'' of rotors

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 2014 2013 2012 2011

Model(s): GT Boss

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

The XS rotors will feature black hubs instead of the more common gold hubswhich will make for a very aggressive look to match their performance.

These key features make this a great rotor for street use and the weekend warrior who demands the most out of their car on and off the track.

Note: Sold individually.

Vossen unveils the VFS-1 the newest addition to the VF/Series Manufactured with Advanced Flow Forming Technology.

The flow forming process maintains the integrity of the design while also improving the grain-structure of the aluminum creating a stronger lighter and considerably thinner forged-like rim barrel. Flow forming is the response to the market's demand for lightweight wheels that are more durable and enhance the overall vehicle driving experience.

The Vossen VFS1 Matte Graphite wheel will add an aggressive yet sophisticated look to your Mustang.

This 20x9 Vossen VFS1 Wheel fits the front of all 2005 to 2014 Mustangs. Stagger with 20x10.5 wheels on the rear for an aggressive muscle car stance.

column1: @1274@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1274@^http://www.steeda.com/vossen-cvt-silver-metallic-directional-mustang-wheel-19x10-05-14-passenger-side-819-cvt-9n46-r/^@^Steeda^@^Vossen CVT Silver Metallic Directional Mustang Wheel 19x10 (05-14) - Passenger Side^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/6/vossen-cvt-silver-metallic-directional-mustang-wheel.jpg

Introducing the CVT directional wheel from Vossen a unique approach to wheel design.

A true rarity in the industry due to its intricate construction investment and overall development the CVT is a considerable step forward in Vossen's already stellar line-up.

The CVT requires four molds rather than the typical one or two molds for standard cast wheels. As a result the wheels on the driver's side and passenger side of the vehicle twist towards the same direction.

The Vossen CVT Silver Metallic Gloss Finish wheel will add a unique and sophisticated look to your Mustang.

This 19x10 Vossen CVT wheel fits the rear of all 2005 to 2014 Mustangs. Stagger with 19x8.5 wheels on the front for an aggressive muscle car stance.

Product Benefits

  • Crafted using low pressure casting
  • Manufacturers limited 5 year warranty
  • Band and valve stem TPMS compatible
  • Brembo compatible

Add race inspired styling to your Mustang with a set of Vossen CV5 wheels. The Vossen CV5 features a five split spoke design with a concave face that exaggerates the profile of the wheel for an impressive appearance.

These Vossen wheels aggressively stand out with their Matte Graphite Machined finish covered with a durable satin clear coat that is tough enough to withstand the hazards of daily driving.

This 20x9 Vossen CV5 Wheel fits the front and rear of all 2005 to 2014 Mustangs. Stagger with 20x10.5 wheels on the rear for an aggressive muscle car stance.

  • Manufacturers limited 5 year warranty
  • Band and valve stem TPMS compatible

column1:
@1290@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1290@^http://www.steeda.com/auburn-mustang-differential-414-545005/^@^Steeda^@^Auburn ECTED Electrically Controlled Mustang Differential - 28 Spline (03-04 IRS)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/414-545005.jpg^@^414-545005^@^

Auburn's exciting new ECTED differential combines a limited slip differential with an electronic locking system for spool-like 100% locked performance. This is a first for the Mustang. All previous locking differentials acted as a an open differential when not locked. The Auburn ECTED gives you the performance advantage of a limited slip differential for everyday driving with the ability to lock the differential at any time for complete torque to both wheels. The electronic locking system can be engaged at any time and at any speed unlike other locking differentials that require you to stop to engage the locking mechanism.

This opens up a whole new world of possibilities. Not only can you engage the locker with a push of the button on the dash it can even be wired to a boost sensitive switch to automatically engage when a certain boost level is reached. Extremely strong made from aircraft quality 9310 heat treated billet steel the ECTED also contains no failure prone pins or shift forks to engage the locking mechanism. Auburn Gear provides a 1 year warranty and the ECTED is also backed by Auburn's exclusive D-REX 4 year replacement exchange program. 31 Spline available - Call for Info.

Product Benefits

  • Locked differential may be engaged any time
  • Limited slip diff performance at your fingertips
  • Programmable based on boost level!

Time to install: About 4 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Model year(s): 2004 2003

Model(s): Cobra

Transmission(s): Manual

  • Easy Bolt-In Installation
  • Deflective Disc Valving – Advanced Shock Technology Increased valving response control and consistency.
  • On-The-Car Valving Adjustment Gone are the days of removing shocks to adjust valving -- simply turn the knob.
  • 5/8” Centerless Ground Hard Chrome Plated Piston Rod Precision surface increased durability eliminates piston rod flex.
  • Machined Forged Aluminum Body Lightweight stronger than billet.
  • Bright Anodized Body Unmatched durability ease of maintenance show-winning appearance.
  • Three Step Sealing System Aerospace material. Exclusively engineered double lip seal with wiper eliminates seal drag and dirt intrusion.
  • 100% Dyno Tested and Serialized Assures consistency in production and performance.
  • Shock Mounting Hardware Bushing material exclusive to QA1 shocks for both upper and lower mounts. Mounting hardware is zinc or chrome plated for durability and professional appearance. Exclusive nylon race bearings for smooth bind-free operation. Also available with polyurethane bushings.
  • These shocks are revalveable and rebuildable by QA1 Authorized Service Centers

@1293@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1293@^http://www.steeda.com/qa1-79-95-mustang-k-member-338-mu2tk/^@^Steeda^@^QA1 Mustang Tubular K-Member - 79-95^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/338-mu2tk.jpg^@^338-MU2TK^@^

QA1's tubular K-members are designed from the ground up for weight savings improved geometry and as a bolt-in swap for the factory K-member in race applications. May alter wheel base and stance.

Bolt-In Design All mounting points have been digitally indexed from new factory K-members.

Weight Savings Up to 28 lbs. lighter than the factory K-members with increased strength by design.

Increased Header Clearance Header and oil pan clearance maximized for easier maintenance and installation.

Modular Design for Versatility Spring perches are removable for extra weight savings when using coil-over kits. Stock or aftermarket a-arms can be used.

Improved Geometry Bump steer anti-dive and Ackerman angles have been improved for maximum performance.

Time to install: About 3 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column1: @1294@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1294@^http://www.steeda.com/qa1-mustang-front-control-arms-338-mu1tca/^@^Steeda^@^QA1 Lightweight Mustang Front Control Arms - Rod Ends (79-93)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/338-mu1tca.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/8/338-mu2tca-2_x6l3-bz.jpg
column4:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/338-mu1tca-3.jpg^@^338-MU1TCA^@^

Tubular control arms reduce unsprung weight while improving weight distribution in race applications. QA1 tubular control arms require the use of QA1 coil-over struts and QA1 caster/camber plates.

Eco-Comp Control Arms

The Eco-Comp control arms are an economical choice in tubular arms for use on the strip. They are built with QA1's exclusive compressed rubber bushings and engineered for performance. The Eco Comp's offer value without sacrificing performance.
column5:
>Pro-Comp Control Arms

The QA1 Pro-Comp Control Arms are the ultimate in adjustability design and strength. These arms utilize QA1's exclusive XM series rod ends. These chrome moly heat-treated rod ends use QA1's exclusive Teflon®/Kevlar® lining for superior performance and durability. Included in the control arm kit are spacers to allow movement of the arms forward and rearward for the wheel base adjustment.

@1305@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1305@^http://www.steeda.com/tokico-d-spec-mustang-rear-shock-for-irs-cobra-99-04-578-de3751/^@^Steeda^@^Tokico D-Spec Mustang Rear Shock for IRS Cobra (99-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/6/tokico-d-spec-mustang-rear-shock-for-irs-cobra-99-04-578-de3751.jpg^@^578-DE3751^@^

This 1994-2004 Cobra Tokico D-Spec (Damping Specific) series shock has a sophisticated piston and valving design that provides an extremely wide range of adjustment. The large adjustment range makes the D-Spec struts and shocks a multi-use damper that can be used for virtually any style of driving. The D-Spec struts and shocks are suitable for street-driven cars autocrossing drag racing and road racing.

The D-Spec dampers have a unique variable-aperture bypass that is controlled by a single adjustment knob. Easily accessed at the top of each strut and shock the knob changes both rebound and compression damping simultaneously. Each damper comes with an instruction manual offering pointers on how to adjust them.

Product Benefits

  • Improves handling
  • Wide range of dampening rates
  • Externally adjustable

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 2004 2003 2002 2001 2000 1999

Model(s): Cobra

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

column14:
3.27) models available for high-performance racing applications
  • Robust transmission design with internal 3-rail shift system with cast iron shift forks
  • Tapered roller bearings on input output and counter shafts improve performance (reduced noise factor).
  • All gears and shafts made from special grade steel (ASTM 4615) that permits increased torque carrying capacity
  • Single-piece countershaft that better handles increased torque carrying capacity
  • Equipped with a high-performance short-throw billet aluminum shifter that isolates road noise while providing clean crisp shifts

    • .82 ratio is ideal for long straight-aways for high performance racing

column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/27-127030-1.jpg^@^27-127030^@^

Ford built a great car in the 2005-2010 S197 Mustang but with a little help from COMP Cams it can sound and perform like a real "
column3: hot rod&quot
column4: . The Thumpr Ford 3 Valve Cam Sets for 4.6L/5.4L Modular 3 Valve Engines deliver an aggressive &quot
column6: exhaust idle and generous power gains in the middle &amp
column7: upper rpm range. These cams will turn your naturally aspirated or blower-equipped Ford 3 valve engine into a performance machine with a minimum of installation difficulty
column8:
only requiring the addition of the COMP Cams® Cam Phaser Limiter Kit (#5449) and computer tuning. The COMP Cams® Cam Phaser Limiter Kit (#5449) safely modifies the factory variable cam timing (VCT) system allowing for the use of aggressive camshaft lobe technology without sacrificing the benefits of the VCT. Extensive testing of these new camshaft combinations has confirmed repeatable power gains of 25+ rear wheel horsepower with no sacrifices in long term durability.

427-127010 - THUMPER (PHASERS AND TUNING REQUIRED)

Great idle with excellent power. Good mid-range torque &
column9: power gains above 4500 rpm. Compatible with stock valve springs converter &amp
column12:
custom tuning.

427-127020 - MUTHA' THUMPR (PHASERS AND TUNING REQUIRED)

Very rough idle biggest cam for stock heads. Great power above 4900 rpm. Compatible with stock valve springs benefits from converter &
column14:
custom tuning.

427-127030 BIG MUTHA' THUMPR (PHASERS AND TUNING REQUIRED)

Extremely rough idle needs stroker motor and/or ported heads. Major hp gains to 6800 rpm. Best with 3.73+ gears &
column15: 2500 stall. Compatible with stock valve springs but requires cam phaser upgrade &amp
column16:
custom tuning.

427-5449 - PHASER LIMITERS

These limiter plates replace the factory back-plate on the cam phaser. They have posts which extend into the cam gear's control chambers limiting their movement to no more than 20 degrees. This gives more piston to valve clearance and lets you install bigger more powerful camshafts with safe piston to valve clearances. While keeping up to 20 degrees of movement available all the wide-open throttle benefits of the cam phasing are retained since the normal retard the cams see at wide-open throttle is only around 9 degrees.

Product Benefits

  • Delivers an aggressive “thumping” exhaust idle
  • Generous power gains in the middle &
column17:
upper rpm range
  • Aggressive camshaft lobe technology without sacrificing the benefits of the VCT

    • Time to install: About 10 Hours

    Level of difficulty: Tech Required

    Tools needed: Shop Tools

@1310@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1310@^http://www.steeda.com/comp-cams-vsr-mustang-cams-427-127350/^@^Steeda^@^Comp Cams VSR Camshafts - Stage 2/Blower Grind (05-10 GT/Bullitt)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/427-127350.jpg^@^427-127350^@^

For those hardcore enthusiasts looking to achieve substantial horsepower and torque increases and who aren't intimidated by having to upgrade their valve springs COMP Cams® offers a full line-up of XFI™ VSR (Valve Springs Required) Cam Sets for Ford 4.6L/5.4L Modular 3 Valve Engines that offer as much as 40 hp increases over stock levels. Available for both naturally aspirated and supercharged engines these cam sets are also available in two stages. Designed to work with the Ford variable cam timing (VCT) system these camshaft sets are direct replacements that bolt in without engine modification except the valve spring upgrade. By working with the VCT which is programmed to retard the camshaft timing at peak power COMP Cams® XFI™ VSR Cam Sets for Ford 4.6L/5.4L Modular 3 Valve Engines optimize both mid-range and high rpm performance.

427-127100 STAGE 1 SOHC

Excellent performance upgrade over stock. Solid power gains above 4400 rpm requires spring upgrade. Tuner recommended. Stock gears &
column2:
converter OK.

427-127150 - STAGE 1 BLOWER GRIND

Powerful mid rpm range cam for bolt-on blowers at stock boost levels. Solid power gains above 4400 rpm requires spring upgrade. Stock gears &
column3:
converter OK.

427-127300 - STAGE 2 SERIOUS STREET SOHC

Serious street cam noticeable idle. Solid power gains above 4600 rpm requires spring upgrade. Works with tuners tuning recommended. Best with 3.90 gears &
column4:
3000 stall.

427-127350 - STAGE 2 BLOWER GRIND

Mid to upper range cam for bolt-on blowers with high boost. Noticeable idle solid power gains above 4900 rpm requires spring upgrade. Best with 3000+ stall.

427-26113-24 - SPRINGS

With a .550"
column5:
maximum lift these Beehive™ Valve Springs were designed for Ford 4.6L and 5.4L Modular 2 and 3 Valve engines. COMP Cams® Beehive™ Valve Springs deliver increased valve train stability and a much lighter valve train. This is achieved with less spring pressure for better valve control and reduced weight of both the spring and retainer. The unique Beehive™ shape handles valve train stress more efficiently to eliminate damaging harmonics and increases high RPM horsepower and durability. The oval/multi-arc wire shape places the maximum area of the wire at the point of highest stress to handle valve train stress more efficiently and allow better heat dissipation for longer life. Because of the unique Beehive™ design the valve train can handle more RPM and more aggressive cam profiles.

427-26125 - SPRINGS FOR BLOWER GRIND

With a .650"
column6: maximum lift these Beehive™ Valve Springs were designed for Ford 4.6L and 5.4L Modular 2 &amp
column7:
3 Valve engines and Duramax applications. COMP Cams® Beehive™ Valve Springs deliver increased valve train stability and a much lighter valve train. This is achieved with less spring pressure for better valve control and reduced weight of both the spring and retainer. The unique Beehive™ shape handles valve train stress more efficiently to eliminate damaging harmonics and increases high RPM horsepower and durability. The oval/multi-arc wire shape places the maximum area of the wire at the point of highest stress to handle valve train stress more efficiently and allow better heat dissipation for longer life. Because of the unique Beehive™ design the valve train can handle more RPM and more aggressive cam profiles.

427-700-24 - STEEL RETAINERS

New valve springs with larger diameters require new retainers to handle the higher pressures developed by the springs. COMP Cams® steel retainers are the solution. Our steel retainers are precision machined from 4140 chromemoly and finished in black oxide. These precision retainers are specifically designed for positive location when combined with COMP Cams® high-quality valve springs. For superior strength and ultimate stability we offer our 10° retainers and our 10° valve locks.

Product Benefits

  • Offers as much as 40 hp increases over stock
  • Designed to work with the Ford variable cam timing (VCT) system
  • Direct replacements that bolt in without engine modification except the valve spring upgrade

Time to install: About 10 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Required

@1316@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1316@^http://www.steeda.com/comp-cams-fox-body-camshafts-427-127200/^@^Steeda^@^Comp Cams NSR Camshafts - Stage 2/Horsepower (79-95)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/427-127200.jpg^@^427-127200^@^

The COMP Cams XFI NSR (No Springs Required) Cam Sets for Ford 4.6L/5.4L Modular 3 Valve Engines are the first truly “drop-in installation” camshafts ever created for this popular application – striking the perfect balance of performance versus installation difficulty. Offered for both naturally aspirated and supercharger-equipped engines these cam sets require no additional computer re-tuning
column2:
however testing has shown that mild tuning can result in power gains even greater than the normal 25 rear wheel horsepower.

These camshafts are fully compatible with the factory variable cam timing (VCT) system and are designed to operate in the stock rpm range. The stage one cam set is designed to maximize mid-range power and torque while stage two maximizes top end horsepower.

Product Benefits

  • High quality billet construction
  • No tuning required
  • For both naturally aspirated and supercharged applications

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Model year(s): 1995 1994 1993 1992 1991 1990 1989 1988 1987 1986 1985 1984 1983 1982 1981 1980 1979

Model(s): 5.0L V8 GT

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

@1319@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1319@^http://www.steeda.com/comp-cams-vsr-mustang-cams-427-127100/^@^Steeda^@^Comp Cams VSR Camshafts - Stage 1/SOHC (05-10 GT/Bullitt)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/427-127100.jpg^@^427-127100^@^

For those hardcore enthusiasts looking to achieve substantial horsepower and torque increases and who aren't intimidated by having to upgrade their valve springs COMP Cams® offers a full line-up of XFI™ VSR (Valve Springs Required) Cam Sets for Ford 4.6L/5.4L Modular 3 Valve Engines that offer as much as 40 hp increases over stock levels. Available for both naturally aspirated and supercharged engines these cam sets are also available in two stages. Designed to work with the Ford variable cam timing (VCT) system these camshaft sets are direct replacements that bolt in without engine modification except the valve spring upgrade. By working with the VCT which is programmed to retard the camshaft timing at peak power COMP Cams® XFI™ VSR Cam Sets for Ford 4.6L/5.4L Modular 3 Valve Engines optimize both mid-range and high rpm performance.

427-127100 STAGE 1 SOHC

Excellent performance upgrade over stock. Solid power gains above 4400 rpm requires spring upgrade. Tuner recommended. Stock gears &
column2:
converter OK.

427-127150 - STAGE 1 BLOWER GRIND

Powerful mid rpm range cam for bolt-on blowers at stock boost levels. Solid power gains above 4400 rpm requires spring upgrade. Stock gears &
column3:
converter OK.

427-127300 - STAGE 2 SERIOUS STREET SOHC

Serious street cam noticeable idle. Solid power gains above 4600 rpm requires spring upgrade. Works with tuners tuning recommended. Best with 3.90 gears &
column4:
3000 stall.

427-127350 - STAGE 2 BLOWER GRIND

Mid to upper range cam for bolt-on blowers with high boost. Noticeable idle solid power gains above 4900 rpm requires spring upgrade. Best with 3000+ stall.

427-26113-24 - SPRINGS

With a .550"
column5:
maximum lift these Beehive™ Valve Springs were designed for Ford 4.6L and 5.4L Modular 2 and 3 Valve engines. COMP Cams® Beehive™ Valve Springs deliver increased valve train stability and a much lighter valve train. This is achieved with less spring pressure for better valve control and reduced weight of both the spring and retainer. The unique Beehive™ shape handles valve train stress more efficiently to eliminate damaging harmonics and increases high RPM horsepower and durability. The oval/multi-arc wire shape places the maximum area of the wire at the point of highest stress to handle valve train stress more efficiently and allow better heat dissipation for longer life. Because of the unique Beehive™ design the valve train can handle more RPM and more aggressive cam profiles.

427-26125 - SPRINGS FOR BLOWER GRIND

With a .650"
column6: maximum lift these Beehive™ Valve Springs were designed for Ford 4.6L and 5.4L Modular 2 &amp
column7:
3 Valve engines and Duramax applications. COMP Cams® Beehive™ Valve Springs deliver increased valve train stability and a much lighter valve train. This is achieved with less spring pressure for better valve control and reduced weight of both the spring and retainer. The unique Beehive™ shape handles valve train stress more efficiently to eliminate damaging harmonics and increases high RPM horsepower and durability. The oval/multi-arc wire shape places the maximum area of the wire at the point of highest stress to handle valve train stress more efficiently and allow better heat dissipation for longer life. Because of the unique Beehive™ design the valve train can handle more RPM and more aggressive cam profiles.

427-700-24 - STEEL RETAINERS

New valve springs with larger diameters require new retainers to handle the higher pressures developed by the springs. COMP Cams® steel retainers are the solution. Our steel retainers are precision machined from 4140 chromemoly and finished in black oxide. These precision retainers are specifically designed for positive location when combined with COMP Cams® high-quality valve springs. For superior strength and ultimate stability we offer our 10° retainers and our 10° valve locks.

Product Benefits

  • Offers as much as 40 hp increases over stock
  • Designed to work with the Ford variable cam timing (VCT) system
  • Direct replacements that bolt in without engine modification except the valve spring upgrade

Time to install: About 10 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Required

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Model year(s): 2010 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005

Model(s): Bullitt GT

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic
