column1: @1320@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1320@^http://www.steeda.com/comp-cams-mutha-thumpr-mustang-cams-427-127020/^@^Steeda^@^Comp Cams Mutha' Thumpr Camshafts (05-10 GT/Bullitt)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/427-127020.jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/427-127020-1.jpg^@^427-127020^@^

Ford built a great car in the 2005-2010 S197 Mustang but with a little help from COMP Cams it can sound and perform like a real "
column3: hot rod&quot
column4: . The Thumpr Ford 3 Valve Cam Sets for 4.6L/5.4L Modular 3 Valve Engines deliver an aggressive &quot
column6: exhaust idle and generous power gains in the middle &amp
column7: upper rpm range. These cams will turn your naturally aspirated or blower-equipped Ford 3 valve engine into a performance machine with a minimum of installation difficulty
column8:
only requiring the addition of the COMP Cams® Cam Phaser Limiter Kit (#5449) and computer tuning. The COMP Cams® Cam Phaser Limiter Kit (#5449) safely modifies the factory variable cam timing (VCT) system allowing for the use of aggressive camshaft lobe technology without sacrificing the benefits of the VCT. Extensive testing of these new camshaft combinations has confirmed repeatable power gains of 25+ rear wheel horsepower with no sacrifices in long term durability.

427-127010 - THUMPER (PHASERS AND TUNING REQUIRED)

Great idle with excellent power. Good mid-range torque &
column9: power gains above 4500 rpm. Compatible with stock valve springs converter &amp
column12:
custom tuning.

427-127020 - MUTHA' THUMPR (PHASERS AND TUNING REQUIRED)

Very rough idle biggest cam for stock heads. Great power above 4900 rpm. Compatible with stock valve springs benefits from converter &
column14:
custom tuning.

427-127030 BIG MUTHA' THUMPR (PHASERS AND TUNING REQUIRED)

Extremely rough idle needs stroker motor and/or ported heads. Major hp gains to 6800 rpm. Best with 3.73+ gears &
column15: 2500 stall. Compatible with stock valve springs but requires cam phaser upgrade &amp
column16:
custom tuning.

427-5449 - PHASER LIMITERS

These limiter plates replace the factory back-plate on the cam phaser. They have posts which extend into the cam gear's control chambers limiting their movement to no more than 20 degrees. This gives more piston to valve clearance and lets you install bigger more powerful camshafts with safe piston to valve clearances. While keeping up to 20 degrees of movement available all the wide-open throttle benefits of the cam phasing are retained since the normal retard the cams see at wide-open throttle is only around 9 degrees.

Product Benefits

  • Delivers an aggressive “thumping” exhaust idle
  • Generous power gains in the middle &
column17:
upper rpm range
  • Aggressive camshaft lobe technology without sacrificing the benefits of the VCT

    • Time to install: About 10 Hours

    Level of difficulty: Tech Required

    Tools needed: Shop Tools

For those hardcore enthusiasts looking to achieve substantial horsepower and torque increases and who aren't intimidated by having to upgrade their valve springs COMP Cams® offers a full line-up of XFI™ VSR (Valve Springs Required) Cam Sets for Ford 4.6L/5.4L Modular 3 Valve Engines that offer as much as 40 hp increases over stock levels. Available for both naturally aspirated and supercharged engines these cam sets are also available in two stages. Designed to work with the Ford variable cam timing (VCT) system these camshaft sets are direct replacements that bolt in without engine modification except the valve spring upgrade. By working with the VCT which is programmed to retard the camshaft timing at peak power COMP Cams® XFI™ VSR Cam Sets for Ford 4.6L/5.4L Modular 3 Valve Engines optimize both mid-range and high rpm performance.

427-127100 STAGE 1 SOHC

Excellent performance upgrade over stock. Solid power gains above 4400 rpm requires spring upgrade. Tuner recommended. Stock gears &
column2:
converter OK.

427-127150 - STAGE 1 BLOWER GRIND

Powerful mid rpm range cam for bolt-on blowers at stock boost levels. Solid power gains above 4400 rpm requires spring upgrade. Stock gears &
column3:
converter OK.

427-127300 - STAGE 2 SERIOUS STREET SOHC

Serious street cam noticeable idle. Solid power gains above 4600 rpm requires spring upgrade. Works with tuners tuning recommended. Best with 3.90 gears &
column4:
3000 stall.

427-127350 - STAGE 2 BLOWER GRIND

Mid to upper range cam for bolt-on blowers with high boost. Noticeable idle solid power gains above 4900 rpm requires spring upgrade. Best with 3000+ stall.

427-26113-24 - SPRINGS

With a .550"
column5:
maximum lift these Beehive™ Valve Springs were designed for Ford 4.6L and 5.4L Modular 2 and 3 Valve engines. COMP Cams® Beehive™ Valve Springs deliver increased valve train stability and a much lighter valve train. This is achieved with less spring pressure for better valve control and reduced weight of both the spring and retainer. The unique Beehive™ shape handles valve train stress more efficiently to eliminate damaging harmonics and increases high RPM horsepower and durability. The oval/multi-arc wire shape places the maximum area of the wire at the point of highest stress to handle valve train stress more efficiently and allow better heat dissipation for longer life. Because of the unique Beehive™ design the valve train can handle more RPM and more aggressive cam profiles.

427-26125 - SPRINGS FOR BLOWER GRIND

With a .650"
column6: maximum lift these Beehive™ Valve Springs were designed for Ford 4.6L and 5.4L Modular 2 &amp
column7:
3 Valve engines and Duramax applications. COMP Cams® Beehive™ Valve Springs deliver increased valve train stability and a much lighter valve train. This is achieved with less spring pressure for better valve control and reduced weight of both the spring and retainer. The unique Beehive™ shape handles valve train stress more efficiently to eliminate damaging harmonics and increases high RPM horsepower and durability. The oval/multi-arc wire shape places the maximum area of the wire at the point of highest stress to handle valve train stress more efficiently and allow better heat dissipation for longer life. Because of the unique Beehive™ design the valve train can handle more RPM and more aggressive cam profiles.

427-700-24 - STEEL RETAINERS

New valve springs with larger diameters require new retainers to handle the higher pressures developed by the springs. COMP Cams® steel retainers are the solution. Our steel retainers are precision machined from 4140 chromemoly and finished in black oxide. These precision retainers are specifically designed for positive location when combined with COMP Cams® high-quality valve springs. For superior strength and ultimate stability we offer our 10° retainers and our 10° valve locks.

Product Benefits

  • Offers as much as 40 hp increases over stock
  • Designed to work with the Ford variable cam timing (VCT) system
  • Direct replacements that bolt in without engine modification except the valve spring upgrade

Time to install: About 10 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Required

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Model year(s): 2010 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005

Model(s): Bullitt GT

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/427-127010-1.jpg^@^427-127010^@^

Ford built a great car in the 2005-2010 S197 Mustang but with a little help from COMP Cams it can sound and perform like a real "
column3: hot rod&quot
column4: . The Thumpr Ford 3 Valve Cam Sets for 4.6L/5.4L Modular 3 Valve Engines deliver an aggressive &quot
column6: exhaust idle and generous power gains in the middle &amp
column7: upper rpm range. These cams will turn your naturally aspirated or blower-equipped Ford 3 valve engine into a performance machine with a minimum of installation difficulty
column8:
only requiring the addition of the COMP Cams® Cam Phaser Limiter Kit (#5449) and computer tuning. The COMP Cams® Cam Phaser Limiter Kit (#5449) safely modifies the factory variable cam timing (VCT) system allowing for the use of aggressive camshaft lobe technology without sacrificing the benefits of the VCT. Extensive testing of these new camshaft combinations has confirmed repeatable power gains of 25+ rear wheel horsepower with no sacrifices in long term durability.

427-127010 - THUMPER (PHASERS AND TUNING REQUIRED)

Great idle with excellent power. Good mid-range torque &
column9: power gains above 4500 rpm. Compatible with stock valve springs converter &amp
column12:
custom tuning.

427-127020 - MUTHA' THUMPR (PHASERS AND TUNING REQUIRED)

Very rough idle biggest cam for stock heads. Great power above 4900 rpm. Compatible with stock valve springs benefits from converter &
column14:
custom tuning.

427-127030 BIG MUTHA' THUMPR (PHASERS AND TUNING REQUIRED)

Extremely rough idle needs stroker motor and/or ported heads. Major hp gains to 6800 rpm. Best with 3.73+ gears &
column15: 2500 stall. Compatible with stock valve springs but requires cam phaser upgrade &amp
column16:
custom tuning.

427-5449 - PHASER LIMITERS

These limiter plates replace the factory back-plate on the cam phaser. They have posts which extend into the cam gear's control chambers limiting their movement to no more than 20 degrees. This gives more piston to valve clearance and lets you install bigger more powerful camshafts with safe piston to valve clearances. While keeping up to 20 degrees of movement available all the wide-open throttle benefits of the cam phasing are retained since the normal retard the cams see at wide-open throttle is only around 9 degrees.

Product Benefits

  • Delivers an aggressive “thumping” exhaust idle
  • Generous power gains in the middle &
column17:
upper rpm range
  • Aggressive camshaft lobe technology without sacrificing the benefits of the VCT

    • Time to install: About 10 Hours

    Level of difficulty: Tech Required

    Tools needed: Shop Tools

Three different camshafts offered for each engine platform. These camshaft designs are targeted to improve horsepower torque or fuel efficiency. By decreasing pumping losses efficiency and performance are enhanced regardless of the camshaft selected.

427-102525 - Tri-Power Extreme (Fuel Economy)

SOHC-Optimized fuel mileage with good torque and horsepower. Programmer upgrade required.

427-102530 - Tri-Power Extreme (Torque)

SOHC-Exceptional torque with good horsepower and good fuel economy. Programmer upgrade required.

427-102535 - Tri-Power Extreme (Horsepower)

SOHC-Optimized combination for power &
column2:
torque with acceptable fuel economy for your daily driver or highway cruiser. Programmer upgrade required.

Important Considerations

  • Made for factory fuel injected engines
  • Best mileage gains require use of programmer

Product Benefits

  • Ability to select from three different platforms
  • Reduced pumping losses increase efficiency and performance
  • Optimize both low and high rpm performance.

4-Point Bolt-In Roll Bars

Our most popular Roll Bars! A stiff body structure is essential to great handling. Four point roll bars stiffen the structure of the car prolonging body life preventing squeaks and rattles and improving handling. Our street roll bars allow the rear seat and interior trim to remain in place and do not interfere with convertible tops.

4-Point Hatchback Bolt-In Roll Bar

For the total "
column3:
effect the rear legs of this Steeda roll bar bolt to the floor in your hatchback area rather than into the wheel wells. An easy 2-3 hour bolt-in installation with no cutting required.

Important Note: All roll bars made from DOM tubing. Rollbars come spray-painted black for corrosion protection only. Scratches will occur during shipping and are not covered under warranty. Customer is responsible for finish and painting of roll bar. This item does not qualify for free shipping. You will be contacted after your order with a shipping quote. Also since these roll bars are made to order any orders placed are non-refundable. Additional lead time is expected.

Product Benefits

  • High quality construction
  • Stiffen the structure of your car and improve handling
  • Easy installation with no cutting required

@1336@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1336@^http://www.steeda.com/airflow-research-mustang-aluminum-heads-251-1492/^@^Steeda^@^Airflow Research Mustang Aluminum Heads - 302/351/185cc (79-95 5.0L)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/251-1492.jpg^@^251-1492^@^

Aluminum heads reduce weight to improve handling and when they are precisely CNC machined from a billet blank by Airflow Research they make plenty of horsepower too. Choose from heads optimized for street or strip:

251-1472: 165cc / 60cc Combustion Chamber - CNC Street Ported

For the ultimate small block Ford street car you’ve got to use AFR’s all new 165cc emissions legal cylinder heads. Unlike some aftermarket heads AFR’s Ford head (CARB EO #250-3) fits all your stock components
column2:
no special parts are required! With 1.900 intake valves 1.600” exhaust valve and combustion chamber volumes of 58cc or 61cc and 69cc exhaust ports AFR’s new 165cc Ford head is perfect for 289 and 302 engines operating from idle to 6000 rpm. A 3/4” thick head deck makes the AFR head ideal for nitrous or blower applications. Will not accept rail rocker arms. Note: 1986 5.0L must have piston notched for clearance.

251-1492: 185cc Heads / 61cc Combust Chamber

If you need the world’s finest street/strip small block Ford head check out AFR’s all new 185cc intake port emissions legal (CARB EO #250-3) cylinder heads. With 2.020 intake valves 1.600” exhaust valves and 69cc exhaust ports AFR’s new 185cc Ford head is designed for 302-351 cid engines operating from 1500 rpm to 6500 rpm. A 3/4” thick head deck makes the AFR head ideal for nitrous or blower applications. Will not accept rail rocker arms. High flow 2.020 valves might require aftermarket pistons notched for valve clearance. Note: 1986 5.0L must have pistons notched for clearance.

Product Benefits

  • Lightweight aluminum construction

Time to install: About 10 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Required

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Model year(s): 1995 1994 1993 1992 1991 1990 1989 1988 1987 1986 1985 1984 1983 1982 1981 1980 1979

Model(s): 5.0L V8 Cobra GT

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

Fluidyne's heat exchanger for 2003/2004 Cobra Mustangs features 100% Aluminum no epoxy construction. Designed as a 2 row unit with large 1 inch tubes it has a much larger cooling surface area than the factory exchanger.

Larger cooling capacity than stock provides better discharge air cooling and less blower heat-soak under extended high-boost conditions. This results in more power due to the cooler intake charge. Great for cars with high boost supercharger pulley setups.

Direct bolt on installation using factory mounting brackets and hardware.

Our famous line of Steeda Tri-Ax shifters extends to the 6-speed family of Tremec Ford Spec T56 transmissions as well.

As you would come to expect from the Steeda Tri-Ax all of the patented features that have made our other Tri-Ax shifters the top selling shifter in the market are also part of the Tremec T56 model. From the ergonomically comfortable Tri-Ax® handle to the third gear assisting Offset preload mechanism. You can be sure this shifter will perform as you've come to expect a Tri-Ax® shifter to perform. Giving you no miss 3rd gear shifts short throws and a positive confident feel.

Note: This shifter fits 2003/04 Cobra's with OEM T-56 transmission and 1979-2004 Mustangs with AFTERMARKET TREMEC T56 conversion.

Note: Comes with free tube of silicone tubing.

@1354@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1354@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-sport-springs-555-8200/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Sport Springs (79-04 GT & V6)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-8200.jpg^@^555-8200^@^

Springs are the foundation of good handling. So start with the best. Our experience and expertise in high performance street and racing suspension systems is second to none. Put that experience to work for you. Steeda springs are all custom made to our specifications. Specifications that have been refined and improved through years of testing.

Steeda's performance lowering springs improve the overall handling of the by lowering the center of gravity and reducing body roll and pitching during braking. The reduced longitudinal pitch of the vehicle during heavy braking improves the overall braking efficiency. The higher rate of the front springs reduces the amount of load transferred to the front tires. This causes the load on all four tires to be more evenly distributed providing additional traction to the rear tires. The additional gain in rear traction can also improve brake performance and result in reduced braking distances.

The increase in spring rate also reduces body roll which improves handling and steering response. Reduced body roll also confines the suspension geometry to stay within parameters that enhance the tire contact patch relative to the road The result is improved vehicle cornering and handling. Higher cornering limits can be achieved as the built in understeer characteristics of the vehicle are reduced and provide for a more neutral handling platform.

All these benefits along with the excellent ride quality Steeda Sport springs are famous for. Steeda Sport Springs give you the best of both worlds. Performance and ride quality.

Steeda Springs are manufactured under these rigorous manufacturing certifications: QS-9000 &
column2:

@1363@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1363@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-whipple-supercharger-belt-drive-555-3359/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Whipple Supercharger Belt Drive - 13-15 PSI/Black Snout (05-10)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-3359.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3359-2.jpg
column5:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3359-4.jpg^@^555-3359^@^

Tired of belts slipping breaking or simply being thrown off your Whipple supercharged Mustang when pushing it to the limit? Those days are now over! Steeda’s Belt Drive System for Whipple Supercharger was designed to prevent any such belt problems that are all too common during competition or just hardcore use of your Mustang.

Steeda designed this belt drive package to relocate the supercharger drive off the factory 6-rib system making it a dedicated 10-rib belt system which drives the supercharger and nothing else. Removing the supercharger drive from the primary accessory drive serves to eliminate any and all slippage problems that can occur including both on the initial tip in and under full load. The standard accessories are driven by a Steeda underdrive pulley for even more power and reduced accessory load.

Our 10-rib system is available in boost levels of approximately 11psi to 17psi on a Gen 1 Whipple system and approximately 13 to 19psi on a Gen 2 Whipple system with no slippage under any conditions and no throwing or breakage of the supercharger belt.

The package includes a new supercharger snout billet pulleys billet mounting plates 2 new belts and a heavy-duty belt tensioner. Although we recommend a Steeda hood it only takes a minor modification to fit the system under your stock hood. Full installation instructions including to the procedure for measuring stock hood clearance are included.

Already own a Steeda Belt Drive and want to change boost levels? Take a look at our separate lower boost pulley kits.

Important Note: Stated boost levels are estimates only based on GEN 2 Whipple superchargers and will vary widely depending on numerous factors including but not limited to: Exhaust configuration cylinder heads port configuration camshafts geographic elevation engine compression throttle body size boost gauge accuracy and other factors beyond the control of Steeda Autosports. Use numbers provided for guidance only. In general cars with large cams cylinder heads etc will have slightly lower boost levels.

@1371@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1371@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-caster-camber-plates-555-8079-al/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Billet Mustang Caster Camber Plates - 79-89^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-8079-al.jpg^@^555-8079-AL^@^

Steeda aluminum caster camber plates dramatically improve your Mustangs handling with less weight &
column2:
more strength than steel!

Steeda's caster camber plates have always given you great adjustment range. Now we've added great style too with a new machined billet aluminum top plate that looks as good as it performs. But good looks aren't the only thing these plates have going for them. The beefy 1/2 inch thick aluminum plates are and an incredible 3 times more resistant to bending than our standard steel plates making them the perfect choice for coil-over equipped race cars that carry the entire front weight of the car through the caster camber plates.

Caster camber plates are essential for getting the most cornering performance out of your Mustang. The factory plates just don't have enough adjustment to give you a good performance alignment. Making matters worse the factory upper strut mount bushing is soft and flexible. During hard corners the strut literally pushes the bushing out of shape changing the alignment mid-corner. This reduces cornering grip and increases tire wear.

Steeda's Caster camber plates replace the flexible upper strut mount with a premium race quality stainless steel spherical bearing. The spherical bearing allows the strut to pivot and turn freely without the slightest bit of play or deflection. No matter how hard you corner the caster camber plate doesn't flex and your alignment stays where you set it.

Steeda plates give you slots to adjust Caster and Camber. Factory plates only let you adjust camber and even that has a very limited range. Steeda plates more-than-double the factory camber range allowing a perfect alignment for everything from drag cars to road racers to "
column3: slammed&quot
column4:
boulevard cruisers. Caster adjustment slots let you increase caster extra caster makes the car track straighter and provides better on-center steering feel. Increased caster allows you to run slightly more negative camber than factory spec on the street without increasing tire wear preserving tire life and improving handling. It also increases negative camber gain when the wheels are turned. In effect your tires lean into the corner as you turn the wheel improving the contact patch for better cornering grip. Increased caster will also improve your tire contact patch during braking for better stopping performance. Steeda Caster Camber Plates include recommended alignment settings for a variety of suspension setups and driving styles.

Strength &
column5:
Durability

  • Increase caster for better high-speed stability and better steering response
  • Correct camber for reduced tire wear and better cornering
  • Adjustable strut mount height for more suspension travel on lowered cars
  • Adjustable strut mount can be set to stock height which works better for drag racing than other plates which are too high and limit suspension extension at launch
  • Specific plates for 79-89 and 90-93 Mustangs fit better than generic "
column7:
offered by other aluminum plates
  • Spherical bearing for better alignment and durability
  • Teflon lined bearing never needs lubrication
  • Lighter than competing steel plates
  • Compatible with stock hoods and Steeda strut tower braces

not too tall like some plates

column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/555-8230-2.jpg^@^555-8230^@^

Steeda's SuperLite Drag Race Springs use a longer front coil that stores more energy to lift the front of the car during launch aiding body rotation to transfer more weight to the rear tires for increased traction. The right rear spring incorporates a progressive coil design that reduces the effect of axle torque reducing body roll and helping the right rear tire stay planted to the ground during launch. The spring rates are tuned for improved traction at the strip while maintaining good ride quality and acceptable handling on the street. Just like the name says Steeda SuperLite Drag Springs incorporate the latest manufacturing technology to reduce weight. They weigh 6 pounds less than comparable springs from Eibach or Ford Racing.

Ride height is about the same as stock springs. However because the springs are softer than stock ride height may be more affected by the weight of the vehicle than with factory springs. Full-weight street cars typically sit 1/4 to 1/2 inch lower than stock. Light weight race cars will sit a little higher.

High torque cars can further minimize axle torque induced body roll with an optional airbag kit (sold separately). Fine tuning the air pressure inside the airbag can help the car go straighter during launch.

Note: Does not fit 99-04 Cobra.

column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2501-2.jpg
column4:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2501-3.jpg^@^555-2501^@^

The Ultimate Rear Suspension For Your Mustang Steeda's 5-Link suspension system
column5: the ultimate rear suspension for your Mustang.The 5-Link is the ultimate no-compromises racing suspension. It provides maximum traction and cornering ability yet is very stable and forgiving at the limit.
column6:
>The 5-Link corrects the factory suspension's inefficient lateral axle control poor anti-squat geometry rear-steer problems and excessive pinion angle changes caused by the short angled upper control arms. The 5-Link's parallel 12" arms almost double the effective length of the 9" factory upper arms. The longer arms make the suspension more stable over bumps and through corners. Adjustable anti-squat (instant center) geometry lets you choose between 65% and 98% anti-squat for maximum traction and reduced brake dive.

The 5-Link's adjustable panhard bar (the lateral or "Fifth" link) corrects the high 16" factory roll center height with a roll center height that's adjustable from 8 to 12 inches. The unique sliding mechanism allows infinite adjustment increments for easy fine tuning of roll center height and cornering grip. The panhard bar is made from 4130 chrome-moly alloy steel for high strength and minimum weight. The 41" long panhard bar (the longest available) gives minimal lateral displacement and maximum stability.

The 5-Link is SCCA American Sedan legal. No parts hang below the differential avoiding the ground clearance problems found with torque arms. It requires use of side-exit or turn-down exhaust system; check out
column7: > Steeda's new side exit exhaust. Special high rate rear springs are recommended for road racing and standard Steeda sport or competition front springs should be used as well. For drag racing the 5-Link can be used with stock or drag springs. The 5 Link is the ultimate race track suspension.
column8: >Recommended Items to accompany 5-Link Suspension system (Fits 1979-2004 Mustangs):
column10: > front springs
column12: >STEEDA 5-LINK REAR SUSPENSION DESIGN ADVANTAGES
column13: >1. Optimal geometry for handling.
column14: >Adjustable anti-squat geometry for tuning rear bite and brake dive. See Picture C
column15: >Roll center height adjustable in infinite increments from 8" to 12" above the ground. See Picture B
column16:
>2. Easy adjustment. Allows for quick adjustment of panhard rod height in small increments to compensate for changing track conditions etc. See Picture B

3. 12" long upper arms provide improved pinion and U-joint angle control and more stable anti-squat/lift geometry throughout the suspension travel than the factory suspension. See Picture C

4. Very long panhard rod (41 inches) provides precise and effective lateral location of the axle with minimal lateral displacement
changes from suspension travel. See Picture A

5. Ground clearance and jack friendly installation with no components hanging below the axle. See Picture A

6. Easy to drive fast. Very controllable and forgiving at the limit. 7. Increased rear grip promotes even tire wear and tire temperatures front to rear.

8. Shorter Installation time The 5-link is not integrated into the sub-frame connectors which more popular brand of torque-arms are integrated into these connectors adding installation time.

9. Easier Adjustment of pinion angle The upper control arms in the 5-link are designed to easily set and adjust pinion angle. torque-arms present a challenge in setting the proper pinion angle which may require adjustable length lower control arms.
column17: >THE 5-LINK’S ADVANTAGES OVER A TORQUE ARM
column18: >1. Better anti-squat geometry than a torque arm less corner-exit understeer.
column19: >2. Torque arms have a short fixed-length side-view swing-arm making the car prone to wheel-hop during hard braking. In contrast the 5-Link's upper and lower links work together to create an instant center geometry which moves in response to suspension loads. During acceleration the instant-center moves rearward to counter the effects of chassis squat. During braking the instant center moves forward in response to chassis lift lengthening the side-view swing-arm to reduce the possibility of wheel hop that is likely to occur in a torque arm equipped Mustang.
column20: >3. Their torque arm with a panhard bar weighs 59 lbs. The 5-Link with a panhard bar is only 31.5 lbs.
column21: >4. Better ground clearance than a torque arm. No parts hang below the rear axle so you can easily fit a jack under the differential.
column22:
>5. No net weight gain when converting from a stock setup.

Time to install: About 6 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

@1380@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1380@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-1999-2001-cobra-mustang-sport-springs-223-fd001-45r/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Cobra Mustang Sport Springs (99-01 Cobra)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/223-fd001-45r.jpg^@^223-FD001-45R^@^

Springs are the foundation of good handling. So start with the best. Our experience and expertise in high performance street and racing suspension systems is second to none. Put that experience to work for you. Steeda springs are all custom made to our specifications. Specifications that have been refined and improved through years of testing.

Steeda's performance lowering springs improve the overall handling of the by lowering the center of gravity and reducing body roll and pitching during braking. The reduced longitudinal pitch of the vehicle during heavy braking improves the overall braking efficiency. The higher rate of the front springs reduces the amount of load transferred to the front tires. This causes the load on all four tires to be more evenly distributed providing additional traction to the rear tires. The additional gain in rear traction can also improve brake performance and result in reduced braking distances.

The increase in spring rate also reduces body roll which improves handling and steering response. Reduced body roll also confines the suspension geometry to stay within parameters that enhance the tire contact patch relative to the road The result is improved vehicle cornering and handling. Higher cornering limits can be achieved as the built in understeer characteristics of the vehicle are reduced and provide for a more neutral handling platform.

All these benefits along with the excellent ride quality Steeda Sport springs are famous for. Steeda Sport Springs give you the best of both worlds. Performance and ride quality.

Sport Springs

  • 79-04 Sport Springs lower the car 1” to 1 1/4”
  • Spring rates 650 lb front 250 lb rear
  • Big improvement in handling and looks
  • Maintains good ride quality
  • High quality high silicon content steel wire rides better than other brands with similar spring rates

2003-04 Cobra Sport Springs

  • 1.25"

Steeda's Caster Camber plates allow total adjustment of caster and camber for maximum handling or improved tire wear or a balance of both!

Dial in extra caster for straight line tracking and extra camber for tight cornering grip or set the car up for best tire wear. Full instructions are provided along with alignment suggestions to help set up your vehicle for street or track use.

Unlike some of our competitors who made a generic one size fits all plate to fit 79-93 we designed specific plates for 79-89 and 90-93 which have different unique strut towers. Our 94-04 plates have proven themselves since we designed them decades ago in IMSA and SCCA professional competition providing durability and a wide range of adjustment for both race and street use.

These plates are direct bolt on replacements and require no drilling for installation.

Strength &

right

race!

  • No interference with hoods or strut tower braces - a common problem with some other brands

Steeda's 4-Bolt Caster Camber plates allow total independent adjustment of caster and camber for maximum handling or improved tire wear or a balance of both!

Unlike our competitors 4-bolt plates this can be accomplished without having to disassemble the plates and swap parts from left to right. All our adjustments can be accomplished easily on the vehicle.

Durable machined aluminum upper plate construction and serviceable strut mount bearings encased in a one piece billet steel bearing plate provide precise alignments and extra long life.

Dial in extra caster for straight line tracking and extra camber for tight cornering grip or set the car up for best tire wear. Full instructions are provided along with alignment suggestions to help set up your vehicle for street or track use.

Our 4-bolt design is also ideal for coil over vehicles for superior strength and even load distribution across the strut tower.

US Patent #D494894

column2:

  • 4 bolts spread the load across the entire strut tower.

column1:
@1390@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1390@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-billet-mustang-anti-roll-bar-555-8131/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Billet Mustang Anti-Roll Bar - (05-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-8131_uiqa-wm.jpg^@^555-8131^@^

Steeda once again has taken it to the next level with their brand new Hardcore Billet Anti-Roll-Bar for the S197 Mustangs! Keep your car flat and rear tires planted for faster and more consistent 60 foot times!!

Unlike the competition Steeda thought of the true Hardcore enthusiast when their in-house engineer team designed this beast. End mounting plates are made from super strong and light weight Billet aluminum. While some of the aftermarket kits are not designed for racers they use urethane bushings to control the pivoting of the anti-roll-bar and use clamped-on endlinks.

Steeda on the other hand designed this kit to use full rollerized bearings instead of bushings that can wear out or bind and endlinks that are fully Tig welded into place so there is no chance of them moving and slipping.

All mounting hardware is included and features rod ends and mounting tabs for both the axle and rear frame rails. This kit can easily be unbolted and swapped out for your corner hugging swaybar instead or you can simply unbolt one of the endlinks so it can be run on the street.

Steeda once again has raised the bar for others to follow! Since it’s made by Steeda it’s also backed by our Life Time Warranty!

Note: Requires welding.

Product Benefits

  • Engineered to be better then all other kits on the market today!
  • Lower 60 foot times at the Track!
  • More Traction with Flatter and Straighter Launches

Time to install: About 2 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

@1398@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1398@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-front-competition-mustang-springs-121-4540-001/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Competition Mustang Springs - Front Only (79-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/121-4540-001.jpg^@^121-4540-001^@^

Springs are the foundation of good handling. So start with the best. Our experience and expertise in high performance street and racing suspension systems is second to none. Put that experience to work for you. Steeda springs are all custom made to our specifications- specifications that have been refined and improved through years of testing.

Steeda's performance lowering springs improve the overall handling of the 2003 Cobra by lowering the center of gravity and reducing body roll and pitching motion. The reduced longitudinal pitch of the vehicle during heavy braking due to the optimized spring calibration improves the overall braking efficiency. The higher rate of the front springs reduces the amount of load transferred to the front tires. This causes the load on all four tires to be more evenly distributed providing additional traction to the rear tires. The additional gain in rear traction usually results in reduced braking distances.

The proportionate increase in spring rate also reduces body roll which limits adverse suspension movement. This confines the suspension geometry to stay within parameters that enhance the tires contact patch relative to the road The result is improved vehicle cornering and handling because front and rear tire loading is more evenly distributed. Therefore higher cornering limits can be achieved because the built in understeer characteristics are reduced and provide for a more neutral yet safe vehicle.

Competition Springs

  • Lowers the car approximately 11/4”
  • Ultimate handling with a street-able ride
  • Slightly firmer ride than Sport Springs
  • O.E. on Steeda’s 5th Anniversary Mustangs

Full Competition Springs

  • Approximate 1-1/4"

@1399@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1399@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-caster-camber-plates-555-8094-3/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Caster Camber Plates (94-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-8094-3.jpg^@^555-8094-3^@^

Steeda's Caster Camber plates allow total adjustment of caster and camber for maximum handling or improved tire wear or a balance of both!

Dial in extra caster for straight line tracking and extra camber for tight cornering grip or set the car up for best tire wear. Full instructions are provided along with alignment suggestions to help set up your vehicle for street or track use.

Unlike some of our competitors who made a generic one size fits all plate to fit 79-93 we designed specific plates for 79-89 and 90-93 which have different unique strut towers. Our 94-04 plates have proven themselves since we designed them decades ago in IMSA and SCCA professional competition providing durability and a wide range of adjustment for both race and street use.

These plates are direct bolt on replacements and require no drilling for installation.

Strength &

Don't be fooled by imitators! Steeda's Aluminum lower rear control arms are the only ones that use our exclusive three part variable rate bushings to eliminate suspension bind and control noise and vibration while planting your tires to the pavement.

Note: Does not fit 1999-2004 Cobra

  • The 4500 series is best for street cars road racing and occasional drag strip use.
  • The 4600 series is best for drag racers who consistently see 60 foot times of 1.65 or better and for heavy (3500+lb) street and road race cars with more than 400 rear wheel horsepower.

  • 1/2 the weight of the competition’s control arms

Steeda's Cobra R style front splitter for your 99-01 Cobra looks great and gives you the aerodynamic benefits made famous by Ford's 2000 Cobra R.

Our front Cobra R Style Front Splitter for is designed to redirect airflow across the bottom of the front bumper to the outside edges instead of letting it flow underneath the vehicle.

This eliminates front end lift and creates down force at high speed. When combined with Steeda's functional rear wing you get a great looking and functional combination that provides balanced downforce at high speeds producing increased high speed grip and handling balance as well as high speed straight line stability.

Note: This front splitter is an add on designed firmly attach to your factory front bumper cover. Does not come painted.

One of Steeda's hottest selling parts our front splitter is now available for the 2010 Mustang GT through 2012 5.0L.

Like our splitters from previous models our 2010 Mustang GT splitter redirects airflow across the lower front bumper to the sides instead of letting it flow underneath the vehicle which creates downforce and eliminates the high speed front end lift associated with the air flowing underneath the car putting more weight down on the front tires.

This design also re directs some of the airflow into the lower grille opening for improved cooling airflow into the radiator.

Designed to be a direct bolt on to the lower front bumper of 2010 Mustang GT models. Piece comes unpainted.

Product Benefits

  • Direct bolt on installation
  • Creates downforce at high speed
  • Improves cooling airflow into lower grille opening

Time to install: About 30 Minutes

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

These high quality c-pillar inserts are designed to match your charcoal OEM interior perfectly for a seamless look.

Installing a set of CDC Interior Quarter Window Louvers to your Mustang is easy. Clean the glass with the included alcohol wipe peel the backing off of the 3M tape and apply the inserts.

Classic Design Concepts created this replacement Hood Strut Kit as a classy clean alternative to the standard rod. CDC's Hood Struts are gas-charged and make it markedly easier to get your hood open and closed while providing more room for maintenance and showing off all of your Mustang performance parts at car shows and other events.

These CDC Hood Struts are extremely easy to install and simply bolt on to your Mustang's stock hood without any modifications or drilling. Each of the brackets included in this kit are laser-cut to ensure perfect fitment every time. Each of these CDC hood strut kits comes with installation hardware and instructions. Fits The Following Models: 2005-2014 Ford Mustang V6/V8.

Please note: Aftermarket Hoods - Modifications may be required for some aftermarket hoods. These CDC Hood Struts may not be able to support heavy aftermarket hoods in the open position. Lightweight hoods may be bowed slightly near the brackets and won't make flush contact with your fenders.

@1425@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1425@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-adjustable-camber-bolts-271-81280/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Strut Camber Adjustment Bolts - 79-04^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/271-81280.jpg^@^271-81280^@^

Mustangs with aftermarket parts that alter the front suspension geometry sometimes need more camber adjustment than can be done with typical caster camber plates. This is especially true on older (79-93) Mustangs with a combination later model spindles X2 balljoints and/or Cobra R brake kits.

Sometimes there just isn't enough room in the strut tower for a camber plate to make all the adjustment you need. These Camber Bolts increase camber-range up to 1 degree by allowing you to adjust the angle that the front spindle attaches to the strut. Sold in pairs. 1 pair adjusts both from struts.

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/382/detailed/3/555-3354-4.jpg^@^555-3354^@^

Steeda's Adjustable Blower Belt Tensioner for Shelby GT500 creates more belt wrap around blower pulley for less belt slip with smaller pulleys and higher boost applications.

Rather than just being a stationary idler with zero adjustment like competitors designs Steeda's kit is a true adjustable tensioner allowing you to set the proper tension regardless of pulley size.

In addition one single part number will fit every blower design out there from the stock blower Ford Racing TVS Vortech Lyschholm and Whipple 2.9 and 3.4L designs this tensioner fits them all!

Includes a billet aluminum pulley all hardware and bracket to mount to engine. Installation is a bolt on installation with no modifications of any kind required.

Product Benefits

  • Made from Billet aluminum for strength and light weight
  • Easily adjustable for proper tension
  • Easy Installation
  • High grade sealed ball bearing design

Time to install: About 45 Minutes

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Steeda's strut mount covers are the perfect addition to any engine bay. It's designed to fit over the top of the strut on V6 and GT model Mustangs with stock or aftermarket fixed valve struts (will not work with Tokico D-specs).

Made from billet 6061 aluminum it is a great dress up item that’s available with or without the Steeda logo. Steeda went the extra mile to include this kit with o-rings to prevent it from rubbing on the top of the strut tower and removing paint.

NOTE: Strut Covers pictured to the right installed with optional Steeda Billet Strut Nut Covers. Does not fit GT500.

@1440@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1440@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-billet-mustang-charge-motion-plates-555-3125/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Billet Mustang Charge Motion Control Plates (05-08)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-3125.jpg^@^555-3125^@^

Steeda's patented CNC machined billet charge motion plates are a superior upgrade for your Mustang. As used on Steeda's Q335 Mustangs Steeda's plates are .070 larger than the OE plates and are a better port match to the intake manifold and cylinder heads than the original plates reducing turbulence and improving airflow in the intake path for more horsepower and torque!

Beautifully CNC'd machined out of 6061-T6 aluminum for superior strength and light weight. Steeda's charge motion plates are available with tapped nitrous fitting holes for custom nitrous applications. Steeda's charge motion plates require computer recalibration for use. Once tuned charge motion plates will not sacrifice any low-end torque and provide mid-range and upper RPM horsepower and torque increases. Peak increases of 10 horsepower or more have been seen on naturally aspirated applications larger gains possible on supercharged engines.

Bolt them on now and maximize your power curve today!

Note: As of the 2009 model year Ford now molds the charge motion plates into the stock intake manifold so they are not changeable.

Product Benefits

  • Increase of 10 hp!
  • Improves torque mid-range and upper RPM power
  • Installs using hand tools
  • Larger ports for better airflow!
  • Bolts directly in place of factory plates
  • US Patented CNC 6061-T6 billet aluminum construction

Time to install: About 3 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column1: @1441@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1441@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-whipple-supercharger-belt-drive-555-3352/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Whipple Supercharger Belt Drive - 11-13 PSI/Black Snout (05-10)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-3352.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3352-2.jpg
column5:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3352-4.jpg^@^555-3352^@^

Tired of belts slipping breaking or simply being thrown off your Whipple supercharged Mustang when pushing it to the limit? Those days are now over! Steeda’s Belt Drive System for Whipple Supercharger was designed to prevent any such belt problems that are all too common during competition or just hardcore use of your Mustang.

Steeda designed this belt drive package to relocate the supercharger drive off the factory 6-rib system making it a dedicated 10-rib belt system which drives the supercharger and nothing else. Removing the supercharger drive from the primary accessory drive serves to eliminate any and all slippage problems that can occur including both on the initial tip in and under full load. The standard accessories are driven by a Steeda underdrive pulley for even more power and reduced accessory load.

Our 10-rib system is available in boost levels of approximately 11psi to 17psi on a Gen 1 Whipple system and approximately 13 to 19psi on a Gen 2 Whipple system with no slippage under any conditions and no throwing or breakage of the supercharger belt.

The package includes a new supercharger snout billet pulleys billet mounting plates 2 new belts and a heavy-duty belt tensioner. Although we recommend a Steeda hood it only takes a minor modification to fit the system under your stock hood. Full installation instructions including to the procedure for measuring stock hood clearance are included.

Already own a Steeda Belt Drive and want to change boost levels? Take a look at our separate lower boost pulley kits.

Important Note: Stated boost levels are estimates only based on GEN 2 Whipple superchargers and will vary widely depending on numerous factors including but not limited to: Exhaust configuration cylinder heads port configuration camshafts geographic elevation engine compression throttle body size boost gauge accuracy and other factors beyond the control of Steeda Autosports. Use numbers provided for guidance only. In general cars with large cams cylinder heads etc will have slightly lower boost levels.
column6:
>

Product Benefits

  • Multiple Boost Levels available
  • Eliminates belt breakage
  • Fits under stock hood (with minor modification)
  • More power to the ground

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

BBK'S 85MM throttle body for the 2011-14 5.0L Mustangs is a direct bolt on replacement that does not require any custom tuning so it is a plug and play installation.

BBK 2011-13 5.0L throttle bodies are CNC machined from high quality 356 aluminum castings to ensure OEM quality and a perfect fit. Features like OEM die stamped throttle linkages double sealed bearings and o ringed throttle shafts.

@1445@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1445@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-automatic-mustang-power-pack-555-3936/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Ultimate Induction Pack - Automatic GT (11-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-3934_12.37.54_PM.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/x4_cpwd-8y.jpg^@^555-3936^@^

Steeda's ProFlow Cold Air Intake on an otherwise stock 2011 and up 5.0L Mustang has achieved a blistering 1/4 mile time of 11.96 at over 115mph! Steeda was the first manufacturer to get into the 11.90 range on a radial tire. Competitors had to use slicks to keep up.

Steeda Autosports the world's largest aftermarket manufacturer of Ford performance equipment is once again leading the performance market with our High Velocity Cold Air Intake (CAI) and SCT custom tuning device package.

This intake/tuning package called our Ultimate Induction Pack combines our High Velocity Cold Air Intake with an SCT X4 tuning device for the ultimate easy to install power upgrade.

The high velocity CAI in this package effectively opens up the intake system of Ford's new five-liter power plant and allows it to breathe much more freely than the stock intake system allows - taking your 2011 and up 5.0L Mustang to the next level of performance.

To ensure the densest air charge possible we retained the factory cold air feed ducting from the front bumper and sealed the stainless steel shield to the hood to prevent any hot air from being sucked in from around the engine compartment. Other manufacturers have chosen to ignore the factory cold air ducting which is key to keeping the lowest air charge temperatures possible. Steeda was the first company to do this starting in 2010 with our 2010 GT intake and have carried this innovation over to the 2011 model.

Also a billet aluminum velocity stack and high flow air filter ensure a clean cool streamlined air charge straight to the engine. The new high flow "
column5:
intake tube provides the necessary ports to retain the factory noise tube and PCV tubes.

This Cold Air Intake is so effective at improving airflow into the five-liter engine that a performance tune is not just recommended it is required for maximum performance!

Combined with the required custom tune using the industry leading SCT X4 Flash Programming Device we have achieved dramatic power increases of up to 44hp and 52ft/lbs of torque!

SCT Tuning is the leader in the Ford tuning industry and Steeda's partner in developing this powerful package.

"
column6: SCT has seen the highest horsepower and torque results while using Steeda's Cold Air Kit over any other brand."
column7:
- Chris Johnson President of SCT Tuning

Our power increase it not just a peak number at one point in the band. The actual power increase is spread throughout the entire rpm range so your increased performance is available on demand in any gear at virtually any rpm!

Note: requires a minimum of 91 octane fuel for power gains.

Warning: This part has been designed and is intended for off-road application only. Installation of this part on a vehicle that is driven on public roads may violate U.S. and Canadian laws and regulations.

Lifetime Tune Program: Purchasing this Steeda Power Package automatically registers you into Steeda's Lifetime Tune Program at no extra cost! To learn more about Steeda's Lifetime Tune Program click here.

Product Benefits

  • Greatly increased horsepower and torque! Up to 44hp &
column8:

  • Best designed/engineered intake on the market
  • Retains factory cold air inlet ducting - critical to keeping temps down
  • Easy installation

*Peak gains in excess of 50 hp!*

Ford Racing's 5.0L Boss Intake Manifold paired with Steeda's proven high flow cold air intake system and custom SCT tuning produce awesome usable top end horsepower gains without sacrificing overall torque vs a stock Mustang GT.

The resulting power increase gives you fierce acceleration while preserving smooth driveability and control during part throttle everyday use.

Road racers will appreciate the linear smooth torque curve allowing for more consistent corner exit. Drag racers and road racers alike will appreciate the top end horsepower for excellent 1/4 mile performance in drag racing and hard acceleration on long straights on road courses.

Expect peak power gains in excess 50 horsepower over a stock GT on stock exhaust but peak gains don't tell the whole story. With the Boss intake top end power never falls off giving you a car that just keeps pulling hard shift after shift. It is an intoxicating feeling you will enjoy over and over again.

Besides the parts in this package you will need the following parts from your local Ford dealer for a complete installation. Drag racers and road racers alike will appreciate the top end horsepower for excellent 1/4 mile performance in drag racing and hard acceleration on long straights on road courses.

column1: @1451@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1451@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-whipple-supercharger-belt-drive-555-3350/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Whipple Supercharger Belt Drive - 15-17 PSI/Black Snout (05-10)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-3350.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3350-2.jpg
column5:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3350-4.jpg^@^555-3350^@^

Tired of belts slipping breaking or simply being thrown off your Whipple supercharged Mustang when pushing it to the limit? Those days are now over! Steeda’s Belt Drive System for Whipple Supercharger was designed to prevent any such belt problems that are all too common during competition or just hardcore use of your Mustang.

Steeda designed this belt drive package to relocate the supercharger drive off the factory 6-rib system making it a dedicated 10-rib belt system which drives the supercharger and nothing else. Removing the supercharger drive from the primary accessory drive serves to eliminate any and all slippage problems that can occur including both on the initial tip in and under full load. The standard accessories are driven by a Steeda underdrive pulley for even more power and reduced accessory load.

Our 10-rib system is available in boost levels of approximately 11psi to 17psi on a Gen 1 Whipple system and approximately 13 to 19psi on a Gen 2 Whipple system with no slippage under any conditions and no throwing or breakage of the supercharger belt.

The package includes a new supercharger snout billet pulleys billet mounting plates 2 new belts and a heavy-duty belt tensioner. Although we recommend a Steeda hood it only takes a minor modification to fit the system under your stock hood. Full installation instructions including to the procedure for measuring stock hood clearance are included.

Already own a Steeda Belt Drive and want to change boost levels? Take a look at our separate lower boost pulley kits.


Important Note: Stated boost levels are estimates only based on GEN 2 Whipple superchargers and will vary widely depending on numerous factors including but not limited to: Exhaust configuration cylinder heads port configuration camshafts geographic elevation engine compression throttle body size boost gauge accuracy and other factors beyond the control of Steeda Autosports. Use numbers provided for guidance only. In general cars with large cams cylinder heads etc will have slightly lower boost levels.
column6:
>

Product Benefits

  • Multiple Boost Levels available
  • Eliminates belt breakage
  • Fits under stock hood (with minor modification)
  • More power to the ground

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column1: @1459@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1459@^http://www.steeda.com/mustang-gt500-cold-air-intake-555-3165/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Cold Air Intake - Plastic Intake (10-12 GT500)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-3165.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3165-2.jpg
column8:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/405/detailed/3/555-3165-7.jpg^@^555-3165^@^

With the 2010-2012 GT500 Mustang Ford took this car to a level never seen before at the O.E. level. Just like the 2011+ 5.0L Mustangs Ford put an outstanding air intake system on these cars giving the customer an extremely high level of performance and capability right from the showroom floor.

We have taken that a step further with our new ProFlow Cold Air Intake for the 2010 and Up GT500. Designed tested and assembled all in-house. This kit completely replaces the factory intake assembly. This kit is specifically designed to utilize the factory cold air feed from the grille and incorporates a serviceable high flow air filter an injection molded velocity stack black powder-coated heat shield and our high flow ProFlow intake tube.

With a large 114mm mass air flow pipe we achieved a substantial increase in air flow at all engine rpm's not just at redline. The heat shield seals to the hood liner and also keeps the factory cold air feed duct keep out all hot engine bay air for maximum power.

This GT500 cold air intake is so effective at improving airflow into the 5.4L supercharged engine that a performance tune is required for maximum performance and drivability. This intake will not work with the factory ECU calibration.

In an effort to maximize performance and provide our customers with only the very best products we have partnered with the leader in automotive tuning - SCT Performance.

Combined with the required custom tune using an SCT X4 Flash programming device we have achieved power increases of up to 36hp and 39ft/lbs of torque!

Breaking down the powerband peak to peak gains of 32 horsepower were achieved with point to point max gains of 36 horsepower. Peak to peak torque gains were 32ft/lbs of torque with point to point max gains of as much as 39ft/lbs!

Power gains were achieved over the entire RPM range. More power and improved throttle response is available everywhere at any time when you need it.

If you already own a tuning device you can purchase the cold air intake by itself here or for a complete package with the required custom tuning check out our Power Packs.

Our easy to install kit comes with premium hardware silicone sleeves and installation instructions.

Product Benefits

  • Utilizes the factory cold air feed duct from the grille for low air charge temperatures
  • Beautiful gloss black powder-coated heat shield
  • ProFlow roto molded intake tube offers minimal heat soak maintaining cool air charge temps
  • Up to 36hp and 39ft/lbs of torque on an otherwise stock car

Read more about the advantages in Steeda Mustang Cold Air Intakes over the competitors on our blog: http://www.steedablog.com/2012/03/mustang-cold-air-intake-truth/

Ford Racing's Performance Intercooler upgrade for GT500's fits 2007 through 2013 GT500s with 5.4L and 5.8L engines.

Designed and engineered by Ford Motor Company for the 662 horsepower 2013 GT500 this intercooler is an excellent upgrade that was designed to offer less restriction and more efficient heat extraction that the standard intercooler found in 2007-12 GT500 and Cobra Jet models helping support higher horsepower while keeping cooler air charge temperatures.

Combined with any of the upgraded heat exchangers we offer you can count on cooler air charge temperatures for more horsepower and more consistent performance.

Features lightweight aluminum construction and includes necessary gaskets and inlet/outlet o-rings.

Product Benefits

  • Direct fit for 2007-2012 GT500 and Cobra Jet models
  • Engineered and designed by Ford Motor Company
  • Less restriction and improved cooling for improved performance
  • Higher horsepower cooling capacity

Looks great and matches with the rest of our line of underhood dress up items.

Includes hardware for installation.

Steeda's Pro-Flow Inlet Elbow was designed specifically for our very popular S197 Mustang Cold Air Intake.

The Pro-Flow intake tube is available in a high temperature heat resistant plastic or available in real carbon fiber.

The high quality construction allows for colder air induction system temperatures resulting in less heat soak and lower air charge temperatures than competitive brands using metal tubes.

We have seen gains up to 8 horsepower and 8 ft lbs of torque to the tires throughout the entire power-band!!!

No additional tune is needed for this kit if you are already using a Steeda cold air intake with SCT or Diablo tuning package and installation is quick and simple. This kit includes gloss blue or black 4 ply silicone hose connectors stainless steel hose clamps and instructions.

555-3141 - Black Silicone Hose Upgrade

This Black Silicone upgrade kit is designed for the S197 GT Mustangs. You can replace the blue hoses with these black ones to match your car better! Fit's Steeda CAI for GT S197's (555-3130 &
column5:

Note: Will work with FRPP intakes but will require retuning if using FRPP's tune with one of our SCT tuners.

  • Easily installs in minutes and Looks great!
  • Smooths incoming air for more Horsepower and Torque to the rear tires!
  • Perfect upgrade to your Steeda or Ford Racing Cold Air Intake Kit.

The BBK Cold Air Intake kit completely replaces your 1986-1993 5.0 mustangs restrictive stock factory air box and paper filter with a high flow BBK filter assembly for a noticeable increase in horsepower and acceleration while providing filtration of harmful power robbing dust particles. The BBK CAI pulls cooler denser air from inside the fender well to make more power you can feel.

BBK designed the air filter to be reusable. So no need to go out and buy a new filter every few thousand miles. Just clean the filter re-oil it save money and go!

The BBK CAI not only Improves Horsepower and Acceleration but improves your mustangs under hood appearance with a strikingly beautiful chrome finish. You'll be sure to win all the car shows with this jewel under the hood.

The BBK Cold Air Intake kit is relatively easy to install with basic hand tools. No extra modifications are required for the installation. See the video below for an overview of the installation process.

This BBK Cold Air Intake is designed as a direct fit replacement for the 1989 to 1993 5.0L V8 Mustangs and for the 1986 to 1988 Mustang owners that do not have the factory MAF just pick up the BBK Speed Density CAI Adapter Kit for a perfect fit!Fits 1986-1988 with optional Speed Density Adapter available above or with Mass Air Conversion.

Product Benefits

  • 10-14 hp increase
  • Chrome finish improves looks
  • Reusable Filter

http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3138-3.jpg^@^555-3138^@^

Steeda's Pro-Flow Inlet Elbow was designed specifically for our very popular S197 Mustang Cold Air Intake.

The Pro-Flow intake tube is available in a high temperature heat resistant plastic or available in real carbon fiber.

The high quality construction allows for colder air induction system temperatures resulting in less heat soak and lower air charge temperatures than competitive brands using metal tubes.

We have seen gains up to 8 horsepower and 8 ft lbs of torque to the tires throughout the entire power-band!!!

No additional tune is needed for this kit if you are already using a Steeda cold air intake with SCT or Diablo tuning package and installation is quick and simple. This kit includes gloss blue or black 4 ply silicone hose connectors stainless steel hose clamps and instructions.

555-3141 - Black Silicone Hose Upgrade

This Black Silicone upgrade kit is designed for the S197 GT Mustangs. You can replace the blue hoses with these black ones to match your car better! Fits Steeda CAI for GT S197's (555-3130 &
column5:
555-3131) and Ford Racing CAI with the Steeda upgraded elbow.

Note: Will work with FRPP intakes but will require retuning if using FRPP's tune with one of our SCT tuners.

Product Benefits

  • High quality plastic inlet elbow allows for colder air charge than competitive metal brands.
  • Easily installs in minutes and Looks great!
  • Smooths incoming air for more Horsepower and Torque to the rear tires!
  • Perfect upgrade to your Steeda or Ford Racing Cold Air Intake Kit.

Time to install: About 15 Minutes

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

@1491@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1491@^http://www.steeda.com/ford-racing-gt500-mustang-crankshaft-balancer-pulley-161-m-6312-svt/^@^Steeda^@^Ford Racing GT500 Mustang Crankshaft Balancer Pulley (07-10 GT500)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/161-m-6312-svt.jpg^@^161-M-6312-SVT^@^

Weighing in at just 10lbs this revised crankshaft pulley will remove over 12lbs of rotating mass over the factory 22lb 2007 GT500 crankshaft pulley.

Designed by Ford engineers it has the proper harmonic characteristics for the engine as well providing all the benefits of reduced rotating mass such as slightly improved throttle response and less stress on the front end of the crankshaft.

Highly recommended for all 2007 GT500 owners. This pulley is O.E. on 2008-09 GT500 models. It is an upgrade from stock on 2007 models only. For 2008-09 models it is a perfect service replacement for the O.E. pulley on high mileage cars as well as new engine builds.

Product Benefits

  • Reduces rotating mass
  • Sheds 12lbs of front end weight
  • Direct bolt on replacement

column1: @1574@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1574@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-oil-separator-555-3710/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Oil Separator - (79-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/555-3710(3).jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/555-3710(4).jpg^@^555-3710^@^

Steeda's oil separator kit reduces detonation oil burning and deposits on the valves by removing oil drawn through the PCV system before it can contaminate the intake charge.

Excess crankcase pressure (sometimes known as "
column3: blow-by&quot
column4:
) is vented from the crankcase through the PCV system where it is drawn into the intake manifold and returned by the engine. This re circulated air contains aerated oil from the crankcase which is burned by the engine. Supercharged nitrous boosted and high mileage engines often draw excessive amounts of oil into the engine through the PCV system. The Steeda oil separator plugs into the PCV hose between the PCV valve and the intake manifold and removes aerated oil from the re circulated air and collects it in a tube that can be drained and recycled.

Oil separator kits include the oil separator and required hardware. For 04-earlier applications connecting hose is included.

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

The factory plastic self-adjusting quadrant is fine for stock clutches but when you add a heavy duty clutch or some fast power-shifts it starts to bend. This unwanted flex causes inconsistent clutch engagement and missed shifts at best plus worn synchronizers and a broken quadrant at worst. Replace that weak plastic clutch quadrant with Steeda's super strong billet aluminum "
column5:
quadrant. The strong flex free billet quadrant design stands up to the hardest shifts.

Steeda's billet clutch quadrant features a fast acting pedal ratio or "
column7:
to pull the clutch cable faster for quicker clutch release and reduced pedal travel. The increased pedal ratio increases pedal effort slightly but the clutch releases quicker so the shift is over quicker and you wont notice the increased effort.

Requires a firewall mounted clutch adjuster such as 555-7021.

Product Benefits

  • Consistent clutch engagement
  • No more missed shifts
  • Faster clutch cable pull

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

@1576@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1576@^http://www.steeda.com/arp-racing-3-inch-mustang-wheel-studs-014-wsr6251g/^@^Steeda^@^ARP Racing 3" Mustang Wheel Stud^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/014-wsr6251g.jpg^@^014-WSR6251G^@^

High strength wheel studs increase safety and prevent lug failure from the high stresses of racing. They are required by the N.H.R.A. and other racing organizations for certain classes. Steeda developed these custom wheel studs to make faster pits stops for their race team.

They feature special "
column3:
tips to prevent cross threading and a reduced length (compared to standard 3 inch racing studs) to minimize time spent threading the lug nuts on. They're longer than your stock studs so you can run wheel spacers if you need them but shorter than other studs so they fit under most center caps.

They're custom made for just Steeda by ARP so you know they're strong and they are cadmium plated to prevent corrosion. Studs feature a 0.625"
column4: knurl making them a direct fit into 1979-2004 rear axles and 1979-1993 front rotors. 1994-2004 front hubs must be slightly enlarged with a 39/64&quot
column5:
drill bit. This can be done easily with a hand drill.

Product Benefits

  • Durable race proven quality
  • Speed Starter tips

Time to install: About 3 Hours

@1579@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1579@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-finned-differential-cover-fill-drain-plugs-555-8142/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Finned Differential Cover w/ Fill/Drain Plugs (86-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-8143.jpg

http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-8143-3.jpg^@^555-8142^@^

This functional differential cover was engineered by Ford as original equipment on the 2011-13 GT500 and 2012/13 Boss 302. This cover can be directly installed on any 1986-2013 8.8 live axle Mustang.

This innovative piece was designed with cooling fins to reduce overall gear oil temperatures and to increase rear end housing rigidity for improved gear set and bearing life. We've taken this cover a step further by installing fill and drain plugs for ease of maintenance.

Includes bolts for installation fill and drain plugs and cover vent plug.

Note: The O.E. application of this cover has the axle vent on the axle cover. All other 8.8 rear ends have the axle vent already installed on one of the axle tubes. Use the included vent plug to plug the vent hole on the cover and continue to use the existing vent on the axle tube. This cover does not fit IRS-equipped Cobra models.

Product Benefits

  • Increases rear end rigidity
  • Reduces gear oil temperatures
  • Original equipment design
  • Fits all live axle 8.8 Mustangs

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

^@^Mustang^@^ Cobra GT GT500 Boss ^@^Mustang Drivetrain^@^2012 2011 2010 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005 2004 2003 2002 2001 2000 1999 1998 1997 1996 ^@^Mustang Drivetrain Accessories^@^14.95^ @1581@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1581@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-double-hook-quadrant-555-7000/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Double Hook Quadrant - (82-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-7000.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-7000-1.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-7000-2.jpg^@^555-7000^@^

The factory plastic self-adjusting quadrant is fine for stock clutches but when you add a heavy duty clutch or some fast power-shifts it starts to bend. This unwanted flex causes inconsistent clutch engagement and missed shifts at best plus worn synchronizers and a broken quadrant at worst. Replace that weak plastic clutch quadrant with Steeda's super strong billet aluminum "Double Hook" quadrant. The strong flex free billet quadrant design stands up to the hardest shifts.

Steeda's exclusive Double Hook design lets you use your choice of an adjustable clutch cable or firewall mounted cable adjuster. Or use both together for the ultimate adjustment versatility. With other quadrants you are locked into one type of adjustment mechanism. With Steeda's Double Hook Quadrant the choice is yours!

Product Benefits

  • Patented Product - US Patent 445238

Steeda's Driveshaft Safety Loop is an important safety upgrade that is required by many tracks and sanctioning bodies.

Our driveshaft safety loop will catch the driveshaft and keep it from causing further damage or vehicle loss of control in the event a U-joint or driveshaft failure occurs. It is a bolt-on installation that will require drilling in order to install.

Hardware and instructions included.

Product Benefits

  • Bolt on installation
  • Provides additional on track safety
  • Made in the USA

@1586@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1586@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-quick-release-clutch-quadrant-555-7006/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Quick Release Clutch Quadrant - 82-04^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-7006.jpg^@^555-7006^@^

The factory plastic self-adjusting quadrant is fine for stock clutches but when you add a heavy duty clutch or some fast power-shifts it starts to bend. This unwanted flex causes inconsistent clutch engagement and missed shifts at best plus worn synchronizers and a broken quadrant at worst. Replace that weak plastic clutch quadrant with Steeda's super strong billet aluminum "
column3:
quadrant. The strong flex free billet quadrant design stands up to the hardest shifts.

Steeda's billet clutch quadrant features a fast acting pedal ratio or "
column5:
to pull the clutch cable faster for quicker clutch release and reduced pedal travel. The increased pedal ratio increases pedal effort slightly but the clutch releases quicker so the shift is over quicker and you wont notice the increased effort.

Requires a firewall mounted clutch adjuster such as 555-7021.

Product Benefits

  • Consistent clutch engagement
  • No more missed shifts
  • Faster clutch cable pull

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Steeda's exclusive Double Hook design lets you use your choice of an adjustable clutch cable or firewall mounted cable adjuster. Or use both together for the ultimate adjustment versatility. With other quadrants you are locked into one type of adjustment mechanism. With Steeda's Double Hook Quadrant the choice is yours!

column1:
@1598@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1598@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-adjustable-clutch-cable-172-0201/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Adjustable Clutch Cable - 96-04^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/172-0201.jpg^@^172-0201^@^

All Steeda clutch cables features a stainless steel inner cable and low friction Teflon lining along with a high-durometer bushing at the firewall for improved clutch response and cable life. This bushing is much more durable and will not prematurely split and fail like lesser bushings. Steeda is the only company with these features making this the finest quality clutch cable you can get for your Mustang.

Steeda's stainless steel cable will not allow the cable to rust through and is more durable unlike all other cables on the market that are made from lesser quality galvanized steel.

Clutch adjustment can be adjusted by turning a nut at the end of the cable when the cable is used in combination with the required Steeda’s aluminum quadrant.

Part number 172-0000 is designed specifically to be a direct bolt-on to '79-'95 Mustangs with V8 Engine. PN 172-0201 is the correct length and has the proper bracket for direct bolt-in replacement in any '96-'04 GT Bullitt or Cobra. PN 172-0301 is a non-adjustable stock-replacement cable.

Please Note: All cables shown require an aftermarket quadrant like Steeda's Double Hook Quadrant!

Product Benefits

  • High durability
  • Improved clutch response and cable life
  • Stainless steel cable will not rust through

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

@1602@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1602@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-rear-shock-tower-brace-94-04-555-5751/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Rear Shock Tower Brace (79-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-5751.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-5751-2.jpg
column6:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/8/555-5751.jpg^@^555-5751^@^

What does it do?

Steeda's Rear Mustang Shock Tower Brace ties the two rear upper shock mounting points together to limit rear chassis flex making the rear suspension more effective and increasing overall chassis life.

What materials are used and how is it made?

Even though it cost us more we believe strongly in using chrome moly steel a stronger and lighter alternative to mild steel used in other braces.

What is the warranty?

Buy with confidence your Steeda Mustang Rear Shock brace is backed by Steeda's LIFETIME WARRANTY.

Is this product thoroughly tested?

Absolutely! All Steeda manufactured parts are track and street tested by our staff of engineers and enthusiasts

Where is it made?

Steeda proudly manufactures our products right here in the United States out of our Valdosta Georgia manufacturing plant.

How does it install?

Steeda's Mustang Shock Tower Brace requires welding of the mounting brackets to the top of the strut towers. An installer experienced in welding is recommended for installation.

Product Benefits

  • Stiffen your Mustang rear end

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools
