A great step towards improved handling out back is to upgrade the panhard bar supplied by the manufacturer with our chrome-moly steel unit.

Steeda's race panhard bar features 4130 chrome moly alloy steel construction not just ordinary mild steel like the factory piece and other aftermarket offerings. Benefits include length adjustment to adjust rear end offset and rod end bushings for reduced flex.

In keeping with Steeda's motto "
column4: Weight is the enemy of performance&quot
column5:
Steeda's panhard rod is 5lbs lighter than the stock unit. And to make a good thing better add our heavy duty Panhard Bar Brace.

Our Panhard brace stiffens the panhard bar mounting bracket which is prone to under load during cornering and provides some extra chassis rigidity as well.

Not sure if you need to replace the factory panhard bar brace? Put your car in the air and grab the factory brace and pull on it. You will be able to flex it by hand!

Like our panhard brace our panhard bar brace is made of super strong 4130 chrome moly alloy steel for the ultimate in strength!

For those who wish to take their 2012 and Up Boss 302 Mustang arguably the best handling Mustang Ford Motor Company has ever produced to the next level of handling performance we have specifically developed the springs that will take you there!

Steeda's street and competition sport lowering springs greatly improve the Boss 302's overall weight distribution. This is achieved by lowering the ride height only 0.2 inches in the front but the rear comes down 0.7 to 0.8 inches.

With the front height remaining largely unchanged your front roll center geometry remains optimal. Spring rates are substantially increased to greatly reduce body roll and reduce nose dive under braking for greatly improved control and balance.

Thanks to our decades of engineering experience with Mustang springs these springs achieve all of this while maintaining near stock ride quality characteristics so if you enjoy taking your Boss 302 Mustang around town you will enjoy it even more with these springs!

Take your Boss 302 Mustang to the next level right now with this amazing spring package.

Love the new Steeda ST-R Gunmetal wheel? How about pairing them with Falken all season FK453 tires and saving big $$$ to boot?! We've made it happen with this staggered wheel and tire combo from Steeda!

Steeda's ST-R mesh wheels for the Ford Mustang offer great style and strength. Using a low pressure casting process gives these wheels lower weight than standard gravity cast wheels.

Steeda's ST-R mesh wheel is designed to clear most popular big brake kits such as Steeda's 14 inch 4 piston brake set up. These Steeda ST-R wheels add an aggressive stance when staggered and give maximum traction. Can easily be installed in your driveway.

Package includes two 20 x 9.5 and two 20 x 11 ST-R wheels.

Package includes 4 Falken FK453 tires. Tire sizes are two 275/35R20 and two 315/35R20.

Note: Stock Tire Pressure Sensors must be transferred for 2015 Mustang owners.

  • Will clear big brake kits

Add the aggressive fully functional and race inspired design of the Boss 302 Laguna Seca Mustang to your Mustang GT with a Ford Racing front spoiler splitter kit.

This Ford Racing lower front fascia grille and splitter was original standard equipment on the BOSS 302 Laguna Seca Mustang.

The Boss Laguna Seca front grille and splitter is designed to direct air under and around the car to reduce drag and front end lift while effectively forcing air through the cooling system.

The Ford Racing Boss 302 Laguna Seca Splitter Kit comes with the lower grille insert lower deflector upper splitter with fasteners and splitter bracket.

The Ford Racing BOSS 302 Laguna Seca Front Splitter Kit is designed to fit 2010 to 2012 Mustang GT's. For 2010-2012 Mustang GT California Special only M-16601-MB is required to add Laguna splitter

Please note: This Laguna Seca Front Splitter Kit is compatible with 2010-2012 V6 Mustangs only when used in combination with a GT front bumper. It is not compatible with stock V6 front end.

column1: @1652@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1652@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-2010-mustang-power-pack-555-3934/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Ultimate Induction Pack - GT - 2010^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-3934.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/388-7015_rht3-no.jpg^@^555-3934^@^

Steeda's Ultimate Induction Power Pack is a complete performance package that includes Steeda's Cold Air Intake with High Flow Inlet Elbow and SCT Tuner.

The 2010 Mustang GT's intake system from Ford is an excellent piece but Steeda was up to the challenge of making it even better.

We started with a large surface area high flow air filter with our famous velocity stack. We then designed a stainless steel heat shield with rubber gasket to seal against the hood and increased the MAF housing size to 95mm then coupled it to a new higher flowing Pro-Flow inlet hose.

You would think this is more than enough but we went the extra mile and designed this intake system to accept the factory sound tube should you choose to want to keep it. We also have tied our airbox into the factory lower cold air scoop for the coolest air charge possible. Something other competitors on the market chose to neglect.

This package includes the required SCT tuner to properly calibrate for the airflow increase provided by the intake system.

This system will make power across the entire RPM range not just a peak number. Typical gains are 20 to 25 horsepower and up to 25 ft/lbs of torque across the RPM range.

Please provide your 4 digit processor code in the checkout notes when placing your order. This is required to program your tuner before shipping.

Warning: This part has been designed and is intended for off-road application only. Installation of this part on a vehicle that is driven on public roads may violate U.S. and Canadian laws and regulations.

Lifetime Tune Program: Purchasing this Steeda Power Package automatically registers you into Steeda's Lifetime Tune Program at no extra cost! To learn more about Steeda's Lifetime Tune Program click here.

Product Benefits

  • Easy installation
  • Intake retains sound tube and factory cold air ducting
  • Power increase across entire RPM range
  • Programmed SCT flash tuner included
  • Gains of up to 25hp 25ft/lbs of torque

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 2010

Model(s): GT

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/077-005-kit-2.jpg^@^077-005-KIT^@^

Product and Design

Each premium grade rotor is quality controlled precision drilled and mill slotted with 30 years of engineering experience manning the process. Our precision design pattern for holes and slots results in a reduction of up to 200 degree Fahrenheit in temperature compared to original OE rotors. This is imperative to safety during heavy breaking and in rain this pattern dissipates water improving your braking in any weather condition.

The slot pattern acts as a mechanism to constantly clean the pad surface to ensure maximum grip every time you apply your brakes. Cooler operation reduces the risk of brake fade and of warping the rotor always ensuring maximum friction between pad and rotor. This prolongs the maximum effective life of both the rotor and the pad.

With all these mechanisms at work to achieve the benefits of safety and performance our designs also allow them to operate at low noise levels ensuring comfort and convenience.

Design Options

Today's vehicles have very open patterned alloy rims exposing the brake rotor. Intensive design and a quality finish with a bright Zinc Electroplating treatment ensures a very clean and eye catching rotor that does not rust.

Kit Includes

  • Front &

  • Zinc Electroplated rotor that does not rust
  • ISO 9001:2008 Certified

Product and Design

Each premium grade rotor is quality controlled precision drilled and mill slotted with 30 years of engineering experience manning the process. Our precision design pattern for holes and slots results in a reduction of up to 200 degree Fahrenheit in temperature compared to original OE rotors. This is imperative to safety during heavy breaking and in rain this pattern dissipates water improving your braking in any weather condition.

The slot pattern acts as a mechanism to constantly clean the pad surface to ensure maximum grip every time you apply your brakes. Cooler operation reduces the risk of brake fade and of warping the rotor always ensuring maximum friction between pad and rotor. This prolongs the maximum effective life of both the rotor and the pad.

With all these mechanisms at work to achieve the benefits of safety and performance our designs also allow them to operate at low noise levels ensuring comfort and convenience.

Design Options

Today's vehicles have very open patterned alloy rims exposing the brake rotor. Intensive design and a quality finish with a bright Zinc Electroplating treatment ensures a very clean and eye catching rotor that does not rust.

Kit Includes

  • Front &
column5:
Rear Brake Pads

Product Benefits

  • Cross drilled and Slotted rotors
  • Zinc Electroplated rotor that does not rust
  • ISO 9001:2008 Certified

Steeda offer the ultimate front brake upgrade for your 2005+ Mustang. Tested and proven in competition and on the street.

Our brake kit features 14 inch 2 piece rotors with floating aluminum hats large 4 piston calipers with Steeda logo DOT legal stainless steel brake lines mounting brackets hardware and brake pads.

Unlike our competitor's kits Steeda went the extra mile and designed this kit with the proper piston sizes for compatibility with the sensitive S197 Mustang Anti-Lock brake system. This is an important safety factor under severe braking on the street and in competition. Improper sizing can lead to ABS malfunction and increased stopping distances! Don't settle for a brake kit that wasn't designed with the specific performance and safety needs of your S197 Mustang in mind. This is the right kit for you! column1: @1661@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1661@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-oil-separator-555-3711/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Oil Separator - (05-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/oil-seperator-555-3711.jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3711-1.jpg^@^555-3711^@^

Steeda's oil separator kit reduces detonation oil burning and deposits on the valves by removing oil drawn through the PCV system before it can contaminate the intake charge.

Excess crankcase pressure (sometimes known as "
column3: blow-by&quot
column4:
) is vented from the crankcase through the PCV system where it is drawn into the intake manifold and returned by the engine. This re circulated air contains aerated oil from the crankcase which is burned by the engine. Supercharged nitrous boosted and high mileage engines often draw excessive amounts of oil into the engine through the PCV system. The Steeda oil separator plugs into the PCV hose between the PCV valve and the intake manifold and removes aerated oil from the re circulated air and collects it in a tube that can be drained and recycled.

Oil separator kits include the oil separator and required hardware. For 04-earlier applications connecting hose is included.

Note: 2005 and Up applications require modifying factory PVC hoses.

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

^@^Mustang^@^ 5.0L Bullitt GT V6 GT500 Boss ^@^Mustang Wheels & Tires^@^2015 2014 2013 2012 2011 2010 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005 ^@^Mustang Wheel & Tire Combos^@^695.95^ @1665@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1665@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-control-arm-upgrade-kit-555-4108/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Upper Control Arm Upgrade Kit - Poly End (05-10)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-4108.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/8/steeda-mustang-control-arm-upgrade-kit-555-4108.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/8/steeda-mustang-control-arm-upgrade-kit-555-4108-2.jpg^@^555-4108^@^

Need to reduce wheel hop and improve traction? Steeda's upper 3rd links will do the job. The Steeda adjustable upper 3rd link for S197 Mustangs gives you the ability to set your pinion angle and eliminate the torque deflection associated with the factory piece. This upper 3rd link uses our track proven three piece bushing package using soft outer bushings a hard center bushing on the axle end. This proven combination helps control axle wind up wheel hop under acceleration and allows for proper articulation without deflection for improved handling and cornering stability.

Steeda's three piece bushing package will not increase NVH (noise vibration and harshness) keeping the factory's quiet smooth operation unlike competitor's pieces. Direct replacement for the factory original bolting into the original factory location. Our 3rd link is a double adjustable design allowing you to make adjustments without removing the arm from the vehicle.

Already own an original 555-4105 Steeda upper 3rd link and want to take it to the next level? Purchase one of our competition upgrade kits.

The full competition version part number 555-4107 includes a competition proven chrome moly alloy rod end to eliminate all wheel hop and axle wind up. This version with a solid rod end will increase NVH in street use and is recommended for competition use only.

The dual purpose street/competition version uses our exclusive 3 piece bushing package on the axle end and is recommended for street use since it wont increase NVH levels in the vehicle.

Both competition upgrades include a new heavy duty chassis mount made from stout 1/4" thick steel for twice the thickness of the original factory piece. It also gives you 2 mounting locations for increased adjustment to provide even better traction and handling.

Steeda Stepped Spacers: 555-4105 upper 3rd links come with spacers designed to fix the problem with the OEM upper chassis mount. At the attachment point for the upper link to the chassis mount Ford uses a 14mm bolt but the opening in the mount is 16mm. This is not typically a problem with the OEM 3rd link as it uses a soft hydra mount bushing to soften this. But once an aftermarket upper is installed with a urethane bushing you get a noticeable clunk from the smaller bolt walking in the larger hole it installs into. Our spacers can be installed with all aftermarket upper arms that use the factory 14mm bolt in the factory chassis mount. The stepped spacers take up the slop and eliminate the noise from the upper 3rd links associated with the mismatched bolt/bolt hole combination.

Note: Our 555-4107 and 4108 upgrades do not require these spacers with their all new chassis mounts. All Steeda 555-4105 Upper Third Links produced on or after February 2007 include the Stepped Spacers.

Product Benefits

  • Adjustable pinion angle for optimum traction
  • Better handling with more stable cornering
  • Three piece urethane bushings for better traction
  • Competition tested & proven

Learn the differences in Steeda brand control arms read our blog post for more info: http://www.steedablog.com/2012/01/the-hidden-difference-in-control-arms/

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

With Steeda's GT500 handling pack our proven suspension components are combined and offered as a complete matched package that will improve increased cornering grip improved handling balance reduced brake dive and reduced body roll.

With Tokico's D-spec adjustable shock and struts you get the best of both worlds. Excellent ride quality and race car handling with just a turn of a knob. One knob controls infinite adjustment of both compression and rebound.

The included sport springs will lower your GT500 approximately 1.2 inches in the front and 1.5 in the rear with optimized spring rates to provide handling and ride quality.

We then round out the package with our awesome chrome moly alloy steel strut tower brace and front and rear swaybar package.

@1674@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1674@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-heavy-duty-belt-tensioner-555-3348/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Heavy Duty Belt Tensioner - Stock/Billet - Supercharged 05-10 4.6L^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-3348.jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/318/detailed/3/555-3348--1.jpg^@^555-3348^@^

Stop your OEM belt tensioner bracket from bending with Steeda's new Tensioner kit! A major problem with Supercharged applications as the increased belt length and tension puts unwanted stress on the factory tensioner. A real problem is when you kick the clutch and pull the next gear the RPMS suddenly drop.

With the extra rotating mass of the supercharger and weight of all the accessories it will jerk the belt and sometimes hurt your OEM tensioner. It causes it to flex and in the end you usually end up with broken belts that are hard to find and expensive. A great fix for all blown Roush Saleen and other bolt on supercharger applications. Kit is available with a factory pulley or an optional billet one.

Note: 555-3358 is designed for use with Whipple supercharger kits with a 3.625"
column3:
- 3.25 blower pulley. These kits require a 90mm idler.

Product Benefits

  • Made to be stronger then the OEM unit
  • Helps prevent belt breakage
  • Cheap and inexpensive way to increase performance and durability
  • A Must for Supercharged applications

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 2010 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005

Model(s): Bullitt GT

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

column1: @1675@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1675@^http://www.steeda.com/axle-exchange-mustang-driveshaft-012-mamt412st/^@^Steeda^@^Axle Exchange Mustang Aluminum Driveshaft (05-10 GT/Bullitt)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/1.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/IMG_9234-1_5isn-wm.JPG^@^012-MAMT412ST^@^

Axle exchange's aluminum driveshafts for the 2005 through 2010 Mustangs have been throughly tested to make them the best aluminum 1-piece driveshaft available!

These driveshafts do not use a flange adapter like competitive versions which can contribute to driveline vibrations. Instead they come with a completely new and easy to install pinion flange which the driveshaft directly bolts to.

Weighing 24lbs less than the factory GT model driveshaft these 1 piece driveshaft greatly reduce rotating mass giving you up to 2 tenths improvement in 1/4 mile performance! Improved acceleration that you can feel.

Rated to safely hold up to 800 rear wheel horsepower. This driveshaft will satisfy practically any performance enthusiasts needs.

Note: If you have had your factory 2 piece driveshaft center bearing fail that bearing cannot be replaced without buying a whole new shaft which is nearly double the price of our driveshaft. Upgrade your driveshaft today!

Product Benefits

  • Up to 2 tenths improvement in 1/4 mile
  • Reduced rotating mass and vehicle weight
  • Smooth operation

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 2010 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005

Model(s): Bullitt GT

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

This brace installs in the chassis area between the rear wheel wells behind the rear seats which effectively couples this part of the rear structure together to increase chassis rigidity.

The reduced deflection allows the rear suspension to be more effective at doing its job.

Manufactured in-house from chrome moly alloy steel tubing and mild steel brackets. Powdercoated silver with a billet aluminum center cover plate for a great appearance. Bolt-on or weld-in installation.

Note: Requires removal of rear seats. Custom rear seat delete or Boss 302 delete panels recommended.

Product Benefits

  • 4130 Chrome Moly Design for Hardcore use also
  • Better handling for more stable cornering
  • Helps prevent and eliminate sqeaks and rattles

Time to install: About 45 Minutes

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column1: @1752@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@1752@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-fox-body-mustang-bumpsteer-kit-555-8103/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Fox Body Mustang Bumpsteer Kit (79-93)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-8103.jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-8103-1.jpg^@^555-8103^@^

If you have substantially lowered your vehicle chances are you have introduced bump steer. What is bump steer? Bump Steer is changes in toe caused by suspension movement.

Every car has bump steer however when you lower the vehicle you increase the amount of bump steer that occurs if this becomes excessive you will begin to notice some unwanted vehicle driving characteristics.

When you turn your steering wheel you are essentially changing the toe of the wheels to turn the vehicle. Excessive bump steer is undesireable because it introduces unwanted steering inputs which means the suspension is steering the car instead of the driver.

If your car is lowered and has tracking issues and less predictable steering behavior you need a bump steer kit.

Steeda's Bump Steer Kits will allow you to correct your bump steer geometry and can do so without requiring you to drill or modify your vehicle spindle.

In addition our bump steer kit makes a great service replacement for your worn out high mileage outer tie rods even if you do not have excessive bump steer issues.

Pick up a bump steer kit today and refresh your outer tie rods and improve your steering.

Steeda Tapered Stud Bolt
Studs are made to the exact taper of the factory spindle for a simple install every time. Requires drilling the spindle hole to a 5/8"
column3: diameter. Bit costs $17 at local Hardware Store. Made of 4140 high-grade steel for superior strength. Basic grade 8 bolt that can vary in strength. Machined to exact tolerances for an exact fit. Must drill spindle to bolt size will have "
column7:
. Heat treated after machining to ensure hardness throughout stud. No steps taken to ensure material hardness.

Product Benefits

  • Wide range of adjustment
  • Does not require spindle modification for fitment or adjustment
  • Direct replacement installation
  • High quality construction and fit

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-5405-2.jpg^@^555-5405^@^

Steeda's IRS Subframe bracket kit provides an immediate improvement in handling and eliminates flexing of the IRS subframe mounting bracket.

The rear suspension subframe of the 99-04 Cobra attaches to the car via a cantilevered bracket. The outer half of this bracket is completely unsupported and flexes significantly leading to less predictable handling as the entire rear suspension system shifts under the car. Steeda's support kit reinforces the bracket and eliminates flexing. Overall handling and responsiveness is improved and wheel hop is reduced.

The support welds to subframe bracket and bolts to the inner fender well with the supplied hardware.

Product Benefits

  • Stiffen Cobra rear subframe connection

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

The secret to perfect shifts! Your stock shift lever has rubber bushings that wear out fast causing sloppy shifts. Permanently replace them with Steeda bushings in about 15 minutes! Fits all 1979 and up 5 speed Mustangs. Now made from billet aluminum less weight for quicker shifts.

Steeda TKO 500/600 &
column2:
Hurst Shifter Bushings

The shifter on the TKO 500 and TKO 600 transmission has strong springs and a short throw but the short lever can be hard to reach and requires more effort to engage the gears. Steeda billet shifter bushings adapt the taller factory Ford shift handle to the TKO 500 / TKO 600 transmission for better driving comfort and easier smoother shifts. The solid billet bushings eliminate the soft rubber isolator in the factory handle making the shifts crisp and precise. Also adapts stock handle to Hurst shifters.

Ford Racing Fox Body 409 Stainless exhaust material is titanium stabilized ferritic stainless steel. 409 stainless is used in applications where appearance is a secondary consideration to properties and corrosion resistance and where some weldability is required. An example of stainless usage is catalytic converter assemblies. 409 stainless has excellent forming characteristics and is rust-through resistant. A surface rust will form in most instances. This rust retards further corrosion.

Product Notes

  • Also fits early "Fox" vehicles with modifications
  • Production and all GT-40 heads
  • Header fits the angled spark plug 5.0L GT-40 "P" cylinder head. Fits 1986-93 Mustang with stock or aftermarket H-pipe. Also fits 1979-85 Mustang and other Fox chassis with minor modification

Product Highlights

  • 409 stainless steel tubes
  • 1.625" diameter tubes
  • Machined flange
  • Bolts to stock exhaust pipes
  • Includes gaskets bolts and studs
  • Designed by Ford Racing engineers

Product Benefits

Love the new Steeda ST-R Black wheel? How about pairing them with Falken all season FK453 tires and saving big $$$ to boot?! We've made it happen with this staggered wheel and tire combo from Steeda!

Steeda's ST-R mesh wheels for the Ford Mustang offer great style and strength. Using a low pressure casting process gives these wheels lower weight than standard gravity cast wheels.

Steeda's ST-R mesh wheel is designed to clear most popular big brake kits such as Steeda's 14 inch 4 piston brake set up. These Steeda ST-R wheels add an aggressive stance when staggered and give maximum traction. Can easily be installed in your driveway.

Package includes two 20 x 9.5 and two 20 x 11 ST-R wheels.

Package includes 4 Falken FK453 tires. Tire sizes are two 275/35R20 and two 315/35R20.

Note: Stock Tire Pressure Sensors must be transferred for 2015 Mustang owners.

  • Save on this combo package
  • Will clear big brake kits

Give your Mustang a sporty European inspired look with a set of HRE FF01 wheels. The FF01 wheel features a stylish 14 spoke mesh design that has a very slight concave face making it the perfect addition to your modern Mustang.

FlowForm is a unique casting and forming process that results in a wheel that is similar to the strength and weight of a forged wheel. The wheel is low pressure cast aluminum that is rapidly cooled and condensed to enhance its elastic strength and durability. The cast wheel is then placed in a flow forming tool where rollers press against the barrel to stretch the rim into a pre-defined final width and shape. This "
column3: stretching&quot
column4:
process improves the grain structure of the aluminum making the wheel much stronger and lighter than a standard cast aluminum wheel.

HRE Performance wheels feature a durable powder coated finish that is tough enough to stand up against the daily hazards of everyday driving. This HRE Performance Wheel is completed in a high-gloss "
column6:
finish for an aggressive eye catching look.

Stagger with a 20x10.5 or 20x11 wheel on the rear for an aggressive muscle car stance and improved traction.

column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/077-006-kit-2.jpg^@^077-006-KIT^@^

Product and Design

Each premium grade rotor is quality controlled precision drilled and mill slotted with 30 years of engineering experience manning the process. Our precision design pattern for holes and slots results in a reduction of up to 200 degree Fahrenheit in temperature compared to original OE rotors. This is imperative to safety during heavy breaking and in rain this pattern dissipates water improving your braking in any weather condition.

The slot pattern acts as a mechanism to constantly clean the pad surface to ensure maximum grip every time you apply your brakes. Cooler operation reduces the risk of brake fade and of warping the rotor always ensuring maximum friction between pad and rotor. This prolongs the maximum effective life of both the rotor and the pad.

With all these mechanisms at work to achieve the benefits of safety and performance our designs also allow them to operate at low noise levels ensuring comfort and convenience.

Design Options

Today's vehicles have very open patterned alloy rims exposing the brake rotor. Intensive design and a quality finish with a bright Zinc Electroplating treatment ensures a very clean and eye catching rotor that does not rust.

column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/6/555-3156-1.jpg^@^555-3194^@^
Steeda Autosports the world's largest aftermarket manufacturer of Ford performance equipment is once again leading the performance market with our High Velocity Cold Air Intake (CAI).
This high performance CAI effectively opens up the intake system of Ford's new five-liter power plant and allows it to breathe much more freely than the stock intake system allows - taking your 2015 5.0L Mustang to the next level of performance.
Our engineers started with a large surface area high-flow nano-fiber air filter added our famous “race-tested” velocity stack entry and then designed a black powder-coated heat shield with a durable rubber gasket to seal the shield against the vehicle’s hood.
You would think this is more than enough but we went the extra mile and designed this intake system to accept the factory sound tube should you decide you want to keep it for that robust intake sound many appreciate. Or if you want to eliminate it we provide the proper plug to delete it from the system.
This Cold Air Intake is so effective at improving airflow into the five-liter engine that a performance tune is not just recommended it is required for maximum performance! In an effort to maximize performance and provide our customers with only the very best products we have partnered with the leader in automotive tuning - SCT Performance.

Product Benefits

  • Easy bolt in installation
  • Retains sound tube and factory cold air ducting (also includes cap for sound tube elimination)
  • Power increase at all RPM ranges - not just peak power
  • Slated for release 2/15

column1: @2008@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2008@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-whipple-supercharger-belt-drive-555-3352-pol/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Whipple Supercharger Belt Drive - 11-13 PSI/Polished Snout (05-10)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-3352-pol.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3352-pol-2.jpg
column5:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3352-pol-4.jpg^@^555-3352-POL^@^

Tired of belts slipping breaking or simply being thrown off your Whipple supercharged Mustang when pushing it to the limit? Those days are now over! Steeda’s Belt Drive System for Whipple Supercharger was designed to prevent any such belt problems that are all too common during competition or just hardcore use of your Mustang.

Steeda designed this belt drive package to relocate the supercharger drive off the factory 6-rib system making it a dedicated 10-rib belt system which drives the supercharger and nothing else. Removing the supercharger drive from the primary accessory drive serves to eliminate any and all slippage problems that can occur including both on the initial tip in and under full load. The standard accessories are driven by a Steeda underdrive pulley for even more power and reduced accessory load.

Our 10-rib system is available in boost levels of approximately 11psi to 17psi on a Gen 1 Whipple system and approximately 13 to 19psi on a Gen 2 Whipple system with no slippage under any conditions and no throwing or breakage of the supercharger belt.

The package includes a new supercharger snout billet pulleys billet mounting plates 2 new belts and a heavy-duty belt tensioner. Although we recommend a Steeda hood it only takes a minor modification to fit the system under your stock hood. Full installation instructions including to the procedure for measuring stock hood clearance are included.

Already own a Steeda Belt Drive and want to change boost levels? Take a look at our separate lower boost pulley kits.

Important Note: Stated boost levels are estimates only based on GEN 2 Whipple superchargers and will vary widely depending on numerous factors including but not limited to: Exhaust configuration cylinder heads port configuration camshafts geographic elevation engine compression throttle body size boost gauge accuracy and other factors beyond the control of Steeda Autosports. Use numbers provided for guidance only. In general cars with large cams cylinder heads etc will have slightly lower boost levels.

Whether you Mustang only gets driven to the grocery store or driven hard on the road course or drag strip every 79-2004 Mustang needs subframe connectors!

Steeda's full length subframe connectors are the best full length subframe connectors available for your 1979-2004 Mustang. Perfect for daily drivers or serious cars with high horsepower sticky tires or competition suspension.

Not only will Steeda full length subframe connectors provide unmatched strength but will save you time in installation over other brands!

Steeda starts with beefy 1.5 x 2 x .083 square tubing that spans the full length of the floor pan providing unmatched chassis rigidity improved handling and improved ride quality with reduced impact harshness.

Our full length subframes are reinforced at each bend and include Steeda’s exclusive torque box reinforcing plate for the strongest attachment possible to the rear subframe for maximum effectiveness.

Steeda Full length subframe connectors also feature a one-piece reinforced seat bolt cross brace. Some subframe cross braces have 8 individual gussets which must be carefully positioned and welded on. Other other kits use no reinforcements at all in their cross braces. Steeda's cross braces have reinforcing gussets built-in for greater strength with less welding.

Other full length subframe connector designs do not attach all the mounting point plates to the connector leaving you to weld them during installation adding time and complexity. Steeda full length subframe connectors come with all mounting point tabs pre-welded to the subframe connector. Another Steeda exclusive.

Full-length subframe connectors are available in bare steel or black powdercoated finishes. The black powdercoat can be scraped and welded over and then only the weld joints need to be spray-painted vs. the whole kit needing to be spray-painted.

Note: 1996-98 Mustang Cobras will require modifications to the transmission crossmember mounting points. Call our sales reps for details.

Product Benefits

  • Dramaticly reduce chassis flex
  • Reduces impact harshness
  • The strongest subframe connectors available on the market
  • Available powdercoated or bare

Time to install: About 3 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

@2016@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2016@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-subframe-connector-cross-brace-555-5201/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Subframe Connector Cross Brace (79-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-5201.jpg^@^555-5201^@^

Adding a cross-brace to your subframe-connector cuts the free span length of the connector in half doubles the number of attachment points and creates a truss structure with the floorpan. The increased strength reduces body flexing dampens floorboard vibrations and lessens interior harmonics. The cross-braces weld to the subframe-connector and attach to the seat-bolts using nuts provided in the kit. Reinforcing the seat mount in this way reduces seat movement and also prevents floorpan cracks. Cuts free span length of the connector in half.

Product Benefits

  • Doubles the number of attachment points
  • Increased strength reduces body flexing
  • Welds to subframe-connector &
column2:

column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-8105-1.jpg^@^555-8105^@^

If you have substantially lowered your vehicle chances are you have introduced bump steer. What is bump steer? Bump Steer is changes in toe caused by suspension movement.

Every car has bump steer however when you lower the vehicle you increase the amount of bump steer that occurs if this becomes excessive you will begin to notice some unwanted vehicle driving characteristics.

When you turn your steering wheel you are essentially changing the toe of the wheels to turn the vehicle. Excessive bump steer is undesireable because it introduces unwanted steering inputs which means the suspension is steering the car instead of the driver.

If your car is lowered and has tracking issues and less predictable steering behavior you need a bump steer kit.

Steeda's Bump Steer Kits will allow you to correct your bump steer geometry and can do so without requiring you to drill or modify your vehicle spindle.

In addition our bump steer kit makes a great service replacement for your worn out high mileage outer tie rods even if you do not have excessive bump steer issues.

Pick up a bump steer kit today and refresh your outer tie rods and improve your steering.

Steeda Tapered Stud Bolt
Studs are made to the exact taper of the factory spindle for a simple install every time. Requires drilling the spindle hole to a 5/8"
column3: diameter. Bit costs $17 at local Hardware Store. Made of 4140 high-grade steel for superior strength. Basic grade 8 bolt that can vary in strength. Machined to exact tolerances for an exact fit. Must drill spindle to bolt size will have "
column7:
. Heat treated after machining to ensure hardness throughout stud. No steps taken to ensure material hardness.

Product Benefits

  • Wide range of adjustment
  • Does not require spindle modification for fitment or adjustment
  • Direct replacement installation
  • High quality construction and fit

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column1:
@2031@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2031@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-1985-2004-mustang-aluminum-steering-rack-bushings-555-4013/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Billet Mustang Steering Rack Bushings - 0.25" Offset - 85-04^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-4013.jpg^@^555-4013^@^Steeda Aluminum Rack bushings adjust both Ackerman angle and bumpsteer geometry for better steering response quicker corner-entry turn-in and more stability. The aluminum bushings replace the factory rubber bushings that mount the steering rack to the front crossmember. By eliminating deflection in the rubber mount steering response is quicker and more precise. The reversible flange design can be installed two different ways giving the installer the choice of maintaining factory Ackerman geometry or increasing Ackerman to quicken turn-in and reduce tire scrub in sharp corners. The offset bolt hole in the bushing moves the steering rack up on the crossmember to correct bumpsteer geometry on cars with modified suspensions such as increased caster X2 balljoints aftermarket K-members or other modifications.

Two different offset heights are available to suit different applications. A .25"
column2: offset fits all Mustangs from 1985 to 2004. A .400&quot
column3: offset is also available for cars requiring larger corrections. The .400&quot
column4:
offset fits 1985 to 1995 and will also fit 96-04 applications but may cause interference between the steering rack and the 4.6L oil pan on some cars.

Modified suspensions requiring large adjustments with a bumpsteer kit will still benefit from using the offset rack bushings because they will reduce the number of spacers required on the bumpsteer kit. A shorter stack of spacers reduces deflection of the bumpsteer stud increasing steering precision. For optimum performance bumpsteer should be checked and adjusted with a bumpsteer kit (adjustable height outer tie rod) after offset rack bushings are installed.

Product Benefits
  • High quality billet aluminum construction

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 2004 2003 2002 2001 2000 1999 1998 1997 1996 1995 1994 1993 1992 1991 1990 1989 1988 1987 1986 1985

  • Requires metric pressure plate bolts N602549-S51M and alignment dowel pins D1FZ-6397-B or Ford Racing kit M-6397-A302. 2 4.6L engines may have 6 or 8 bolts to attach to the crankshaft. Check the engine code before ordering.

@2040@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2040@^http://www.steeda.com/ford-racing-mustang-flywheel-161-m-6375-b302/^@^Steeda^@^Ford Racing OE Iron 50oz Balanced Mustang Flywheel - 81-95 5.0L^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/161-m-6375-b302.jpg^@^161-M-6375-B302^@^

Whenever you install a new clutch it's a good idea to replace the flywheel to reduce clutch chatter and promote maximum durability.

Many shops use a basic resurfacing machine that leaves hot spots and heat cracks on your flywheel as well as regularly leaving high spots that can cause uneven engagement and accelerated wear.

Upgrage to a billet steel flywheel that meets SFI spec 1.1 and add extra safety and prevent flywheel failure from excessive horsepower heat and high RPM.

Ford Racing aluminum flywheels are also SFI approved and will greatly reduce rotating mass for improved acceleration and response.

Don't trust your flywheel on your high horsepower Mustang to resurfacing. Do your clutch right the first time with a new flywheel.

Note: Some 4.6L 2V engines may have 8 bolt instead of 6 bolt crankshafts. Romeo plant built engines have 6 bolts Windsor plant built engines have 8 bolts. Using the 8th digit of your VIN number VIN character X is for windsor engines VIN character W is for Romeo engines. Please identify your engine before ordering.

Product Benefits

  • Direct fit replacement
  • 6 or 8 bolt models available
  • Available for 6 or 8 bolt applications
  • SFI approved

Time to install: About 6 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

@2044@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2044@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-fuel-injectors-555-3034/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda 34LB EV14 Mustang Fuel Injectors - Set of 8 (86-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-3034.jpg^@^555-3034^@^

Fuel Injectors are one of the key components in your fuel system. Injectors can become clogged over time reducing their capacity. Or maybe you have added a supercharger turbocharger or performed extensive engine modifications which put you past the flow capacity of the factory injector. Steeda has the injector selection you need to restore factory performance or deliver the fuel you need for your high performance application.

Steeda carries EV1 EV6 and EV14 injectors to fit any application you need. EV1 style injectors are a direct application for 86-2004 GT Mustangs. EV6 Injectors fit 2003-04 Cobra and 05-08 GT Mustangs. EV14 injectors are for Whipple supercharged 05-08 Mustang application and GT Supercar.

http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3163-2.jpg^@^555-3163^@^

Steeda's Patented Billet Aluminum intake spacer is designed specifically for the 2011 and up V6 Mustang. Made from Billet 6061 aluminum it is designed to give you more plenum volume for increased horsepower. The swirl design helps promote airflow by breaking the surface tension of the incoming air. An increase of horsepower and fuel milage should be seen with this part. Kit includes instructions gaskets and mounting hardware.

Increases of 2 to 4 horsepower are typical as well as an increase in fuel mileage.

U.S. Patented Product - Patent Number 6895924

Product Benefits

  • Increased horsepower
  • Increased gas mileage
  • Solid billet aluminum construction

Time to install: About 30 Minutes

Level of difficulty: Easy

column6:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/8/4_chr5-d1.jpg^@^574-HREFF15-Liquid Silver-2011^@^

Give your Mustang a sporty European inspired look with a set of HRE FF15 wheels. The FF15 wheel features a stylish 15 spoke design that has a very slight concave face making it the perfect addition to your modern Mustang.

FlowForm is a unique casting and forming process that results in a wheel that is similar to the strength and weight of a forged wheel. The wheel is low pressure cast aluminum that is rapidly cooled and condensed to enhance its elastic strength and durability. The cast wheel is then placed in a flow forming tool where rollers press against the barrel to stretch the rim into a pre-defined final width and shape. This "
column8:
process improves the grain structure of the aluminum making the wheel much stronger and lighter than a standard cast aluminum wheel.

HRE Performance wheels feature a durable powder coated finish that is tough enough to stand up against the daily hazards of everyday driving. This HRE Performance Wheel is completed in a high-gloss "
column10:
finish for an aggressive eye catching look.

Note: These are special order only.

Note: Fits rear only.

Product Benefits

  • State of the art low pressure cast flow formed wheel
  • Durable Liquid Silver powder coated finish
  • Can be installed as a set or staggered
  • Starting at 19 lbs. each

column1:
@2053@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2053@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-adjustable-clutch-pedal-stop-555-7025/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Adjustable Clutch Pedal Stop - 94-04^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-7025.jpg^@^555-7025^@^

Steeda's pedal stop adjusts the height of the clutch pedal for better driving comfort and optimum pedal travel. The factory pedal placement puts the clutch about two inches above the brake pedal. Aftermarket quadrants lower the pedal down a little but exactly how much varies based on the design of the quadrant and can't be adjusted. Either way the result is a compromise as some people prefer the pedal higher or lower. In addition some racing clutches release very quickly and require the pedal travel to be shortened to prevent damage to the diaphragm.

Adjustable cable and quadrant kits have been used for years to adjust the tension of the clutch cable but they don't adjust the height of the pedal when your foot is off the clutch. That height is fixed in place by the design of the quadrant. Steeda's new pedal stop adjusts the height of the pedal with the simple turn of bolt. Installation is simple and requires no drilling. Note: This part requires the use of an aftermarket non-adjustable clutch quadrant and an adjustable cable or firewall cable adjuster.

Product Benefits

  • Optimum pedal travel
  • Better driving comfort
  • Precise pedal height adjustment

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Love the new Steeda ST-R Gunmetal wheel? How about pairing them with Nitto's all season performance Motivo tires and saving big $$$ to boot?! We've made it happen with this staggered wheel and tire combo from Steeda!

Steeda's ST-R mesh wheels for the Ford Mustang offer great style and strength. Using a low pressure casting process gives these wheels lower weight than standard gravity cast wheels.

Steeda's ST-R mesh wheel is designed to clear most popular big brake kits such as Steeda's 14 inch 4 piston brake set up. These Steeda ST-R wheels add an aggressive stance when staggered and give maximum traction. Can easily be installed in your driveway.

Package includes two 20 x 9.5 and two 20 x 11 ST-R wheels.

Package includes 4 Nitto Motivo tires. Tire sizes are two 275/35R20 and two 315/35R20.

Note: Stock Tire Pressure Sensors must be transferred for 2015 Mustang owners.

  • Strong pressure cast construction
  • Save on this combo package
  • Will clear big brake kits

@2060@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2060@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-stop-bolt-shifter-kit-tremec-500-600-555-7071/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Tremec TKO 500/600 Stop Bolt Kit - 79-04^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-7071.jpg^@^555-7071^@^

The Tremec TKO 500 and TKO 600 transmissions are the hot ticket for high horsepower applications but they lack a stop bolt in the shifter to prevent overstressing the linkage during hard shifts. While the TKO gears have a built in stop to prevent over engagement all of the linkage between the gear and the shifter is still subject to severe shock loading.

The shift forks roll pins and rails have been known to bend or break from hard shifts. Steeda's Stop Bolt Kit absorbs the shock load and protects the shift linkage from damage. The kit includes a new shifter top with built in adjustable stops and complete instructions for installation and adjustment.

Note: This part only works on the old Tremec Shifter design. In late spring/early summer 2009 Tremec began shipping TKO transmissions with a different shifter than earlier designs. The old shifter had a 2-piece base that was red anodized. The new shifter has a 1- piece base that is powder coated wrinkle red.

Product Benefits

  • Provides stops to prevent over extension and bending of shift forks during hard shifts
  • Easy adjustment
  • Easy install
  • Made in the United States from high strength billet aluminum

Time to install: About 15 Minutes

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

@2083@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2083@^http://www.steeda.com/ford-racing-mustang-flywheel-161-m-6375-c302/^@^Steeda^@^Ford Racing Steeda Mustang Flywheel (81-95 5.0L)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/161-m-6375-c302.jpg^@^161-M-6375-C302^@^

Whenever you install a new clutch it's a good idea to replace the flywheel to reduce clutch chatter and promote maximum durability.

Many shops use a basic resurfacing machine that leaves hot spots and heat cracks on your flywheel as well as regularly leaving high spots that can cause uneven engagement and accelerated wear.

Upgrage to a billet steel flywheel that meets SFI spec 1.1 and add extra safety and prevent flywheel failure from excessive horsepower heat and high RPM.

Ford Racing aluminum flywheels are also SFI approved and will greatly reduce rotating mass for improved acceleration and response.

Don't trust your flywheel on your high horsepower Mustang to resurfacing. Do your clutch right the first time with a new flywheel.

Note: Some 4.6L 2V engines may have 8 bolt instead of 6 bolt crankshafts. Romeo plant built engines have 6 bolts Windsor plant built engines have 8 bolts. Using the 8th digit of your VIN number VIN character X is for windsor engines VIN character W is for Romeo engines. Please identify your engine before ordering.

Product Benefits

  • Direct fit replacement
  • 6 or 8 bolt models available
  • Available for 6 or 8 bolt applications
  • SFI approved

Time to install: About 6 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

As good as the fuel system on the 2011-14 5.0L and Boss 302 Mustangs is it was never intended to support the horsepower levels that can easily be achieved with power adders today. If you are looking to make over 650 horsepower upgrading the fuel rails is a must.

These billet aluminum high flow fuel rails for the 2011-14 5.0L and Boss 302 Mustang are designed to be a direct plug and play bolt on replacement for the factory fuel rails. Unlike other offerings on the market which require separate adapters to make them fit the factory fuel system our rails come complete and ready to bolt on.

The larger diameter of these rails will allow you to support higher horsepower levels along with fuel pump upgrades.

  • Supports high horsepower

http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-7153-1.jpg^@^555-7153^@^

The Steeda Tri-Ax shift handle combines the quick shifts of a short handle with an easy to reach ergonomic design. The exclusive three axis bend positions your hand perfectly for short precise and comfortable shifts. (You won't have to bend over to reach 5th gear like you do with those other handles)..

As a result of Steeda's never ending search to provide the very best performance parts all Tri-Ax handles are now Forged from high strength aluminum alloy. The new forging features a tapered thread boss and military spec radius-root threads to increase strength by over 70%. This high-strength light weight design reduces inertia for quicker and more precise shifts than are possible with bulky steel handles.

The Tri-Ax handle fits the stock shifter and many other popular shifters and is standard equipment on Steeda's complete Tri-Ax billet shifter assemblies for 79-04 vehicles.

US Patent 449809

Product Benefits

  • Ergonomic design
  • Short precise comfortable shifts
  • HIg strength forged alloy offers long lasting durability

Looking for an easy way to adjust your clutch? Steeda's firewall mounted clutch adjuster lets you adjust clutch engagement without having to crawl under the car. Just turn the adjuster knob on the firewall and you're done!

Of course you expect the best from Steeda so we went the extra mile and designed this part with a bigger adjustment range than the other guy's plus a handy locking tab to keep the adjuster base from rotating allowing you to adjust it with one hand! In addition this adjuster's click lock mechanism allows for the adjuster to lock in place automatically insuring the adjustment does not change unless you want it to! Must be used with Steeda's Double Hook Quadrant. Will work with stock or aftermarket adjustable clutch cables.

Product Benefits

  • Easy clutch adjustment
  • Improved clutch feel and pedal effort
  • Consistent clutch engagement for smooth shifts

@2101@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2101@^http://www.steeda.com/ford-racing-mustang-flywheel-161-m-6375-r00a/^@^Steeda^@^Ford Racing 8-Bolt Aluminum Mustang Flywheel - 96-04 Cobra & 03-04 Mach 1^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/161-m-6375-r00a.jpg^@^161-M-6375-R00A^@^

Whenever you install a new clutch it's a good idea to replace the flywheel to reduce clutch chatter and promote maximum durability.

Many shops use a basic resurfacing machine that leaves hot spots and heat cracks on your flywheel as well as regularly leaving high spots that can cause uneven engagement and accelerated wear.

Upgrage to a billet steel flywheel that meets SFI spec 1.1 and add extra safety and prevent flywheel failure from excessive horsepower heat and high RPM.

Ford Racing aluminum flywheels are also SFI approved and will greatly reduce rotating mass for improved acceleration and response.

Don't trust your flywheel on your high horsepower Mustang to resurfacing. Do your clutch right the first time with a new flywheel.

Note: Some 4.6L 2V engines may have 8 bolt instead of 6 bolt crankshafts. Romeo plant built engines have 6 bolts Windsor plant built engines have 8 bolts. Using the 8th digit of your VIN number VIN character X is for windsor engines VIN character W is for Romeo engines. Please identify your engine before ordering.

Product Benefits

  • Direct fit replacement
  • 6 or 8 bolt models available
  • Available for 6 or 8 bolt applications
  • SFI approved

Time to install: About 6 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Torsen differentials allow you to transfer power smoothly to the ground minimizing wheelspin and maximizing acceleration both in straightline and cornering situations.

Available in 28 and 31 spline axle applications.

@2108@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2108@^http://www.steeda.com/axle-exchange-gt500-mustang-driveshaft-012-mamtcobrast/^@^Steeda^@^Axle Exchange GT500 Mustang Aluminum Driveshaft (07-12 GT500)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/1.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/IMG_9234-1.JPG^@^012-MAMTCOBRAST^@^

Axle exchange's aluminum driveshafts for the 2005 and newer Mustangs have been throughly tested to make them the best aluminum 1-piece driveshaft available!

These driveshafts do not use a flange adapter like competitive versions which can contribute to driveline vibrations. Instead they come with a completely new and easy to install pinion flange which the driveshaft directly bolts to.

Weighing 24lbs less than the factory GT model driveshaft these 1 piece driveshaft greatly reduce rotating mass giving you up to 2 tenths improvement in 1/4 mile performance! Improved acceleration that you can feel.

Rated to safely hold up to 800 rear wheel horsepower. This driveshaft will satisfy practically any performance enthusiasts needs.

Note: If you have had your factory 2 piece driveshaft center bearing fail that bearing cannot be replaced without buying a whole new shaft which is nearly double the price of our driveshaft. Upgrade your driveshaft today!

Product Benefits

  • Up to 2 tenths improvement in 1/4 mile
  • Reduced rotating mass and vehicle weight
  • Smooth operation

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Steeda's billet strut tower brace will reduce front end flex improving handling over rough surfaces and ride quality. Easy bolt in installation that can be done in your driveway with simple hand tools.

column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/2_cn1i-4b.jpg^@^067-0511-7006-01^@^

Although cruising in a Mustang convertible is always an enjoyable activity the excessive wind noise at even low speeds can put a damper on your fun if you're trying to listen to music talk on your phone or have a conversation with a passenger. Combine the great styling of the Classic LightBar with CDC's Windstop and enjoy a comfortable ride in your Mustang convertible. The Windstop is designed to match the curves of the LightBar for a flawless appearance while greatly reducing wind noise and turbulence.

- Windstops are made of a single piece mesh fabric in an aluminum frame
column3:
the mesh itself reduces turbulence dramatically cutting noise level by 50%

- The Windstop extends your convertible driving season as heating becomes more intensified and is maintained within the driving compartment

- The Windstop rests on the rear trim panels behind the CDC LightBar - others rest in front of the LightBar risking damage to the bar. It is held in place with two adjustable quick-release straps as opposed to other models that use four straps risking additional wear.

- No modification is needed to the vehicle or LightBar! - When not in use the Windstop can be quickly unbuckled folded and stored in the trunk in its protective storage bag (included). It also fits safely under the top and does not need to be removed when raising the top.

Product Benefits
column4: >Single piece mesh fabric in an aluminum frame
column5: >Reduces turbulence dramatically cutting noise level by 50%

@2159@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2159@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-whipple-supercharger-belt-drive-555-3353/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Whipple Supercharger Belt Drive - 18-20 PSI/Black Snout (05-10)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-3353.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3353-2.jpg
column5:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3353-4.jpg^@^555-3353^@^

Tired of belts slipping breaking or simply being thrown off your Whipple supercharged Mustang when pushing it to the limit? Those days are now over! Steeda’s Belt Drive System for Whipple Supercharger was designed to prevent any such belt problems that are all too common during competition or just hardcore use of your Mustang.

Steeda designed this belt drive package to relocate the supercharger drive off the factory 6-rib system making it a dedicated 10-rib belt system which drives the supercharger and nothing else. Removing the supercharger drive from the primary accessory drive serves to eliminate any and all slippage problems that can occur including both on the initial tip in and under full load. The standard accessories are driven by a Steeda underdrive pulley for even more power and reduced accessory load.

Our 10-rib system is available in boost levels of approximately 11psi to 17psi on a Gen 1 Whipple system and approximately 13 to 19psi on a Gen 2 Whipple system with no slippage under any conditions and no throwing or breakage of the supercharger belt.

The package includes a new supercharger snout billet pulleys billet mounting plates 2 new belts and a heavy-duty belt tensioner. Although we recommend a Steeda hood it only takes a minor modification to fit the system under your stock hood. Full installation instructions including to the procedure for measuring stock hood clearance are included.

Already own a Steeda Belt Drive and want to change boost levels? Take a look at our separate lower boost pulley kits.

Important Note: Stated boost levels are estimates only based on GEN 2 Whipple superchargers and will vary widely depending on numerous factors including but not limited to: Exhaust configuration cylinder heads port configuration camshafts geographic elevation engine compression throttle body size boost gauge accuracy and other factors beyond the control of Steeda Autosports. Use numbers provided for guidance only. In general cars with large cams cylinder heads etc will have slightly lower boost levels.
column6:
>

Product Benefits

  • Multiple Boost Levels available
  • Eliminates belt breakage
  • Fits under stock hood (with minor modification)
  • More power to the ground

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Classic Design Concepts created this replacement Hood Strut Kit as a classy clean alternative to the standard rod. CDC's Hood Struts are gas-charged and make it markedly easier to get your hood open and closed while providing more room for maintenance and showing off all of your Mustang performance parts at car shows and other events.

These CDC Hood Struts are extremely easy to install and simply bolt on to your Mustang's stock hood without any modifications or drilling. Each of the brackets included in this kit are laser-cut to ensure perfect fitment every time. Each of these CDC hood strut kits comes with installation hardware and instructions.

Fits The Following Models: 2005-2014 Ford Mustang V6/V8.

Please note: Aftermarket Hoods - Modifications may be required for some aftermarket hoods. These CDC Hood Struts may not be able to support heavy aftermarket hoods in the open position. Lightweight hoods may be bowed slightly near the brackets and won't make flush contact with your fenders.

Product Benefits

@2170@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2170@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-sport-mustang-short-throw-shifter-555-7310/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Sport Mustang Short Throw Shifter Kit (05-10)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-7310.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-7310-2.jpg^@^555-7310^@^

The nickel-plated lever provides smooth shifts and longevity. Install this shifter with our improved Urethane Shifter Base Bushings for even greater control.

For V8 GT models looking for an even easier installation take a look at our Sport Shifter Assembly. This piece is our Sport shifter kit already assembled to a new factory shifter base assembly. Just swap it out for the OEM part and shift away!!

Product Benefits

  • Short throws yet comfortable reach
  • Prevents transmission damage
  • Smooth shifts and long lasting

Testimonial

I am not a performance driver anymore. These days my Mustang is my daily driver and weekend cruiser. So my needs in a short throw shifter are somewhat different than those of most enthusiasts. I wanted a shifter with a somewhat shorter throw than stock but still long enough for my relaxed shifting style. But most of all the shifter had to be as quiet as stock. I tried one of the very expensive performance shifters and liked the shorter throw but hated the amount of noise vibration and harshness (NVH) that it introduced so after about a month I went back to the shop and had them reinstall the stock shifter. I found out later that the NVH problem was due to damage caused by an improper installation so I don't know what it would have been like had it been properly installed.

Once back to using the stock shifter I realized how much I still wanted a shorter throw but without the NVH so I started asking around and came to the conclusion that the Steeda Short Throw Shifter might be my best option. After some conversation with the helpful people at Steeda I ordered and received their shifter. I had a different shop do the installation this time. Driving away after the installation I noticed an immediate difference that brought a grin to my face. This shifter was exactly what I was looking for! It has a nice throw that is shorter than stock but not too extreme. It has very precise movement and best of all it is just as quiet as the stock shifter! There is a slight click as it is pulled into each gear that is more felt than heard and is a reassuring confirmation that you are in the gear. The reverse lockout is positive without requiring too much effort (I had expected I would want to switch to the included lighter spring but decided it wasn't necessary once I tried it).

I can't say how it would do in performance use since that's not my style but if you are looking for a reasonably priced quality shifter with great feel and no added noise then the Steeda shifter is a great choice. I could not be more pleased!

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column1:
@2171@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2171@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-t-56-short-throw-shifter-555-7474/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Magnum XL Tri-Ax Mustang Short Throw Shifter T-56 (05-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-7474.jpg^@^555-7474^@^

The Tri-Ax shifter is one of the hottest selling shifters on the market thanks to it's proven track record for well over a decade of street and track use by tens of thousands of customers.

When the new Tremec T-56 Magnum XL started hitting the streets owners of current Tri-Ax shifters began coming to us asking for an upgrade. The result is our new Steeda Tri-Ax shifter for the Tremec Magnum XL transmission for 2005-2013 Mustang.

The Tremec T-56 Magnum XL is a new 6-speed manual transmission designed to replace the 2005-10 Mustang GT 5-speed transmission with it's remote mounted shifter set up and to also replace the Getrag MT-82 transmission in the 2011-13 Mustang. The new T-56 Magnum features a much more robust direct shifter connection eliminating the remote set up on the 2005-2010 models and greatly improving durability over the Getrag MT-82 in the 2011-13 models.

Our Tri-Ax shifter for this new transmission was designed with the same standards as all our other Tri-Ax shifters. Our shifter directly replaces the Tremec shifter that is supplied with the transmission and features our offset pre-load shift mechanism for "
column3:
2-3 shifts adjustable positive stops to prevent over extending the shift leverand a nickel plated pivot shaft that won't rust or stain.

As you would expect from our shifters they are CNC machined from 6061 T-6 aluminum with no welds castings or stampings that can break. Our internal design is the same design that has been repeatedly tested to over 1.5 million shifts with no measureable wear of the internal pivot mechanism. All other competitor's internal construction would never endure such a test without significant wear.

If you decide to step up to the new T-56 Magnum transmission take your upgrade all the way with our Tri-Ax shifter.

Product Benefits

  • "
column5:
coil springs find third gear for you - so you won't miss!
  • Smooth confident precise shifts with short throws
  • Adjustable positive stops prevent over extending the shift lever
  • Heavy duty construction. No welds stampings or castings to break
  • Heavy duty construction and durability no competitor can match

Steeda’s billet aluminum Pro Street shifter handle was originally designed for 05-10 Mustangs equipped with Tri-Ax shifters but it will also fit 79-04 Mustangs with stock and most aftermarket shifters including the Steeda Tri-Ax.

This beautiful and lightweight handle is made from 6061 billet aluminum and features a steel stud with a M12 x 1.75 thread pattern. Grade 10.9 mounting hardware included.

Note: Shift knobs for this handle must have a M12 x 1.75 thread pattern. 79-04 Mustangs use this thread pitch from the factory.

This special tool is designed to remove and install the pulley on Ford (and Eaton) superchargers. The replacement of the press-on supercharger pulley for the Ford series superchargers (Cobra Lightning and Harley-Davidson trucks) is a straight-forward procedure with this tool but does require that the engine be completely cooled down before removal of the existing pulley or installation of the replacement pulley. The best procedure is to allow the car/engine to sit overnight before beginning the procedure.

http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/8/4_tt41-4u.jpg^@^574-HREFF15-Liquid Silver-1810^@^

Give your Mustang a sporty European inspired look with a set of HRE FF15 wheels. The FF15 wheel features a stylish 15 spoke design that has a very slight concave face making it the perfect addition to your modern Mustang.

FlowForm is a unique casting and forming process that results in a wheel that is similar to the strength and weight of a forged wheel. The wheel is low pressure cast aluminum that is rapidly cooled and condensed to enhance its elastic strength and durability. The cast wheel is then placed in a flow forming tool where rollers press against the barrel to stretch the rim into a pre-defined final width and shape. This "
column8:
process improves the grain structure of the aluminum making the wheel much stronger and lighter than a standard cast aluminum wheel.

HRE Performance wheels feature a durable powder coated finish that is tough enough to stand up against the daily hazards of everyday driving. This HRE Performance Wheel is completed in a high-gloss "
column10:
finish for an aggressive eye catching look.

Note: These are special order only.

Product Benefits

  • State of the art low pressure cast flow formed wheel
  • Durable Liquid Silver powder coated finish
  • Can be installed as a set or staggered
  • Starting at 19 lbs. each

column1: @2193@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2193@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-2011-2014-mustang-lightweight-radiator-support-555-5080/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Lightweight Radiator Support (11-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-5080.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/8/555-5080(1).jpg^@^555-5080^@^

Steeda's Lightweight Tubular Front Radiator Support was the first one on the market that allowed you to maintain your front swaybar and reduce weight at the same time! Our competitors took years before catching on to this.

Our engineers designed this support from super strong and light 4130 chrome moly alloy steel material. This resulted in a tubular support that is much lighter than the factory piece. Your factory radiator support weighs in at 17 pounds our easy to install radiator support comes in at less than 7 pounds for an easy 10+ pound weight reduction off the front of the car. That is over half the weight of the stock steel unit and yet is still strong enough for you to run your front swaybar when not at the drag strip and tough enough to withstand the rigors of autocross and road course competition. This support is the perfect item for the road course/autocross car to reduce front end weight and improve weight distribution.

Compared to changing the K-member our tubular radiator support improves weight distribution by 0.3% and takes weight right off the nose of the car which is ideal. A typical tubular K-member improves weight distribution 0.4% yet costs many hundreds of dollars more is much more complicated/costly to install which ads even more cost and is not removing weight from the front nose of the vehicle making ours the best bang for your buck piece for performance and weight reduction.

Our tubular radiator support works with or without the swaybar also with or without the factory Z-brace found underneath the 2011-14 GT models. Fits the factory original Steeda and most aftermarket front swaybars.

Our radiator support is tig welded and powdercoated in silver metal flake which makes for a great looking piece. It accepts all factory hardware also. This brace bolts directly in place of the factory piece and can be installed by practically anyone in their garage or driveway.

Product Benefits

  • Lightweight thin-wall tubing
  • Optional use of swaybar or Z-brace
  • Lower splash shield can be re-used (with zip-ties)

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column1: @2194@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2194@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-complete-front-and-rear-brake-kit-94-04-cobra-077-001-kit/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Complete Front & Rear Brake Kit (94-04 Cobra)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/077-001-kit.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/077-001-kit-2.jpg^@^077-001-KIT^@^

Product and Design

Each premium grade rotor is quality controlled precision drilled and mill slotted with 30 years of engineering experience manning the process. Our precision design pattern for holes and slots results in a reduction of up to 200 degree Fahrenheit in temperature compared to original OE rotors. This is imperative to safety during heavy breaking and in rain this pattern dissipates water improving your braking in any weather condition.

The slot pattern acts as a mechanism to constantly clean the pad surface to ensure maximum grip every time you apply your brakes. Cooler operation reduces the risk of brake fade and of warping the rotor always ensuring maximum friction between pad and rotor. This prolongs the maximum effective life of both the rotor and the pad.

With all these mechanisms at work to achieve the benefits of safety and performance our designs also allow them to operate at low noise levels ensuring comfort and convenience.

Design Options

Today's vehicles have very open patterned alloy rims exposing the brake rotor. Intensive design and a quality finish with a bright Zinc Electroplating treatment ensures a very clean and eye catching rotor that does not rust.

Kit Includes

  • Front &
column5:

  • Zinc Electroplated rotor that does not rust
  • ISO 9001:2008 Certified

@2202@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2202@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-transmission-speedometer-plug-555-7072/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Transmission Speedometer Plug (99-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-7072.jpg^@^555-7072^@^

Our new speedometer plug covers up the mechanical speedometer gear access hole in the new TKO 500 and TKO 600 transmissions so they can be used on 1999 and newer Mustangs with electronic speedometer pickups.

The new TKO transmissions are equipped with dual speedometer pickups to work with either electronic or mechanical speedometer pickups. A plug is required to cover the mechanical access hole if it is not being used. The plug also fits most common Ford transmissions such as T-5 and T-45 for use on race cars without speedometers.

Product Benefits

  • Covers up the gear access hole
  • Designed with Steeda style and craftsmanship!

Time to install: About 10 Minutes

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

@2203@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2203@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-tremec-tr-3650-mustang-short-throw-shifter-555-7363/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Tri-Ax Mustang Short Throw Shifter for Tremec TR-3650 (01-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-7363.jpg^@^555-7363^@^

Like the rest of the Tri-Ax line the new shifter has been specifically engineered for the new transmission yet retains all the great features of the current line-up of Tri-Ax shifters.

The Tri-Ax starts with precision CNC machined billet aluminum body. The body's heavy-duty construction features no welds stampings or castings for ultimate durability and precision engineering to fit right.

Inside the pivot shaft has been specially designed to have the correct pivot ratio and short shift-throw for theTR-3650. The nickel-plated shaft won't rust or stain and has been machined to exacting tolerances for smooth precise operation. Offset pre-load springs make sure you find third gear every time and adjustable positive stops prevent damage to the transmission. Up top the Tri-Ax features an exclusive boot guard to prevent damage to the factory inner boot two-position adjustable handle height and a new forged Tri-Ax shift handle. The forged aluminum handle is strongest and lightest handle available on the market. Its unique three-axis bend places the shift knob closer to the driver for fast precise and comfortable shifts.

Product Benefits

  • Ultimate durability and precision engineering
  • Won't rust or stain
  • Fast precise comfortable shifts
  • No complicated unnecessary adjustments unlike competitive designs

Not all Mustang shifters are created equal. Learn more about what makes Steeda stand out from the crowd: http://www.steedablog.com/2010/04/tri-ax-shifter-extreme-engineering/

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Once you change the gears in your differential you need a new speedometer gear to recalibrate your speedometer. They're inexpensive and only take a few minutes to change.

These Recalibration Gears fit 1979-1998 Mustangs. Please check our Hot New Product Section for information on 1999 and 2002 Mustangs.

Instructions: Note transmission type model and resulting drive gear. Cross reference with your rear-end gear ratio to find the correct "
column3:
gear for your application.

Manual Transmissions with 7 Tooth Drive Gear

  • 1983-1989 T-5 OEM
  • Pre 1993 T-5 Aftermarket
  • 1996-1998 Cobra T-45 OEM
  • All Tremec Transmissions

Manual Transmissions with 8 Tooth Drive Gear

  • 1990-1995 T-5 OEM
  • 1996-1998 T-45 OEM Except Cobra

Automatic Transmissions with 7 Tooth Drive Gear

  • 1983-1989 Automatic Transmissions

Automatic Transmissions with 8 Tooth Drive Gear

  • 1990-1998 Automatic Transmissions

Product Benefits

  • Easy to install
