@2217@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2217@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-underdrive-pulleys-701-0002/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Underdrive Pulleys (96-99 Cobra 02 Bullitt)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/701-0002.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/701-0002-10.jpg
column12:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/701-0002-9.jpg^@^701-0002^@^

Steeda is the leader in underdrive pulley design for the 4.6L engines. Steeda was the first to achieve SFI approval on our underdrive pulleys for all 4.6L engines. Our underdrive pulleys are the only pulleys engineered through our unique partnership in Ford's technology transfer program to have the proper torsional vibration dampening characteristics for your 4.6L engine. No other manufacturer can make this claim.

Don't be fooled by other manufacturer's and their "
column14: process claims. Steeda uses the latest technology directly from O.E. sources. Steeda's crank pulley is a one piece nodular iron injection molded rubber design. Not a cheap &quot
column16:
design like many of our competitors use. Special rubber materials were chosen for their ability to absorb the torsional vibrations and their ability to withstand underhood temperatures.

Steeda's underdrive pulleys slow down accessory speed by about 25% reducing parasitic acccessory drag on the engine. This drag reduction results in an increase of up to 10 horsepower and increased gas mileage! Get back the horsepower and torque your belt driven accessories steal and start enjoying better performance and gas mileage today!

Notes: Midway through the production run for the 2001 model year Ford changed the design of the water pump on the 4.6L engine. The older style pump produced from 1996 to mid 2001 had a longer shaft. In January of 2001 the design of the pump was changed to a shorter shaft. This necessitated a change in the design of the pump pulley.

column23:
>1996 thru Mid-2001 Pulley
Use Part #701-0001 for GT 701-0002 for Cobra/Bullit


2003 Mach 1 DOES NOT use alternator pulley. Crankshaft U/D pulleys in very limited surplus order now while supplies last.

@2222@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2222@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-adjustable-panhard-bar-555-2552/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Comp Mustang Adjustable Panhard Bar (05-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-2552.jpg^@^555-2552^@^

A great step towards improved handling out back is to upgrade the panhard bar supplied by the manufacturer with our chrome-moly steel unit.

If you want to take your Mustang to competition level performance and be able to adjust your rear roll center you need our new Competition Adjustable Race Panhard Bar.

This panhard bar is made up of aerospace rod ends grade 12.9 hardware and high strength 4130 chrome moly alloy steel. This is a weld-in unit that will allow you to adjust your rear roll center with ease and eliminate all deflection associated with the factory panhard rod. Adjusting the roll center will allow you to dial handling balance of the vehicle by helping control under/over steer.

Take your handling to the next level with Steeda!

Product Benefits

  • Competition tested and proven!
  • Adjustable Rear Roll center
  • Dramatically improves Handling
  • Is a must for any performance car

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Steeda's Pro-Flow Inlet Elbow was designed specifically for our very popular S197 Mustang Cold Air Intake.

The Pro-Flow intake tube is available in a high temperature heat resistant plastic or available in real carbon fiber.

The high quality construction allows for colder air induction system temperatures resulting in less heat soak and lower air charge temperatures than competitive brands using metal tubes.

We have seen gains up to 8 horsepower and 8 ft lbs of torque to the tires throughout the entire power-band!!!

No additional tune is needed for this kit if you are already using a Steeda cold air intake with SCT or Diablo tuning package and installation is quick and simple. This kit includes gloss blue or black 4 ply silicone hose connectors stainless steel hose clamps and instructions.

555-3141 - Black Silicone Hose Upgrade

This Black Silicone upgrade kit is designed for the S197 GT Mustangs. You can replace the blue hoses with these black ones to match your car better! Fit's Steeda CAI for GT S197's (555-3130 &
column5:
555-3131) and Ford Racing CAI with the Steeda upgraded elbow.

Note: Will work with FRPP intakes but will require retuning if using FRPP's tune with one of our SCT tuners.

Product Benefits

  • High quality plastic inlet elbow allows for colder air charge than competitive metal brands.
  • Easily installs in minutes and Looks great!
  • Smooths incoming air for more Horsepower and Torque to the rear tires!
  • Perfect upgrade to your Steeda or Ford Racing Cold Air Intake Kit.

Time to install: About 15 Minutes

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column1: @2302@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2302@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-2013-2014-shelby-gt500-cold-air-intake-555-3173/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda GT500 Mustang BIG BORE Cold Air Intake (13-14 GT500)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-3173.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3173-2.jpg
column7:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-3173-6.jpg^@^555-3173^@^

Designed tested and assembled all in-house. This kit completely replaces the factory intake assembly. This kit is specifically designed to utilize the factory cold air feed from the grille and incorporates a serviceable high flow air filter an injection molded high flow intake tube billet velocity stack and black powder-coated heat shield.

With a huge 130mm mass air flow tube diameter we achieved a substantial increase in air flow at all engine rpm's not just at redline. Because of the huge size of the mass air housing this kit must be used with a custom tuning device such as our SCT tuners. The heat shield seals to the hood liner and also keeps the factory cold air feed duct to keep out hot engine bay air for maximum power.

Power gains are substantial when combined with our required SCT custom tuning. Peak to peak gains of up to 60 horsepower can be expected with point to point horsepower gains of over 70 horsepower. You can expect peak to peak torque gains of up to 54 ft/lbs with point to point gains of over 68 ft/lbs.

Our easy to install kit comes with premium hardware silicone sleeves and installation instructions.

Product Benefits

  • Gains up to 70 horsepower and 68 lb/ft of torque!
  • Utilizes the factory cold air feed duct from the grille for low air charge temperatures
  • Beautiful black powder-coated heat shield
  • ProFlow roto molded intake tube offers minimal heat soak maintaining cool air charge temps

Read more about the advantages in Steeda Mustang Cold Air Intakes over the competitors on our blog: http://www.steedablog.com/2012/03/mustang-cold-air-intake-truth/

Note: Federal and several state and provincial laws prohibit the removal modification or rendering inoperative of any part that affects emissions or safety on motor vehicles used on public streets or highways. Steeda Autosports assumes no liability for any violations arising out of any federal state or provincial emissions or safety requirements on motor vehicles arising out of the customer’s modifications and/or use of Steeda products. It is the responsibility of the customer to determine if their modified vehicle complies with applicable laws.

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Classic Design Concept's Shaker System is now available for the 2010 Mustang GT. CDC's shaker system brings the 1969 Mach1 muscle car look to the new redesigned S197. Not only will your Mustang look better but this component also works as a completely functional Ram Air product that will boost performance with an increase in horsepower.

This CDC Ram Air Cold Air Package includes a pre-assembled engine cover with cast aluminum scoop all the necessary hardware duct work instructions and templates for an easy installation.

The Mustang Shaker was engineered with multiple water management systems to prevent water from entering the engine making foul-weather driving concerns a thing of the past.

The CDC Shaker System uses the factory air box so engine flashing is not necessary leaving your emissions unchanged and warranty intact.

Bummed that you bought a 2009 Mustang GT and found that you couldn't use Steeda’s Charge Motion Plates? Well we have the prescription for happiness! Steeda’s 2009 Charge Motion Delete Plugs eliminate the butterflies giving your intake air a smooth shot into the head.

Machined from billet aluminum these plugs are a great upgrade for your 2009 Mustang. As used on Steeda's Q350 Mustangs Steeda's plugs reduce turbulence and improve airflow in the intake path for more horsepower and torque!

Steeda's charge motion delete plugs require computer recalibration for use which is available with any of our SCT tuning devices! Once tuned charge motion plates will not sacrifice any low end torque and provide midrange and upper rpm horsepower and torque increases. Peak increases of 10 horsepower or more have been seen on naturally aspirated applications larger gains possible on supercharged engines. Install them now and maximize your power curve today!

Note: If nitrous injection ports are desired on a 2009 or 2010 a 2005-2008 manifold can be used on 2009-2010 engine with Steeda’s Charge Motion Plates.

Product Benefits

  • More Horsepower to the Tires!
  • Made from Billet Aluminum
  • Increased airflow

@2316@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2316@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-v6-mustang-power-pack-555-3938/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Ultimate Induction Pack (11-14 V6)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/382/detailed/2/555-3938.jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/x4_6z9n-1z.jpg^@^555-3938^@^

Steeda Autosports the world's largest aftermarket manufacturer of Ford performance equipment is once again leading the performance market with our High Velocity Cold Air Intake (CAI). This intake was designed using CAD data supplied exclusively by Ford Motor Company via our Technology Transfer program with Ford engineers.

This high performance CAI effectively opens up the intake system of Ford's new 3.7L power plant and allows it to breathe much more freely than the stock intake system allows - taking your 2011 3.7L V6 Mustang to the next level of performance.

The 2011 3.7L V6 Mustang’s intake system from Ford is an excellent piece one of the best ever to come out of Dearborn. But as usual the engineers at Steeda were up to the challenge of making it even better for the performance customer that demands more power.

Our engineers started with a large surface area high-flow nano-fiber air filter added our famous “race-tested” velocity stack entry and then designed a stainless steel heat shield with a durable rubber gasket to seal the shield against the vehicle’s hood. Next we increased the MAF housing size and coupled it to a new higher flowing Pro-Flow inlet hose with our Cool-Tube Technology.

To ensure the densest air charge possible we retained the factory cold air feed ducting from the front bumper. Steeda was the first company to do this starting in 2010 with our 2010 GT intake and have carried this innovation over to the 2011 model. We also sealed the stainless steel shield to the hood to prevent any hot air from being sucked in from around the engine compartment. Some manufacturers have chosen to ignore the factory cold air ducting while others don't bother to seal and isolate the airbox which are both keys to keeping the lowest air charge temperatures possible. Also our billet aluminum velocity stack and high flow air filter ensure a clean streamlined air charge into the engine.

This Cold Air Intake is so effective at improving airflow into the five-liter engine that a performance tune is not just recommended it is required for maximum performance! In an effort to maximize performance and provide our customers with only the very best products we have partnered with the leader in automotive tuning - SCT Performance and their X4 tuning device.

Combined with the required custom tunes in the included SCT X4 Flash programming device we have achieved dramatic power increases of up to 24hp and 30ft/lbs of torque!

SCT Performance is the leader in the Ford tuning industry and Steeda's partner in developing this powerful package.

"
column3: SCT has seen the highest horsepower and torque results while using Steeda's Cold Air Kit over any other brand.&quot
column4:
- Chris Johnson President of SCT Performance

Our power increase it not just a peak number at one point in the band. The actual power increase is spread throughout the entire rpm range so your increased performance is available on demand in any gear at virtually any rpm! For automatic transmission equipped vehicles shift points and shift firmness are modified to improve performance as well. Also expect noticeably improved throttle response no matter what transmission you have.

Note: requires a minimum of 91 octane fuel for power gains.

Warning: This part has been designed and is intended for off-road application only. Installation of this part on a vehicle that is driven on public roads may violate U.S. and Canadian laws and regulations.

Lifetime Tune Program: Purchasing this Steeda Power Package automatically registers you into Steeda's Lifetime Tune Program at no extra cost! To learn more about Steeda's Lifetime Tune Program click here.

Product Benefits

  • Complete package including cold air and tuner
  • Gains of up to 24hp and 30 ft/lbs of torque
  • Improved throttle response
  • Easy installation

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

The Ford Racing High Performance Hydraulic Roller Lifter fits 1985-1995 5.0L and 5.8L V8 Mustangs and is ideal for any performance or racing applications.

The Modified OEM lifter features ceramic check ball and higher rate piddle valve spring to improve performance at higher RPMs and higher oil temperatures. Ford Racing dyno tests have shown 200 to 300 RPM increase in RPM range over stock OEM type hydraulic roller lifter in Ford Racing sealed crate engines.

Uses OEM dog-bone type tie bars and retainer plate components.

Product Benefits

  • High Performance hydraulic roller tappet
  • Direct replacement for the OEM small block hydraulic roller lifter applications
  • Sold in a set of 16 lifters

Time to install: About 4 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Required

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Replace your weak factory 5.0L block with this super strong block from Ford Racing! Stronger than the original Boss 302 block this block features splayed 4-bolt mains on #23and 4 main caps. It will accept the factory Mustang oil pan with a custom pickup tube and can be bored up to 4.125 bore size. Deck height is 8.2 inches. This block accepts 1/2 inch head bolts and uses common outer diameter cam bearings. A great foundation for high horsepower 302 based engines.

  • Big Bore Capacity up to 4.125 inches
  • Excellent for high horsepower buildups

column1: @2329@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2329@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-underdrive-pulleys-701-0001/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Underdrive Pulleys (96-Mid 01 GT)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/701-0001.jpg

column13:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/701-0001-9.jpg^@^701-0001^@^

Steeda is the leader in underdrive pulley design for the 4.6L engines. Steeda was the first to achieve SFI approval on our underdrive pulleys for all 4.6L engines. Our underdrive pulleys are the only pulleys engineered through our unique partnership in Ford's technology transfer program to have the proper torsional vibration dampening characteristics for your 4.6L engine. No other manufacturer can make this claim.

Don't be fooled by other manufacturer's and their "
column15: process claims. Steeda uses the latest technology directly from O.E. sources. Steeda's crank pulley is a one piece nodular iron injection molded rubber design. Not a cheap &quot
column17:
design like many of our competitors use. Special rubber materials were chosen for their ability to absorb the torsional vibrations and their ability to withstand underhood temperatures.

Steeda's underdrive pulleys slow down accessory speed by about 25% reducing parasitic acccessory drag on the engine. This drag reduction results in an increase of up to 10 horsepower and increased gas mileage! Get back the horsepower and torque your belt driven accessories steal and start enjoying better performance and gas mileage today!

Notes: Midway through the production run for the 2001 model year Ford changed the design of the water pump on the 4.6L engine. The older style pump produced from 1996 to mid 2001 had a longer shaft. In January of 2001 the design of the pump was changed to a shorter shaft. This necessitated a change in the design of the pump pulley.

column1: @2331@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2331@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-suspension-package-555-2321/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda G/Trac Mustang Suspension Package - Stage 3 (96-98 Cobra)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-2321.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2321-2.jpg
column5:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2321-4.jpg^@^555-2321^@^

Steeda's G/Trac Suspension Systems include everything needed to build an awesome handling car with excellent street manners. Steeda designed these parts using Computer Aided Design (CAD) software and the experience gained from years at the racetrack. Each stage provides an outstanding improvement in performance and a well balanced car in an affordable package.

Stage 3 completes the suspension. Your total G/Trac suspension completely transforms an average performer into a world class sports car capable of out-handling anything on the road.

  • Aluminum Lower Control Arms reduce unsprung weight and dramatically improve traction and control while maintaining a smooth quiet ride.
  • Lightweight high strength Tubular Front Swaybar reduces body roll for flatter more stable and faster cornering.
  • Our exclusive Offset Front A-Arm bushings push the control arms forward to improve weight distribution and steering response. Bushings are formed from special urethane compounds for ride quality superior to typical urethane or Delron.
  • Uncoated 4130 Chrome-Moly Alloy Subframe Connectors reduce body twist and improve handling by strengthening the structure which supports the suspension. These connectors prevent fatigue from shortening the life of your car.

Time to install: About 9 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 1998 1997 1996

Model(s): Cobra

Transmission(s): Manual

Our high flow 55lb injectors are for high horsepower applications using EV6 style injectors. Can be used in older EV1 style injectors with an EV1 to EV6 style harness connector.

We include an injector data sheet to assist in tuning. Whether you are a hobbyist using SCT Pro Racer software or paying a professional to dyno tune your vehicle the supplied injector data will make the tuning task much easier. With the proper injector data you can insure proper idle quality smooth part throttle cruising great throttle response and proper wide open throttle fueling.

  • Injector tuning data supplier
  • High Flow 55lb/hr capacity
  • Ford O.E. quality

column1: @2333@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2333@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-suspension-package-555-2135/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda G/Trac Mustang Suspension Package - Stage 1 (98 Cobra)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-2135.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2135-2.jpg
column5:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2135-4.jpg^@^555-2135^@^

Steeda's G/Trac Suspension Systems include everything needed to build an awesome handling car with excellent street manners. Steeda's G/trac suspension components are proven components tested through decades of experience gained from street and racetrack testing.

Each stage provides an outstanding improvement in performance and a well balanced car at the end of each stage. This means you do not have to do each stage in numerical order to achieve improvements. Each stage can be done individually at any time as your budget or upgrade needs dictate.

Steeda’s Stage 1 suspension package lays the foundation for proper handling and builds a base for any future modifications by addressing three essential elements needed for performance.

  • Sport Lowering Springs lower the center of gravity and reduce body roll while maintaining the great ride quality Steeda springs are known for.
  • Strut Tower and lower G/Trac braces stiffen the body structure to stabilize the suspension during hard cornering and reduce body shake and rattles. Steeda G/Trac bars are included with 86-93 cars. 94+ have factory G/Trac style bars so our kits do not include them.
  • Caster Camber Plates allow you to set proper alignment and improve caster geometry while eliminating suspension “slop” at the top of the strut tower. Improved caster gives you straighter highway tracking with less wander and better self centering steering feel. Increased caster also gives you better tire contact patch area during braking or better more consistent braking performance.

Time to install: About 7 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Model year(s): 1998

Model(s): Cobra

Transmission(s): Manual

column4:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-7042-3.jpg^@^555-7042^@^

The factory plastic self-adjusting quadrant is fine for stock clutches but when you add a heavy duty clutch or some fast power-shifts it starts to bend. This unwanted flex causes inconsistent clutch engagement and missed shifts at best plus worn synchronizers and a broken quadrant at worst. Replace that weak plastic clutch quadrant with Steeda's super strong billet aluminum "
column6:
quadrant. The strong flex free billet quadrant design stands up to the hardest shifts.

Steeda's exclusive Double Hook design lets you use your choice of an adjustable clutch cable or firewall mounted cable adjuster. Or use both together for the ultimate adjustment versatility. With other quadrants you are locked into one type of adjustment mechanism. With Steeda's Double Hook Quadrant the choice is yours!

Product Benefits

  • Patented Product - US Patent 445238

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Once you change the gears in your differential you need a new speedometer gear to recalibrate your speedometer. They're inexpensive and only take a few minutes to change.

These Recalibration Gears fit 1979-1998 Mustangs. Please check our Hot New Product Section for information on 1999 and 2002 Mustangs.

Instructions: Note transmission type model and resulting drive gear. Cross reference with your rear-end gear ratio to find the correct "
column3:
gear for your application.

Manual Transmissions with 7 Tooth Drive Gear

  • 1983-1989 T-5 OEM
  • Pre 1993 T-5 Aftermarket
  • 1996-1998 Cobra T-45 OEM
  • All Tremec Transmissions

Manual Transmissions with 8 Tooth Drive Gear

  • 1990-1995 T-5 OEM
  • 1996-1998 T-45 OEM Except Cobra

Automatic Transmissions with 7 Tooth Drive Gear

  • 1983-1989 Automatic Transmissions

Automatic Transmissions with 8 Tooth Drive Gear

  • 1990-1998 Automatic Transmissions

Product Benefits

  • Allows speedo to work with changed differential gears
  • Easy to install

@2338@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2338@^http://www.steeda.com/ford-racing-mustang-torsen-differential-161-m-4204-t28/^@^Steeda^@^Ford Racing Mustang Torsen Differential (79-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/161-m-4204-t28.jpg^@^161-M-4204-T28^@^

Torsen differentials are among the best torque sensing differentials you can buy.

Torsen differentials allow you to transfer power smoothly to the ground minimizing wheelspin and maximizing acceleration both in straightline and cornering situations.

Available in 28 and 31 spline axle applications.

Note: 2004 &
column2:
earlier Mustangs come factory equipped with 28 spline axles except for 2003-04 Cobra which is 31 spline. All 2005+ Mustangs come equipped with 31 spline axles.

Product Benefits

  • Torque sensing differential
  • Available in 28 or 31 spline
  • Smooth and quiet power delivery

Time to install: About 4 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

column1:
@2339@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2339@^http://www.steeda.com/ford-racing-mustang-flywheel-161-m-6375-r00b/^@^Steeda^@^Ford Racing 6-Bolt Aluminum Mustang Flywheel - 96-04 GT^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/161-m-6375-r00b.jpg^@^161-M-6375-R00B^@^

Whenever you install a new clutch it's a good idea to replace the flywheel to reduce clutch chatter and promote maximum durability.

Many shops use a basic resurfacing machine that leaves hot spots and heat cracks on your flywheel as well as regularly leaving high spots that can cause uneven engagement and accelerated wear.

Upgrage to a billet steel flywheel that meets SFI spec 1.1 and add extra safety and prevent flywheel failure from excessive horsepower heat and high RPM.

Ford Racing aluminum flywheels are also SFI approved and will greatly reduce rotating mass for improved acceleration and response.

Don't trust your flywheel on your high horsepower Mustang to resurfacing. Do your clutch right the first time with a new flywheel.

Note: Some 4.6L 2V engines may have 8 bolt instead of 6 bolt crankshafts. Romeo plant built engines have 6 bolts Windsor plant built engines have 8 bolts. Using the 8th digit of your VIN number VIN character X is for windsor engines VIN character W is for Romeo engines. Please identify your engine before ordering.

Product Benefits

  • Direct fit replacement
  • 6 or 8 bolt models available
  • Available for 6 or 8 bolt applications
  • SFI approved

Time to install: About 6 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 2004 2003 2002 2001 2000 1999 1998 1997 1996

Model(s): GT

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

@2343@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2343@^http://www.steeda.com/ford-racing-mustang-clutch-kit-161-m-7560-a302n/^@^Steeda^@^Ford Racing Mustang Clutch Kit^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/530/detailed/5/ford-racing-mustang-clutch-kit-161-m-7560-a302n.jpg^@^161-M-7560-A302N^@^

When it's time to replace the worn out stock clutch in your stock or mildly modified Mustang a Ford Racing Performance Clutch kit is the perfect balance of performance and drive-ability.

The Ford Racing Performance Clutch will give you additional holding power for mild performance upgraded Mustangs. Get the grip you want without sacrificing the quality of your driving experience.

The Ford Racing Performance Clutch kit requires up to 10% less pedal effort than stock making shifting faster easier and a lot more fun.

This kit includes the clutch pressure plate and throw out bearing for an easy installation.

Note: it is recommended to replace the pilot bearing and that you may need to pick up a clutch alignment tool which are not included.

Note: Diameter - 10.5"

column1: @2368@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2368@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-lightweight-96-04-mustang-k-member-555-5078/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Lightweight Mustang K-Member - (96-04)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-5078.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/10552593_720861154648419_2087161391824705823_n.jpg^@^555-5078^@^

Steeda's SN95 K-Member was designed to shed some weight from the front end without requring a full suspension replacement or requireing modified geometry.

Made from a mix of 4130 chrome moly and low alloy steel our K-member is approximately 19 lbs lighter than the OE K-member. The control arm cups were designed to accept unmodified stock control arms so tubular control arms are not required.

Our k-member features 2 lower control arm mounting positions for fine tuning of roll center geometry. One position if for cars at stock ride height or less than 1 inch lower than stock. The second position is recommended for cars 1 to 1 1/2 inches lower than stock. For further roll center correction if you are lowered more than 1 1/2 inches check out our X2 Ball Joints.

Finally while the rack can be positioned in the stock location we've made it adjustable for changes to the Ackerman geometry. Ackerman adjustment is a must for the serious road racer.

Note: Only compatible with Rack bushings with standard 3/4 inch hole such as our urethane rack bushings. Ours as well as any other aftermarket aluminum bushings with smaller than 3/4 inch holes will not work.

Product Benefits

  • 19 pounds lighter than stock k-member
  • Accepts stock control arms and tubular control arms that work with stock K-members
  • Two control arm positions to compensate for vehicle lowering (can also be used with X2 ball joints)
  • Adjustable Ackerman geometry

Time to install: About 3 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

@2371@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2371@^http://www.steeda.com/bbk-off-road-mustang-x-pipe-035-1664/^@^Steeda^@^BBK Off-Road Mustang X-Pipe (94-95 5.0L)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/ae272f75-5a20-4ed8-8e65-102036beb372.JPG^@^035-1664^@^

Add horsepower and torque to the rear wheels with a BBK Off-road X pipe. A BBK X pipe will greatly improve your Mustang's exhaust flow to increase it's overall performance and sound. This BBK direct replacement X-pipe features 2.5"
column2:
diameter CNC mandrel bent aluminized tubing and a merged X crossover to improve exhaust flow. Additional features include factory O2 sensor locations and OEM style die-stamped flanges.

Specifically designed to fit the 1994 to 1995 5.0L V8 Mustangs this Off-Road X-pipe is a direct fit replacement for the stock mid pipe. Please note: This BBK product is not legal for use in emission restrictive states.

Steeda's billet strut tower brace provides the best of both worlds. Appearance and increased front end rigidity. This strut tower brace features billet CNC machined endcaps and a chrome moly allow steel bar for the ultimate in strength light weight and looks.

Steeda's billet strut tower brace will reduce front end flex improving handling over rough surfaces and ride quality. Easy bolt in installation that can be done in your driveway with simple hand tools.

Notes: Steeda strut tower braces designed for use with Whipple Superchargers are not compatible with stock hood clearances. You must have an aftermarket hood with proper clearance.

Product Benefits

  • Improves front chassis stiffness
  • Improves ride quality over rough surfaces
  • Improves vehicle handling

@2397@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2397@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-2007-2009-shelby-gt500-mustang-short-throw-shifter-555-7307/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Tri-Ax Shelby GT500 Mustang Short Shifter (07-09 GT500)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-7307.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-7307-2.jpg
column4:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-7307-3.jpg^@^555-7307^@^

Like the tens of thousands of Tri-Ax shifters that came before it this Tri-Ax carries over many of the same great features that make the Tri-Ax shifter the best shifter available for your GT500 Mustang.

Short throws precise action our unique two-position handle height and calibrated internal spring tension to assist you in never missing 3rd gear! This last feature is original and exclusive to the GT500 Tri-Ax and not found in any other GT500 shifter!

The factory steel mounting rail is replaced with a substantial billet beam for more positive location
column5:
and upgraded rear mounting bushings are supplied to further reduce deflection under hard shifting. The shifter base handle and beam are all CNC machined by Steeda from 6061 aluminum.

Often imitated but never truly duplicated get the original and best line of short throw shifters for your Mustang!

Product Benefits

  • Superior patented Steeda technology!
  • Internal spring tension not found in ANY other shifter!
  • Complete billet design from 6061 aluminum made in the USA in house at Steeda!
  • Never miss 3rd gear again!
  • No complicated unnecessary adjustments unlike competitive designs

Not all Mustang shifters are created equal. Learn more about what makes Steeda stand out from the crowd: http://www.steedablog.com/2010/04/tri-ax-shifter-extreme-engineering/

Testimonial

I am not a performance driver anymore. These days my Mustang is my daily driver and weekend cruiser. So my needs in a short throw shifter are somewhat different than those of most enthusiasts. I wanted a shifter with a somewhat shorter throw than stock but still long enough for my relaxed shifting style. But most of all the shifter had to be as quiet as stock. I tried one of the very expensive performance shifters and liked the shorter throw but hated the amount of noise vibration and harshness (NVH) that it introduced so after about a month I went back to the shop and had them reinstall the stock shifter. I found out later that the NVH problem was due to damage caused by an improper installation so I don't know what it would have been like had it been properly installed.

Once back to using the stock shifter I realized how much I still wanted a shorter throw but without the NVH so I started asking around and came to the conclusion that the Steeda Short Throw Shifter might be my best option. After some conversation with the helpful people at Steeda I ordered and received their shifter. I had a different shop do the installation this time. Driving away after the installation I noticed an immediate difference that brought a grin to my face. This shifter was exactly what I was looking for! It has a nice throw that is shorter than stock but not too extreme. It has very precise movement and best of all it is just as quiet as the stock shifter! There is a slight click as it is pulled into each gear that is more felt than heard and is a reassuring confirmation that you are in the gear. The reverse lockout is positive without requiring too much effort (I had expected I would want to switch to the included lighter spring but decided it wasn't necessary once I tried it).

I can't say how it would do in performance use since that's not my style but if you are looking for a reasonably priced quality shifter with great feel and no added noise then the Steeda shifter is a great choice. I could not be more pleased!

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column1: @2401@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2401@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-sport-mustang-short-throw-shifter-555-7306/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Sport Mustang Short Throw Shifter (05-09)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-7306.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-7306-2.jpg
column4:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/555-7306-3.jpg^@^555-7306^@^

The Steeda Sport shifter is far superior to other competitors offerings and very competitively priced! This shifter has a revised pivot ratio that gives you short throws while maintaining a comfortable reach. Comes with a billet aluminum top plate that features adjustable shifter stops to prevent transmission damage from over extension of the shift handle. This feature is not found in any of the current competitions offerings. Nickel-plated lever provides smooth shifts and longevity. Install with our improved urethane bushings (sold separately) for even greater control.

Note: Unassembled Steeda Sport Shifter Kit also available.

Product Benefits

  • No Dynomat® needed to cover up shifter buzz
  • Smoothest shifter on the market... Period.
  • Short throws yet comfortable reach
  • Prevents transmission damage
  • Engineered right the First Time
  • No unnecessary adjustments or gimmicks
  • Lifetime Warranty

Not all Mustang shifters are created equal. Learn more about what makes Steeda stand out from the crowd: http://www.steedablog.com/2010/04/tri-ax-shifter-extreme-engineering/

Testimonial

I am not a performance driver anymore. These days my Mustang is my daily driver and weekend cruiser. So my needs in a short throw shifter are somewhat different than those of most enthusiasts. I wanted a shifter with a somewhat shorter throw than stock but still long enough for my relaxed shifting style. But most of all the shifter had to be as quiet as stock. I tried one of the very expensive performance shifters and liked the shorter throw but hated the amount of noise vibration and harshness (NVH) that it introduced so after about a month I went back to the shop and had them reinstall the stock shifter. I found out later that the NVH problem was due to damage caused by an improper installation so I don't know what it would have been like had it been properly installed.

Once back to using the stock shifter I realized how much I still wanted a shorter throw but without the NVH so I started asking around and came to the conclusion that the Steeda Short Throw Shifter might be my best option. After some conversation with the helpful people at Steeda I ordered and received their shifter. I had a different shop do the installation this time. Driving away after the installation I noticed an immediate difference that brought a grin to my face. This shifter was exactly what I was looking for! It has a nice throw that is shorter than stock but not too extreme. It has very precise movement and best of all it is just as quiet as the stock shifter! There is a slight click as it is pulled into each gear that is more felt than heard and is a reassuring confirmation that you are in the gear. The reverse lockout is positive without requiring too much effort (I had expected I would want to switch to the included lighter spring but decided it wasn't necessary once I tried it).

I can't say how it would do in performance use since that's not my style but if you are looking for a reasonably priced quality shifter with great feel and no added noise then the Steeda shifter is a great choice. I could not be more pleased!

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column2:

Steeda's rear axle catch can is made from aerospace grade billet aluminum and TIG welded for looks and strength. It comes with all necessary stainless steel and brass hardware. Comes with a custom made breather element. This kit replaces the factory axle vent found on all Mustang rear axles. Prevents loss of gear oil through the axle vent caused from heat expansion. Also prevents oil build-up underneath the car/axle assembly or spraying oil on the road/racing surface. Great for road racing.

Note: Steeda's catch can is designed to mount in the trunk of your Mustang for easy access. This can allow the smell of the differential fluid into the cabin of your Mustang. To avoid this you can alternatively mount the catch can under the car.

Product Benefits

  • Prevents any loss of fluid onto the pavement
  • Holds 6 ounces of oil (including connecting hose)
  • Made from billet aluminum and TIG welded

Level of difficulty: Easy

column2:

Ford Racing's Ported 3V Cylinder heads are production castings that have been CNC machine ported for increased flow and performance.

Specs for these cylinder heads are as follows:

  • 53 cc combustion chamber (Stock head is 51 cc)
  • Intake runner volume: 202cc (Stock 174cc)
  • Exhaust runner volume: 73cc (Stock 62cc)
  • Intake flow rate at .600 lift: 272 CFM
  • Exhaust flow rate at .600 lift: 190 CFM (no pipe)
  • Assembled with factory guides production springs valves retainers locks and seals

These heads do not include camshafts and related valve trail (followers lash adjusters etc). They use 2008-later GT high thread spark plugs. Will bolt up to 05-07 GT models but requires conversion to 08+ spark plugs and ignition coils (sold separately).

Recommend using Ford Racing head changing kit M-6067-3V46.

Note: Engines with late style 12MM spark plugs can be identified by coil engineering number 8L3E Engines with early style 16mm "

column1:
@2416@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2416@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-caster-camber-plates-555-8090-al/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Billet Mustang Caster Camber Plates - (90-93)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-8090-al.jpg^@^555-8090-AL^@^

Steeda aluminum caster camber plates dramatically improve your Mustangs handling with less weight &
column2:
more strength than steel!

Steeda's caster camber plates have always given you great adjustment range. Now we've added great style too with a new machined billet aluminum top plate that looks as good as it performs. But good looks aren't the only thing these plates have going for them. The beefy 1/2 inch thick aluminum plates are and an incredible 3 times more resistant to bending than our standard steel plates making them the perfect choice for coil-over equipped race cars that carry the entire front weight of the car through the caster camber plates.

Caster camber plates are essential for getting the most cornering performance out of your Mustang. The factory plates just don't have enough adjustment to give you a good performance alignment. Making matters worse the factory upper strut mount bushing is soft and flexible. During hard corners the strut literally pushes the bushing out of shape changing the alignment mid-corner. This reduces cornering grip and increases tire wear.

Steeda's Caster camber plates replace the flexible upper strut mount with a premium race quality stainless steel spherical bearing. The spherical bearing allows the strut to pivot and turn freely without the slightest bit of play or deflection. No matter how hard you corner the caster camber plate doesn't flex and your alignment stays where you set it.

Steeda plates give you slots to adjust Caster and Camber. Factory plates only let you adjust camber and even that has a very limited range. Steeda plates more-than-double the factory camber range allowing a perfect alignment for everything from drag cars to road racers to "
column3: slammed&quot
column4:
boulevard cruisers. Caster adjustment slots let you increase caster extra caster makes the car track straighter and provides better on-center steering feel. Increased caster allows you to run slightly more negative camber than factory spec on the street without increasing tire wear preserving tire life and improving handling. It also increases negative camber gain when the wheels are turned. In effect your tires lean into the corner as you turn the wheel improving the contact patch for better cornering grip. Increased caster will also improve your tire contact patch during braking for better stopping performance. Steeda Caster Camber Plates include recommended alignment settings for a variety of suspension setups and driving styles.

Strength &
column5:
Durability

  • Increase caster for better high-speed stability and better steering response
  • Correct camber for reduced tire wear and better cornering
  • Adjustable strut mount height for more suspension travel on lowered cars
  • Adjustable strut mount can be set to stock height which works better for drag racing than other plates which are too high and limit suspension extension at launch
  • Specific plates for 79-89 and 90-93 Mustangs fit better than generic "
column7:
offered by other aluminum plates
  • Spherical bearing for better alignment and durability
  • Teflon lined bearing never needs lubrication
  • Lighter than competing steel plates
  • Compatible with stock hoods and Steeda strut tower braces
column8:
not too tall like some plates
  • Direct bolt-on. No drilling required.

    • Read Steeda's blog post to learn more about the truth behind caster and camber products:http://www.steedablog.com/2012/08/the-truth-about-camber-caster-plates-and-strut-mounts/

    Time to install: About 2 Hours

    Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

    Tools needed: Basic Tools

column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/steeda-mustang-caster-camber-plates-555-8090-(2).jpg
column5:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/steeda-mustang-caster-camber-plates-555-8090-2-(4).jpg^@^555-8090-2^@^

Steeda's Caster Camber plates allow total adjustment of caster and camber for maximum handling or improved tire wear or a balance of both!

Dial in extra caster for straight line tracking and extra camber for tight cornering grip or set the car up for best tire wear. Full instructions are provided along with alignment suggestions to help set up your vehicle for street or track use.

Unlike some of our competitors who made a generic one size fits all plate to fit 79-93 we designed specific plates for 79-89 and 90-93 which have different unique strut towers. Our 94-04 plates have proven themselves since we designed them decades ago in IMSA and SCCA professional competition providing durability and a wide range of adjustment for both race and street use.

These plates are direct bolt on replacements and require no drilling for installation.

Strength &
column6:
Durability

  • Lifetime warranty on caster camber plates
  • Allows for independent setting of left &
column7:
right
  • Direct bolt-in - No modifications required
  • 1/2 the weight of other plates
  • Complete adjustment of caster and camber for better alignment - caster is not adjustable from the factory
  • Universal plates - perfect for street &
column8:
race!
  • Finally correct camber to eliminate excessive tire wear
  • Dial in more negative camber for better cornering
  • Reduce camber for less rolling resistance on drag cars
  • Add up to 2° more positive caster
  • Straighter tracking and better high speed stability
  • Better steering response quicker turn in
  • Precision spherical bearing with stainless steel race
  • Holds precise alignment in ALL driving conditions
  • Teflon lined bearing never needs lubrication
  • Bearing is replaceable
  • Less friction than stock bushings
  • Offset bushings allow custom adjustment of strut height
  • Increase suspension travel on lowered vehicles
  • Increase strut extension travel for more traction on drag race cars
  • No interference with hoods or strut tower braces - a common problem with some other brands
  • TIG welded and nickel plated for strength and durability

    • Read Steeda's blog post to learn more about the truth behind caster and camber products: http://www.steedablog.com/2012/08/the-truth-about-camber-caster-plates-and-strut-mounts/

    Time to install: About 2 Hours

    Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

    Tools needed: Basic Tools

column1: @2418@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2418@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-suspension-package-555-2110/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda G/Trac Mustang Suspension Package - Stage 1 (86-89 Coupe)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-2110.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2110-2.jpg
column5:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2110-4.jpg^@^555-2110^@^

Steeda's G/Trac Suspension Systems include everything needed to build an awesome handling car with excellent street manners. Steeda's G/Trac suspension components are proven components tested through decades of experience gained from street and racetrack testing.

Each stage provides an outstanding improvement in performance and a well balanced car at the end of each stage. This means you do not have to do each stage in numerical order to achieve improvements. Each stage can be done individually at any time as your budget or upgrade needs dictate.

Steeda’s Stage 1 suspension package lays the foundation for proper handling and builds a base for any future modifications by addressing three essential elements needed for performance.

  • Sport Lowering Springs lower the center of gravity and reduce body roll while maintaining the great ride quality Steeda springs are known for.
  • Strut Tower and lower G/Trac braces stiffen the body structure to stabilize the suspension during hard cornering and reduce body shake and rattles. Steeda G/Trac bars are included with 86-93 cars. 94+ have factory G/Trac style bars so our kits do not include them.
  • Caster Camber Plates allow you to set proper alignment and improve caster geometry while eliminating suspension “slop” at the top of the strut tower. Improved caster gives you straighter highway tracking with less wander and better self centering steering feel. Increased caster also gives you better tire contact patch area during braking or better more consistent braking performance.

Time to install: About 7 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Model(s): 5.0L V8 V6 2.3L

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

Looking to improve performance or just rebuild your stock front suspension? This cost effective upgrade is exactly what you need! Steeda has put these packages together to allow you to effectively restore your front suspension to better than new condition for better than new performance!

This package includes Steeda's awesome caster/camber plates offset lower A-arm bushings offset rack bushings swaybar endlink bushings swaybar pivot bushings and front spring isolators.

^@^Mustang^@^ GT ^@^Mustang Drivetrain^@^1993 1992 1991 1990 1989 1988 1987 1986 1985 1984 1983 ^@^Mustang Drivetrain Accessories^@69.95 @2438@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2438@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-clutch-cable-172-0301/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Non-Adjustable Clutch Cable - 82-93^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/172-0301.jpg^@^172-0301^@^

All Steeda clutch cables features a stainless steel inner cable and low friction Teflon lining along with a high-durometer bushing at the firewall for improved clutch response and cable life. This bushing is much more durable and will not prematurely split and fail like lesser bushings. Steeda is the only company with these features making this the finest quality clutch cable you can get for your Mustang.

Steeda's stainless steel cable will not allow the cable to rust through and is more durable unlike all other cables on the market that are made from lesser quality galvanized steel.

Clutch adjustment can be adjusted by turning a nut at the end of the cable when the cable is used in combination with the required Steeda’s aluminum quadrant.

Part number 172-0000 is designed specifically to be a direct bolt-on to '79-'95 Mustangs with V8 Engine. PN 172-0201 is the correct length and has the proper bracket for direct bolt-in replacement in any '96-'04 GT Bullitt or Cobra. PN 172-0301 is a non-adjustable stock-replacement cable.

Please Note: All cables shown require an aftermarket quadrant like Steeda's Double Hook Quadrant!

Product Benefits

  • High durability
  • Improved clutch response and cable life
  • Stainless steel cable will not rust through

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

This special tool is designed to remove and install the pulley on Ford (and Eaton) superchargers. The replacement of the press-on supercharger pulley for the Ford series superchargers (Cobra Lightning and Harley-Davidson trucks) is a straight-forward procedure with this tool but does require that the engine be completely cooled down before removal of the existing pulley or installation of the replacement pulley. The best procedure is to allow the car/engine to sit overnight before beginning the procedure.

Think all control arms are the same? Think again Steeda has raised the standard for others to follow. This revolutionary new arm features a one-piece billet design that is far superior to the twisted and welded steel arms available today. The solid billet construction virtually eliminates deflection without sacrificing weight. Each arm weighs under 7 lbs. (Competitors arms weigh 30% more.)

The adjustable spring seat allows you to raise or lower the rear of your Mustang up to 1"

@2446@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2446@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-2003-2004-cobra-mustang-sport-springs-223-9004/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Cobra Mustang Sport Springs (03-04 Cobra)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/223-9004.jpg^@^223-9004^@^

Springs are the foundation of good handling. So start with the best. Our experience and expertise in high performance street and racing suspension systems is second to none. Put that experience to work for you. Steeda springs are all custom made to our specifications. Specifications that have been refined and improved through years of testing.

Steeda's performance lowering springs improve the overall handling of the by lowering the center of gravity and reducing body roll and pitching during braking. The reduced longitudinal pitch of the vehicle during heavy braking improves the overall braking efficiency. The higher rate of the front springs reduces the amount of load transferred to the front tires. This causes the load on all four tires to be more evenly distributed providing additional traction to the rear tires. The additional gain in rear traction can also improve brake performance and result in reduced braking distances.

The increase in spring rate also reduces body roll which improves handling and steering response. Reduced body roll also confines the suspension geometry to stay within parameters that enhance the tire contact patch relative to the road The result is improved vehicle cornering and handling. Higher cornering limits can be achieved as the built in understeer characteristics of the vehicle are reduced and provide for a more neutral handling platform.

All these benefits along with the excellent ride quality Steeda Sport springs are famous for. Steeda Sport Springs give you the best of both worlds. Performance and ride quality.

2003-04 Cobra Sport Springs

  • Lowers Cobra .75"
column3:
rear

  • Spring rate rear working range 650-790 lb/in

    • Big improvement in handling and noticeable reduction in nosedive

column1: @2447@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2447@^http://www.steeda.com/ford-racing-cobra-mustang-supercharger-161-m-6066-ct46p/^@^Steeda^@^Ford Racing Mustang Supercharger - Polished - Stock TB (03-04 Cobra)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/161-m-6066-ct46p.jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/161-m-6066-ct46p-1.jpg^@^161-M-6066-CT46P^@^

Get the same ultra-efficient Whipple twin-screw supercharger that's utilized on the new 550HP Ford GT. With the industry's largest most efficient latest designed twin-screw superchargers the Whipple can produce incredible power levels with the stock 4.6L Cobra engine as well as highly modified engines. Run 8-15psi of boost on pump gas and have the ability to produce nearly 25psi for racing applications.

This is a direct bolt-on replacement with dramatically lower temps and power consumption (hp) than the factory Eaton roots-type supercharger. The Whipple Supercharger has passed the OEM standards to be factory equipment on the Ford GT and will provide you with unsurpassed reliability and durability. With the latest rotor bearing and case design Whipple is simply the best available option.

It's a simple fact that the Whipple-Lysholm supercharger has gone through more endurance testing and has passed the strenuous standards of Ford as well as Eaton. Whipple's Cobra kit not only offers a better supercharger but also offers far more engineering to help produce more power per pound of boost than any other supercharger. The Whipple supercharger inlet is nearly 35% larger which offers a much lower possibility for starving the compressor for air at high power levels. The Whipple discharge plate offers far more plenum area as well as a much greater radius to help distribute the air evenly over the entire intercooler core. Whipple's air bypass system also actually functions properly. This allows for lower discharge temps and less parasitic losses during operation.

Product Features

  • INSTANT BOOST / HORSEPOWER &
column3:
TORQUE AT ANY RPM
  • Largest displacement screw compressor available.
  • Direct bolt on replacement. CAD designed air inlet for maximum air flow.
  • Available for stock throttle body or larger mouth mono blade (Accufab Billetflow).
  • More power cooler charge temp less power consumption/parasitic loss than stock Eaton.
  • Up to 95% efficiency.
  • Over 80hp gain at 13psi.
  • Best $$ value bolt on.
  • More power than headers cam throttle body MAF meter chip and filter COMBINED.
  • No "
column5:
(stock Eaton is 13 psi @ 4000 and only 10.5 psi @ 6000).
  • No "
column7:
as with centrifugals and turbos. Boost range 8 - 25 psi.
  • No need for separate oil reservoir system or “catch can”.
  • Billet oversized bypass valve for decreased operating temps.
  • Internally lubricated. No tapping holes in pan required.
  • Factory fit and finish.
  • Kit includes supercharger supercharger inlet adapter plate pulley pulley plate drive belt and hardware kit
  • Kits include Ford Racing Pro-Cal tool with custom calibration with improved throttle response. Calibrations are 50 state emissions legal.
  • Simple bolt on increase at the rear wheels of 85 horsepower and 50 ft./lbs. of torque
  • Designed by Ford Racing and Whipple engineers
  • Installation of this kit will void your new vehicle engine warranty

    • Time to install: About 12 Hours

    Level of difficulty: Tech Required

    Tools needed: Basic Tools

Changing supercharger pulleys for more boost is a popular way to add more power to the '03 and '04 Cobra. What many people don't realize is that the factory supercharger system is designed to bleed off extra boost. The Steeda Boost Bypass kit maintains maximum boost during wide open throttle to get the most power from the supercharger pulley upgrade. Installation is simple and only takes a few minutes.

Product Benefits

Steeda High Velocity Cold Air Kits all feature a new Velocity Stack for improved airflow bringing more oxygen into the cylinder for better combustion.

Designed to work with the Mach 1 signature Shaker Hood Scoop this model produces measurable results on the dyno - we gained 9.7 RWHP and 14.3 lb. ft. of torque on a recent installation.

In addition to the Steeda Logo stainless steel airbox the kit also includes a Steeda Lifetime Filter that can easily be cleaned and re-oiled making maintenance a snap. All hardware required for installation is included in the kit along with illustrated instructions.

The kit mounts in the same location of the factory plastic piece it replaces and it installs simply with just a few hand tools. Plenty of performance for the bucks!

  • Lifetime filter
  • Keeps hot air out cold air in

Steeda's high velocity cold air intake earns its name due to the exclusive velocity stack design.

The radiused entry of the velocity stack design increases and straightens airflow into the mass air for greater power and a cleaner MAF signal.

With a clean MAF signal you get better drivability than other designs and makes it easier to dyno tune if you choose to get your car tuned. The result is better power and the best drivability available.

Features a reusable dual cone filter with more surface area than single cone models to feed the most air into the velocity stack. Also features a stainless steel heat shield to isolate it from hotter underhood air keeping air charge temperatures within 10 degrees of ambient!

Includes all the necessary hardware for a direct bolt-on installation. Expect 9 to 13 rear wheel horsepower depending on model year.

Product Benefits

  • Added horsepower and torque
  • Lifetime filter
  • Keeps hot air out cold air in
  • Stainless Steel Housing &

Increases Overall Performance with a BBK Off-road X pipe. A BBK X-pipe will greatly improve your Mustang's exhaust flow and also increase overall performance and sound.

This BBK direct replacement X-pipe features 2.5" diameter CNC mandrel bent aluminized tubing and a merged X crossover to improve exhaust flow. Additional features include factory O2 sensor locations and OEM style die-stamped flanges all to ensure a perfect fit. Specifically designed to fit the 1999 to 2004 4.6L Mustangs including the GT Bullitt Mach 1 and SVT Cobra. This Off-Road X-pipe is a direct fit replacement for the stock mid pipe. Please note: This BBK product is not legal for use in emission restrictive states. Warning: This part has been designed and is intended for off-road application only. @2470@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2470@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-underdrive-pulleys-701-0004/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Underdrive Pulleys (01 Cobra 03-04 Mach 1 03-04 Marauder)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/701-0004.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/701-0004-10.jpg
column13:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/701-0004-9.jpg^@^701-0004^@^

Steeda is the leader in underdrive pulley design for the 4.6L engines. Steeda was the first to achieve SFI approval on our underdrive pulleys for all 4.6L engines. Our underdrive pulleys are the only pulleys engineered through our unique partnership in Ford's technology transfer program to have the proper torsional vibration dampening characteristics for your 4.6L engine. No other manufacturer can make this claim.

Don't be fooled by other manufacturer's and their "
column15: process claims. Steeda uses the latest technology directly from O.E. sources. Steeda's crank pulley is a one piece nodular iron injection molded rubber design. Not a cheap &quot
column17:
design like many of our competitors use. Special rubber materials were chosen for their ability to absorb the torsional vibrations and their ability to withstand underhood temperatures.

Steeda's underdrive pulleys slow down accessory speed by about 25% reducing parasitic acccessory drag on the engine. This drag reduction results in an increase of up to 10 horsepower and increased gas mileage! Get back the horsepower and torque your belt driven accessories steal and start enjoying better performance and gas mileage today!

Notes: Midway through the production run for the 2001 model year Ford changed the design of the water pump on the 4.6L engine. The older style pump produced from 1996 to mid 2001 had a longer shaft. In January of 2001 the design of the pump was changed to a shorter shaft. This necessitated a change in the design of the pump pulley.

Notes: Midway through the production run for the 2001 model year Ford changed the design of the water pump on the 4.6L engine. The older style pump produced from 1996 to mid 2001 had a longer shaft. In January of 2001 the design of the pump was changed to a shorter shaft. This necessitated a change in the design of the pump pulley.

column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/077-017-kit-2.jpg^@^077-017-KIT^@^

Product and Design

Each premium grade rotor is quality controlled precision drilled and mill slotted with 30 years of engineering experience manning the process. Our precision design pattern for holes and slots results in a reduction of up to 200 degree Fahrenheit in temperature compared to original OE rotors. This is imperative to safety during heavy breaking and in rain this pattern dissipates water improving your braking in any weather condition.

The slot pattern acts as a mechanism to constantly clean the pad surface to ensure maximum grip every time you apply your brakes. Cooler operation reduces the risk of brake fade and of warping the rotor always ensuring maximum friction between pad and rotor. This prolongs the maximum effective life of both the rotor and the pad.

With all these mechanisms at work to achieve the benefits of safety and performance our designs also allow them to operate at low noise levels ensuring comfort and convenience.

Design Options

Today's vehicles have very open patterned alloy rims exposing the brake rotor. Intensive design and a quality finish with a bright Zinc Electroplating treatment ensures a very clean and eye catching rotor that does not rust.

Kit Includes

  • Front &
column5:

  • Zinc Electroplated rotor that does not rust
  • ISO 9001:2008 Certified

This upgrade kit is for converting a 555-3155 or 555-3156 Steeda Cold Air intake for standard 5.0L Mustangs to a 555-3162 Boss specific system for use with BOSS intake manifolds.

Upgrade kit includes a larger 101mmm replacement MAF housing larger intake tube specifically designed to be used with the Boss manifold silicone sleeves replacement hose clamps and a template for modifying your heat shield for the larger MAF housing.

Due to the larger MAF size over our standard 5.0L GT cold air specific tuning is required to use these parts. Tunes designed for the original MAF housing size are not correct and must be updated.

^@^Mustang^@^ GT Boss ^@^Mustang Body Kits^@^2014 2013 2012 2011 2010 ^@^Mustang Front Splitters^@^389.95^ @2502@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2502@^http://www.steeda.com/classic-design-concepts-convertible-lightbar-w-interior-dome-light-charcoal-067-110000-il/^@^Steeda^@^Classic Design Concepts Convertible Lightbar w/ Interior Dome Light - Charcoal (05-14)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/1_kqv9-fw.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/2_z4zf-8n.jpg; http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/3_owp3-7e.jpg^@^067-110000-IL^@^

The convertible Mustang has been a very popular vehicle for many decades. In most cases however the front of the Mustang tends to make more of an impression than the side profile because a convertible lacks definition when the top is down. Enhance the flat side profile of your convertible Mustang with a Classic Design Concepts Light Bar and give your car a sportier look that is sure to catch a whole lot of attention!

This light bar has been engineered to fit the curves and natural lines of your Mustang to provide a factory fit. The high mounted LED light provides added safety with a highly visible 3rd brake light. If rain should attempt to spoil your cruise the factory top effortlessly fits over the light bar as it does not interfere with any original factory functions.

With the iLightBar you no longer have to struggle to see what's in your back seat. Whether your top is up or down this fully integrated dome light system will give you all the illumination you need with three bright white LEDs. Cutting edge design and pure functionality the recessed dome light is bright stylish and long overdue!

The light bar is constructed of a sturdy 1-1/4" round steel tube with a 1/8" wall thickness. Polyurethane is then molded around the tube and hand-wrapped in vinyl grained to match your car's interior trim. The bar is supplied with brackets that are mounted to the B pillars giving the light bar a sturdy mount and also stiffening the body.

Revised wiring automatically disables the lights when the convertible top is closed no external cut-off switch needed.

Product Benefits
column8: >Extra brake light for safety

column1: @2610@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2610@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-2011-2014-shelby-gt500-radiator-support-555-5083/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda GT500 Lightweight Radiator Support (11-14 GT500)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-5083.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/8/555-5083(2).jpg^@^555-5083^@^

Steeda's Lightweight Tubular Front Radiator Support was the first one on the market that allowed you to maintain your front swaybar and reduce weight at the same time! Our competitors took years before catching on to this.

Our engineers designed this support from super strong and light 4130 chrome moly alloy steel material. This resulted in a tubular support that is much lighter than the factory piece. Your factory radiator support weighs in at 17 pounds our easy to install radiator support comes in at less than 8 pounds for an easy 9+ pound weight reduction off the front of the car. That is over half the weight of the stock steel unit and yet is still strong enough for you to run your front swaybar when not at the drag strip and tough enough to withstand the rigors of autocross and road course competition. This support is the perfect item for the road course/autocross car to reduce front end weight and improve weight distribution.

Compared to changing the K-member our tubular radiator support improves weight distribution by 0.3% and takes weight right off the nose of the car which is ideal. A typical tubular K-member improves weight distribution 0.4% yet costs many hundreds of dollars more is much more complicated/costly to install which ads even more cost and is not removing weight from the front nose of the vehicle making ours the best bang for your buck piece for performance and weight reduction.

Our tubular radiator support works with or without the swaybar also with or without the factory Z-brace found underneath the 2011-14 GT models. Fits the factory original Steeda and most aftermarket front swaybars.

Our radiator support is tig welded and powdercoated in silver metal flake which makes for a great looking piece. It accepts all factory hardware also. This brace bolts directly in place of the factory piece and can be installed by practically anyone in their garage or driveway.

Product Benefits

  • Made from High Strength 4130 Steel
  • Light weight and lose it off the front of the car!
  • OEM Quality and Easy installation
  • A Must for any Hardcore Drag strip enthusist

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

@2631@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2631@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-2007-2010-shelby-gt500-mustang-radiator-support-555-5079/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Lightweight Radiator Support (07-10 GT500)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-5079.jpg^@^555-5079^@^

Steeda's Lightweight Tubular Front Radiator Support was the first one on the market that allowed you to maintain your front swaybar and reduce weight at the same time! Our competitors took years before catching on to this.

Our engineers designed this support from super strong and light 4130 chrome moly alloy steel material. This resulted in a tubular support that is much lighter than the factory piece. Your factory radiator support weighs in at 17 pounds our easy to install radiator support comes in at less than 7 pounds for an easy 10+ pound weight reduction off the front of the car. That is over half the weight of the stock steel unit and yet is still strong enough for you to run your front swaybar when not at the drag strip and tough enough to withstand the rigors of autocross and road course competition. This support is the perfect item for the road course/autocross car to reduce front end weight and improve weight distribution.

Compared to changing the K-member our tubular radiator support improves weight distribution by 0.3% and takes weight right off the nose of the car which is ideal. A typical tubular K-member improves weight distribution 0.4% yet costs many hundreds of dollars more is much more complicated/costly to install which ads even more cost and is not removing weight from the front nose of the vehicle making ours the best bang for your buck piece for performance and weight reduction.

Our tubular radiator support works with or without the swaybar. Fits the factory original Steeda and most aftermarket front swaybars.

Our radiator support is tig welded and powdercoated in silver metal flake which makes for a great looking piece. It accepts all factory hardware also. This brace bolts directly in place of the factory piece and can be installed by practically anyone in their garage or driveway.

Product Benefits

  • Made from High Strength 4130 Steel
  • Light weight and lose it off the front of the car!
  • OEM Quality and Easy installation
  • A Must for any Hardcore Drag strip enthusist

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column4:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/4/701-0005a-6_gwd9-yy.jpg^@^031-PBU1187-SS25^@^

Steeda is the leader in underdrive pulley design for the 4.6L engines. Steeda was the first to achieve SFI approval on our underdrive pulleys for all 4.6L engines. Our underdrive pulleys are the only pulleys engineered through our unique partnership in Ford's technology transfer program to have the proper torsional vibration dampening characteristics for your 4.6L engine. No other manufacturer can make this claim.

Don't be fooled by other manufacturers and their "
column6: process claims. Steeda uses the latest technology directly from O.E. sources. Steeda's crank pulley is a one piece nodular iron injection molded rubber design. Not a cheap &quot
column8:
design like many of our competitors use. Special rubber materials were chosen for their ability to absorb the torsional vibrations and their ability to withstand underhood temperatures. Steeda's underdrive pulleys slow down accessory speed by about 25% reducing parasitic accessory drag on the engine. This drag reduction results in an increase of up to 10 horsepower and increased gas mileage!

Read more about Steeda Mustang Underdrive Pulleys by clicking here.

Product Benefits

column1:
@2635@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2635@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-mustang-belt-tensioner-555-3347/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Mustang Heavy Duty Belt Tensioner - Stock - Supercharged 05-10 4.6L^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-3347.jpg^@^555-3347^@^

Stop your OEM belt tensioner bracket from bending with Steeda's new Tensioner kit! A major problem with Supercharged applications as the increased belt length and tension puts unwanted stress on the factory tensioner. A real problem is when you kick the clutch and pull the next gear the RPMS suddenly drop.

With the extra rotating mass of the supercharger and weight of all the accessories it will jerk the belt and sometimes hurt your OEM tensioner. It causes it to flex and in the end you usually end up with broken belts that are hard to find and expensive. A great fix for all blown Roush Saleen and other bolt on supercharger applications. Kit is available with a factory pulley or an optional billet one.

Note: 555-3358 is designed for use with Whipple supercharger kits with a 3.625"
column2:
- 3.25 blower pulley. These kits require a 90mm idler.

Product Benefits

  • Made to be stronger than the OEM unit
  • Helps prevent belt breakage
  • Cheap and inexpensive way to increase performance and durability
  • A Must for Supercharged applications

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 2010 2009 2008 2007 2006 2005

Model(s): Bullitt GT

Transmission(s): Manual Automatic

Increase boost and add tire-shredding horsepower!

Steeda's GT500 supercharger pulley directly replaces the factory supercharger pulley and gives approximately 3 PSI of extra boost.

Manufactured out of billet steel not aluminum like others on the market and nickel-plated for durability and great looks.

Also available for the Ford GT supercar (not shown).

In house testing has shown increases of over 125 HP and 100 ft. lbs. of torque to the rear tires! (Tested on GT500 with Steeda CAI Pulley and Tune)

Note: This product requires a custom tune.

Product Benefits

  • More Horsepower and Torque to the rear tires!!
  • 100% made in the USA by Steeda.
  • Exceeds OEM Quality with superior durability.

Love the new Steeda ST-R Black wheel? How about pairing them with Nitto's max performance NT05 tires and saving big $$$ to boot?! We've made it happen with this staggered wheel and tire combo from Steeda!

Steeda's ST-R mesh wheels for the Ford Mustang offer great style and strength. Using a low pressure casting process gives these wheels lower weight than standard gravity cast wheels.

Steeda's ST-R mesh wheel is designed to clear most popular big brake kits such as Steeda's 14 inch 4 piston brake set up. These Steeda ST-R wheels add an aggressive stance when staggered and give maximum traction. Can easily be installed in your driveway.

Package includes two 20 x 9.5 and two 20 x 11 ST-R wheels.

Package includes 4 Nitto NT05 tires. Tire sizes are two 275/35R20 and two 315/35R20.

Note: Stock Tire Pressure Sensors must be transferred for 2015 Mustang owners.

Product Benefits

  • Strong pressure cast construction
  • Save on this combo package
  • Will clear big brake kits

Add the aggressive race inspired design of the World Challenge splitter to your Mustang GT from Ford Racing.

The World Challenge front splitter is designed to direct the air under and around the car to reduce drag and improve down force and also effectively force air through the cooling system.

This front splitter is manufactured from ABS plastic material for its light-weight and superior durability.

Please note: The Ford Racing World Challenge Front Splitter is designed to fit the 2010 to 2012 Mustangs with the GT/CS California Special lower front fascia (BR3Z-17626-AB) installed. This splitter will not fit the standard GT or V6 front fascia.

If you want to give your 2010 Mustang V6 the look and sound of a GT then get the Magnaflow Dual Exhaust Cat-back System. This cat-back not only improves sound but it also improves horsepower with it's non restrictive mandrel bent design.

Unlike other aftermarket V6 dual exhaust kits that require cutting and welding the stock mid-pipe the Magnaflow system simply bolts right up to the stock factory Y-pipe.

Constructed from high quality 2.5" mandrel bent stainless steel piping this Cat-Back Exhaust system from Magnaflow features two aggressive straight-through style mufflers that end in brightly polished 4" stainless tips.

This cat-back will bolt up to the factory Y-Pipe without any modification.

Magnaflow's X-Pipe uses free-flowing mandrel-bent piping with a Tru-X "X" style crossover to improve exhaust flow and to produce significantly more horsepower and torque at the rear wheels.

This free flowing Magnaflow Tru-X X-pipe for the 2010 Mustang GT will not only increases power but with its "X" crossover pipe design it also adds a crisp raspy race car growl to the sound of your exhaust.

The installation of the Magnaflow Cut and Clamp Tru-X X-Pipe requires cutting and removing the stock H-pipe and reuses the factory catalytic converters saving you money. Clamps and instructions are provided.

Magnaflow constructs their Cut and Clamp X-Pipes from 2.5" mandrel bent Stainless Steel tubing for improved exhaust flow and long life.

This Magnaflow Cut and Clamp Tru-X X-Pipe is a specifically designed for use on 2010 4.6L V8 Mustang GT's.
