^@^Mustang^@^ GT ^@^Mustang Exhaust^@^2010 ^@^Mustang X-Pipes^@^449.95^ @2660@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2660@^http://www.steeda.com/bbk-ceramic-long-tube-mustang-headers-07-10-gt500-035-16490/^@^Steeda^@^BBK Ceramic Long Tube Mustang Headers (07-10 GT500)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/530/detailed/5/bbk-stainless-long-tube-mustang-headers-07-10-gt500-035-16495_6100-jq.jpg^@^035-16490^@^

Improve the performance of your Shelby GT500 with a set of BBK Long Tube Headers. These BBK Ceramic Coated Headers will greatly improve your mustangs exhaust flow over the restrictive factory manifolds and increase your horsepower and torque. Significant increases in rear wheel horsepower have been seen when installed with a matching BBK shorty X pipe.

These Long Tube Headers are completed in BBK's Polished Silver Ceramic Coating that look great and reduce under hood temperatures to help increase horsepower. Ceramic Coated headers will long out last both chrome plated and polished headers.

BBK Long Tube Exhaust headers are manufactured from 1-3/4" CNC mandrel bent tubing for unrestricted airflow. And feature one piece laser cut 3/8" header flanges for added strength leak-free performance and OEM fit. These headers are then completed in a polished ceramic finish for good looks and to lower under hood temperatures.

These Ceramic Long Tube Headers are designed to fit the 2007-2010 Mustang Shelby GT500. BBK long tube headers require a flanged end shorty midpipe in order to function properly. BBK recommends using a BBK shorty X-Pipe for the best performance gains (see drop down option above).

This dual pump system is the same high flow system used in the factory supercharged GT500 Mustang. It is a direct drop in to the factory fuel tank and includes an upgraded fuel pump driver and plug in wiring harness for a complete hassle free installation.

Capable of up to 600hp on factory fuel rails. Higher capacity possible with modified fuel systems. Custom tuning is required when using these components.

Note: Use 161-M-9407-MSVTA on 2010 GT models. 05-09 kit is not compatible with 2010 fuel level gauge.

Steeda's Tri-Ax short throw shifter dramatically improves your 2015 Mustang's gear shifting.

This straight forward install takes only about an hour and a half and you probably have all the tools you need sitting in your tool box. Dramatically improve the driving experience with this short throw shifter!

Steeda's Tri-Ax shifter for the 2015 Mustang V6 EcoBoost and GT is crafted from billet aluminum steel and composite components for solid construction and to provide no increase in shifter NVH. This shifter will provide a 20% shorter throw and retains full reverse lockout functionality of the factory shifter and also allows for spring pressure adjustment.

The re-engineered pivot mechanism provides no change in shifter knob height to preserve shifter ergonomics while still providing a shorter throw - nickel plated finish for great looks and corrosion protection.

Note: Accepts factory shift knobs and aftermarket knobs with M12 x 1.25 thread pitch. Easy to install and does not require any permanent modifications to your vehicle. Comes with a lifetime warranty!

Product Benefits

  • 20% throw reduction
  • Made of high quality billet materials
  • Retains reverse lock-out
  • Comes with a lifetime warranty

column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/IMG_9234-1_kw3f-yb.JPG^@^012-MAMT011^@^

Axle exchange's aluminum driveshafts for the 2011 through 2014 Mustangs have been throughly tested to make them the best aluminum 1-piece driveshaft available!

These driveshafts do not use a flange adapter like competitive versions which can contribute to driveline vibrations. Instead they come with a completely new and easy to install pinion flange which the driveshaft directly bolts to.

Weighing 24lbs less than the factory GT model driveshaft these 1 piece driveshaft greatly reduce rotating mass giving you up to 2 tenths improvement in 1/4 mile performance! Improved acceleration that you can feel.

Rated to safely hold up to 800 rear wheel horsepower. This driveshaft will satisfy practically any performance enthusiasts needs.

Note: If you have had your factory 2 piece driveshaft center bearing fail that bearing cannot be replaced without buying a whole new shaft which is nearly double the price of our driveshaft. Upgrade your driveshaft today!

Product Benefits

  • Up to 2 tenths improvement in 1/4 mile
  • Reduced rotating mass and vehicle weight
  • Smooth operation

Time to install: About 1 1/2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

@2777@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2777@^http://www.steeda.com/boss-mustang-power-pack-555-3941/^@^Steeda^@^Boss Mustang Power Pack - 12-13^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-3934_ndj8-gi.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/x4.jpg
column4:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/5/555-3156_gpjj-x8.jpg^@^555-3941^@^

*Peak gains of up to 32 hp!*

As good as the Boss 302 Mustang is there is still room for improvement and Steeda has found it with our Boss 302 Ultimate Induction Power Pack!

Designed in-house by our engineering staff specifically for the Boss 302. The high performance CAI of our Power Pak effectively opens up the intake system of Ford's five-liter power plant and allows it to breath much more freely than the stock intake system allows - taking your Boss 302 Mustang to the next level of performance.

Our engineers started with a large surface area high-flow nano-fiber air filter added our famous “race-tested” velocity stack entry and then designed a stainless steel heat shield with a durable rubber gasket to seal the shield against the vehicle’s hood. Next we increased the MAF housing size to 101mm and coupled it to a new higher flowing Pro-Flow inlet hose with our Cool-Tube Technology.

To ensure the densest air charge possible we retained the factory cold air feed ducting from the front bumper. Steeda was the first company to do this starting in 2010 with our 2010 GT intake and have carried this innovation over to the 2011-12 models. We also sealed the stainless steel shield to the hood to prevent any hot air from being sucked in from around the engine compartment. Some manufacturers have chosen to ignore the factory cold air ducting. Some claim they use it when it is really just hanging there blowing air into an open unsealed compartment. While others don't bother to seal and isolate the airbox which are all keys to keeping the lowest air charge temperatures possible. Also our billet aluminum velocity stack and high flow air filter ensure a clean streamlined air charge into the engine.

This Cold Air Intake is so effective at improving airflow into the five-liter engine that a performance tune is not just recommended it is required for maximum performance! In an effort to maximize performance and provide our customers with only the very best products we have partnered with the leader in automotive tuning - SCT Performance.

SCT Performance is the leader in the Ford tuning industry and Steeda's partner in developing this powerful package.

"
column5: SCT has seen the highest horsepower and torque results while using Steeda's Cold Air Kit over any other brand.&quot
column6:
- Chris Johnson President of SCT Performance

Combined with the included custom tune using an included SCT X4 Flash programming device we have achieved dramatic power increases.

Peak to Peak gains of up to 28hp and 22ft/lbs of torque have been achieved with point to point gains of as much as 32 horsepower and 25 ft/lbs of torque!

Our power increase it not just a peak number at one point in the band. The actual power increase is spread throughout the entire rpm range so your increased performance is available on demand in any gear at virtually any rpm!

Note: requires a minimum of 91 octane fuel for power gains. Please provide your 4 digit processor code off your PCM sticker located on the front passenger side of the engine compartment for your calibration.

Please contact our Steeda sales reps if you need assistance finding this code.

You can purchase the cold air intake by itself if you already own a flash programming device and intend to have your own custom tuning done. Check out our Boss 302 Cold Air Intake by itself by clicking here.

Warning: This part has been designed and is intended for off-road application only. Installation of this part on a vehicle that is driven on public roads may violate U.S. and Canadian laws and regulations.

Lifetime Tune Program: Purchasing this Steeda Power Package automatically registers you into Steeda's Lifetime Tune Program at no extra cost! To learn more about Steeda's Lifetime Tune Program click here.

Product Benefits

  • Boss specific intake tube for proper fitment on Boss 302
  • Easy bolt on installation
  • Peak gains of up to 32 horsepower
  • Power increase across entire power band

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

Model year(s): 2013 2012

Model(s): Boss

Transmission(s): Manual

column1: @2778@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2778@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-gt500-power-package-555-3949/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda GT500 Mustang Power Pack (13-14 GT500)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/1/555-3949.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/x4_ieav-10.jpg^@^555-3949^@^

*Gain up to 70 hp and 68 lb/ft of torque!*

For 2013-14 GT500 owners looking for even more power our Big Bore 130mm cold air and SCT tuner package will unleash the power Ford held back from your already powerful 5.8L GT500. Designed tested and assembled all in-house. This package completely replaces the factory intake assembly and is specifically designed to utilize the factory cold air feed from the grille and incorporates a serviceable high flow air filter an injection molded high flow intake tube billet velocity stack and black powdercoated heat shield.

With a huge 130mm mass air flow tube diameter we achieved a substantial increase in air flow at all engine rpm's not just at redline. Because of the huge size of the mass air housing this kit must be used with a custom tuning which is included using the proven SCT Xcalibrator 4 tuning device.

The heat shield seals to the hood liner and also keeps the factory cold air feed duct to keep out hot engine bay air for maximum power. Power gains are substantial with peak to peak gains of up to 60 horsepower and point to point horsepower gains of over 70 horsepower. You can expect peak to peak torque gains of up to 54 ft/lbs with point to point gains of over 68 ft/lbs.

Our easy to install kit comes with premium hardware silicone sleeves and installation instructions.

Warning: This part has been designed and is intended for off-road application only. Installation of this part on a vehicle that is driven on public roads may violate U.S. and Canadian laws and regulations.

Lifetime Tune Program: Purchasing this Steeda Power Package automatically registers you into Steeda's Lifetime Tune Program at no extra cost! To learn more about Steeda's Lifetime Tune Program click here.

Package Package Includes

  • 555-3173 - Steeda GT500 Mustang BIG BORE Cold Air Intake
  • 388-7015 - SCT X4 GT500 Tuner w/ Custom Steeda Tune

Product Benefits

  • Gains up to 70 horsepower and 68 lb/ft of torque!
  • Utilizes the factory cold air feed duct from the grille for low air charge temperatures
  • Beautiful black powdercoated heat shield
  • ProFlow roto molded intake tube offers minimal heat soak maintaining cool air charge temps

Time to install: About 1 Hour

Level of difficulty: Easy

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column1: @2780@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2780@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-stage-2-boss-mustang-handling-package-555-2378/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda Boss 302 Handling Pack - Stage 2 - 12-13 Boss 302^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/2/555-2378.jpg
column3: http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/382/detailed/3/555-2378-2.jpg
column6:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/3/555-2378-5.jpg^@^555-2378^@^

As good as Ford made the Boss 302 Mustang there is still room for improvement to make your Boss even better than it already is with our handling packages.

Our Level 2 package includes our Boss 302 specific springs adjustable upper strut mounts adjustable panhard bar and adjustable front and rear swaybars.

The springs in this package greatly improve the Boss 302's overall weight distribution. This is achieved by lowering the ride height only 0.2 inches in the front but the rear comes down 0.7 to 0.8 inches.

With the front height remaining largely unchanged your front roll center geometry remains optimal. Spring rates are substantially increased to greatly reduce body roll and reduce nose dive under braking for greatly improved control and balance.

Thanks to our decades of engineering experience with Mustang springs these springs achieve all of this while maintaining near stock ride quality characteristics so if you enjoy taking your Boss 302 Mustang around town you will enjoy it even more with these springs!

The included adjustable strut mounts feature a +1/-1 degree range of camber adjustment. Manufactured from billet aluminum billet steel TIG-welded nickel plated and grade 12.9 hardware the bearing chosen for our mounts is a fully caged 70mm diameter 7200lb capacity needle roller bearing for long life and incredible strength. Triple sealed to keep out dirt and water and isolated in a custom designed urethane bushing our mounts provide no increase in NVH while maintaining near O.E. levels of impact harshness and comfort.

Our adjustable front swaybars feature 3 position of adjustment on both the front and rear bars for fine tuning of handling balance. At their stiffest positions the front swaybar has 27% more roll stiffness than stock and 83% in the rear.

Rounding our the package is our adjustable panhard bar which features 4130 chrome moly alloy steel construction not just ordinary mild steel like the factory piece and other aftermarket offerings. Our chrome moly alloy construction makes it lighter than the factory bar by 4 pounds and lighter than any other aftermarket piece.

Our bar is length adjustable to adjust rear end offset to a more optimal position regardless of ride height and our urethane bushings reduce deflection under load for noticeably improved steering response and control.

Add up the parts in this package individually and you will see the great savings and value this package provides. Take your Boss Mustang to the next level of performance and enjoyment today!

Package Includes

  • 555-8245 - Steeda Boss 302 Springs
  • 555-8135 - Steeda Heavy Duty Upper Strut Mounts
  • 555-2551 - Steeda Adjustable Panhard Bar
  • 555-1073 - Steeda Adjustable Rear Swaybar
  • 555-1067 - Steeda Adjustable Competition Front Swaybar

Product Benefits

  • Adjustable swaybars for fine tuning of handling balance
  • Improved weight distribution
  • Greatly increased handling
  • Improved steering response
  • Bolt on installation
  • +1/-1 degree of camber adjustment not available with the factory strut mount which is not adjustable

Time to install: About 8 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Shop Tools

Model year(s): 2013 2012

Model(s): Boss

Transmission(s): Manual

The replacement of the press-on supercharger pulley for the Ford series superchargers (Cobra Lightning and Harley-Davidson trucks) is a straight-forward procedure with this tool but does require that the engine be completely cooled down before removal of the existing pulley or installation of the replacement pulley. The best procedure is to allow the car/engine to sit overnight before beginning the procedure.

@2795@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2795@^http://www.steeda.com/steeda-s550-mustang-bumpsteer-kit-2015-555-8133/^@^Steeda^@^Steeda S550 Mustang Bumpsteer Kit (2015)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/steeda-s550-mustang-bumpsteer-kit-2015-555-8133.jpg
column2:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/steeda-s550-mustang-bumpsteer-kit-2015-555-8133(2).jpg^@^555-8133^@^

* Available mid to late January! *

If you have substantially lowered your vehicle chances are you have introduced bump steer. What is bump steer? Bumpsteer is changes in toe caused by suspension movement.

Every car has bumpsteer however when you lower the vehicle you increase the amount of bumpsteer that occurs if this becomes excessive you will begin to notice some unwanted vehicle driving characteristics. When you turn your steering wheel you are essentially changing the toe of the wheels to turn the vehicle.

Excessive bumpsteer is undesirable because it introduces unwanted steering inputs which means the suspension is steering the car instead of the driver. If your car is lowered and has tracking issues and less predictable steering behavior you need a bumpsteer kit.

Steeda's bumpsteer kits will allow you to correct your bumpsteer geometry and can do so without requiring you to drill or modify your vehicle spindle. In addition our bumpsteer kit makes a great service replacement for your worn out high mileage outer tie rods even if you do not have excessive bumpsteer issues.

Pick up a bumpsteer kit today and refresh your outer tie rods and improve your steering.

Product Benefits

  • Wide range of adjustment
  • Does not require spindle modification for fitment or adjustment
  • Direct replacement installation
  • High quality construction and fit

Time to install: About 2 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

@2796@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2796@^http://www.steeda.com/ford-racing-mustang-half-shaft-upgrade-kit-2015-161-m-4130-m/^@^Steeda^@^Ford Racing Mustang Half Shaft Upgrade Kit (2015)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/7/ford-racing-mustang-half-shaft-upgrade-kit-2015-161-m-4130-m.jpg^@^161-M-4130-M^@^

Ford Racing Upgraded Axle Half Shafts are CNC machined from aerospace high alloy materials and feature billet one-piece 34-spline inner and 32-spline outer stub ends. The CV joints are severe duty serviceable units with CNC billet centers making them ideal for high stress street and race applications. Axle Half Shafts are completed in an Aerospace electrically bonded e-coating for long lasting corrosion resistance.

Note: Estimated availability 12/19/2014.

Product Benefits

  • Direct replacement for right side/passenger side production half shaft assemblies
  • Billet one-piece 34-spline inner and 32-spline outer stub ends
  • Axle shafts feature anti-wheel hop technology
  • Aerospace electrically bonded e-coating to resist corrosion

Time to install: About 4 Hours

Level of difficulty: Tech Recommended

Tools needed: Basic Tools

column1: @2802@^GAS - Steeda^@^GAS - Steeda^@2802@^http://www.steeda.com/vossen-cv1-machined-matte-graphite-mustang-wheel-20x9-05-14-all-819-cv1-0n12/^@^Steeda^@^Vossen CV1 Machined Matte Graphite Mustang Wheel - 20x9 (05-14 All)^@^http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/6/Vossen_CV1_Machined_Matte_Black_Mustang_Wheel_pg9n-a6.jpg
column3:
http://www.steeda.com/images/thumbnails/530/362/detailed/6/Vossen_CV1_Machined_Matte_Black_Mustang_Wheel(3)_wgxl-cl.jpg^@^819-CV1-0N12^@^

Add race inspired styling to your Mustang with a set of Vossen CV1 wheels. The Vossen CV1 features a ten spoke design with a concave face that exaggerates the profile of the wheel for an impressive appearance.

These Vossen wheels aggressively stand out with their Machined Matte Black finish covered with a durable clear coat that is tough enough to withstand the hazards of daily driving.

This 20x9 Vossen CV1 Wheel fits the front and rear of all 2005 to 2014 Mustangs. Stagger with 20x10.5 wheels on the rear for an aggressive muscle car stance.

Product Benefits

  • Crafted using low pressure casting
  • Manufacturers limited 5 year warranty
  • Band and valve stem TPMS compatible

Notes

  • Offset - +32mm (1.25"
